story:
Baring Epitaph: Story from a Pacific Crest Trail

If you want an offer which is not listed in perk section send me an e-mail and we can make arrangements

Hi, my name is Nikola Horvat - Tesla (38), theologian, father of 6 year old boy, divorced, freelance writer and an adventurer. In year 2016 I have successfully finished great journey on Pacific Crest Trail. 

My fund goal is to publish a book. Experience from my journey is vast and turbulent. It was adventure of a lifetime and I think it is unique and inspiring. Besides my personal story there are lots of useful and interesting information about Pacific Crest Trail, people and places somehow connected to this beautiful trail. 

In order to see the tip of an iceberg I invite you to watch documentary about my Pacific Crest Trail adventure. 

 

So, if you decide to fund my book you will contribute to one man's dream that outstrips his personal borders. From poor kid that lived in war environment of 90's, through being a Franciscan in search for God, he became the first Croat that finished 2659 miles of Pacific Crest Trail, but in the process he went thru divorce which led to breakdown so hiking the trail turned out to be a hell of a journey.

 

What I Need & What You Get

  • Where the money goes: - Printing in Croatian language - 4000$
  •                                                 - Translation -                                     1600$
  •                                                 - Editing, lecturing, design -             940$
  •                                                 - Taxes and fees -                                 500$
  •                                             ______________________________________________________
  •                                                 - All together -                                     7040$
  •  
  • So, there are 3 perks for English speakers. Plain E-Book, E-Book and T-shirt, and E-Book, T-shirt and unique photo with credits in the book. So, pick up the one you like the most!!! 

The Impact

There are lots of books with similar topics. But, every adventure is somewhat unique. Mine is inspiring and it was like a roller coaster of emotions. I am not hiding one bit of a story. My suffering is integral part of my journey and I felt I needed to write about it too. But, there was much more than suffering and pain. Positive message is what inspires. Good people and extraordinary hikers that treated me with respect are part of my victory as well. 

Let me get this straight! I don't want to get rich with this book. I just want my story to reach and inspire more people. That is my general goal - to inspire! Every penny I earn is going to be for my next adventure on Continental Divide Trail that I plan to hike in 2018. So next documentary and book are already in plan....as a matter of fact my next book has already over 20 pages :)

Risks & Challenges

In this campaign only E-Book will be available in English language. To be frank, I don't know how vast interest for my book in the world will be. So, for now I will pay for translation of the book, but due to the cost of printing and shipping of the book I will print it later on if enough people show interest

Of course, translation of a book is major work so everybody who buys it will wait for her/his E-Book a little bit more then Croatian readers. I hope that fact will not discourage you to buy it. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some of you don't have funds to help me to publish a book, and others already purchased a book but they want to go step further. No problem. You can share my story so it reaches more people and sponsors. The more people I reach, better the possibility to print an English version. So, please help me spread the word. Thank you for that!

 

Barinški epitaf: priča s Pacific Crest Traila

Ako među perkovima nema kombinacije koju biste željeli pošaljite mi mail pa ćemo složiti perk prema Vašim željama :)

Bok, moje ime je Nikola Horvat – Tesla (38), magistar sam teologije, otac šestogodišnjaka, razveden, slobodni pisac i avanturist. Godine 2016. sam uspješno završio pješačko putovanje na Pacific Crest Trailu.

Moj cilj je izdati knjigu. Iskustvo koje sam doživio na putovanju je široko i turbulentno. Bijaše to iskustvo života, i dakako – jedinstveno, te inspirirajuće. Uz spomenutu osobnu priču u knjizi se mogu naći razne korisne informacije o Pacific Crest Trailu, ali i ljudima i mjestima koji su na razne načine povezani s ovim divnim putem.

Kako biste okusili mali dio mog putovanja pozivam Vas da pogledate dokumentarac o mojoj avanturi.

 

Dakle, ukoliko se odlučite pomoći mi izdati knjigu izravno ćete sudjelovati u snu jednog čovjeka koji je nadišao svoje osobne granice. Od siromašnog dječaka koji je odrastao u ratnom okruženju devedesetih, preko potrage za Bogom u kojoj sam bio na putu da postanem franjevac, pa sve do trenutka kada sam postao prvi Hrvat koji je prehodao Pacific Crest Trail, ali uz muku rastave koja me je na tome putovanju lomila do mjere da je putovanje na mahove postalo uistinu pakleno.

Koliko novaca trebam i što vi dobijete

  • Cijene usluga:
  • - Tisak knjige -                                                 4000$ (25600kn)
  • - Prijevod na engleski -                                  1600$ (10000kn)
  • - Uredništvo, lektura i dizajn -                       940$ (6000kn)
  • - Porezi i naknade -                                           500$ (3200kn)
  • ______________________________________________________
  • - Sve skupa -                                                     7040$ (45000kn)
  • Postoje mogućnost kupnje raznih nagrada - od E-knjige, tiskane knjige, majice, bookmarka, fotografija, pa sve do upoznavanja s autorom, zahvale u knjizi, privatnog predavanja ili loga vaše tvrtke u knjizi. Odaberite, kombinirajte koje vam najviše odgovaraju!
 

Utjecaj

Mnogo je knjiga slične tematike. No, svaka je avantura na neki način jedinstvena. Moja je inspirativna i nadasve emotivna. Ne krijem niti zrnce svoje priče. Patnja je bila sastavni dio moga putovanja i o tome sam morao pisati, ali nije sve bilo patnja i bol. Pozitivni dio priče je ono što inspirira. Dobri ljudi i čudesni suputnici su dobar dio moje pobjede. Američki je vid planinarenja bitno drugačiji od hrvatskog, a moja knjiga tome najbolje svjedoči. Uvjeren sam da će moje iskustvo uvelike utjecati na planinare s naših područja, te da će nakon knjige poželjeti iskočiti iz svoje zone komfora, usuditi se na ono na što su zaista sposobni i proširiti svoj pogled na planine i divljinu!

Ne želim se obogatiti ovom knjigom (da li je to uopće moguće u Hrvatskoj?). Želim da moja priča dođe do što više ljudi, te da ih inspirira. To je moj generalni cilj – inspirirati ljude. Svaku kunu koju zaradim od ove knjige ću uložiti u moj novi projekt – putovanje na Continental Divide Trail (5100 km dugačak trail u SAD-u), a koji planiram za 2018. Dakle, novi dokumentarac i knjiga su već u planu. Štoviše, nova knjiga već ima dvadesetak stranica :)

Rizici i izazovi

Svaka crowdfunding kampanja je rizik i izazov. Tako je i  s ovom kampanjom. Ipak, vjerujem da će ljudi prepoznati moju priču kao dobru, poistovjetiti se, poželjeti pročitati o ovom velikom putovanju. Vid kampanje koji sam uzeo je flexible. To znači da koliko god novaca skupio krenuti ću u tisak kako znao i umio. Za kupca s naših područja to znači da će knjigu dobiti kako god se okrene. Naravno, morati će malo pričekati, ali moje su pretpostavke da bi do Božića knjiga mogla pristići na kupčevu adresu :)

Kako još možete pripomoći

Neki od vas nemaju dovoljno sredstava da bi kupili knjigu, a željeli bi pomoći. Ili pak, već su kupili knjigu, ali željeli bi učiniti još malo. Nije problem! Moju kampanju možete dijeliti na društvenim mrežama ili kontaktirati novinara kojeg poznajete i sugerirati mu da piše o ovoj temi, ili pak sponzora koji bi volio da mu logo firme bude u knjizi. Uspjeh svake kampanje ovisi o tome koliko ljudi čuje za nju. Naime, kupci knjige koji su zainteresirani za ovakvu priču postoje. Štoviše, ima ih mnogo, no informacija treba doći do njih. Hvala Vam što mi u tome pomažete!

story:
Short Summary

  •  My name is Kevin Barron. I am a novelist who draws on personal experiences, the experiences of those I have come in contact with, and the issues and challenges we face in society to write stories. I am currently involved in activism and organizing around prison reform issues.
  • My focus in writing "COLLATERAL CONSEQUENCES"involves around the need for more people to understand the challenges that families of those who are incarcerated face. The day to day issues that they face, emotionally, financially, psychologically are often ignored or neglected. I personally experience these challenges when my wife was incarcerated for nearly 10 years and I had the responsibility of taking care of my five children.
  • Through your contribution I will be able to spread the word of the experiences, pain, challenges, and issues the families of those incarcerated along with their incarcerated loved ones face through my story telling.

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need approximately $5,000 to assist in the following cost: Cover art, Editor, Production, Marketing (including advertisement and public relations), Transportation (book tours, signings. interviews, etc.)
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

Short Summary

 My name is Kevin Barron. I am a novelist who draws on personal experiences, the experiences of those I have come in contact with, and the issues and challenges we face in society to write stories. I am currently involved in activism and organizing around prison reform issues.
My focus in writing "COLLATERAL CONSEQUENCES"involves around the need for more people to understand the challenges that families of those who are incarcerated face. The day to day issues that they face, emotionally, financially, psychologically are often ignored or neglected. I personally experience these challenges when my wife was incarcerated for nearly 10 years and I had the responsibility of taking care of my five children.
Through your contribution I will be able to spread the word of the experiences, pain, challenges, and issues the families of those incarcerated along with their incarcerated loved ones face through my story telling.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need approximately $5,000 to assist in the following cost: Cover art, Editor, Production, Marketing (including advertisement and public relations), Transportation (book tours, signings. interviews, etc.)
Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.


The Impact
Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
Make it real for people and build trust.


Risks & Challenges
People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
Describe your plan for solving these challenges.


Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
It’s not difficult to know the difference between a positive and negative work environment. It’s also not hard to identify what separates a manager from a leader. You cannot see these distinctions in the product a workplace may produce, but you can see it in the faces of those individuals behind the product. Their labour can wear on them, breaking their backs under duress, or it can hold them up like a pedestal where they are proud and energized by the space they are a part of. Understanding the differences in what defines a work environment is not an arduous task, carrying out the actions necessary to create that positive workplace is - and it can be a balancing act of genuine nurturing and outgoing gestures of leadership.

People Above Profit examines the direct correlation between success and a positive work environment. In his book, Dustyn Baulkham B.Mgmt. shows how the beating heart of a company is its employees, and the stronger and more lively that heart beats the better the product of its labour. He shows us real world examples of companies that have fostered genuine care in their employees and how that can translate into a better customer service experience, growing the brand as a result. Dustyn tells us of stories involving managers who treat their employees without trust or compassion and how only focusing on the bottom line alienates those integral pieces of a company and can damage the production of a better product or service.

The limitless aspiration of making one’s being better is the lifeblood that distinguishes Dustyn’s vision from the crowd. Understanding that one can never achieve their “best,” he believes that people are always capable of their better being. In order to attain their better being they need inspiration from leadership and a nurturing, caring environment to create roots in and grow stronger with their colleagues around them. This is why we’ve set up this crowdfunding page, so that we can enact the social change we hope to imbue in businesses worldwide. We want to give you the opportunity to be a part of our vision for a better workspace, a better company motivated to make a change. If you believe in making your being better, or know of a business that could use some help inspiring their employees, help us make that a reality. People Above Profit is the first step towards building the unified company driving to being better.


(Cover Page concept)


What We Need & What You Get

Even with humble beginnings and a singular goal of creating a better work space for everyone, this initiative has grown into something beautiful. That something beautiful is growing into a bigger, vaster being than we can handle by ourselves. So, we need your help.

We wanted to self publish so that we could write this book our way, they way we believe. As inspirational as that may sound it isn’t cheap. It will cost us nearly $6,000 to fully actualize our self published book, and another $1,000 in marketing and promotion to make sure that everyone has an equal opportunity to hear what we have to say.

We want you to feel as much a part of this book as we do, so we would like to offer you a few perks just to let you know how much we appreciate your involvement. In addition to those perks, we will be printing 150 hardcover books that will have hand written copy numbers. The first 50 will be going towards our loving family and friends whose generous and limitless support will continue to carry us forward to no end. The remaining 100 will be available exclusively through this campaign, and be offered to those whose belief in this cause goes above and beyond.


Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone can contribute financially, but that doesn’t mean that you can’t help. Having lots of publicity is just as important as monetary contributions, we can’t spread our message if no one can hear us! Please share our Facebook, Twitter, Indiegogo page or join our email list!

Everything helps! Thank you!

This is why we’ve set up this crowdfunding page, so that we can enact the social change we hope to imbue in businesses worldwide. We want to give you the opportunity to be a part of our vision for a better workspace, a better company motivated to make a change. If you believe in making your being better, or know of a business that could use some help inspiring their employees, help us make that a reality. People Above Profit is the first step towards building the unified company driving to being better.(Cover Page concept)What We Need & What You GetEven with humble beginnings and a singular goal of creating a better work space for everyone, this initiative has grown into something beautiful. That something beautiful is growing into a bigger, vaster being than we can handle by ourselves. So, we need your help. We wanted to self publish so that we could write this book our way, they way we believe. As inspirational as that may sound it isn’t cheap. It will cost us nearly $6,000 to fully actualize our self published book, and another $1,000 in marketing and promotion to make sure that everyone has an equal opportunity to hear what we have to say.We want you to feel as much a part of this book as we do, so we would like to offer you a few perks just to let you know how much we appreciate your involvement. In addition to those perks, we will be printing 150 hardcover books that will have hand written copy numbers. The first 50 will be going towards our loving family and friends whose generous and limitless support will continue to carry us forward to no end. The remaining 100 will be available exclusively through this campaign, and be offered to those whose belief in this cause goes above and beyond. Other Ways You Can HelpWe understand that not everyone can contribute financially, but that doesn’t mean that you can’t help. Having lots of publicity is just as important as monetary contributions, we can’t spread our message if no one can hear us! Please share our Facebook, Twitter, Indiegogo page or join our email list! Everything helps! Thank you!

story:
My name is Quentin Lucas.

I’ve been a writer for as long as I can remember, winning my first storytelling competition in the 2nd grade — with a tale about how cool my dad is — to winning a poetry slam just a few weeks ago. Last year, on December 13, 2014, my father died. Four months later — while trying to get on with life — I was let go from my writing position in corporate America.

A few months after losing my job, I submitted an article to an online magazine. They liked it. I then submitted more articles — to that magazine and others. After some time passed, I was offered a weekly column.  And over these past five months I have been published more frequently than I had been in the previous two years.

In truth, I’m still hurt that my father died. And I’m still frustrated that I lost a job which paid me a living wage for doing what I love doing — so much so that I’ve decided to continue writing, albeit for much less money. In response to a trying time, I’ve adopted a zealous commitment. Honest conversations, quirky perspectives, sexy wordplay — through writing I practice self-preservation.

Fortunately, writing to add value to my life has added value to others’, so I’m currently presented with storytelling opportunities which are exciting but also beyond my financial means:

A Short Film:

I’ve been working with a pair of filmmakers — Alexandre Echeverri and Ezra McDowell — on dramatizing a poetic trilogy of mine about a character who leaves his home in search of the 3 Monarchs of Hip-Hop: The Money Rapper. The Sex Rapper. The Gangster Rapper.

The protagonist wants to know what’s happened to the soul of the music he loves. Presently, we’re looking to secure a budget for filming equipment and actors. You can see a video of The Money Rapper poem below. ($5,000)


A Slam Poetry Show:

John Morello is a longtime performer of an inspirational one-man show for high school students. We’ve been working together on a two-person slam poetry show — targeting high schools — and are looking to build a budget for practice venues, stage equipment, and promotions. ($5000)

The Impact of Your Contributions:

When I write, my target market is my inner child — a poor, inner city American black boy who’d often feel ostracized by a strange and, at times, scary world. Subsequently, while trying to uplift, challenge, and enrich him, I inadvertently do the same for those with similar tastes in humor, beauty, provocative conversations, and, ultimately, a good story about almost any conceivable topic. A strong example of my work would be this piece published by the Huffington Post:

When Men are the “Beautiful Disasters” in Relationships

A successful campaign augments my ability to bring something positive into the world and to collaborate with some really talented people with a reduced concern for financial challenges — which can drastically limit productivity and quality.

Final Thoughts:

The perks for contributing to the campaign all revolve around storytelling: A custom short story with you as the main character. A custom poem written for you or a loved one. My novel The Magnificent Adventures of QLuke. Or some combination of the three.


Thanks for your time. And if you can’t contribute financially to the endeavor, consider sharing word of the campaign — or just do something nice for somebody, tell them a good story.

story:
What Is BookedBox? Who Am I?And Why Should You Get BookedBox?

Hello there, lovely readers.  My name is Matthew King, and I'm addicted to reading. I hope you are too! :P

BookedBox began for me as a seed of anxiety while perusing the gigantic bookstores and the not-my-favorite NYT Bestseller lists.  (Don't get me wrong. I've loved many NYT Bestsellers.  There's just SO MUCH MORE out there.)  I love bookstores and the feeling of being surrounded by hoards of amazing books, but there are so many kinds of different books for so many kinds of different people that the mega-chains don't do it for me.

I missed the local indie bookstores I had in NYC, where every book on display was curated by an amazing staff and would always be an engrossing read.  Despite having a couple great stores near me in Baltimore -- shout-out to Red Emma's and Atomic Books! -- I can't hop from one to another to the next bookstore every week like I could in NYC.  

I want to give everyone, everywhere, the opportunity to have a great, curated reading experience based on what they like to read, not what publishers want them to read!

Above all else, BookedBox is about books! And you!  And you having more books to read!

BookedBox is a curated monthly subscription box tailored to your personal reading habits.  Every month, the BookedBox team will pick out one or more books based on what you've read, genres you love, and any other reading preferences you might have.  

But it doesn't end with just the books.  We help you find even more reading material by adding a different literary magazine every month.  (Such as Harpers, The New Yorker, or Ploughshares.)

And then, just because we love you, we throw in some book-related paraphenalia.  Book-scented candles?  Custom made bookmarks?  Posters?  Yes, please!




How BookedBox Works!

1) Sign Up!

Right now, we're taking orders via IndieGogo here!  Sign-up for whatever tier you're interested in, and we'll get you in with the  First BookedBox Subscriptions Ever!  Even if we don't fulfill our full goals, you'll still receive your BookedBox no matter what.

Once you sign-up, there'll be a basic questionnaire about your reading habits and preferences, what you've read, and what you love.  With this info, we'll start finding the perfect pages for your next reading session.  And for ever better picks, share your Goodreads or Bookdigits usernames with us, so we can really dive into what you want.

2) Be Patient! It's on Its Way!

Our first round goes out in March.  Every batch of subscriptions will be sent out together on monthly basis.  If you're a fast reader, though, we'll totally have an extra option to get more hand-picked books sent early!

3) Read!

Watch your library grow!  Read everything we send. And then tell us what you think of each book. We'll use that info to improve our picks with each box! 

4) Get Free Books!

Share BookedBox with your friends and get a free one-month for every three friends who sign-up or support us!   We already have the program available on IndieGogo.  And we'll have the same program available on main subscription site when it opens up in March!  

(You must be logged into your Indiegogo account and use Indiegogo’s share tools for us to track your referrals!!!)

 

How Your Pre-Orders and Funding Will Help

BookedBox is the definition of a lean startup.  I've run businesses in the past and have some great resources to help get going, but I'm putting my own money and energy in it to get started.  There's a lot more I can do with just a little support from you that would help refine the process and give everyone a better experience.  

And remember, no matter what, BookedBox will still ship out and fulfill all orders you place here on IndieGogo!

1) Custom Design Work

Everyone loves nice packaging.  And though boxes won't cost much once we get the first custom designs made, that initial investment will be our largest expense.  We want people to get excited about seeing that box arrive on their doorstep every month.  We want you to never experience the pain of packaging peanuts!

2) Advertising and Marketing

Free love and shares/likes on the internet are vastly appreciated! So do it! But you know what would skyrocket BookedBox to success and give us more resources to focus on what you want?  A successful crowdfunding campaign!

And not only that, the money from the campaign will go right back into getting out the word to more and more people.  We'll be putting up small ad campaigns, reaching out to subscription box reviewers, and trying to get every blog on the planet to talk about us.  Tell us if you have any ideas!

3) Books!

Most of your money pledged will be going right where it needs to go most.  To the next books that you'll be reading.  The next author you'll fall in love with.  To all the good things in your next BookedBox!

4) Database Management and Review System!

The most complex aspect of BookedBox is going to be keeping all the info on each person and using that in a way that helps us decide what books you want to read.  We'll be attempting to integrate the GoodReads API into accounts and encouraging folks to communicate and review the books they're reading.

A review system made just for BookedBox is another long stretch goal, but we'll be needing to work on basic database systems before that even starts.  Your money will go a long way to us getting the help we need in that regard. 

Risks & Challenges

Luckily, BookedBox is low-risk in that every purchase covers the costs of your subscription.  With the support of this campaign, we hope to overcome growing pains associated with the research that goes into making sure you get the books you want.  We want to make sure our picks are unique and catered directly to you rather than mass-produced like books on display at the mega-chains.

story:
Another memoir?  

By someone not famous? 

Not even a reality star?

No, but I do have a unique story to tell that I believe will entertain, inspire and even enlighten the reader. Other than being a gay bi-polar addict who teaches animation, I have a rare mental disorder called Excoriation Disorder aka Dermatillomania. 

Dermatillomania is the compulsive/addictive picking of skin. It's related to Trichotillomania (hair pulling) and a cousin to the more popular nail biting.

There are virtually no books on the subject written from the point of view of a person who has Dermatillomania. This little known condition is hard to understand. But with humor, and a touch of spirituality, I shed some light on this dark subject with stories of living with it for the last 30 years.

This particular mental illness relates to body image,  perfectionism, stress release and the illusion of being in control. But ultimately, this book is about the process of arriving at self acceptance.

The book will be of benefit to others who have this condition, people living with mental illness in general and to those who know and love someone afflicted.

The funds raised will go towards a professional editor, publishing expenses and promotion to the general public and to the mental health community.

So please make this book happen. 


Besides, the perks make great holiday gifts.

                                        

A bit about my professional life:

I directed nearly 100 short animated films for UNICEF, Sesame Street, HBO Family, Nickelodeon and Noggin. I've taught animation to children at venues such as The Museum of Radio and Television in NYC, Amherst College, University of Pennsylvania and the Aspen Short Film Festival.

And I was the focus of the feature length documentary, “Animating Autism’ where I taught children with Autism how to make their own film. The film was featured on theatlantic.com on October 27, 2015. Here's the link.

http://www.theatlantic.com/video/index/412027/c...


The Editor's bio:

Trish Sammer is a journalist, storyteller, and content strategist. She has 15+ years’ experience in publishing and related industries, working as a writer,  editor, and ghostwriter. She currently freelances for The Franklin Institute, several technology firms, and other private clients. Trish’s goal in working with John is simple: To help him fine-tune his engaging stories to allow his unique voice and humor to shine through. She suspects the whole process is going to be a hoot.

 


And for your consideration, here is a sample chapter:


Wince for the camera

story:
Novel Synopsis (What's it about?)

Alexandra Bliss, Erik Bliss, Shaun Wade, and Drake Raman. The four of them are notable people within Vampire society because Alexandra and Erik are royalty, the current Prince and Princess of Vampires with Alexandra expected to be queen. Drake is an exceptional fighter and one of the most talented members of the Vampire Royal Guard. Shaun, mostly known for her past, has only recently been adopted into Drake's family and become Drake's younger sister. Their lives were normal until the day of Alexandra's 18th birthday celebration at the castle. The party is ambushed by a group of Werewolves asking for "the four Hybrids" and everyone is confused because Hybrids are considered a taboo, especially Vampire-Werewolf Hybrids which Alexandra, Erik, Shaun, and Drake just so happen to be. So, my story focuses on the four of them as they try to learn how to control their Werewolf abilities so they can avoid a war and possible execution on the night of the Vampire holiday: the Sapphire Moon.

Why should you read it?

Sapphire Moon is unlike anything you've ever seen. I made it a point to make sure my story stood out from it's counterparts. Being an avid reader personally, I noticed what parts stood out and helped titles stand out amongst stories in their genre. Authors like Veronica Roth, Cassandra Clare, and Suzanne Collins each have unique elements in their stories that helped them stand out amongst their peers. With fluid story telling and an idea unlike what's been seen amongst my [future] peers, I made it a point to make sure I wrote something people of all ages could enjoy. 

Short Summary

My name is Angela C. Dixon and I am currently at student at the Savannah College of Art and Design (SCAD) in Savannah. I'm from Norcross, GA and there is where I live with my grandmother and her sister who have been raising me since the passing of my mother when I was ten back in 2006. This campaign is to help me raise funds in order to start the publishing process for my book "Sapphire Moon" which I've been writing since I've been in middle school. It was published once before but I wasn't happy with the outcome so I removed it from the market and began a major rewrite on it and now I'm finally in a position where I'm happy with the story and I'm confident that others will enjoy it. My family and I don't have the funds in order to publish this book ourselves and I have very little options when it comes to locating them or getting my book out there where someone wants to just publish it without running the risk of someone else stealing my story. This story is what inspired me to become a professional author and with your help I'll be able to achieve that dream and begin my career. 

What We Need & What You Get

The funds, if all of them are raised (and maybe even exceeded), will go solely towards the publishing of "Sapphire Moon". I'm planning on publishing with Archway Publishing who is affiliated with Simon and Schuster who also published one of my favorite series. The package I'm intending to go for is called "Bookseller" and is priced at $4,999 and this is without editing which is entirely separate purchase. For the editing, it is charged per word and with my word count in the 100,000 range, I'm looking at an additional $5,000 to $6,000. 

As for perks, they are as followed: 
$10 - book stub containing e-book with a thank you note

$15 - signed soft cover copy with personalized message

$20 - signed hard cover copy with personalized message

$40 - honorable mention, by name, in the special thanks 

$100 - character creation (details under perks)

If the goal is not reached, I can still go for the "Designer" package or at least get editing done for the book once it's finished. 

(all information on packages and what they include is located here: http://www.archwaypublishing.com/PublishingPack...)

Risks & Challenges

I understand there is a possiblity that this book will not succeed but I hope and I pray that it does the complete opposite. I believe I have a story that's very unique and unlike any other story out there despite it following the popular theme of vampires and such. I know that there's only so much that can be done in the beginning but I hope that it gains momentum and gets spread through word of mouth and expands from there. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can donate a dollar or even a few cents, I will be more than grateful to you. You can help me spread the word to more people through sharing this on any and all your social media outlets and letting people know that there's a new story that's about to take the spotlight.

I'm planning on publishing with Archway Publishing who is affiliated with Simon and Schuster who also published one of my favorite series. The package I'm intending to go for is called "Bookseller" and is priced at $4,999 and this is without editing which is entirely separate purchase. For the editing, it is charged per word and with my word count in the 100,000 range, I'm looking at an additional $5,000 to $6,000. 
As for perks, they are as followed: $10 - book stub containing e-book with a thank you note
$15 - signed soft cover copy with personalized message
$20 - signed hard cover copy with personalized message
$40 - honorable mention, by name, in the special thanks 
$100 - character creation (details under perks)
If the goal is not reached, I can still go for the "Designer" package or at least get editing done for the book once it's finished. 
(all information on packages and what they include is located here: http://www.archwaypublishing.com/PublishingPack...)   
Risks & Challenges

 I understand there is a possiblity that this book will not succeed but I hope and I pray that it does the complete opposite. I believe I have a story that's very unique and unlike any other story out there despite it following the popular theme of vampires and such. I know that there's only so much that can be done in the beginning but I hope that it gains momentum and gets spread through word of mouth and expands from there. 
    Other Ways You Can Help If you can donate a dollar or even a few cents, I will be more than grateful to you. You can help me spread the word to more people through sharing this on any and all your social media outlets and letting people know that there's a new story that's about to take the spotlight.

story:
Love Wisconsin… The Book!

Love Wisconsin—the online storytelling project all about the people of Wisconsin—is going "offline" with a beautiful, gift-able, high-quality, 10x10 hardcover book.

  • Over 80 inspiring stories from storytellers featured on Love Wisconsin
  • Stories that entertain, introduce us to our neighbors, and spread hope
  • Full page, full color, vibrant portraits of the people of Wisconsin
  • First edition—Limited print run
     


What We Need:

Every pre-order helps us cover the costs of making the book, including:

  • Book design, layout, editing, and proofreading
  • High-quality book printing

What You Get:

  • You get a great book. Really, it will be a beauty!
  • You get your holiday gift shopping problems solved.
  • You get mad bonus points, knowing you spent your dollars locally on a COMPLETELY MADE IN WISCONSIN book. (Edited in Madison, designed in Milwaukee, and will be printed in Butler.)
  • You get a full-heart, knowing you've contributed to the ongoing mission of Love Wisconsin. Love Wisconsin is a 501(c)3 non-profit that uses storytelling and technology to bring about more connection, compassion, and engagement in Wisconsin.

Give a Book to a Wisconsin Library:

In addition to getting a great book, you can extend your impact by purchasing a book for a Wisconsin library. Our goal is to get copies into public libraries all over our state!

You can choose to buy a book + give a book to a library. Or, purchase reduced price books directly for libraries.

Extras:

  • Get a personally signed copy with some Love Wisconsin swag.
  • Stock up on your holiday gifts with our 3 and 6 order sets with discounts and bulk shipping.
  • For pre-orders larger than 6 books, please reach out to us directly at hello@lovewi.com.

Other Ways You Can Help:

Spread the word! Pre-orders really, really help us in estimating how many books to print, plus it will ensure that you get one of this first edition! (If you don't pre-order, we can't guarantee that you'll be able to snag one.)

For More Info About Love Wisconsin:

  • www.lovewi.com
  • facebook.com/lovewiproject

story:
What it is!

15-25% of children are still bedwetting by the age of 5 in the US! 6% by 12 years old. Wowsa. Help me reverse this trend back to an acceptable percent by communicating to our kiddos that they are fully CAPABLE of waking to use the potty at night, to eventually take themselves, and that a diaper-free nighttime situation is totally within their reach.

The world has been waiting for a pre-bed potty training board book that actually helps young children stay dry at night (and one that can be read to babies as young as 6 months).

I'm Andrea Olson and I've taught infant potty training (EC) and non-coercive potty training for the past 7 years at Go Diaper Free through my books and podcast.

Here is a pic of me and my family, in case we haven't met:

...and throughout teaching EC and ECing 4 of my own babies from birth I have NEVER found a pre-bedtime potty training board book that provides ALL of the following:

  • gives the message that children are capable of being dry all night, from an early age
  • doesn't include pictures of diapers, or the question of "should I pee in my diaper or not?"
  • doesn't teach children it's okay to pee in their bed
  • doesn't give the message that children should "wait til they're ready" (a message created by a Pampers advocate and pediatrician just two years after disposable diapers hit the market - and has doubled our daytime potty training age!)
  • teaches the actual steps of going to the potty at night
  • has humor appropriate for the ages of 6 month-5 years old
  • makes night pottying "normal" from 6 months to 5 years old.
This campaign will raise funds to get my board book (which is already *fully illustrated* by a professional artist, written by me, edited, printed, and being shipped as I type) imported, marketed, and distributed for sale in major bookstores, on Amazon, and on my own websites.
 

By supporting this campaign YOU will not only get a great board book, but you will also help 1,000s of other moms and dads give their children a tool that is fun, engaging and educational about making potty a normal part of every bedtime and nighttime ritual, whether they practice Elimination Communication or are potty training their toddler.

What I Need & What You Get

I need a total of $5,000 to complete the importing, marketing, and distribution of this book. Again, it is already fully illustrated, written/edited, and printed (which has cost over $5000 of my own money) and is just about here (it's on a boat!).

The $5,000 needed will pay for:

  • $1,000 importing duties
  • $1,000 shipping and storage
  • $3,000 PR, book events, marketing, advertising, and promotion.

If I surpass my goal, I will produce more books and use them to supply our nation's libraries and low income parents with this resource as an outreach project.

What YOU will get!

The perks involved in this campaign are fun and practical. You will, at the very least, get a beautifully-illustrated, 22 page, 6"x6" board book (or multiple books, depending on the perk), and you'll have the option of adding on any of the following in exchange for your contribution:

  • Tiny Potty, the prequel to this book, which covers the daytime pottying routine - get 'em together for a great set for your or a friend!

  • The Nighttime EC 101 minicourse - my fully-digital, comprehensive online course that teaches you whether and how to do nighttime Elimination Communication with your 0-24 month baby

  • Either of my very popular paperback book packages for parents: Go Diaper Free for 0-18 month babies or The Tiny Potty Training Book for 18 months and up. These kinda complete the whole learning experience by teaching you what to do!

 or 

IN SUMMARY, you can support this campaign today by grabbing a solo copy of the new board book, or by pairing it with a variety of essential tools...your choice! I made all of this stuff to help you and your baby learn and grow into diaper-independence. <3

The impact this book will have on the WORLD...

I have successfully brought 3 books on infant and toddler potty training into the world, organically and over time, and have helped over 50,000 families reduce or elimination their dependence upon diapers.



With this book, I want to support our babies and children in reaching this core nighttime competency at appropriate ages (my goal is for children to feel confident finishing nighttime potty training by around 24-30 months, after knowing about the potty since the child's first 6 months of life) with gentle, clear modeling through the character and the character's friend, Bear.

The impact on the WORLD is unlimited! Once we change the status quo, more babies and parents will avoid the struggles and medical issues (bedwetting!) associated with late or difficult nighttime potty training, and we can get on with what really matters, more quickly, such as instilling self-esteem, pride in oneself, and an increase in confidence, mobility, and self-care...all results of early day and night potty training!

Risks & Challenges

Risks are low here folks! You're working with a self-taught pro. :) Lessons I've learned with importing my line of Tiny Undies, Tiny Trainers, and one other board book will absolutely help me curb the risks associated with importing these completed books. I have also experienced self-publishing my own 3 books and have learned a lot about getting a book to market...and feel there is no barrier to entry for authors with the right skills.

I am equipped for any challenge, but with the team I've selected and most of the work already done, I am certain this book will be a huge success!
 

Other Ways You Can Help: SHARE!

If you can't fund this campaign directly, no worries!

Please share the link to this campaign via email, Facebook, Twitter, and more (YOU CAN SHARE *EASILY* WITH THE LINKS AT THE TOP OF THIS CAMPAIGN PAGE) to help others find out about it so they can help make it happen. By doing this, you are helping 1,000s of babies and parents get out of diapers at night, for good.

Thanks a bunch!

xx Andrea Olson

Go Diaper Free, Tiny Undies, + MamaWorx

Mother of 4 here in good ole Asheville, NC

story:
A new hope  

I am asking for contributions to get my new book in circulation. it is a game changer because it directly addresses a deep existential angst that so many people are feeling today. Sky-rocketing rates of depression, anxiety, and addiction are symptomatic of this angst, and my book points to a need for new, integrative vision of and for spirituality and religion—or "God" in whatever way we prefer to conceive of this term—in our personal and collective lives. We can't go back to the great traditions to address this need, and so my book explores what we can do to go forward without throwing the proverbial baby—the profound depth of the world's spiritual and religious traditions—out with the bathwater.   

My book is thus dedicated to seekers of integration: to those who long for the depth but cannot go back to the great traditions or ‘land’ in one perspective; to those who seek a common ground for an emerging collective spirituality that has depth, but who are unsure about how to achieve this. You might be one of many people today who are sensing a call to integrate complexity. In this book, I offer a radical process that can revolutionize your relationship with religion/spirituality, God (however you understand it), and the evolution of our species. 

Help me share a message of hope, collaboration, and inspiration.

My book offers and expansive, inclusive story of the universe we live in. I believe that we owe our children stories and mythologies that can embrace both science and religion, individual and collective journeys, and where all of the critical aspects of human living are addressed and understood to be interdependent. I want to be part of a story where paradoxes are accepted, mystery is celebrated, and soulful living can co-exist with everyday practicalities. 

Our lives are the ink through which this story is told.

In this story, we are all the protagonist and the supporting cast, the writers and the ‘fictional’ characters. The story combines chaos with harmony, the rhythms of life with the inherent balance of the universe, systemic thinking with radical acceptance. All in all, it is a  meta-cultural attempt to invite more people into what is truly the greatest story ever told—the story of God (whatever your understanding of God may be). 

I invite you and anyone who might be interested to re-imagine our potential as human beings, and to re-claim our place in the story of God. 

Why this book? 

In two words, "Life: Upgraded". 

This book addresses polarizing discourses in our inner lives, as well as in the realms of politics, religion, and culture. What makes this book stand out is that it offers practical structures that people can use in their own life and communities and answer together, the following questions: 

  • How can we address the conflict many of us feel between a need for the sacred in our lives and the lives of our children and our communities, and yet our aversion to relying on old religious structures to address this need?   
  • What can you do to feel connected to yourself, others, and God? 
  • How can you communicate your ideas, worldviews, and needs with others in a genuine, respectful, and compassionate way? 
  • What does it look like to share a common vision where no one needs to compromise and where everyone can bring their full emerging selves as active participants? 

So let’s get to work. :)

________________________

Religion? God?  . . . Seriously? 

It's definitely not easy to sell a book with the words "God" and "Religion" anywhere in the title these days. Neither are sexy or trendy topics. "Spirituality" might get a bit more traction, but so much of what is out there on the "spiritual" marketplace feels either shallow or excessively commercialized—stripped of the great depth of the traditions. So, today we face a conundrum. Many of us long for depth, but can't justify going 'back' to religious traditions to find it. My book is a meditation on what going forward could look like for individuals and communities.

When people ask me about my spiritual affiliation, I occasionally reply by saying (somewhat seriously and somewhat jokingly) that I am a Jewish - Christian - Buddhist - Atheist. I write ‘jokingly’ because many people find it hard to believe that someone so dedicated to the religious impulse and to the emergence of God would be comfortable identifying as an atheist. However, I don't see a contradiction. Instead, I see a maturing and evolving reality that, by its nature, must include a developmental stage that rejects the split of man and God, ‘heaven’ and ‘earth’. This is so difficult to feel into because ‘God’ (or gods), as an archetype in our collective consciousness, has been mostly perceived as a supernatural, omnipotent deity. 

Like so many people before me, I to want to bridge the gap of my experience toward a common ground of understanding and collaboration—not a common belief, nor a mutual respect to agree or disagree. I am seeking a common ground that is new because it is alive.

I am hoping you want that too. Here's the thing: I feel that God (Spirit, life, creation, call it what you wish) needs us; that the journey of God is two-fold: from God to us and from us to God (both being God!) and the longing for connection is mutual. It is as if God says, ‘help me to know myself’. And in the patience of that longing, love teaches me the language of life and the song of the Cosmos to be of service.

I wish to reach those who are currenting seeking to reclaim the story of God and to transform the role of the great spiritual traditions in the 21st century. I am not talking about any specific tradition, but the religious heart that is in pursuit of wholeness, integration, and maturation. It's this heart that I believe is at the essence of all authentic religious endeavours.

    ______________________

    Who am I? 

    I am a  registered Clinical Counsellor and Assistant Professor of Counselling Psychology at Alder University based in Vancouver, Canada. I formerly served as the Program Director of the Orchard Recovery Centre on Bowen Island, with years of experience in treating trauma, addiction, depression, and anxiety. Ten years ago, I co-founded the New Earth Institute, a non profit educational organization that offers programs, workshops, and public talks for people and communities seeking awakened and evolving lives. For my work with disadvantaged soldiers in Israel, I earned a Certificate of Excellence from the President of Israel. I also have experience as a choreographer, philosophy teacher, yoga teacher, meditation instructor, and even a clown. 

    ​​Academic Background: 

    • Ph.D.—Explored integrative approaches to addiction recovery and created a new model for recovery titled ‘integrative recovery model’.
    • M.A. — Clinical Counselling—Focused on mindfulness based modalities in mental heath.
    • M.A. — Education—Dedicated to improving people's sense of coherence.
    • B.A. — Philosophy and Education 

    ________________________

    From the media

    A CTV interview on recovery day  

     

    Journey To A Life Of Recovery: Acknowledgment Of Addiction

    ________________________

    Testimonials 

    Dr. Avraham Cohen, Ph.D., RCC, CCC, Vancouver, Canada
    Shahar Rabi is one of the more brilliant and creative people I have ever met, and I have met some brilliant and creative people. Having had the opportunity to spend significant time with him over several years I have been impressed by his powerful presence that is significantly integrated with an enormous intelligence and ability to sense the other and the world. I recommend him unconditionally as a psychotherapist and an inner guide.
     

    Dr. Heesoon Bai, PhD., Professor, Faculty of Education.
    Shahar's achievements as an intellectual, activist, contemplative, and therapist are immense and extraordinary. He is one of the few people that I have known who can fully encompass such a wide range of human capacities. In particular, I have always been impressed by the quality of presence that he manifests with people. He has a rare level of ability to sense, feel, perceive, attune, and intuit with respect to himself, in relation to others, and to the biosphere.  

    Dr. Sean Park
    Shahar has an extraordinary way of embodying and teaching how the creative soul and the disciplined mind work together in transformation.  He brings together old school spirituality with succinct and practical insights into how to work with human heart, mind, and body in these challenging times.  This is a rare gift.  If you're looking to work with someone with deep skill and compassion for the dark spaces, Shahar unreservedly has the sincerity, courage, and humour for pointing to how you can shine a light in the world.  

    Dr. Anne Bérubé, Ph.D., Author of Be Feel Think Do, spiritual coach, and speaker.
    Dr. Rabi is offering a great gift to the world with his work as a psychotherapist and a coach. His approach to supporting others is based on extensive professional and personal training as well as in depth educational, psychological, and shamanic studies. His guidance is open, loving, and clear, and invites deep and enlightening insights. Since I have met Shahar in 2006, I have been continuously inspired by his unwavering commitment to human evolution and individuals ability to live a fulfilled, joyful, and meaningful life, no matter what the circumstances are. His faith in the resilience of the human heart is strong and he transfers that faith simply by being in his presence. I highly recommend Dr. Rabi to my clients who desire to cut through the veil of their anxiety, depression, or simply wish to remember the mystery and the magic of their innate Self. 
     

    Sunyata Calogeros-Smith, Psychotherapist 
    Insightful, perceptive and compassionate, Dr. Rabi is a harbinger of transformation. I have had the pleasure of working collaboratively leading workshops with Shahar and have witnessed his capacity to hold a sacred space in group process work. He brings creativity, wisdom and warmth to all he works with and I wholeheartedly recommend him as a therapist. 
     

      

    Chela Davison, Former Director og Leadership & Strategic Innovation, Integral Coaching Canada
    Shahar brings a depth of wisdom and attuned sensitivity to how he engages and meets others that immediately gets to the heart of the matter. I always feel deeply seen, acknowledged and appreciated in a way that enables me to more deeply see and meet aspects of myself that weren't fully available to me. He's incredibly gifted at deeply listening -- not only to what is being said or not said, but also to what is emerging the space and what is called for. Every time I have the pleasure of connecting with Shahar, I am left with a sense of wider space within myself, greater intimacy with my own needs and practical possibilities for how to carry my new found connection and insight into action. Shahar's style as a therapist and developmental guide is dynamic, curious and so deeply honouring. His care and integrity as a practitioner and human being are inspiring and vast. 

    ________________________

    How will the funds from this campaign get used? 

    Publishing a book is an epic journey! For me, it started with a deep calling to create practical and effective solutions to the polarizing discourses of our times. What I have to offer matters. My book has been written and now I need help to share its important message with the world.

    Here is how I will be using the funds: 

    • Developmental editing 
    • Content editing
    • Copy editing 
    • Polishing 
    • Formatting
    • Cover design 
    • Back cover design 
    • Printing management
    • ISBN #
    • Production of an audiobook version of the book
    • Digital distribution
    • Amazon strategy
    • Promotions and marketing strategy 

    ________________________

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Some of you can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help! 

    1. Please help me get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
    2. Share my Video.
    3. Use the Indiegogo share tools on the right side of the page. 
    4. Speak with your friends about the ideas of the book. 

    ________________________

    A short overview of the main ideas in the book 

    1. In search of a sustainable future (providing practical solutions):  

    • Five principles to end polarizing discord. 
    • Making sense of our current cultural warfare. 
    • A comprehensive reorientation for our times. 
    • Identifying and expelling the four major social 'symptoms':  (1) extremism and polarizing discord; (2) dislocation and social isolation; (3) ethnocentricity (‘us' vs. 'them’); and (4) narcissism (the cult of personality). All four are adaptive reactions to a culture that is unable to adjust to the growing complexities of our times. 

    2. The religious impulse as a bridge and the future of religion:

    • Reclaiming the importance of religion as a bridge to a more collaborative future  
    • Understanding our emerging role in what I term the “learning and growing God” 
    • Showing how the ‘religious impulse’ manifests through time and in different cultures 

    3. Collaborative spirituality: 

    • How collaborative spirituality, when done well, can meet not only our personal needs but also our collective needs. 
    • What is post-individual spirituality?
    • How to notice red flags and common traps in spiritual work.   
    • How to move from a traditional leadership model in religious and spiritual organizations into a collaborative model of leadership. 

    ________________________

    A passage from the book

    Reclaiming God 

    There is a code. Nature abides by it. Life flows because of it. Poets write to describe it and scientists have observed it—each from their distinct perspectives defined by time, history and culture. This code is alive and thus can never be captured nor can it be defined. And yet, we can embody its essence. The code is a call of love to all that is sacred in the Cosmos. It is the future in the now—always evolving, self-organizing, unifying.

    You are part of that code, a miracle 14.7 billion years in the making. You are a child of of the Cosmos, the one and only you, and never will there be another just like you. You are a part and a whole, a whole-part, a “holon”. You are an evolving self-organizing structure composed of cells, tissues, and organs.  You are also a part of an evolving self-organizing structure, composed of other people, things, and places, both endlessly small and endlessly big. Every perception, insight, or truth you have ever experienced is nested in an unfolding grid that is timeless and boundless. You exist at a balance point between chaos and order. And between being and becoming.

    Equilibrium is your goal. Evolution is your quest.
story_txt:
A new hope  I am asking for contributions to get my new book in circulation. it is a game changer because it directly addresses a deep existential angst that so many people are feeling today. Sky-rocketing rates of depression, anxiety, and addiction are symptomatic of this angst, and my book points to a need for new, integrative vision of and for spirituality and religion—or "God" in whatever way we prefer to conceive of this term—in our personal and collective lives. We can't go back to the great traditions to address this need, and so my book explores what we can do to go forward without throwing the proverbial baby—the profound depth of the world's spiritual and religious traditions—out with the bathwater.   My book is thus dedicated to seekers of integration: to those who long for the depth but cannot go back to the great traditions or ‘land’ in one perspective; to those who seek a common ground for an emerging collective spirituality that has depth, but who are unsure about how to achieve this. You might be one of many people today who are sensing a call to integrate complexity. In this book, I offer a radical process that can revolutionize your relationship with religion/spirituality, God (however you understand it), and the evolution of our species. Help me share a message of hope, collaboration, and inspiration.My book offers and expansive, inclusive story of the universe we live in. I believe that we owe our children stories and mythologies that can embrace both science and religion, individual and collective journeys, and where all of the critical aspects of human living are addressed and understood to be interdependent. I want to be part of a story where paradoxes are accepted, mystery is celebrated, and soulful living can co-exist with everyday practicalities. Our lives are the ink through which this story is told.In this story, we are all the protagonist and the supporting cast, the writers and the ‘fictional’ characters. The story combines chaos with harmony, the rhythms of life with the inherent balance of the universe, systemic thinking with radical acceptance. All in all, it is a  meta-cultural attempt to invite more people into what is truly the greatest story ever told—the story of God (whatever your understanding of God may be). I invite you and anyone who might be interested to re-imagine our potential as human beings, and to re-claim our place in the story of God. Why this book? In two words, "Life: Upgraded". This book addresses polarizing discourses in our inner lives, as well as in the realms of politics, religion, and culture. What makes this book stand out is that it offers practical structures that people can use in their own life and communities and answer together, the following questions: 
How can we address the conflict many of us feel between a need for the sacred in our lives and the lives of our children and our communities, and yet our aversion to relying on old religious structures to address this need?   
What can you do to feel connected to yourself, others, and God? 
How can you communicate your ideas, worldviews, and needs with others in a genuine, respectful, and compassionate way? 
What does it look like to share a common vision where no one needs to compromise and where everyone can bring their full emerging selves as active participants? 
So let’s get to work. :)________________________Religion? God?  . . . Seriously? It's definitely not easy to sell a book with the words "God" and "Religion" anywhere in the title these days. Neither are sexy or trendy topics. "Spirituality" might get a bit more traction, but so much of what is out there on the "spiritual" marketplace feels either shallow or excessively commercialized—stripped of the great depth of the traditions. So, today we face a conundrum. Many of us long for depth, but can't justify going 'back' to religious traditions to find it. My book is a meditation on what going forward could look like for individuals and communities.When people ask me about my spiritual affiliation, I occasionally reply by saying (somewhat seriously and somewhat jokingly) that I am a Jewish - Christian - Buddhist - Atheist. I write ‘jokingly’ because many people find it hard to believe that someone so dedicated to the religious impulse and to the emergence of God would be comfortable identifying as an atheist. However, I don't see a contradiction. Instead, I see a maturing and evolving reality that, by its nature, must include a developmental stage that rejects the split of man and God, ‘heaven’ and ‘earth’. This is so difficult to feel into because ‘God’ (or gods), as an archetype in our collective consciousness, has been mostly perceived as a supernatural, omnipotent deity. Like so many people before me, I to want to bridge the gap of my experience toward a common ground of understanding and collaboration—not a common belief, nor a mutual respect to agree or disagree. I am seeking a common ground that is new because it is alive.I am hoping you want that too. Here's the thing: I feel that God (Spirit, life, creation, call it what you wish) needs us; that the journey of God is two-fold: from God to us and from us to God (both being God!) and the longing for connection is mutual. It is as if God says, ‘help me to know myself’. And in the patience of that longing, love teaches me the language of life and the song of the Cosmos to be of service.I wish to reach those who are currenting seeking to reclaim the story of God and to transform the role of the great spiritual traditions in the 21st century. I am not talking about any specific tradition, but the religious heart that is in pursuit of wholeness, integration, and maturation. It's this heart that I believe is at the essence of all authentic religious endeavours.______________________Who am I? I am a  registered Clinical Counsellor and Assistant Professor of Counselling Psychology at Alder University based in Vancouver, Canada. I formerly served as the Program Director of the Orchard Recovery Centre on Bowen Island, with years of experience in treating trauma, addiction, depression, and anxiety. Ten years ago, I co-founded the New Earth Institute, a non profit educational organization that offers programs, workshops, and public talks for people and communities seeking awakened and evolving lives. For my work with disadvantaged soldiers in Israel, I earned a Certificate of Excellence from the President of Israel. I also have experience as a choreographer, philosophy teacher, yoga teacher, meditation instructor, and even a clown. ​​Academic Background: 
Ph.D.—Explored integrative approaches to addiction recovery and created a new model for recovery titled ‘integrative recovery model’.
M.A. — Clinical Counselling—Focused on mindfulness based modalities in mental heath.
M.A. — Education—Dedicated to improving people's sense of coherence.
B.A. — Philosophy and Education 
________________________From the mediaA CTV interview on recovery day   Journey To A Life Of Recovery: Acknowledgment Of Addiction________________________Testimonials Dr. Avraham Cohen, Ph.D., RCC, CCC, Vancouver, CanadaShahar Rabi is one of the more brilliant and creative people I have ever met, and I have met some brilliant and creative people. Having had the opportunity to spend significant time with him over several years I have been impressed by his powerful presence that is significantly integrated with an enormous intelligence and ability to sense the other and the world. I recommend him unconditionally as a psychotherapist and an inner guide. Dr. Heesoon Bai, PhD., Professor, Faculty of Education.Shahar's achievements as an intellectual, activist, contemplative, and therapist are immense and extraordinary. He is one of the few people that I have known who can fully encompass such a wide range of human capacities. In particular, I have always been impressed by the quality of presence that he manifests with people. He has a rare level of ability to sense, feel, perceive, attune, and intuit with respect to himself, in relation to others, and to the biosphere.  Dr. Sean ParkShahar has an extraordinary way of embodying and teaching how the creative soul and the disciplined mind work together in transformation.  He brings together old school spirituality with succinct and practical insights into how to work with human heart, mind, and body in these challenging times.  This is a rare gift.  If you're looking to work with someone with deep skill and compassion for the dark spaces, Shahar unreservedly has the sincerity, courage, and humour for pointing to how you can shine a light in the world.  Dr. Anne Bérubé, Ph.D., Author of Be Feel Think Do, spiritual coach, and speaker.Dr. Rabi is offering a great gift to the world with his work as a psychotherapist and a coach. His approach to supporting others is based on extensive professional and personal training as well as in depth educational, psychological, and shamanic studies. His guidance is open, loving, and clear, and invites deep and enlightening insights. Since I have met Shahar in 2006, I have been continuously inspired by his unwavering commitment to human evolution and individuals ability to live a fulfilled, joyful, and meaningful life, no matter what the circumstances are. His faith in the resilience of the human heart is strong and he transfers that faith simply by being in his presence. I highly recommend Dr. Rabi to my clients who desire to cut through the veil of their anxiety, depression, or simply wish to remember the mystery and the magic of their innate Self.  Sunyata Calogeros-Smith, Psychotherapist Insightful, perceptive and compassionate, Dr. Rabi is a harbinger of transformation. I have had the pleasure of working collaboratively leading workshops with Shahar and have witnessed his capacity to hold a sacred space in group process work. He brings creativity, wisdom and warmth to all he works with and I wholeheartedly recommend him as a therapist.    Chela Davison, Former Director og Leadership & Strategic Innovation, Integral Coaching CanadaShahar brings a depth of wisdom and attuned sensitivity to how he engages and meets others that immediately gets to the heart of the matter. I always feel deeply seen, acknowledged and appreciated in a way that enables me to more deeply see and meet aspects of myself that weren't fully available to me. He's incredibly gifted at deeply listening -- not only to what is being said or not said, but also to what is emerging the space and what is called for. Every time I have the pleasure of connecting with Shahar, I am left with a sense of wider space within myself, greater intimacy with my own needs and practical possibilities for how to carry my new found connection and insight into action. Shahar's style as a therapist and developmental guide is dynamic, curious and so deeply honouring. His care and integrity as a practitioner and human being are inspiring and vast. ________________________How will the funds from this campaign get used? Publishing a book is an epic journey! For me, it started with a deep calling to create practical and effective solutions to the polarizing discourses of our times. What I have to offer matters. My book has been written and now I need help to share its important message with the world.Here is how I will be using the funds: 
Developmental editing 
Content editing
Copy editing 
Polishing 
Formatting
Cover design 
Back cover design 
Printing management
ISBN #
Production of an audiobook version of the book
Digital distribution
Amazon strategy
Promotions and marketing strategy 
________________________Other Ways You Can HelpSome of you can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help! 
Please help me get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
Share my Video.
Use the Indiegogo share tools on the right side of the page. 
Speak with your friends about the ideas of the book. 
________________________A short overview of the main ideas in the book 1. In search of a sustainable future (providing practical solutions):  
Five principles to end polarizing discord. 
Making sense of our current cultural warfare. 
A comprehensive reorientation for our times. 
Identifying and expelling the four major social 'symptoms':  (1) extremism and polarizing discord; (2) dislocation and social isolation; (3) ethnocentricity (‘us' vs. 'them’); and (4) narcissism (the cult of personality). All four are adaptive reactions to a culture that is unable to adjust to the growing complexities of our times. 
2. The religious impulse as a bridge and the future of religion:
Reclaiming the importance of religion as a bridge to a more collaborative future  
Understanding our emerging role in what I term the “learning and growing God” 
Showing how the ‘religious impulse’ manifests through time and in different cultures 
3. Collaborative spirituality: 
How collaborative spirituality, when done well, can meet not only our personal needs but also our collective needs. 
What is post-individual spirituality?

How to notice red flags and common traps in spiritual work.   
How to move from a traditional leadership model in religious and spiritual organizations into a collaborative model of leadership. 
________________________A passage from the bookReclaiming God There is a code. Nature abides by it. Life flows because of it. Poets write to describe it and scientists have observed it—each from their distinct perspectives defined by time, history and culture. This code is alive and thus can never be captured nor can it be defined. And yet, we can embody its essence. The code is a call of love to all that is sacred in the Cosmos. It is the future in the now—always evolving, self-organizing, unifying.You are part of that code, a miracle 14.7 billion years in the making. You are a child of of the Cosmos, the one and only you, and never will there be another just like you. You are a part and a whole, a whole-part, a “holon”. You are an evolving self-organizing structure composed of cells, tissues, and organs.  You are also a part of an evolving self-organizing structure, composed of other people, things, and places, both endlessly small and endlessly big. Every perception, insight, or truth you have ever experienced is nested in an unfolding grid that is timeless and boundless. You exist at a balance point between chaos and order. And between being and becoming.Equilibrium is your goal. Evolution is your quest.

story:
Why we need this

Due to the fact that half of my life I'm plus size woman, I have decided to do something about this. The best way for me to cope with this is by eating. This summer I have found a new way - writing love stories. After some time, and talking to my friends we noticed that those stories made us thing about all things that we are missing. My imagination got wild and I wrote for days and days. Since than, I have lost 20 pounds, feeling great, attractive and have a new way of coping with my problems.

I believe that out there are many woman that can do this to, but didn't thing of it jet. This is why I would like to publish my first book, activate web page and invite all of them to join me on this wonderful journey that is in front of us.  

Many of my friend have allready read some parts of my book, and they wont more.

 

Due to the fact that I have to work from 8-16 every day, and that I have 12 old son who has puberty issues, dog and husband that is working 2 jobs, finding time to write is hard. But, I manage and hope that one day writing and book clubbing will be my way of life.

Costs for publishing pocket book in Croatia are:

No of copies: 1000

Lecture: 500 €

Design and graphical preparation: 1000 €

printing: 1500 €

publishing: from 500 €

There are really no risks if my book will not be published because people have stop reading them. But, imagine what will happen if after this book comes out, 20-30-50 desperate plus size woman get together and help each other to have a better life. Think of their families, their children that are looking at mother who are happy and smiling. Isn't that what we all wish for our children? To be happy? So, help us show them how this can be done!
