story:
La desconocida que soy es la primera publicación de Índigo Editorial, un proyecto que busca dar voz a las mujeres que están escribiendo, hoy día, literaturas de la intimidad. Nuestro primer libro convoca a 32 autoras de Latinoamérica y España, como una suerte de puente trasatlántico para que sus escrituras se encuentren. La desconocida que soy es un manifiesto, un interrogante, una veta en bruto a través de la cuál acceder a una muestra de uno de los géneros menos publicados pero más vivificantes de la escritura con voz de mujer. Y es, ante todo, un diálogo entre escritoras, pero también entre la que habla y quienes leen o escuchan el relato íntimo de su día a día, con sus contradicciones y hallazgos.

La desconocida que soy, pero también Índigo Editorial, tienen como objetivo primordial habilitar un espacio donde las mujeres puedan desarrollar una voz propia y alzarla, pero también donde por fin logren encontrarse libres para decirse con sus propias palabras. En la escritura de la intimidad hemos estado solas y queremos que eso cambie. Nuestro hogar es conciliador: Resistencia. Este primer volumen de la antología (que verá nacer su segunda parte a finales de 2018) es su primera piedra. 

Este libro está prologado por la escritora española Laura Freixas, una de las mayores conocedoras de las literaturas de la intimidad en España y voraz lectora de diarios, y entre las autoras de esta primera edición, procedentes de España, Argentina, Uruguay, Colombia, Cuba y Venezuela, se encuentran: Oriette D'Angelo, Sol Iametti, Inés Vechietti, Laire Sur, Keiko McCartney, Isabel García Cuesta, Leyre Villate García, Sofía Pinto, Laura Bianchi, Olga Hueso, Jazmín Hollmann, Priscila Vallone, Carmina Balaguer, Nathaly Ponce, Agustina Bor, Oriana Vázquez, Valentina Riveiro, Joana Sánchez, Susana Simavilla, Marta Herrero, Giuliana Santoli, Cristina López, Mariela Cordero, Elena Barrio, Josefina Garzillo, Carol Milkewitz, Melanie Pérez, Diana Ferreiro, Ana María Trujillo, Olivia Arocena y Laura Liz Gil Echenique. 
 

¿Por qué mujeres?

Desde que comenzamos este proyecto, creímos necesario preguntarnos qué voces necesitan un reconocimiento mayor del que han tenido hasta el momento. En ese camino encontramos que en nuestro espacios culturales las mujeres todavía no han alcanzado el lugar que merecen como creadoras. Muchas de nosotras crecimos pensando que nuestra escritura no era suficientemente valiosa para ser leída. Con esta antología y con nuestros futuros libros queremos redefinir la palabra mujer. Por eso usamos la expresión "mujeres cursiva", tratando de ampliar un concepto que encierra múltiples y muy diversas voces, cuerpos e identidades. 
 

¿Quiénes somos?

Carla Santángelo y Marina Hernández se reunieron en la Plaza del 2 de Mayo de Madrid a finales de mayo de 2016. En su conversación, se dieron cuenta de que ambas tenían la misma idea sobre el futuro: la creación de un espacio para difundir literaturas de la intimidad. Una en Buenos Aires, la otra en Madrid, decidieron considerar este indicio -un sueño compartido- como un posible propósito. La llegada de Olga Hueso al proyecto dejó un enorme poso: esas literaturas de la intimidad que querían publicar debían ser las escritas por mujeres. Con su marcha, llegó la ultima de las integrantes actuales de Índigo, Fernanda Cid, técnica en cine, fotógrafa, y amante del collage. Su mirada estética converge a la perfección con las ideas de Índigo Editorial.

 

 

Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes

Hemos valorado la primera tirada de La desconocida que soy, nuestro primer libro en papel (más las totebags y las láminas que lo acompañan), y la creación de una plataforma online de formación y encuentro, en 7000 dólares.

 

El libro

La desconocida que soy será impreso entre España y Argentina, y presentado en ambos países en entre 2018 y 2019. Este primer volumen consta de +350 páginas, con un acabado muy cuidado. Aspiramos a hacer un libro que cada una de nuestras mecenas y lectoras ame tener en su estantería. 

 

 

Láminas y totebag

Además, nuestra diseñadora ha preparado un pack de 3 láminas originales y una totebag 100% algodón en color crudo para que te acompañe allí donde vayas.

 

 

 

 

 

Socia de la Casa Índigo

Uno de los pilares de nuestra editorial es construir un hogar para todas aquellas mujeres que busquen encontrarse con otras escritoras y lectoras. En esta comunidad, que tendrá como base la plataforma online, podrán disfrutar de ventajas como:

- Un club de lectura mensual (hasta el momento hemos leído a Simone de Beauvoir, Irène Némirovsky, Elena Ferrante y Clarice Lispector).

- Grupos de debate acerca de temas que nos conciernan, por ejemplo, la escritura, la subjetividad de la mujer, la maternidad, el cuerpo, el conocimiento personal, etc. 

- Bibliografía recomendada en nuestra biblioteca virtual (en PDF).

- Dinámicas y desafíos creativos.

- Descuentos para nuestros próximos talleres, servicios de edición y próximas publicaciones. 

- Una newsletter mensual inspiradora sobre la que plantear debates y generar nuevas ideas. 

- Encuentros presenciales y virtuales con escritoras y otras mujeres cuyas ideas o modos de vida resulten interesantes.

- Y sobre todo: un espacio para vincularnos, conocernos y desarrollar en común proyectos que aborden el lugar de la mujer en la literatura y en el arte. 

La cuota de socia para la Casa Í es anual, lo que quiere decir que, si te unes ahora, podrás disfrutar de 12 meses de estas y muchas otras sorpresas. Este precio podrás disfrutarlo solo hasta que finalice esta campaña. 

 

Amigxs índigo

Este proyecto está planteado para habilitar espacios de confianza para las mujeres. Sin embargo, sabemos que muchos hombres están interesados en apoyarnos y valorar nuestras experiencias y el desarrollo de un lugar propio para nosotras. Por eso, creamos la figura del Amigo índigo, para todas aquellas amigas y amigos que no desean formar parte de la Casa Í (porque no les interesa la escritura de la intimidad ni formarse como creadores) pero que sienten el deseo de apoyar nuestro proyecto. El Amigo Índigo recibirá, además del libro, las láminas y la totebag, un reconocimiento especial en nuestra web.

 

Otras formas de apoyarnos

Puedes compartir esta campaña y ayudarnos con la difusión. Si perteneces a un medio de comunicación y te interesa lo que hacemos, ¡contáctanos!

También puedes ver lo que hacemos a través de nuestro Instagram y Facebook.

Amigxs índigo
Este proyecto está planteado para habilitar espacios de confianza para las mujeres. Sin embargo, sabemos que muchos hombres están interesados en apoyarnos y valorar nuestras experiencias y el desarrollo de un lugar propio para nosotras. Por eso, creamos la figura del Amigo índigo, para todas aquellas amigas y amigos que no desean formar parte de la Casa Í (porque no les interesa la escritura de la intimidad ni formarse como creadores) pero que sienten el deseo de apoyar nuestro proyecto. El Amigo Índigo recibirá, además del libro, las láminas y la totebag, un reconocimiento especial en nuestra web.
 
Otras formas de apoyarnos
Puedes compartir esta campaña y ayudarnos con la difusión. Si perteneces a un medio de comunicación y te interesa lo que hacemos, ¡contáctanos!
También puedes ver lo que hacemos a través de nuestro Instagram y Facebook.

story: Forrester C. Fox's first novel, Jerry Haywire, has been completed. This campaign will help the author finalize the manuscript for printing and also will help produce the first limited print run of the book.The author's timeline would provide for delivery of perks within 90 days of the end of this campaign. That said, please be aware that it could take up to an additional 60 days for physical delivery of perks. Thank you for your support!

story:
Why Chile Today?

Globally, Chile is famous for its mountain ranges, lakes and volcanoes, as well as for being home to the driest desert on the planet, and the bottom of the world, Tierra del Fuego. However, the social, political and environmental issues being lived and debated in Chile are inaccessible to the rest of the non-Spanish speaking world, due to the lack of independent Chilean news that is written in English and reported by those living in the country and distributed internationally.

The majority of news about Chile that can be read in online media is produced and published by foreign publications, and doesn’t include stories that reflect daily life and culture in the country, something that is best done by a Chilean publication. It is into this niche that Chile Today will fit, with a staff of both international and Chilean reporters and editors, sharing local stories with the world and bringing an independent voice to Chilean media.

Our audience

The cornerstone of Chile Today is built on three main pillars –

  • We bring quality content in the form of an independent, critical, free press
  • We target both Chileans eager to learn English and those who already speak English
  • We provide expats living in Chile, Chileans living abroad and tourists with a window on everything that moves the country

 10% of the Chilean population, or 1.8 million people, speak English. Of the non-
speakers, 82% would study English to improve their employment prospects. Chile is Lonely Planet´s number one destination for 2018. And Chile has a vibrant expat community of English-speakers. Chile Today will be the first dedicated English platform to inform, teach and assist them.

What Next?

Chile Today is asking for donations to professionalize its structure, and to develop an attractive website and a social media strategy. Once Chile Today generates income, editors and staff can be paid, which opens the possibility to expand into investigative journalism and other areas of the field. 

The initial stage of the project will focus on establishing our online presence: ChileToday.com, Facebook, Twitter, Youtube and Instagram. These will be the channels through which we are able to reach and engage our audience.

The funds we raise will be used for the following activities:

  • Website development: ChileToday.com will provide our audience with articles, short videos and podcasts. The website will collect content from the newswire as well as original multimedia content from Chile Today staff and interns. Subscriptions and partnerships will allow us to stockpile multimedia content in the form of raw images and footage that can be used as needed.
  • Digital marketing: During the first 12 months of operation, social media will be the primary tool for assessing the interests and engagement of our audience, as well as for expanding that audience. Through reader panels and suggestion threads opened on public social media platforms in Chile, we have already begun to build a better image of the Chile Today reader.
  • Premises: In order to expand, hire interns and produce top quality multimedia content, Chile Today will rent offices in a co-working space, based in Santiago, Chile.
  • Tools of the trade: Finally, we will use the funds fo ensure each of our reporters and interns have high quality tools with which to cover the news, including cameras and recording equipment, as well as the appropriate softwares for editing our multimedia content.

About Us

At this stage, all members of Chile Today staff operate on a volunteer basis. Staff is made up of journalists, marketing experts and professionals from Europe, the United States and Chile. All staff is currently based in Santiago, Chile. Chile Today will officially launch in August, 2018.

Our Impact

Our focus is two pronged, as we will not only provide news for international readers, but also an educational platform, promoting independent journalism in Chile and Latin America.

News

Stories and reports on Chile Today will come from a combination of original content written by our staff and interns, local contributors, and relevant, high quality content from the newswire.

Content will be published daily on the website, with highlights being shared across our multimedia platforms.

Each week, Chile Today will provide a news roundup, pulling together the most important stories from around Latin America into one, easy to read piece for our readers. This will be published on our social media platforms and distributed via email to our subscribers.

Each month, Chile Today will host a one hour news roundup in English on Radio la Clave, one of Chile’s independent radio stations. This roundup will be hosted by Chile Today staff and interns. 

Education

In a country where English-language schools are most accessible for those who can afford private education, Chile Today brings a strong focus on education. Our mission is to enable the younger generation of journalists in Chile to produce strong, local content to be shared globally.

  • Internships: Internships with Chile today will be offered to select journalism students twice annually for a period of six months, a placement that will allow students to conduct in-depth reporting on Chilean issues and stories, and to produce long-form articles as well as shorter news briefs. Interns will work directly with Chile Today’s full-time staff, and will be provided with all required technology to produce exceptional content. Interns will have the opportunity to report stories in several different regions of Chile, and will be encouraged and expected to pitch original ideas.

  • Workshops: Through collaboration with journalism programs at local universities, as well as with English language institutes, both students and teachers will have the opportunity to take part in workshops and trainings with professional journalists from both Chile and abroad, and to have their stories published on Chile Today. Workshops will focus on pitching stories, using multimedia, conducting interviews, assessing the reliability of sources etc.

  • Collaborations: Chile Today seeks to collaborate with the Journalism faculties at local universities, to more efficiently engage young Chileans who are dedicated to the field and have prior knowledge of good writing and reporting. Those who wish to work with Chile Today will have the opportunity to be mentored by a professional journalist, as well as with our editors to prepare their stories for publication. These collaborations will provide aspiring journalists with published bylines, equipping them with robust portfolios as they enter their careers.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you aren't able to make a monetary donation, you can still support our efforts! 

  • Like and follow our Facebook page, on Twitter and Instagram!
  • Subscribe to our newsletter
  • Share this campaign!

Thank you all very much for your interest and support. We look forward to bringing you independent, local news from Chile and beyond.

story:
The Story

Cami and Wyatt are back in another funny and relatable book by best selling author Stacy C. Bauer.

Cami and Wyatt love their screen time. Watching movies and playing games on their tablets is so much fun! But are they missing out on other fun things? Could they be ignoring their friends and family? Will Cami and Wyatt be able to figure out a healthy screen time balance and find their way back to the real world?  

My illustrator, Rebecca Sinclair, is hard at work on the book. Illustrations that will be just as amazing as the first two books. I'm so thankful to be working with her on this series. Rebecca uses colored pencils to create each illustration by hand-  you can tell how much work and love she puts into each one!  

The story behind the story:

Hi! My name is Stacy C. Bauer. I am a wife, mother, teacher and author. I have always loved writing and have been sharing funny stories about my own children for years. 

The series- Cami Kangaroo and Wyatt Too: 

I've wanted to be a published writer since I was a child. 3 years ago, on a leave from my teaching career, I decided to go for my dream. I ran successful Kickstarter campaigns in 2017 and 2018 and was able to publish the first 2 books in my series about my children Cami and Wyatt. In the fall of 2019, I had a coloring book and stuffed kangaroos created and published an interactive activity book about kindness. I was excited to find out my hardcover books won 4 book awards!  

My hopes and dreams for this series:

*FAMILY. That it brings families closer. 

*EMPOWERMENT. That it empowers children to make good choices.

*COMMUNICATION. That it helps to foster discussion between family members regarding important and relatable topics.

*FUN and ENGAGING. That the books engage children and spark and fuel a love of reading and books.   

Last summer, I started working on the third hardcover book in the series: Cami and Wyatt Have Too Much Screen Time. I want to help other families who might be struggling to find a healthy screen time balance. I want to bring families closer.

It has been my dream to become a published author for a long time and because of your support, I am living that dream. I would love to continue my series with this book. My family and I are so grateful for your interest and support!  

 If helping this project succeed is important to you, please spread the word! Sharing the campaign link on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, in texts to friends, on your blog and through email will help me reach more people and get closer to meeting my funding goal. Check out some of the rewards you can grab along with the book below, and then head over and select the best tier for you. If you change your mind, you can always go back in and edit your choice.

story:
Thanks for checking out our campaign. If you watched the video, you know what we’re doing – working creatively to defeat Donald Trump and his minions in Congress this November. No small task.

But this is not a political campaign fundraiser. No PACs or donations to politicians. This is the power of original, entertaining, and informative content that fuels our planned social media campaign, and done right, drives earned media with its novelty and message.

And for a couple of bucks, you can help see it done.

Why a book?

That’s a question Trump would ask since he doesn’t read them unless they’re full of pictures and his name. This book meets both of those criteria, but I don’t think he’ll like it.

We need a book that focuses on one topic and puts it into perspective from beginning to end. A book that people will read and enjoy and understand. Not a 6,000 word NY Times article (as good as those are), but something for folks outside the Beltway, folks who aren’t obsessed with cable news. A book that covers the most important topic leading into the upcoming election - the coronavirus pandemic.

Deceit and distraction are Trump’s weapons of choice, and we can’t let today’s rage du jour mute all his previous blunders. A book can remind us that yelling “Obamagate!” doesn’t make the tragedy of a pandemic mismanaged and denied go away.

Why this book?

Pretty much the same reason – it’s full of pictures! But these pictures are special.

First, they’re Trump’s own words throughout the crises, and available on video. No denial can make them disappear.

Second, each one is accompanied by a scathing picture, an editorial cartoon that communicates a message instantly and unequivocally. In this case, the truth behind Trump’s lies.

See? Did you get that message? Will you remember it? Any questions?

And finally, there is the story that explains his words. A story of deceit, corruption, ignorance, and depravity. A story told fully and accurately with clever simplicity.

Who the hell are you?

I’m John Darrin, author and retired business professional. I’ve worked in high-tech for 50 years, helped my son create one of USA’s 10-Best Cybercafes back before the Internet became ubiquitous, and written several books. In 2018, I wrote Who’s That Man with Mr. Lincoln, Mommy?, a satirical parody of a children’s book lampooning Trump’s administration going into the 2018 mid-terms.

Mostly I write novels. One was a best-selling techno-thriller about the Internet, and another was one of Publisher’s Weekly’s best thrillers of 2015.  

And maybe most importantly, I am a passionate opponent of Donald Trump, his family, his administration, his “business”, his friends, and his dog. That’s not true. He doesn’t have a dog.

But this fundraising is about the sequel.

Dr. Trump’s Traveling Medicine Show will be even bigger, better, and, if it is possible given the subject matter, more fun and entertaining.  Using Trump’s own words and actions, we track his response to the pandemic in cartoon chronology. Watch his lies evolve as the indisputable facts and events prove yesterday’s rant totally wrong, and someone or something else has to be found to blame. And enjoy the most politically creative minds around skewering Trump’s every pronouncement with one compelling image.

I can write, but I can’t draw, unless you count stick-figures. So I enlisted a roster of award-winning cartoonists to illustrate each page. Each page is different, using the cartoonist’s unique style.

Who are these “award-winning” cartoonists?

Here are some of them from Who’s That Man.

With our expanded roster, we’ll have nine Pulitzer winners and finalists, eleven Berryman and Herblock winners, and too many other prize-winners to list here.

Besides Trump, who are the characters?

Do you really need any others? Well, yes. Someone must tell the truth. So, we created Mini Dr. Fauci. You’ll find him on every page, citing the real statistics, describing what really needs doing, and explaining that day’s events.

OK. Wrap this up.

Right now, Joe Biden is trapped in his basement,

and Donald Trump is front and center in the news every day, spouting lie after lie,

and still having his poll numbers reach record highs.

Not a good formula for November. Voters, especially those who like entertainment more than news, need to know the truth and remember it come election day. Dr. Trump is the reminder that pops up on your mental display come October and November and says, “This guy is a pathological liar and a threat to America. I’ve got to get out and vote (or stay in and mail my ballot).”

Getting the book to the printer will cost $26,335 (budget in the FAQ). I need to get that from you. Just $10 or $20 or more will be leveraged into influence far beyond that amount, and beyond paid ads or streaming video speeches.

story:
INTRODUCING

 

BABY ON THE WAY - DAY BY DAY 
A beautiful and professional crafted tear-off pregnancy calendar and guide.


This tear-off calendar will become your valuable companion during your pregnancy, following
your baby’s development from embryo to fetus to birth. Carefully crafted by healthcare professionals and mothers; the calendar is a detailed source of information, tips and provides general support for the expecting mom.

The calendar joins your journey in the eighth week of pregnancy. Typically, an embryo’s heart will begin beating around the age of six to seven weeks. The calendar’s starting point, however, is where, more than likely, the beautiful rhythm of your baby’s first heartbeat will be detected by ultrasound.

 

 

INSIDE THE CALENDAR YOU WILL FIND THE FOLLOWING
 

 Our pregnancy countdown which will guide you from week 8 till week 40.
The current trimester as well the remaining days and weeks until child birth are
displayed at the top and bottom of each page.

 

 

Useful information regarding the fetus development and your pregnancy.

 

 

400+ baby names on the bottom of each page to help you
find the right name for your baby.

 

 

Weekly handcrafted beautiful images to show you just how things are
changing rapidly during your pregnancy.

 

 

9 milestone cards that give you an easy and beautiful way to have a picture of your pregnancy which can be shared with others.

 

Since all women and babies are unique, this calendar follows what is regarded as a normal pregnancy, but it is perfectly normal to experience variations in your own individual experience.

Your baby’s development will take place progressively over time and not day-by-day as this calendar may imply, however the timetable presented here will closely serve as a guide for you to follow.

Above all else: always consult your doctor or medical professionals if you have concerns or questions during your pregnancy.

 

WHO WE ARE:

We are a small group consisting of healthcare professionals and mothers who set out on a mission to create something special and unique to guide you through your pregnancy.
The result of our efforts and dedication became this wonderful tear-off calendar.

 

WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET:

We are currently looking for initial funding of $4000 to complete the production of our first print of the BABY ON THE WAY - DAY BY DAY tear-off pregnancy calendar.

Any additional funding will be used towards the production and development of our remaining product-line which features our GRANDCHILD ON THE WAY - DAY BY DAY tear-off calendar.

Our "GRANDCHILD ON THE WAY - DAY BY DAY" tear-off calendar is a wonderful gift-idea for those who want to include the future grandparents into the pregnancy, as it serves with the same purpose as the BABY ON THE WAY - DAY BY DAY tear-off calendar, and gives the grandparents a chance to be included in the pregnancy.

And our additional products;

- Our beautiful crafted fine china "BABY ON THE WAY -  MUG"
- Our beautiful "BABY ON THE WAY and GRANDCHILD ON THE WAY -POSTERS"
- Our beautiful and stylish, "Baby's First Year Milestone and Memory Cards"




  • When you choose to support our business at this start-up stage, we would in return like to offer up to 30% discount on our products as well as delivery well before any other costumers.

Carefully crafted by healthcare professionals and mothers; the calendar is a detailed source of information, tips and provides general support for the expecting mom.The calendar joins your journey in the eighth week of pregnancy. Typically, an embryo’s heart will begin beating around the age of six to seven weeks. The calendar’s starting point, however, is where, more than likely, the beautiful rhythm of your baby’s first heartbeat will be detected by ultrasound.  
INSIDE THE CALENDAR YOU WILL FIND THE FOLLOWING  Our pregnancy countdown which will guide you from week 8 till week 40.The current trimester as well the remaining days and weeks until child birth aredisplayed at the top and bottom of each page.  Useful information regarding the fetus development and your pregnancy.  400+ baby names on the bottom of each page to help youfind the right name for your baby.  Weekly handcrafted beautiful images to show you just how things arechanging rapidly during your pregnancy.  9 milestone cards that give you an easy and beautiful way to have a picture of your pregnancy which can be shared with others. Since all women and babies are unique, this calendar follows what is regarded as a normal pregnancy, but it is perfectly normal to experience variations in your own individual experience.Your baby’s development will take place progressively over time and not day-by-day as this calendar may imply, however the timetable presented here will closely serve as a guide for you to follow.Above all else: always consult your doctor or medical professionals if you have concerns or questions during your pregnancy. WHO WE ARE:We are a small group consisting of healthcare professionals and mothers who set out on a mission to create something special and unique to guide you through your pregnancy.The result of our efforts and dedication became this wonderful tear-off calendar. WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET:We are currently looking for initial funding of $4000 to complete the production of our first print of the BABY ON THE WAY - DAY BY DAY tear-off pregnancy calendar.Any additional funding will be used towards the production and development of our remaining product-line which features our GRANDCHILD ON THE WAY - DAY BY DAY tear-off calendar.Our "GRANDCHILD ON THE WAY - DAY BY DAY" tear-off calendar is a wonderful gift-idea for those who want to include the future grandparents into the pregnancy, as it serves with the same purpose as the BABY ON THE WAY - DAY BY DAY tear-off calendar, and gives the grandparents a chance to be included in the pregnancy.And our additional products;- Our beautiful crafted fine china "BABY ON THE WAY -  MUG"- Our beautiful "BABY ON THE WAY and GRANDCHILD ON THE WAY -POSTERS"- Our beautiful and stylish, "Baby's First Year Milestone and Memory Cards"When you choose to support our business at this start-up stage, we would in return like to offer up to 30% discount on our products as well as delivery well before any other costumers.

story:
Hello! My name is Morgan and I am a full time music teacher and performer. I teach private instrumental lessons and I am also a Music Together teacher. I play fiddle, guitar, mandolin, piano and of course....the jug! I have played jug band music for many years with groups such as the Skiffle Symphony and Devine's Jug Band.  A few years ago I wrote a children's song about the alphabet and jug band music.  Since then I have worked to make it not only a song, but a book, and with this book I plan to become more involved in children's music  by doing more educational concerts and presentations.  

Producing music can be expensive, but hiring an illustrator and buying a publishing package from a self-publication company can be very expensive too!  You can help move this project forward buy purchasing a book, a "perk package," or simply donating to the cause.

story:
(The above Rudy interview took place at Mark Weiss' "Welcome to my Exhibition", live stream Halloween event 2020)

Did You Bang Your Head to Quiet Riot's, Metal Health?

I did, too.

I discovered Quiet Riot in 1979 with the lineup—Kevin DuBrow, Randy Rhoads, Rudy Sarzo, and Drew Forsyth on drums.

After Randy and Rudy left the band to join Ozzy Osborne, I thought that was the end of the music and the great band Quiet Riot. Little did I know, it was just the beginning.

Hi, I'm Missy Whitney, and I was running the Quiet Riot Squad Fan Club when the #1 Billboard charted album, Metal Health, came out in 1983. I've wanted to write about my unique experiences running the fan club and completed my book earlier this year. It includes photos from my scrapbook, some memorabilia, and even handwritten letters from Kevin.

The book is a journey, starting from when I was 16. Shortly thereafter, I became a fan(atic) promoter of Kevin's solo career, attending 105 gigs, up through Metal Health's release and beyond. I’ve selected my favorite band and fan accounts, plus, video shoot stories from “Bang Your Head” and “Cum on Feel the Noize,” and talk about the shock of Kevin's untimely death in 2007.

Plus, much more...

In my quest to find the perfect photo for the book’s cover, I met the iconic 80s rock photographer, Mark "Weissguy" Weiss. He was curious about my project, and after a few phone conversations (I'm west coast, he’s east), Mark shared a bigger vision for my book.

As it turns out, Mark was friends with Quiet Riot, and he suggested adding some of his incredible photos. And then Ron Sobol also came aboard, offering photos from his treasure trove from the Randy Rhoads years.

With your pre-order, this book will be a collective gift in honor and memory of Kevin's 65th birthday. Plus, a portion of all book proceeds will be donated to the Pancreatic Cancer Cure Foundation in memory of Frankie Banali. 

And in the spirit of the Quiet Riot Squad Fan Club, I’ve designed several packages with fan goodies like vinyl stickers, band photographs, t-shirts, and a limited-edition photo guitar pick commemorating Kevin's birthday.

Please check the FAQ. And if you don't see your question answered, feel free to contact me. I'll do my best to get back to you as soon as possible.  

Please follow and share with your fellow headbanger friends on FaceBook: 

www.facebook.com/MissyWhitneyQuietRiotSquad/

I look forward to sharing this journey with all you---Quiet Riot fans.  Now go and pick your perk package! All packages are on the right side of this page. Click each box to see what you get!

Keep on Rollin'!

Missy Whitney

story:
Summary

Sultan Akif's purpose in life is to set change makers in motion by helping them overcome self-limiting beliefs through Power of Purpose. 

100% of all profits from the launch of this framework will go towards delivering the library builds and scholarship programs Sultan runs. Post launch, he will continue to donate 50% of all profits from all his projects to his cause for life. Life is simply too short and the purpose too important to do it any other way!

It took soul searching by traveling to 80 countries in the world, gaining and then losing 100 pounds, personal experience with poverty, then delivering over 1 billion dollars of consulting revenue, building 37 libraries in 10 countries, building the largest youth employment event in Canada and keynotes to hundreds of thousands of people around the world for Sultan to finally create this framework. It is his life's work and one through which he plans to fulfill his purpose of setting change makers just like you in motion at scale by helping people see how powerful they really are, helping them have a set of guiding steps to develop directional clarity and measure their progress, supporting them in developing a better relationship with their body, their mind and their soul, so they can make a real difference in this world while having joy and happiness in their own lives.

You can see the summary of Sultan's work in the video and visit the websites at www.experienceyourlife.ca, www.libraryinaweek.com, www.futureofeducationconference.com , www.twosistersonamission.com (his daughters) and https://www.linkedin.com/in/sultanakif/. . This framework is not about his story but rather to make the wisdom accessible to you that is carried forward for thousands of years and his own ideas that helped him go from inspiration to action

During his travels, his corporate experience, and his life overall - Sultan witnessed a lot of people pass through life struggling to connect with their potential, their worth, their happiness and their impact. He saw tremendous light in them but many times the person’s self-limiting beliefs limits that light depriving the universe (including their work, relationships, and self-opinion) of their unique energy. This heartfelt, science-based, and actionable framework and guidance, will make life changing wisdom accessible to you that he acquired through his own life experiences and by reading hundreds of books from around the world. Read more about the 6-point framework in the "Framework" section below.

The Initial Offerings

The Power of Purpose Framework has the following - you can purchase today:

1) eBook: This is an electronic copy of Sultan's second book to be released later this year. You will get a complimentary copy of his first book as well. 

2) Physical Book: This is a physical and signed copy of Sultan's second book "Power of Purpose". You will get a complimentary copy of his eBook as well as a special gift.

3) Physical Book + Journey Print: This is a physical and signed copy of Sultan's second book "Power of Purpose". It also includes a special edition print of the painting Journey. The story of Journey is both deeply moving and inspiring. It is also part of the book cover for that reason. You can read it at https://twosistersonamission.com/products/journ...

4) Physical Book + Journey Print + 1 Coaching Session: This perk includes the items of perk 3 above and in addition a coaching session with Sultan in which he will share the full details of the Power of Purpose framework and help you connect with the techniques and methods captures in this work.

5) Online Course + 1 Coaching Session: This exciting new offering is an online video course where Sultan will take you step by step through the Power of Purpose framework. Designed to be actionable, real, and transformative, the course will empower you to drive real change in your life and truly connect with the lessons of the framework. This course will be on-demand on a secure portal. As part of the launch, you will also get a 1-hour one-on-one session with Sultan to help you apply the framework in your personal situation and truly engage with the message and guidance. The course will be released later this year.

6) A ticket to an invitation only worldwide Immersive Workshop. Sultan will be conducting Power of Purpose Workshops and Retreats around the world. This includes a ticket to the event ($1500 dollars+), one year access to the course ($1200), and a copy of the physical book ($30) and eBook ($20). These are fashioned to be multi-day transformative experiences to kickstart your journey of change and impact.  To preserve the energy of each workshop, there will be an application process to ensure only those that are ready for the transformation participate in this life changing experience which will focus on the science, activities, and community to help you visualize your transformation. You will find yourself among a tribe of people whom you can relate to and who will be with you well after the workshop experience is over. 

7) Annual Coaching Program: There are only 12 spots for this program. Change takes time and being a part of an encouraging community like our tribe helps. The value of this program is $7200 based on individual components. but you will receive it at a deeply discounted price at the launch. This 12-month program allows you to have 12 monthly group calls with Sultan and core group of people who are going through the same program. It also comes with 6 coaching sessions spread out across the year to drive you past roadblocks and plateaus. It comes with two tickets to world-wide immersive workshops, access to online course for one year, a signed copy of the physical book and a copy of the eBook.

The Impact

The impact of this project will be on two very important dimensions:

1) The goal is to help you achieve happiness and inner success in your life so you can make a real difference in this world. The framework is razor focused on that goal.

2) Sultan has decided to donate 100% of his profits from this launch to fund libraries and to provide full college scholarship to incredible youths through his lighthouse program. See details at www.libraryinaweek.com.

The Book Cover

The book cover has a profound meaning and connection to the Power of Purpose Framework. While building library #20 in the Grassy Narrows First Nations Reserve, Sultan and his family met Jason Fobister https://youtu.be/6tdbm-Ls-zU. He quickly became a part of the family and was the inspiration for his daughters to launch www.twosistersonamission.com. Jason flew in to attend a very special dinner where Sultan’s tribe of 200 change makers from around the world had gathered and on stage, in that moment, Jason surprised him with a 6 feet by 5 feet painting he took 1 year to paint for Sultan. There are four stages in this painting. The end of the earth represents the point where you achieve all that you consider success, illustrating those moments where your purpose truly reveals itself (the tree with the energy around it). The eagle represents your will to listen to it and the signs of the creator that will take you to the light you were always meant to be in the universe. It will help you unleash your potential and make a real difference in your life and in the lives of others. This is precisely why, the book cover is -for the Power of Purpose Framework to help us all take flight towards our deeper purpose in life.

Other Offerings

The world needs not just our inspiration but our action. Sultan would love to partner with you to deliver a keynote or corporate training at your workplaces. This will directly help impact the people involved as well as provide the necessary funds for the projects. Reach out to him to schedule an introductory call at info@experienceyourlife.ca.

The following two offers are customized. Please reach out for a quote based on your event size and organization:

6) Keynote Speech: Unleashing Potential through Power of Purpose as a team, organization, or individual.

7) Corporate Training: Human Centric Digital Transformation through Power of Purpose.

The Power of Purpose Framework

Here is a sneak preview of some of the topics. The framework will contain over 20 poems, visualizations, worksheets, and references that bridge the world of science, spirituality, impact, and action. 

This frame is carefully modelled to be simple, actionable, and relatable so you can conquer your self-doubts and accelerate your potential-. It balances the inner and outer worlds by focusing on themes such as a purpose-driven career, your body, finances, tribe, enjoying your life, the energy field around you, emotions, and business models! These topics are seldom in a single framework and that is what makes it extremely difficult for guidance to be actionable. Sultan uses the 6 core pillars of fitness, finances, friends & family, faith, fun, and freedom, and an additional 30 underlying sub-topics (5 under each) to truly help you align your body, mind, and soul in the service of your purpose. The guidance is logical, actionable, and focused to anchor you in a place where you do not feel conflict between what you must do and what you want to do in life. This will open your eyes to where you truly experience internal and external peace and how you are surrounded by people who believe in you and your brilliance. As a sneak preview, the flow of the framework is as follows:

1) Life: This is where you can take a step back. Guided by worksheets and simple tasks, take inventory of what is working in your life, what you can tolerate, and what must change. We then visualize, vividly and in detail, what life can be like in the future and what activities, people, and beliefs, belong in that space to help you achieve true happiness.

2) Overcoming Self-Limiting Beliefs: No building can be constructed on the foundation of quicksand. The more you build, the more the building tilts out of control. The same is true for a transformation in life. It cannot be achieved on the foundation of self-limiting beliefs such as doubt, low self-esteem, lack of confidence, low opinion of worth and dependence on external approvals for defining satisfactions. This part of the framework goes deep into each issue and provides you with a set of tools and techniques to overcome the beliefs and habits and reinforce them over and over again. Exiting this phase of the framework, you will have a higher understanding of what has been really holding you back and how you can surmount it in the future. One of the poems in this section is, "I am Enough, or so I am told.... But at every turn of my life, a feeling of doubt takes hold".

3) Connecting with Purpose: One of the poems in the framework is, "Life is a gift, not something to be sold. It is a story you are writing, not one you are told". A life without purpose is a like a ship caught in a storm, or a motorboat with the fastest engines in the world, but with nowhere to go. Purpose gives life meaning. When we truly connect with it, it changes everything in our lives. Connecting with his purpose led Sultan to transform every aspect of his physical, mental, and spiritual life, and the techniques to achieve the same will now be accessible to you. Moving out of this phase, you will achieve a much better understanding of your real purpose, what inspires you, what moves you down to the core, and what helps you sleep better at night. One of the poems in this section reads, "Give yourself permission, to feel the way you feel".

4) Power of Purpose Pathway: Inspiration without action leads to no impact. Similarly, guidance without a pathway can be hard to follow and implement. This part of the framework goes deep into the actual science of change, and deep scientific analysis of each recommendation as well as references to additional reports, books, and articles. 

4.1: Fitness: Your body is a miracle. Millions of cells, vessels, systems, and organs work together for you to take that one breath. Yet, as we get busy in life, we neglect this one gift which is our vessel to connect with the external world. Energy stops flows and disease follows along with impacts on our mental wellbeing. Sultan lost nearly a 100 pounds following advice passed down for thousands of years as well as his own research on what empowers the body and helps it flow again. He now competes in endurance races and is about to complete his first iron man – a 2 km swim, 90 km bike ride, and a 21 km run– – that you can too.

4.2: Finances: Too many change makers neglect this important aspect of life. On the other hand, too many people focus on it non-stop at the expense of other pillars of life. Harvard research shows that after earning $75,000 dollars annually, there is no correlation between happiness and wealth. This topic dives deep into the various ways you can achieve financial freedom, and educate you on created offerings and services that make the world a better place, yet still allow you to meet your financial obligations and overall reshape your relationship with money. Brace yourself for some life changing content in this section!

4.3 Friends and Family: This pillar focuses on the important aspect of your tribe consisting of friends and family. Those individuals have your back and help you achieve greater impact in the world. The section focuses on the importance of choosing your circle of friends very carefully, techniques to build a real tribe around your projects and your life that empowers you on just as your presence - them, and will  break the cycle of transactional relationships to make room for ones that alleviate the soul.

4.4 Faith: This topic focused on the importance of faith, whatever it may mean for you, in your overall well-being and happiness. It empowers you to develop a stronger, but more real relationship with what you believe in and then translate that into action. It encourages you to dive deep within, so your faith becomes a source of internal strength and not an outwardly projection. This topic is sensitive for many people, but that is why it deserves focus and attention in a transformation framework. Sultan is not a very religious person, but a deeply spiritual one. He has built libraries in partnerships across all major religions, from temples, churches to mosques. One of his favorite quotes is, "The best way I can show my love to you (God), is to love all humans". 

4.5 Fun: Life is not a struggle. It is not a chore. It is not a set of responsibilities you must do, neither is it a burden. Life is a gift. It is a miracle to be enjoyed, appreciated, treasured, and experienced. Sultan named his company “Experience Your Life” for one reason. He saw so many people struggle through life changing milestones, but they were not enjoying the journey and escaping to places where they can lose themselves temporarily because the reality is too hard to bear - he believes there is a better way. A path in which you can give your dreams the space to shine again, a place where you do not question your worth but spend your time trying to have impact.  Life is a journey, guided by eternal light. It is not a destination but a path we choose and enjoying your life while you experience it is incredibly important.

4.6 Freedom: There is a poem in this section called freedom. It goes deep into the realization that most of what we believe is either inherited or absorbed from society. What is truly 'us' in the mist of societal beliefs? Can we say we are truly free if all we do is reflect beliefs of those immediately around us? Have we dived deep within to touch into universal truths that float through all around us - independent of our place of birth - but empowering in their simple truth about equality, love, harmony, respect, and co-existence?  This part of the framework will push you to challenge your most basic assumptions about yourself and prompt you to redefine your identity to be one that glows universally with impact, light, and love. 

5) Bringing it all together around Purpose: This section focuses on constructing an explicit action plan, accountability framework, and an energy circle to amplify the change in your life and in the lives of others and more tangible next steps in the days, weeks, months, and years to follow. 

Sultan is going ALL-IN to finalize this work

In Sultan's own words " For it to impact your heart and drive change - this life changing work deserves deep authenticity and clarity. I find that at the brink of physical exhaustion which is why I did the 280 km walk, 500 km bike ride and other endurance trips. Now - to write the final chapters of this framework & go ALL-IN on the Future of Education conference I have decided to relocate to Calgary & the Rockies for 40 days where I will be doing 6 endurance races/triathlon starting with a half-marathon. The big one will be the Half Iron Man on 1st August and while I am only doing the bike/run option (90 km ride / 21 km run) - the chances of not making the bike cutoff are really high (The route is 1.5 km elevation across 90 km at speeds that I barely touch on flat ground) .. none of that matters.. it's about showing up and giving it my all. It is about being at the foothills of mountains and diving deep within. It is about taking all that inspiration and finishing this framework so it can help others. I will post (to my network only so connect if you are not already in it) as it plays out. I hope through that you find your own inspiration to keep taking the next step and unleashing the reservoirs of strength and not be shackled by outcomes."

Please reach out for a quote based on your event size and organization:6) Keynote Speech: Unleashing Potential through Power of Purpose as a team, organization, or individual.7) Corporate Training: Human Centric Digital Transformation through Power of Purpose.The Power of Purpose FrameworkHere is a sneak preview of some of the topics. The framework will contain over 20 poems, visualizations, worksheets, and references that bridge the world of science, spirituality, impact, and action. This frame is carefully modelled to be simple, actionable, and relatable so you can conquer your self-doubts and accelerate your potential-. It balances the inner and outer worlds by focusing on themes such as a purpose-driven career, your body, finances, tribe, enjoying your life, the energy field around you, emotions, and business models! These topics are seldom in a single framework and that is what makes it extremely difficult for guidance to be actionable. Sultan uses the 6 core pillars of fitness, finances, friends & family, faith, fun, and freedom, and an additional 30 underlying sub-topics (5 under each) to truly help you align your body, mind, and soul in the service of your purpose. The guidance is logical, actionable, and focused to anchor you in a place where you do not feel conflict between what you must do and what you want to do in life. This will open your eyes to where you truly experience internal and external peace and how you are surrounded by people who believe in you and your brilliance. As a sneak preview, the flow of the framework is as follows:1) Life: This is where you can take a step back. Guided by worksheets and simple tasks, take inventory of what is working in your life, what you can tolerate, and what must change. We then visualize, vividly and in detail, what life can be like in the future and what activities, people, and beliefs, belong in that space to help you achieve true happiness.2) Overcoming Self-Limiting Beliefs: No building can be constructed on the foundation of quicksand. The more you build, the more the building tilts out of control. The same is true for a transformation in life. It cannot be achieved on the foundation of self-limiting beliefs such as doubt, low self-esteem, lack of confidence, low opinion of worth and dependence on external approvals for defining satisfactions. This part of the framework goes deep into each issue and provides you with a set of tools and techniques to overcome the beliefs and habits and reinforce them over and over again. Exiting this phase of the framework, you will have a higher understanding of what has been really holding you back and how you can surmount it in the future. One of the poems in this section is, "I am Enough, or so I am told.... But at every turn of my life, a feeling of doubt takes hold".3) Connecting with Purpose: One of the poems in the framework is, "Life is a gift, not something to be sold. It is a story you are writing, not one you are told". A life without purpose is a like a ship caught in a storm, or a motorboat with the fastest engines in the world, but with nowhere to go. Purpose gives life meaning. When we truly connect with it, it changes everything in our lives. Connecting with his purpose led Sultan to transform every aspect of his physical, mental, and spiritual life, and the techniques to achieve the same will now be accessible to you. Moving out of this phase, you will achieve a much better understanding of your real purpose, what inspires you, what moves you down to the core, and what helps you sleep better at night. One of the poems in this section reads, "Give yourself permission, to feel the way you feel".4) Power of Purpose Pathway: Inspiration without action leads to no impact. Similarly, guidance without a pathway can be hard to follow and implement. This part of the framework goes deep into the actual science of change, and deep scientific analysis of each recommendation as well as references to additional reports, books, and articles. 4.1: Fitness: Your body is a miracle. Millions of cells, vessels, systems, and organs work together for you to take that one breath. Yet, as we get busy in life, we neglect this one gift which is our vessel to connect with the external world. Energy stops flows and disease follows along with impacts on our mental wellbeing. Sultan lost nearly a 100 pounds following advice passed down for thousands of years as well as his own research on what empowers the body and helps it flow again. He now competes in endurance races and is about to complete his first iron man – a 2 km swim, 90 km bike ride, and a 21 km run– – that you can too.4.2: Finances: Too many change makers neglect this important aspect of life. On the other hand, too many people focus on it non-stop at the expense of other pillars of life. Harvard research shows that after earning $75,000 dollars annually, there is no correlation between happiness and wealth. This topic dives deep into the various ways you can achieve financial freedom, and educate you on created offerings and services that make the world a better place, yet still allow you to meet your financial obligations and overall reshape your relationship with money. Brace yourself for some life changing content in this section!4.3 Friends and Family: This pillar focuses on the important aspect of your tribe consisting of friends and family. Those individuals have your back and help you achieve greater impact in the world. The section focuses on the importance of choosing your circle of friends very carefully, techniques to build a real tribe around your projects and your life that empowers you on just as your presence - them, and will  break the cycle of transactional relationships to make room for ones that alleviate the soul.4.4 Faith: This topic focused on the importance of faith, whatever it may mean for you, in your overall well-being and happiness. It empowers you to develop a stronger, but more real relationship with what you believe in and then translate that into action. It encourages you to dive deep within, so your faith becomes a source of internal strength and not an outwardly projection. This topic is sensitive for many people, but that is why it deserves focus and attention in a transformation framework. Sultan is not a very religious person, but a deeply spiritual one. He has built libraries in partnerships across all major religions, from temples, churches to mosques. One of his favorite quotes is, "The best way I can show my love to you (God), is to love all humans". 4.5 Fun: Life is not a struggle. It is not a chore. It is not a set of responsibilities you must do, neither is it a burden. Life is a gift. It is a miracle to be enjoyed, appreciated, treasured, and experienced. Sultan named his company “Experience Your Life” for one reason. He saw so many people struggle through life changing milestones, but they were not enjoying the journey and escaping to places where they can lose themselves temporarily because the reality is too hard to bear - he believes there is a better way. A path in which you can give your dreams the space to shine again, a place where you do not question your worth but spend your time trying to have impact.  Life is a journey, guided by eternal light. It is not a destination but a path we choose and enjoying your life while you experience it is incredibly important.4.6 Freedom: There is a poem in this section called freedom. It goes deep into the realization that most of what we believe is either inherited or absorbed from society. What is truly 'us' in the mist of societal beliefs? Can we say we are truly free if all we do is reflect beliefs of those immediately around us? Have we dived deep within to touch into universal truths that float through all around us - independent of our place of birth - but empowering in their simple truth about equality, love, harmony, respect, and co-existence?  This part of the framework will push you to challenge your most basic assumptions about yourself and prompt you to redefine your identity to be one that glows universally with impact, light, and love. 5) Bringing it all together around Purpose: This section focuses on constructing an explicit action plan, accountability framework, and an energy circle to amplify the change in your life and in the lives of others and more tangible next steps in the days, weeks, months, and years to follow. Sultan is going ALL-IN to finalize this workIn Sultan's own words " For it to impact your heart and drive change - this life changing work deserves deep authenticity and clarity. I find that at the brink of physical exhaustion which is why I did the 280 km walk, 500 km bike ride and other endurance trips. Now - to write the final chapters of this framework & go ALL-IN on the Future of Education conference I have decided to relocate to Calgary & the Rockies for 40 days where I will be doing 6 endurance races/triathlon starting with a half-marathon. The big one will be the Half Iron Man on 1st August and while I am only doing the bike/run option (90 km ride / 21 km run) - the chances of not making the bike cutoff are really high (The route is 1.5 km elevation across 90 km at speeds that I barely touch on flat ground) .. none of that matters.. it's about showing up and giving it my all. It is about being at the foothills of mountains and diving deep within. It is about taking all that inspiration and finishing this framework so it can help others. I will post (to my network only so connect if you are not already in it) as it plays out. I hope through that you find your own inspiration to keep taking the next step and unleashing the reservoirs of strength and not be shackled by outcomes."

story:
Short Summary

Hi, I’m Lindsay Rosasco, the author of These Words Are for You. When my friend, who struggled with infertility, got pregnant against all odds, I knew I wanted to do something special, so I wrote a few lines of poetry and put it in a frame for her nursery. I wanted to convey how much her baby was wanted, loved, and meant to come at the exact time she got pregnant, because any other time and it wouldn't be wonderful "you."  The lines stuck with me, and I knew there was more to the story just waiting to burst out.

The words are real. They're every parent talking to their kids. They’re for every expectant mother. These words are for your babies, preschoolers, and school-aged kiddos to learn about love, kindness, and how they’re connected to the world around them. The words are for anyone who holds someone near and dear to their heart. They're more than just "love." And guess what? These words are for you.

What I need

In order for this book to launch, I need your help! You can pre-order the book and earn other incredible, exclusive perks by contributing to the campaign. I am printing an 8x10, high-quality hardcover book to ensure the best product for you. These funds will go towards:

- the printing and shipment of the first run of books

- illustrator expenses (they are beautiful, whimsical pictures - you're going to love them!)

- shipping and packaging of all rewards

-e-book conversion & design

Other ways you can help

If you're not looking to contribute right now, I could still use the support! Please consider sharing this campaign on your social media or letting friends and family know about it so they can soon add this heartwarming book to their collection.  

If you have a media contact, please send them my way; or if you simply have words of encouragement, feel free to drop me a line: lindsay@blueinkweb.com 

Wall art digital download options

Are you choosing a perk with a wall art digital download? Great! Choose from 10 styles, including 5 illustrations and 5 quotes.

Art 1 gramophone: 

 

Art 2 boat:​

 

Art 3 boots:​

 

Art 4 seeds:​

 

Art 5 clouds:​

Quote 1:

Quote 2:

Quote 3:

Quote 4:

Quote 5:

Choose your wall art today! It's the perfect addition to any room.

story:
Introduction

Our grandpa used to tell us, while we were still little kids, that there is a great person and a mediocre person inside each of us. He would add that only one of them could rule at any given time, and that the game of life is to determine which person should rule – the great person or the mediocre person.

As I grew older, I started to notice the finer nuances between the great person and the mediocre person inside me.

For example, the great person might say: “Your book really needs expert editing.”

The mediocre person would reply: “I can’t afford it.”

The great person might say: “Your book’s interior design can be more attractive.”

The mediocre person would reply: “I can’t afford it.”

The point is that whenever both are confronted with a radical idea, the great person responds differently from the mediocre person. While the mediocre person is screaming, “I can’t!” the great person is wondering, “How can I?”

Short Summary

My names are King Samuel Benson. The beautiful girl in the photo is my sister and best friend. We are fresh university graduates with a major in Media & Communication Studies. Your generous contribution will help us find safe accommodation in the city while we are hunting for jobs.

As a thank-you for helping us reach our goal, we will help you reach your business goals by lending you our expertise. We have excellent professional skills in Proofreading, Copy-editing, Paperback Design, eBook Formatting, and Website Setup.

Commit only 50 bucks if you like. We will give you excellent return of value for your contribution. The process is simple and GUARANTEED.

What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise $100 from 20 contributors. Our ideal donors are independent authors and publishers who need expert assistance in publishing, marketing and distributing their books. You can be an individual or a company. The point is that you need us as much as we need you.

You need us if:

  1. You have written a book that was not polished because you could not afford to pay for expert assistance.
  2. You have a great story idea but writing is your limiting factor and you want a professional book in your name very quickly.
  3. You are better at writing than at any other aspect of the publishing business and you’re looking for professional help in editing, formatting and designing your book.
  4. You are a publishing services company looking to outsource some of your publishing jobs to competent hands.
  5. You have written and published numerous titles and it’s time to call your game tighter and raise your professional standard.

Help us move forward in our careers and we’ll help you accomplish significant milestones in your publishing business. Milestones such as:

  • Create excellent branding in the minds and hearts of your readers.
  • Make each new book you release as professional as can be.
  • Position yourself as an authority in your chosen niche.
  • Seize market share with expertly designed titles that compete with books from bigger publishers.

If you don’t have $100, please give $50. If you are thinking that fifty bucks seem meager in exchange for our services; that is because it is. However, remember that your very contribution is what moves us closer to our goal. If you genuinely need/want our services, this is the perfect opportunity to seize your slot. We will attend to our patrons on a first-come-first-serve basis.

For $50 you get eBook Design & Paperback Design only on one (1) book. This means that we will format your manuscript for electronic readers and design an attractive print-ready paperback book for you.

For $100 you get Proofreading, eBook Design & Paperback Design on one (1) book. This means that we will proofread your manuscript, format the content for electronic readers, and design an attractive print-ready paperback book for you.

For $200 you get Proofreading, eBook Design, Paperback Design, and Website Setup on one (1) book. This means that we will proofread your manuscript, format the content for electronic readers, design an attractive print-ready paperback book, and then set up a landing page for your product.

The Impact

Here is how your contribution will affect the rest of the world:

  • Less Crime. Studies have shown that young people often resort to crime when they have outstanding bills to pay and lack the opportunity to earn an honest wage.
  • Less Hate. People from different cultural backgrounds are likely to embrace people and cultures that have impacted and influenced their lives positively.
  • More Generosity. People who receive a helping hand in their moment of adversity are ten times likelier to lend a helping hand to others in need.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help. Help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. Use the Indiegogo share tools to inform your social circle about us. Thank you for reading! Thank you also for taking action!

Bonus Section

Even though I have edited books professionally for seven years, you’d be shocked to learn that I acquired a lot of my copy-editing wisdom while engaged in other facets of life. Here are three invaluable copy-editing lessons that I learned from life and music-making.

Cut Before You Boost
So you’ve completed that paragraph but you’re not quite satisfied with it? Don’t be tempted to add new lines right away. Embellishing the problem will not make it go away. To eliminate the problem, look for parts to delete. Try and see if you can rewrite the same paragraph with fewer words. Only after you’ve done your cutting should you try to embellish it.

Simple Is Best
Cut to the chase! Highlight the strong point in your descriptive and eliminate everything else. Don’t be tempted to introduce complexity because the story feels too simple. When you remove the extraneous, that extra line, you give the rest the space to shine.

Less Is More
Don’t narrate it in one paragraph if you can narrate it in one line. Don’t be tempted to believe that more is better. Too many unnecessary lines will make your story cheap. Less is expensive. When you aim to use fewer words, even the blandest line acquires a sudden importance that cannot be matched with more words. Keep only what the reader needs to know.

In the end, only the best parts will be remembered. So, leave only the best parts. Immerse yourself in your story and highlight only the best parts of it.

story:
About me:

     

Hi everyone! My name is Joshua Pinker and I am a 2D Animator. I am originally from New Jersey but currently living in Toronto, Canada. With having over 5 years of experience in the industry I have worked on multiple cartoons such as Teen Titans GO!, Unikitty, Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood, Wildkratts, Corner Gas Animated, Cyanide and Happiness and many more!

 The E-Book

      I am constantly receiving questions from people like, How do I get a job at a studio? How do I network on LinkedIn? How do i get a freelance job? What should I have in my portfolio? I'm taking ALL the knowledge I have acquired from my extensive experience in the animation industry and putting it all into one place! Every year there is a new wave of student graduating looking for opportunities. There are also people currently in the industry that feel stuck and want to grow in their career. I want this book to be a go-to self help guide for anyone that wants to have an amazing career making cartoons. This book will help build a strong foundation of tips and advise to keep in mind for every road bump you will encounter on Your Animated Journey!

 

Why I need your help!

       In order to get this E-Book completed there are a few fess that come with it.

  • The book cover- I was able to get my favorite artist, Joel Mackenzie to create the cover.
  • Editor- My writing is good but I need a pro to read it over and fix some of my grammar and make sure it flows the right way for all the readers
  • Website- I will not be putting this up on amazon. I will have my own dedicated website to promote and give updates about the E-Book.
  • LLC- I want to license the name and turn this into an actual company where i can build a brand off of.
  • MARKETING- This will be the BIG one. I have a list of social media outlets that I want to utilize when advertising the book. 

 

 

Whats in the book?

  •  Chapters about school,networking,looking for a job, keeping a job,freelancing, money
  • Q&A with industry professionals from across the country that have different roles within the animation industry
  • fun illustrations
  • Great advise on everything you will encounter in your career.

The Cool Perks

    ** All perks are originally listed in USD.**

  I think there are some cool options on what you can get with your contribution towards the completion of the book:

  • Get your name on the thank you page in the book
  • get a physical copy of the book cover as an 11x17" poster mailed to you
  • pre-order a copy of the book and get it as soon as it is released
  • If your feeling extra generous you can get ALL the perks together at once! 

Other Ways You Can Help

      Please share with your network about the E-Book and this campaign. Please follow the books page on Facebook and give a follow on Instagram! Thank you so much.

http://www.facebook.com/youranimatedjourney

https://www.instagram.com/your_animated_journey/

**I am doing my best to get the book done by end of the year but it all depends on the time needed for editing.

story:
Short Summary

https://writebloody.com/

Write Bloody Publishing is an independent poetry publishing company based in Los Angeles, with an imprint in Canada and soon – if all goes to plan – the UK.

I’d been submitting poetry manuscripts to Write Bloody for around 3 years to no avail before I realised that they didn’t accept international submissions. Gutted. Write Bloody are the crème de la crème of independent poetry publishing with their snappy vibe, soft touch covers and book tours. To have them publish me was a life goal of mine. Not just advocates for the written form, each WB author commits to a 20 show tour around the United States, giving book readings and building a fan base. There is absolutely nothing like this in the UK. Nothing.

Ok we have a few quirky literary journals and digital platforms, but manuscript competitions tend to be found on tired websites producing small, dated books. The golden opportunities are exclusive to youth poets, and unless you’re picked up by a major publisher or have been writing since you were young enough to get yourself onto The Foyles Young Poets scheme or into your University’s press, it’s tough. Thank god for The Poetry Café & South Bank Centre.

When Write Bloody posted on Instagram that they had opened an imprint in Canada, I commented as a half-joke, “If you ever need a Write Bloody UK I’ll run it for you.” I did not expect the founder, Derrick C. Brown to take me up on the offer. After months of emails back and forth and a couple FaceTimes, I’ve decided to pull the trigger. There are a myriad of talented poets in the UK who are limited to sharing their work on Facebook statuses or Tumblr. The chance of getting their poetry into good-quality print is low without an agent. I know there are a ton of writers hiding amongst us with a hell of a lot to say who just need a place for it. For their words to be bound up, beautified and performed to the world. I want Write Bloody UK to be the bridge that enables this and I need your help.

 


 

Examples of Write Bloody books

What We Need & What You Get

My aim is to roll out the imprint with two book releases in the first year. Authors will submit their manuscripts via Submittable and the finalists will be asked to submit a video reading to show they are able to perform as well as they write. Then voila.

This will cost an estimated £3500.

Creation & distribution of books: £2500
Write Bloody UK website: £500
Book launch and sample copies: £500

You'll receive a perk aligned with your donation, details of which can be seen to the right.

Examples of Write Bloody books

The Impact

Write Bloody books are distributed to major wholesalers and independent bookstores alike. The difference between opening this imprint and starting my own business from scratch is that I will be extending an already successful US brand. We’ll have the same contacts and process. The author will have a say in their cover design and get to take their work around the country with us. It’s fresh and it’s personal.

In America, poetry is its own animal. There is an entire scene of poets; like a BEAT Generation 2.0 for spoken word, where anyone with a voice can get involved. Aren't you writers fed up of being part of a sub-culture that only exists on a far smaller scale in your own country? In America, poetry is cool. Attending a reading is becoming as popular as watching a film or going to a gig. There's a huge gap in the UK market for this.

Risks & Challenges

Now the seed has been planted, I want to make it happen no matter what. If we don't hit our goal, I will save the money earned and find another way to fund the rest. I'd rather not eat into my house deposit to do this though - it’s already difficult enough to get on the property ladder as it is!

Other Ways You Can Help

Obviously Christmas is just around the corner and this is the most expensive time of the year (please note that if I know you, I'd rather this than a Christmas present! Ha), however there are other ways you can help if you're unable to part with your money:

- Could you possibly share the link on your Facebook, Twitter and Insta? 
- You can use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word

If you’d like to see talented poets get the exposure they deserve, please donate. I have big visions for Write Bloody UK and am determined to circulate some of the UK’s best poetry in gorgeous, velvety-to-the-touch books. As Derrick once said, "“People are only used to the poetry they were exposed to in school. I feel like it’s the ‘50s and people have only heard jazz and the minute they hear some rock ‘n’ roll they’re going to love it. We just need to let them hear it.”
