story:
Introduction

Hello there! I'm Heather, and I've been writing and talking about history since 1991 when I started a summer job at a Revolutionary War museum when I was in high school. In 1998 I built my first history website, on Colonial America. And in 2009 I started the Renaissance English History Podcast, which makes it one of the longest continuously running indie history podcasts. Since then I've spoken about podcast community building at writers conferences, and at Harvard University. 

In late 2016 I created the 2017 Tudor Planner,  which was a mix of two of my favorite things - Tudors and planning! It's a weekly/monthly planner that brings together history with planning - something that I definitely need as a mom with a young kiddo, who is also an entrepreneur (me, not the kiddo, though I'm sure she'll be an entrepreneur when she's older!). I've always loved planners, since I bought my first Ziggy assignment book in 1989 - I color coded my assignments with Crayola skinny markers (the Bold colors - do they still make those?).

Here's the cover from the 2017 Tudor Planner - the very first one!

It was one of those things that I wanted to create basically so that I could buy it. I thought it would be fun, and I might sell a few dozen. But that first one was way more successful than I ever imagined, and for the 2018 one, I worked with a custom printer. Last year I worked with the same printer, and added more customizations, which drove the price up. This year I'm making it even better, again working with my printer, but adding in even more stickers (!!!), and more organizational tools.

The Tudor Planner is a gorgeous book that will lead to people wandering by your desk just to check it out, and will cause spontaneous conversations whenever you take it out :)  Because each planner is a unique work of art. It's like having art, history, and planning all wrapped up in one. I mean, what else is there!?

Here's the 2018 Tudor Planner:


 

The Tudor Planner: For when you want to add history to your planning :)
(and have it look gorgeous on your desk)
 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Creating a gorgeous book like this takes lots of moolah. It's a hardbound book, about 6x9 (the size of a hefty trade paperback book - only hardbound). The initial print run is going to cost about $15,000. Your funding covers not just the actual printing, but then also the designer, and the time of editors and proofreaders. I'm using the same printer as before, so I know the quality will be just as wonderful! Last year I did a crowdfunding campaign on IndieGoGo to fund the print run, and it really helps defray my costs up front when I do this, PLUS you get the planner at a great price, and other perks too!

The 2020 Planner is going to be a little bit different and fresh because it's the 500th anniversary of the Field of Cloth of Gold, the big summit between Henry VIII and Francis I of France. I've done several episodes on the event, including an interview with the author of one of the foremost books on the Field, and I've become fascinated by it. So this year, the dates and facts will focus especially on the runup to the Field! 

And the cover will be based on this famous painting - and something NEW THIS YEAR: IndieGoGo Supporters will be able to vote on the final cover!

What you get by supporting the planner are:
1) You get to be involved from the very early stages - I'll keep you updated as things happen like we get proofs, and the print run happens. 

2) You get the planner at a way discounted price - it won't be this inexpensive again until late January of 2020 (if it's even still available - this year we sold out completely).

3) Awesome perks! 

All the money I raise will go towards these printing costs and shipping. Even if I don't make the full amount, I'll use everything I get towards paying the printer. And by signing on now, you'll get to be part of the process, and walk through the entire production cycle with me!

 

The Impact

I'm a huge believer in building empathy and peace through history. As we learn more about the motivations of people from the past, and start to really understand them, it builds our empathy muscle, and helps us understand people who are different than we are today. I also see the connections between Tudor England and today - it's a time very similar to our own. New technologies made disseminating information easier than ever before, with less control than ever before. Wars of religion mixed with exploration made the world seem more in touch than ever, yet also led to people being nervous about their own culture, and fearful of the unknown. There are so many parallels. These are the stories I tell in my podcast.

The planner is a major source of income for me, and helps to keep my show running, and independent. It helps to keep me doing these shows every week or two, and keep bringing these stories alive. It also allows me to create events that bring together Tudor enthusiasts from around the world, like the Tudor Summit, a virtual online event that happens every six months, and features leading historians, bloggers, and podcasters in the Tudor World. All of this takes time, and energy, and the Planner is a major way that my work is supported. 

Plus, what Tudor history enthusiast doesn't want to pull out this planner the next time they're making a doctor's appointment?!
 

THE PERKS!

In addition to my podcast, I do some other fun things like my online shop TudorFair.com which has lovingly curated Tudor swag, and there are gift cards there. I'm also creating the world's first TudorCon in 2019 in Pennsylvania, where we will spend three days in person learning, feasting, and partying like it's 1509. So depending on what tier you come in at, you can snag tickets to Tudorcon in person, or the digital tickets where we'll be streaming everything!

Of course, you'll also get the Tudor Planner - it completely sold out in 2019 so this way you'll guarantee that you have it, plus it's at the cheapest price it will be all year. 



Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't support the campaign financially, you can make a huge difference by sharing my work with others. Share the podcast. Share this project. Tell your friends who are into planning, and history. There are easy share tools right here on the Indiegogo page. Share, share, share!

And thank you!!!

story:
Update #1: 

The Chapter "My American Dream" is available for free when you sign up to my mailing list on www.waralovestory.com

Update #2:

Soft cover book which ships internationally has been added

________________________________________

 

Some people say that when it rains it can be a sign from God.  In Homer's Iliad, Zeus rained blood on the battlefield during the battle of Troy.  The fighting was intense and it was on that battlefield drenched in blood that some of the most heroic acts ever witnessed by men took place and were immortalized by Homer's pen. 

Not all battles are fought with swords... or guns... or bombs.  Some battles are fought with words and ideas.  Battlefields like these can be found anywhere there are people who seek the power to control.

These battles of words and deeds dwell all around us and can even wage within our own minds.  We live in a society today, which has over time watered the seeds of war, but there is still time to cultivate the seeds of peace.

 

 

War: A love Story is a book about a patriotic young man whose life is deeply rooted in religion and dedicated to the cause of fulfilling his American Dream.  From childhood he devoted his life to joining the military and following in the footsteps of his Grandfather who was a Lt. Colonel in the Air Force and who took part in top secret missions during Vietnam and the Cuban Missile Crisis.

Just as he begins to realize his dream though, something goes terribly wrong which catapults him into a journey of self discovery on the American road and abroad.  His adventures and hardships seem to echo at times those of the character Candide who was first imagined by the french philosopher Voltaire.

In his search to find new meaning, and as his old life crumbles all around him he finds himself living in another country and re-discovering his spiritual and earthly roots.  With this reawakening of passion inside of him he sets out to mend with worn out tools those things he once held sacred in order to restore his honor before it’s too late.

 

 

Who is Charles Voltaire?

Charles Voltaire is an idea.  He was first imagined as a joke, then as a pen name, until eventually he became a symbol of something bigger then the author himself.  His words stream from his eyes to his pen and with each stroke he connects ideas, symbols, and stories revealing deeper mysteries long since forgotten.  

He symbolizes that part in all of us that wants to be heard — that part of us that wants to do what’s right and speak up but doesn’t know how.   He embodies everything you wish you could have said if you’d had the courage to speak your mind without fear of the ramifications.  He’s a sinner but his conscience is clear because he took the time to confess his story.  He’s Rodin’s “Thinker,” naked and perched atop the gates of hell pondering a way to clothe his pride so he can make his way home to Eldorado.  

Love him or hate him but don’t question his honesty.  He wears his heart on his shoulder and the power of his speech and actions are tattooed on his face.  He uses myth as a tool to tell his story and is rooted in poetry.  He is a soldier only his weapons are far more powerful then those of conventional warfare and just like a samurai he carries two swords on him at all times.

Soft Cover Artwork

 

A Look Under the Cover

 

 

The book is organized with a quote at the top of each chapter that coincides with the theme of that chapter.  More subtly though, the story of Candide by Voltaire is woven into each chapter as a way to connect them all together.  The story will take you on a journey through the boyhood of a young patriotic American to the deserts of Iraq and beyond.

 

Chapter List:

  1. Fire and Dust
  2. If I die in a combat zone
  3. Nice Bombs
  4. Blood in Blood out
  5. My American Dream
  6. Dump Truck Transit
  7. That Fateful Moment
  8. An Oath an Oath
  9. Mere Christianity
  10. The Last Crusade
  11. ”Fucking Hajis”
  12. Us Vs. Them
  13. The Man Who Planted Trees
  14. The Art of War
  15. My First love

 

There are over 59,000 words or approximately 236 pages which have already been written.  I don't have a publisher though, so I need your support to finish the final draft, finalize artwork, and hire a professional editor.

 

Audience:

The content of the book will appeal to every Pastor, Veteran, and Politician in the US.  They are the ones I NEED to read this book so the entire marketing strategy is designed around them.  The book is written in a modern style blended with elements of classical literature and poetry which is sure to appeal to an even wider audience.

If you are reading this, there's a good chance you came across this campaign on Twitter or social media.  Stay tuned to the social media pages and you may notice something more then just a book marketing campaign but the beginnings of a movement.  If the strategy works the book will be read by the people who need to read it and there's hope it could bring about real change in the world.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't afford to contribute at this time, you can spread the word by sharing on social media through the links listed.  The more attention the campaign gets, the more likely I can reach my goal.

Thank you for your support!

The Art of War
My First love

Thank you for your support!

story:
Who am I (and what am I doing)?

Welcome! Devin Griffiths here, and very pleased to see you. I’m a professional writer, published author, and second-generation obsessed birder. I’ve spent most of my life around birds, and I’d like to take you with me on an adventure into their world through my book, A Symphony Of Feathers: Life In The Company Of Birds. It's a personal journey that explores the lives of these wonderful creatures and our enduring connection to them, and shows readers how critically important birds are to our mental and physical health, and indeed to our very survival. It examines the challenges they face, the work people are doing to conserve them, and what each of us as individuals can do to help build them a better world. 

Here’s the story

The challenges confronting birds are great--among them natural ones like finding food, raising young, and the pressures of migration, to man-made threats like habitat loss, disruption of resources, and climate change. But the reasons to conserve them are greater. From providing ecosystem services like seed dispersal, pest and disease control, beach stabilization, and pollination, to serving as the ultimate canaries in the coalmine, alerting us to potential environmental problems, birds are critical to maintaining and monitoring the health of the environment on which we all depend.

But this story is about more than saving birds for our benefit. It’s about understanding the critical roles they play in the environment at large, and respecting them as equally deserving of living the full measure of their lives free from harm. And it’s about reimagining the role of our own species on this planet—and our place as part of the web of life upon it—and creating a new story of humanity, casting us as ardent protectors, preservers, and stewards of the Earth and all who inhabit her.

What can you do?

Each day, the threats to birds grow more serious; every day that passes is another vanished opportunity to help them. Throughout my life, birds have been a constant source of solace and joy. A Symphony Of Feathers is my way of giving something back; funding this project can be yours. Help me bring A Symphony Of Feathers to life. Help me tell their story, and together we can ensure that our world always has a place for these magical creatures. 

So where’s the money going, anyway (and what do you get for it)?

Every dollar I raise goes directly towards getting this book done—from research and writing all the way through production and distribution (okay, maybe a meal or two along the way). The more I raise, the more books I can create, and the more people I can reach—which is, yes, good for me, but it’s even better for the birds. Contribute what you can—and don’t forget to check out the perks! The world is full of amazing birds, and I’ve picked some of my favorite images to share with you. Can’t decide which you like best? No problem! There are a couple of special packages that give you more than one (and they make great gifts for the bird lover in your family). You can also get a copy of the book (once it’s complete, of course), have me over for a reading, get the photos and the book… there are infinite options (well maybe not infinite, but there are quite a few). Check back once in a while, too; you never know what I might add! And remember to spread the word. Tell your friends, your family, your co-workers, bring it up casually at parties, shout it from the hills if that’s your thing, but let people know. If enough of us get involved, who knows what we can accomplish?
story_txt:
Who am I (and what am I doing)?
Welcome! Devin Griffiths here, and very pleased to see you. I’m a professional writer, published author, and second-generation obsessed birder. I’ve spent most of my life around birds, and I’d like to take you with me on an adventure into their world through my book, A Symphony Of Feathers: Life In The Company Of Birds. It's a personal journey that explores the lives of these wonderful creatures and our enduring connection to them, and shows readers how critically important birds are to our mental and physical health, and indeed to our very survival. It examines the challenges they face, the work people are doing to conserve them, and what each of us as individuals can do to help build them a better world. 

Here’s the story
The challenges confronting birds are great--among them natural ones like finding food, raising young, and the pressures of migration, to man-made threats like habitat loss, disruption of resources, and climate change. But the reasons to conserve them are greater. From providing ecosystem services like seed dispersal, pest and disease control, beach stabilization, and pollination, to serving as the ultimate canaries in the coalmine, alerting us to potential environmental problems, birds are critical to maintaining and monitoring the health of the environment on which we all depend.
But this story is about more than saving birds for our benefit. It’s about understanding the critical roles they play in the environment at large, and respecting them as equally deserving of living the full measure of their lives free from harm. And it’s about reimagining the role of our own species on this planet—and our place as part of the web of life upon it—and creating a new story of humanity, casting us as ardent protectors, preservers, and stewards of the Earth and all who inhabit her.

What can you do?
Each day, the threats to birds grow more serious; every day that passes is another vanished opportunity to help them. Throughout my life, birds have been a constant source of solace and joy. A Symphony Of Feathers is my way of giving something back; funding this project can be yours. Help me bring A Symphony Of Feathers to life. Help me tell their story, and together we can ensure that our world always has a place for these magical creatures. 
So where’s the money going, anyway (and what do you get for it)?
Every dollar I raise goes directly towards getting this book done—from research and writing all the way through production and distribution (okay, maybe a meal or two along the way). The more I raise, the more books I can create, and the more people I can reach—which is, yes, good for me, but it’s even better for the birds. Contribute what you can—and don’t forget to check out the perks! The world is full of amazing birds, and I’ve picked some of my favorite images to share with you. Can’t decide which you like best? No problem! There are a couple of special packages that give you more than one (and they make great gifts for the bird lover in your family). You can also get a copy of the book (once it’s complete, of course), have me over for a reading, get the photos and the book… there are infinite options (well maybe not infinite, but there are quite a few). Check back once in a while, too; you never know what I might add! And remember to spread the word. Tell your friends, your family, your co-workers, bring it up casually at parties, shout it from the hills if that’s your thing, but let people know. If enough of us get involved, who knows what we can accomplish?

story:
Spanish for Travelers: A Learning Journal is a beautifully designed and innovative self-study guide for people visiting Spanish-speaking countries. 

The book features a series of interactive, self-directed lessons on Spanish for a specific purpose: to increase readers’ communication with and connection to the Spanish-speaking world while traveling in it.

Readers will learn vocabulary words, basic grammar, common questions and answers, short dialogues, and local expressions that will help them become more independent travelers.

The book is divided into eight chapters that target Spanish for different aspects of traveling, including preparing and packing for a trip, introducing yourself, transportation, shopping, and, of course, eating. 

Each chapter encourages readers to customize their learning journey through the use of practice space for listing new foods that were tried, places visited, new words learned, and other highlights.

We wanted to write a book that could teach Spanish for your specific needs, but to give you the opportunity to add your own learning experiences. At the same time, we wanted to create a place that can help you see your learning progress.

To achieve this, we will work in different areas of interest and need, so that the topics to be addressed are of full relevance to you, and will help to increase learning motivation and awareness of the usefulness of learning Spanish as a second language.

Spanish for Travelers will be focused on you through a self-study format and on communication over grammar, thus facilitating your learning process and making it much more meaningful, close, and motivating for you.

We know that traveling is not the only way to learn Spanish. Maybe you're learning from home, which is an adventure on its own. This is why we designed the book in a way that looks attractive and will add style to your bookshelf.

Spanish for Travelers will accompany the reader through their traveling experiences with beautiful illustrations and a travel-themed layout.

We designed a high-quality book that will accompany you wherever you go. We paid attention to details and worked to craft a product that will be comfortable to use and long-lasting. 

The Book

Spanish for Travelers: A Learning Journal will be the best traveling companion you'll ever have. Beautifully designed and filled with useful activities and vocabulary, the book will help you be a more independent traveler. 

Postcards

A set of five postcards featuring illustrations from the book. A great way to share your travel experiences with friends and family!

The PDF

All Kickstarter pledges come with the full PDF version of Spanish for Travelers.

Eduardo Mora is an educator and writer and is the creator of Spanish for Travelers.

Following his passion for language learning and storytelling, he founded Brightlab, a language learning studio where he is the owner and creative director.

At Brightlab his work ranges from self-study guides to children’s books that aim to help shape a future where everyone can understand each other and work collaboratively.

Originally from Valparaiso, Chile, he now lives and works in Wilmington, North Carolina.

Follow him on Twitter!

Share this project on your social media, send us a screenshot at hello@gobrightlab.com, and we will send you a PDF copy of the book. Super easy! 

Facebook – Instagram – Twitter 

Thank you for your support! 

Interested in writing about our project? Download our press kit here!

Also, you can email us at hello@gobrightlab.com and we will be happy to answer your questions!

All the funds raised in this campaign will be used to pay for the cost of printing the book.

The PDF version will be delivered by June 2017.

The printed books and the postcards will be shipped by August 2017.

Thank you!

Thank you so much for backing, sharing, or just taking the time to learn about Spanish for Travelers. It really means a lot!

Also, infinite thanks to my dear family and friends for your support and encouragement. I love you!

Design and illustration

Estudio Libre

Credits

Music by Blank Ant. The artist is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution License.

Risks & Challenges

We have been working on Spanish for Travelers for over a year to ensure a high-quality product and very low risk. Before launching the campaign, we made sure our project was ready to be sent to print.

We have spent several months learning about book manufacturing, and because of this, we have found an American printer with the experience and capability to fulfill the demand for the book. Our campaign is also powered by Backerkit, a team of awesome people helping us with backer management.

If our campaign is successfully funded, we will commit ourselves to delivering a high-quality product and communicating transparently. Our main goal is to make sure that Spanish for Travelers is in your hands and we will work hard to achieve that goal.

story:
Lily Pond & Indiegogo

Indiegogo provides exposure and funding opportunities but it also furnishes a platform to present a project's backstory. This is especially important for an unusual book like LILY POND because people don't always realize that the illustrations are sculpted rather than computer generated. Thanks to Indiegogo, they can learn how Lily came to be, how the illustrations were made and what they were made from. Potential backers can learn of a young frog determined to seize life and the young woman determined to tell her story.

A Mother's Love

Self-publishing LILY POND allows me to control not only the book's content and print quality, but also its publicity and longevity. I'll make sure that LILY POND is still visible and available long after the new season of books have pushed LILY's contemporaries off the shelves at Barnes & Noble. 

The Genesis of LILY

When I was six, my siblings and I started building a clay town with some old balls of colored modeling clay. My parents, remarkably, let it stay, and Claytown grew to become the centerpiece of our childhoods. After college, I started sculpting clay illustrations for a poem I had written about growing up called “Lily Pond.” I honed my skills to become a freelance 3D artist in San Diego, New York and Los Angeles, eventually working as a character sculptor on The Nightmare Before Christmas, Toy Story and as the sculpting supervisor on James & the Giant Peach. I kept working on LILY POND over the years, sculpting and finishing the scenes as time and life allowed.

I met my husband shortly after the final illustration had been photographed. We were both pushing forty, so once my work on James & The Giant Peach was over I set LILY POND aside and quit "show business" to start a family. By the time I returned to the book - three kids and several years later - Photoshop had been born. With the help of Gary Karsten, my image editor and "computer hands," LILY POND's twenty-three illustrations were gradually Photoshopped to perfection.

Raves & Reviews!

“On the eve of her eighth birthday, a young frog dreams of her future in Shelley Daniels Lekven’s new book, LILY POND. Ms. Lekven’s remarkable illustrations – all sculpted by her hand in colored clay – are eye-opening works of wonder and imagination that should make this sweet tale a children’s book classic.”– HENRY SELICK, Director, The Nightmare Before Christmas, Coraline

“Years ago, Shelley Daniels Lekven introduced me to the fantastic world of LILY POND, her picture book featuring amazing and whimsical hand sculpted clay scenes, telling the charming story of a little girl frog’s dreams for the future. This is a book you can gaze at repeatedly and always find something new and wonderful. Shelley Daniels Lekven’s immense sculptural and storytelling talent comes through on every delightful page. The world of LILY POND is immersive and joyous. This is a book for everyone.”– KELLY ASBURY, Director, Shrek 2, Gnomeo & Juliet, Smurfs – The Lost Village

“The playful world of LILY POND  bursts with childhood joy and imagination, and celebrates a child’s unwritten tomorrows, full of endless possibilities. Shelley is such a gifted sculptor that I knew a book illustrated entirely by her magical all-clay scenes would be something very special. LILY POND is the kind of book that should be out there in the hands of children.” - GREG DYKSTRA, Sculptor, The Nightmare Before Christmas, Finding Nemo, Brave and Up 

“This lovely book for children, and the child in all of us, provides a totally new and wonderful way of imagining life’s possibilities. The messages of empowerment and inclusion flow cheerfully throughout both the story and its delightful illustrations.”– THE REVEREND FRANK PLACONE-WILLEY, Minister, Summit Unitarian Universalist Fellowship

“I am so impressed by the detail, craftsmanship and thought in this work. A true delight. Genius.” – JENNY SAAR, Artist/Illustrator

“LILY POND is exactly the type of book I would have spent hours staring at when I was a kid.” - LINDSEY B.

 “My mom sat looking at the castle for an hour.”- RAYNA M., age 10

 “This book makes me feel… happy!”- DENISE T., age 50

Risks & Challenges

The book files have gone to the printer, the proofs have been approved and five thousand copies will arrive from China by the end of December. While printing and shipping the book from China is surprisingly inexpensive, just $1.46 per book, other related expenses have been adding up ($583 for proofs, the computer work needed to get the files ready and sent, etc.). A successful Kickstarter campaign for LILY POND just closed with $4400 in funds, but the net profit from that will only cover about a third of the printing costs. Funds from this Indiegogo campaign will be used to help fill the gaps.

Any additional funds will be used toward:

  • Shipping costs
  • Fulfillment and warehousing costs
  • Indiegogo fees     

Estimated Delivery Date

 Book orders are scheduled to be delivered by early January. Backers will be kept apprised of any unforeseen delays.
​

 

*International Orders: 

If you live in a country with a prime minister, chancellor or premier, the line: “Will I be famous and president twice?” (see below) can be covered with a nice-looking label to create alternate versions with the appropriate head of state. You will be able to choose your version in a survey taken at the end of the campaign.

Thank you!

story:
The Novel

The outcome of several years of research. It exposes the truth about a small elite group of capitalists who, with the collaboration of key political figures, now lord it over our world.

The novel draws heavily on historic record: press archives, government and intelligence agency records to expose the rise and continued existence of a secret cabal of Internationalists who have gained monopoly control over money and credit. They now wield inordinate influence over the determinants of the global economy that has so adversely impacted our planet, and that defines how we live our lives. This is the story about our need to take back ownership of the problems that now threaten to deprive our children of the life we had hoped, like us, they would enjoy.

The theft of sovereign wealth, terrorism, money laundering, the drug trade, war, religion, and relentless environmental destruction - along with the privatisation of everything are all integral to the story.

Do you have a favourite test-read review?

Yes: An exciting read and an animated exchange. However, I would be cashing in any loyalty program points before you publish. There won't be any discounts coming your way. Lol.

What other comments have I had?

Genuinely enjoying it, just very confronting given I just don't think this way or conduct my life in a manner that allows this sort of premeditated (dare I say it) evil to exist. I live in the suburbs, walk dogs, put out rubbish bins, paint things and maintain gardens. This is heavy stuff. It's not naivety, just a lack of exposure to this type of thinking. I use YouTube for DIY videos.

Book Comment Snippet

Please tell me [he] dies a painful horrible death somewhere along the way. He is a must needed foil for your story, but what a pig. Surely James gets tired of all this and at least beats him up.

Book Comment Snippet

Still hard to believe that this is available info, that dedicated people have found it and written about…. We are no longer talking economic principles of competitive advantage, but deliberate control of economic instruments and outcomes. Sad isn't it.

Book Comment Snippet

[She] doesn't sound so nice any more. A distant sort of person that having the so-called good fight on paper, but is not happy, not ready to commit (I suspect a bit selfish) and is using her beau. A bit hypocritical for me. 

Have you completed your final edit, and if so what did the editor say?

The copy edit has been completed and the novel is now ready to be typeset prior to the first proof.

The copy editor's comments were:
Works well.
The writing is solid.
I liked the way you situated most of the non-fiction element in the middle, and brought it back to the story more at the end - that was nicely done.

So what do you think about the current state of play?

I think 2008 was merely the tide draining away ahead of the Tsunami that's about to hit, both in economic and environmental terms. Economic collapse will pave the way for more draconian government. While the environmental disaster that is happening right before our eyes will result in crops dying in the ground, water deprivation, disease and starvation; which will be great for some – a very few – as they drive up the cost of water and food while destroying the middle, and upper middle classes as they drive us back towards a neo-feudal existence.

That said, I'm also confident that change is within our grasp. We just all need to get nto the same page. Stephen Hawking predicted we had about a 1 in 20 chance that global warming would destroy our planet within a single lifetime. Which, at least to my mind was a challenge; it doesn't have to end like this, not if we all come together in pursuit of the dreams our great grandparents and their parents had for their future generations just a century ago. If we act now, collectively, and we're radical but not extreme in our thinking - we might still just have a small glimmer of hope.

So are you a crazy conspiracy theorist?

No, although I'm sure that's the spin the mainstream would put on it. To borrow cliché - I do believe that the truth is typically far stranger than fiction. And often a lot scarier - which is why I spent the first couple of years buried in research, fact-checking everything. And why I went back to the likes of the Architects and Engineers for 9/11 Truth, and the And the UK’s climate coalition with a request that they fact check my interpretation of the evidence and facts as the last thing I want is to be bashed with the fake news stick.

Is this another example of Fake News?

No. Absolutely not. I've been meticulous in my research. When I'd finished my final draft I passed the novel to organisations like the Climate Change org, and the Architects and Engineers for 9/11 truth to fact check ... not that this is  novel just about 9/11 or climate change. They are events that are used to give context to the narrative that exposes the ambition of a few men whose greed for power and wealth has reshaped our world for the worst.

Why should you read this novel?

My hope is that it might just change the way you think about the world around you. And if the novel achieves that, then it might just also help us all find a few alterntive answers to the rather cataclysmic problems now confronting us.

 

Author Biography

GEORGE, uninspired by the sunshine of California, lives a quiet, albeit hectic life under grey skies in the UK's second city, Birmingham. An MBA graduate, he built his career over  several decades in the corporate world.  He also conceived and developed strategies to shape consumer opinion, for the clients of some of London’s leading creative agencies.

Alarmed by the growing levels of inequality, the rise of what he believes to be neo-feudalism disguised as neoliberalism, along with the destructive impact of globalisation, George opted to explore poverty as a writer. Why? Because he believes the journey towards change and securing a future for our children, in a world that sits on the brink of a economic and environmental collapse, begins with insight. He was, and is, determined to become a voice for change.

Now, having comfortably achieved his first objective of exploring poverty first hand while researching and writing an informative and engaging factual fiction novel - and having learned to mix a stonkingly good Long Island tea - he's now out to achieve his second goal of spreading the message. To do this, he needs your help to get his first novel out into a global market in as many languages as possible.

A couple of his favourite tweets are:

Were we all so busy climbing to the tops of our favourite trees that we didn’t see the men with a monopoly over the forests cutting them down-Killing off the insects-Killing the environment; distracting us with their politics, their wars, their greed #orwell_horizon

Unlike 1789, anarchy and a response through chaos will no longer deliver change, it will simply pave the way towards more draconian government. Our solutions reside in understanding the problems and then using the system to implement the discovered answers #orwell_horizon

Worried about what their #endgame might mean for you – 2008 was simply the tide going out b4 the Tsunami #orwell_horizon

Neoliberalism + neoconservatism = financialization of capitalism + monopoly = austerity for most + quant easing for a few = derivatives + gov bond bubble = endgame = neo-feudalism = zero-hour contracts + growth of low wage economies #orwell_horizon

Censorship and a reluctance to engage with alternatives has seldom, if ever, resulted in a better outcome being achieved. It has often resulted in change when motivated by the offer to eat cake. #orwell_horizon

If you live in the dark long enough, you become a mushroom. If you sit on the fence & live in the dark, you’re probably being spoon feed that alternative reality, spun by their mainstream media. It’s why #JulianAssange is banged up in the Ecuadorian Embassy #orwell_horizon

2 years ago 15 sinkholes, each one spewing tonnes of methane CO₂ a 100x more methane opened up on Siberia’s Bely Island. Now there are more than 7k We’re well on way to 2º - buckle in. 1.7tn tonnes of CO₂ & 100x CH4 under permafrost - 2late? #orwell_horizon

Will our world is dye while we sit on our hands. If we have lost faith in the economic system of the few and their mechanism of political control, why do we believe the answer resides in more politics and the simple tweaking of their failed economic system? #orwell_horizon

If, unlike Thatcher, we believe in society and reject the current system of political rule by a few, then the creation of a state of flux through anarchy and  chaos will never offer a solution to the economic and environmental collapse we’re on the brink of #orwell_horizon.

The woes to our failed political & economic system won’t result from tweaking the current models - left, right or centrist politics & their vested interests in the current economic models will always fail. The solution resides in fundamental change @Orwell_Horizon

The Artist

Sergei Zoschenko, a freelance artist and illustrator, was born in the small Ukrainian town Yasinovatay. He graduated with Honors in Fine Arts from the Donetsk Art School in 1992 and gained an M.A. from Kharkiv State Academy of Design and Arts in 2000. He is now based in Ukraine’s second largest city, Kharkiv. Sergei’s art for the cover of Orwellian Horizon – GREED expresses, through imagery, the enslavement of ordinary people in a dystopic reality that has brought our planet to the brink of economic and environmental collapse. His art captures, in a picture, the essence of the novel.

 

Other Ways You can Help

I'd really appreciate any help. If you like what you've read and can't do any more than tell a friend and make a bit of noise about the campaign - then please do. You can use the Indiegogo share tools. You'll make a difference.
story_txt:
The Novel
The outcome of several years of research. It exposes the truth about a small elite group of capitalists who, with the collaboration of key political figures, now lord it over our world.
The novel draws heavily on historic record: press archives, government and intelligence agency records to expose the rise and continued existence of a secret cabal of Internationalists who have gained monopoly control over money and credit. They now wield inordinate influence over the determinants of the global economy that has so adversely impacted our planet, and that defines how we live our lives. This is the story about our need to take back ownership of the problems that now threaten to deprive our children of the life we had hoped, like us, they would enjoy.
The theft of sovereign wealth, terrorism, money laundering, the drug trade, war, religion, and relentless environmental destruction - along with the privatisation of everything are all integral to the story.
Do you have a favourite test-read review?
Yes: An exciting read and an animated exchange. However, I would be cashing in any loyalty program points before you publish. There won't be any discounts coming your way. Lol.
What other comments have I had?
Genuinely enjoying it, just very confronting given I just don't think this way or conduct my life in a manner that allows this sort of premeditated (dare I say it) evil to exist. I live in the suburbs, walk dogs, put out rubbish bins, paint things and maintain gardens. This is heavy stuff. It's not naivety, just a lack of exposure to this type of thinking. I use YouTube for DIY videos.
Book Comment Snippet
Please tell me [he] dies a painful horrible death somewhere along the way. He is a must needed foil for your story, but what a pig. Surely James gets tired of all this and at least beats him up.
Book Comment Snippet
Still hard to believe that this is available info, that dedicated people have found it and written about…. We are no longer talking economic principles of competitive advantage, but deliberate control of economic instruments and outcomes. Sad isn't it.
Book Comment Snippet
[She] doesn't sound so nice any more. A distant sort of person that having the so-called good fight on paper, but is not happy, not ready to commit (I suspect a bit selfish) and is using her beau. A bit hypocritical for me. 
Have you completed your final edit, and if so what did the editor say?
The copy edit has been completed and the novel is now ready to be typeset prior to the first proof.
The copy editor's comments were:Works well.The writing is solid.I liked the way you situated most of the non-fiction element in the middle, and brought it back to the story more at the end - that was nicely done.
So what do you think about the current state of play?
I think 2008 was merely the tide draining away ahead of the Tsunami that's about to hit, both in economic and environmental terms. Economic collapse will pave the way for more draconian government. While the environmental disaster that is happening right before our eyes will result in crops dying in the ground, water deprivation, disease and starvation; which will be great for some – a very few – as they drive up the cost of water and food while destroying the middle, and upper middle classes as they drive us back towards a neo-feudal existence.
That said, I'm also confident that change is within our grasp. We just all need to get nto the same page. Stephen Hawking predicted we had about a 1 in 20 chance that global warming would destroy our planet within a single lifetime. Which, at least to my mind was a challenge; it doesn't have to end like this, not if we all come together in pursuit of the dreams our great grandparents and their parents had for their future generations just a century ago. If we act now, collectively, and we're radical but not extreme in our thinking - we might still just have a small glimmer of hope.
So are you a crazy conspiracy theorist?
No, although I'm sure that's the spin the mainstream would put on it. To borrow cliché - I do believe that the truth is typically far stranger than fiction. And often a lot scarier - which is why I spent the first couple of years buried in research, fact-checking everything. And why I went back to the likes of the Architects and Engineers for 9/11 Truth, and the And the UK’s climate coalition with a request that they fact check my interpretation of the evidence and facts as the last thing I want is to be bashed with the fake news stick.
Is this another example of Fake News?
No. Absolutely not. I've been meticulous in my research. When I'd finished my final draft I passed the novel to organisations like the Climate Change org, and the Architects and Engineers for 9/11 truth to fact check ... not that this is  novel just about 9/11 or climate change. They are events that are used to give context to the narrative that exposes the ambition of a few men whose greed for power and wealth has reshaped our world for the worst.
Why should you read this novel?
My hope is that it might just change the way you think about the world around you. And if the novel achieves that, then it might just also help us all find a few alterntive answers to the rather cataclysmic problems now confronting us.
 
Author Biography
GEORGE, uninspired by the sunshine of California, lives a quiet, albeit hectic life under grey skies in the UK's second city, Birmingham. An MBA graduate, he built his career over  several decades in the corporate world.  He also conceived and developed strategies to shape consumer opinion, for the clients of some of London’s leading creative agencies.
Alarmed by the growing levels of inequality, the rise of what he believes to be neo-feudalism disguised as neoliberalism, along with the destructive impact of globalisation, George opted to explore poverty as a writer. Why? Because he believes the journey towards change and securing a future for our children, in a world that sits on the brink of a economic and environmental collapse, begins with insight. He was, and is, determined to become a voice for change.
Now, having comfortably achieved his first objective of exploring poverty first hand while researching and writing an informative and engaging factual fiction novel - and having learned to mix a stonkingly good Long Island tea - he's now out to achieve his second goal of spreading the message. To do this, he needs your help to get his first novel out into a global market in as many languages as possible.
A couple of his favourite tweets are:
Were we all so busy climbing to the tops of our favourite trees that we didn’t see the men with a monopoly over the forests cutting them down-Killing off the insects-Killing the environment; distracting us with their politics, their wars, their greed #orwell_horizon
Unlike 1789, anarchy and a response through chaos will no longer deliver change, it will simply pave the way towards more draconian government. Our solutions reside in understanding the problems and then using the system to implement the discovered answers #orwell_horizon
Worried about what their #endgame might mean for you – 2008 was simply the tide going out b4 the Tsunami #orwell_horizon
Neoliberalism + neoconservatism = financialization of capitalism + monopoly = austerity for most + quant easing for a few = derivatives + gov bond bubble = endgame = neo-feudalism = zero-hour contracts + growth of low wage economies #orwell_horizon
Censorship and a reluctance to engage with alternatives has seldom, if ever, resulted in a better outcome being achieved. It has often resulted in change when motivated by the offer to eat cake. #orwell_horizon
If you live in the dark long enough, you become a mushroom. If you sit on the fence & live in the dark, you’re probably being spoon feed that alternative reality, spun by their mainstream media. It’s why #JulianAssange is banged up in the Ecuadorian Embassy #orwell_horizon

Will our world is dye while we sit on our hands. If we have lost faith in the economic system of the few and their mechanism of political control, why do we believe the answer resides in more politics and the simple tweaking of their failed economic system? #orwell_horizon
If, unlike Thatcher, we believe in society and reject the current system of political rule by a few, then the creation of a state of flux through anarchy and  chaos will never offer a solution to the economic and environmental collapse we’re on the brink of #orwell_horizon.
The woes to our failed political & economic system won’t result from tweaking the current models - left, right or centrist politics & their vested interests in the current economic models will always fail. The solution resides in fundamental change @Orwell_Horizon
The Artist

Sergei Zoschenko, a freelance artist and illustrator, was born in the small Ukrainian town Yasinovatay. He graduated with Honors in Fine Arts from the Donetsk Art School in 1992 and gained an M.A. from Kharkiv State Academy of Design and Arts in 2000. His art captures, in a picture, the essence of the novel.
 
Other Ways You can Help
I'd really appreciate any help. If you like what you've read and can't do any more than tell a friend and make a bit of noise about the campaign - then please do. You can use the Indiegogo share tools. You'll make a difference.

story:
Short Summary

When you experience loss, especially if it's the end of a relationship, it feels like you've been sucker-punched by a giant. Knocked down, the world spins out of control and nothing makes sense anymore. Heart break cripples people for years, decades, sometimes even for the rest of their lives.

Has that been your story?

It doesn't have to be that way. You can experience the hell of heartbreak and become something more. You can become whole. I know you can because I did.

I'm a regular dude who has experienced both personal loss and living with fears and insecurities for years and years. I used to be fearful, insecure and pretty codependent. I was unaware of some of this stuff. But when my worst fear of rejection & abandonment came true, I was met with a very startling reality.

I had to decide if I was going to let it break me or if I'd dig deep to overcome the issues within myself. Instead of blaming those who hurt me, or turning on myself, I utilized a core principle gained from an unlikely source from my past: my brief stint in amateur boxing.

This book is the culmination of this healing journey. It's a guide for how to heal, rebuild yourself and birth a new life without pain, fear or regret.

The Be Solid book includes the method and lessons learned along the way and the tools I've gained to restore my heart and mind to new levels. This is my transformation story and method that you can use to become your best self after experiencing your worst pain.

 

Who's This Book For? Who Should Read It?

Have you experienced personal loss? This is for you. Have you experienced heartbreak? This book is for you. Do you feel stuck in anxiety and worry? This book is for you.

But here's the thing....

Heartbreak, loss and feeling stuck are all human conditions. All of us have experienced it in some form or fashion. When your heart suffers, everything in your life goes dark and hope seems completely lost.

This book project is about healing. It's about loss not being what defines who you are as a person, nor determines your future. This book and everything in the Be Solid brand is about wholeness, restoration and transformation into your best life and best self.

Which we hear a lot, right? "Become your best self" is stuff the self-help gurus talk about a lot. I'm not interested in being a guru. I am interested in living a life of peace, satisfaction, happiness, and completeness. Getting free from insecurities, shame, fear, doubt, worry, anxiety and everything else like that.

How about you?

If you've struggled with self-doubt, a need for validation from others, fears, shame, worries, or anxieties then this book is exactly what you are looking for to be free.

You'll learn not only the principles that guide a whole and solid life, but also gain the action steps to take along the way in your own healing journey.

 

Who is this guy who's trying to make boxing a healing sport?

I've got a name you won't forget: D Grant Smith. You can call me D (that's what my friends do!).

I've got a storied life of overcoming challenges and obstacles. Professionally I'm a syndicated radio host, life & personal development coach, and speaker.

Which looks like a lot of big wins and success on the outside. But on the inside, I used to be scared and full of fear. That fear ruled a lot of how I thought about myself, which caused problems in relationships and kept me from experiencing growth and success for many years. It also made me a pretty codependent person, which led to some issues I wasn't even aware of until my marriage came to a sudden end.

It wasn't until I experienced some very deep personal loss that the game changed for me. I was confronted with the reality that I either had to change myself or I had to give up trying because nothing was going to be like it was. There is no going back to "normal" after heartbreak, especially when it's a relationship. You either heal yourself or you carry the weight of that pain with you for the rest of your days.

Which is why pain can be transformational if you let it. It's like how gold becomes truly valuable. It has to go through the most intense fires to burn off all the junk that's attached to it so that it can become pure. That fire is hot as hell! So is the pain of heartbreak.

It's not easy, don't get me wrong. Healing and becoming whole after you've been broken and experienced loss is hard. But if I can do it, you can do it. This book is about the healing process that I've been on. And the process involves overcoming very deep-seated fears you may be carrying with you from childhood. I had a lot of fears growing up that I talk about in the book, and I talk about the steps I took to overcome them.

There's no fear that controls my actions or behaviors anymore. Confidence, peace, strength, and wholeness are regular ways of thinking and behaving now. I'm not perfect or close to it. But life feels a whole lot better on this side now.

Everything I share in this book is true because I've lived it. And from the experiences of healing the broken places in myself, I've been able to lead and coach countless people in their personal transformation and wholeness.

I look forward to being able to do much more of that through the funding of this project to deliver these tools and resources to people all over the world.

 

Why Is This Project A Game Changer?

 

If you've ever felt unworthy or not good enough (who hasn't?), the emotional turmoil of heartbreak and loss seems to confirm that terrible belief. It makes you feel like what you had wasn't worth fighting for. Which is debilitating. And something all of us fear.

But here's the thing:

You get to decide what to do with your life when you're faced with your worst fears.

Who will you become. Will you be someone who carries anger, resentment, bitterness, rage, and pain with you?

Will you let your experiences negatively impact your relationships, your business, your family life and your health?

Everything is connected. Heartbreak doesn't just hurt in one place. It carries over into every area of your life.

That's why when you experience it, it's like going through hell. You can't compartmentalize hell.

When I lost my marriage I had to quit the entrepreneurial business I had because I lost all of the confidence I had in myself. I took a very challenging job to be able to build that confidence back. I was scared of a LOT of stuff. But I didn't want to make decisions that would fuel more brokenness. So I chose to let that experience be the transformational vehicle to become the best version of me.

In just 2 years time, I've restarted my business working with people in helping them heal and grow. My confidence is at an all time high. I have peace in my life. I enjoy my time and my friends. I've discovered new hobbies and traveled more. It's easier than ever to make friends and bring healthy relationships into my life. I'm physically the healthiest I've ever been and exercise regularly.

Because when you seek wholeness in your life, everything changes. You come into the fullness of who you really are. Not hiding yourself out of fear, and not dependent on anyone else's validation. It's true freedom.

That's what this book and this project is all about. I'm serious about helping people who have been through this gut-wrenching experience of heartbreak. I want to help those who are going through it now, and those who are helping a loved one go through it be transformed.

I believe that pain can be the catalyst for a better life if you will let yourself go through the healing process in this book. I'm committed to helping to break the tragedy of hurting people hurting others. That cycle is real.

This book is a game changer because it changes the dynamic of who you are. Don't be a victim. Instead, become a  conqueror.

You have the power within you to become a solid individual. You just need the tools, guidance, and empowerment to make the necessary changes and move forward. Fortunately, you have me and this book.

Your support of this project helps me to be able to spread healing and wholeness to throughout the world so that hearts can be made whole from brokenness.

 

What Does This Campaign Goal Cover?

Yes the book is written. But it still needs to be formatted and readied for publishing. While "writing" a book like this has emotional/mental costs of living through the healing process described, it's also already had financial costs. I've invested thousands of my own dollars, borrowed resources from others, and done good faith deals to have everything that is currently in place. But I can't do this on my own. To be able to publish and put it out into the world (meaning to make it available for you to read in print, ebook, or audiobook), I need you to partner with me in supporting this campaign.

The campaign goal also covers the costs of promotion, marketing, design and other items. These costs include:

  • the initial print run and audiobook publishing
  • editor's fees,
  • promotion/PR services,
  • video production,
  • graphic design
  • copy writing
  • website design and hosting
  • additional merchandise (Solid T-Shirts!!!)
  • Indiegogo fees

I'm a big supporter of people who work to change the world, which is one reason I do what I do. In that vein, I'll be contributing 10% of everything we raise in this campaign to Big Brothers Big Sisters to help make more young people solid in life.

 

**BONUS**
For everyone who contributes at a perk level (click each button to see what the perk level includes) with a Paperback copy ($35 or more), the paperback copy will come to you autographed with a special note inside. Another reason to contribute to this campaign and not wait for the book to be released to the general public.

Mention of you will also be included in a special video following the conclusion of this campaign where I will name you (and provide a pic if you send one in) and thank you for your help in making people all over the world more solid and whole.

Why You Should Support This Book Launch

This transformational book has taken two years to write and develop. Getting it published and into your hands quickly is why I need your help.  Supporters of this campaign get to read it before the rest of the world. Which means I'll personally send you a copy before it's "officially" released. That's first dibs!

Which means that you get bragging rights in saying that this book happened because of you!

The Be Solid book is a method, process, and guidebook into healing all in one. But there's more to help you in your healing to transform into the best version of yourself.

I'm committed to helping people heal and live their best life! This campaign gives more people more ways to benefit from this method and system for healing. The book, coaching, and speaking opportunities are all available in one place for those who want to really dive deep.

If you want more than the book and want a personalized, one-on-one experience in transforming your life into wholeness, that is available (at a discount) through this campaign. The Be Solid Coaching Program is where you work with me directly in a 6 month program. In it we walk together through the steps in the Be Solid process for wholeness and healing. It's life coaching on a higher level of personal development, wholeness, and growth.

If you have a business or group that can benefit from the inspiration and motivation of this story, you have the opportunity to bring the full keynote presentation to your event, meeting, or group.

All of these options are available at the different perk levels (click each button to the right to see what's inside and what's included).

 

What happens if we don't reach our goal?

If we don't reach our goal, we'll divvy up the funds that we do raise and allocate them to the sections we can cover. This campaign is designed to help us spread the healing and restoration method to the world to help people in our existing communities as well as those in other areas. ,

Every dollar you contribute goes to making that goal happen.

The book is about healing and wholeness. So is the program. And the coaching. And the keynote presentation. Everything here is about changing the dynamic of your life from brokenness into wholeness.

You are worth fighting for!

It's a statement you'll see me use a lot. Because owning your worth and being solid in who you are is the key to operating out of wholeness.

Your investment in this project gives healing and inspiration to yourself while also helping someone else have the chance to experience it too.

On top of contributing money to our chosen nonprofit, we're also going to contribute books to our local Big Brothers Big Sisters organization so their personnel and the people they serve can be positively impacted too!

My biggest desire is to help people who've been in similar shoes as I have come out of their brokenness and into the richness of themselves. When you believe in yourself, fully love yourself, and operate from confidence, everything in your life improves. Your interpersonal relationships are strong and vibrant. You have peace in your days. Your business endeavors become easier and more successful. And you love the life you live.

 

Every person wants to feel love, respect, and be successful. Don't you? But too often we let experiences and the trauma that life hits us with determine the story that we live out. You can choose to be bigger than your circumstances and become something that changes the world. This project gives you what you need to heal and become a force for good in a broken world.

Risks & Challenges

Vulnerability is risky. Talking about personal pain is risky. Spending 2 years going through a difficult healing process and writing about it is risky. Devoting the time, focus, money, and energy into a project that I believe in with all my heart and continuing with it for over a year is risky.

There's a lot of risk attached to this project already. But you know what? It's worth it. Because the healing has been worth it. So has the transformation. I'm 10x the man and human I was before everything broke down. In a way, I'm very thankful for this experience (despite how difficult and painful it was) because of what it produced.

The transformation I've been able to help others experience through coaching and speaking is worth it. Helping people go through their darkness to discover that the light on the other side is actually inside them. That's worth it.

Here's where the book stands right now: This book is written, edited,  is being readied to print. There are still a few things we need to add/correct before we hit "Print." This campaign ensures that we will publish it in the next few months.

We will make advanced reader copies (in digital format) available to those who support this campaign as a way to kick off the launch of the book. We will also provide additional opportunities for early adopters through the Be Solid Program and keynote speech to supporters of this campaign before we release it to the world.

The Real Challenge

The biggest challenge for us is getting as many people as possible to hear about the book and the platform. Marketing and promotional endeavors can be bootstrapped, but you and I both know that doing so limits the amount of reach and exposure that can bring.

I'm not interested in playing small in this book release because I want to help as many people as possible live a full and whole life. Restoration is the message here, and spreading the love about this book actually spreads love to the world.

Personal growth is not just a book genre, it's a reality for those who seek it. This book is a resource to achieve that, and help countless people find the healing, peace, and transformation they seek.

I'm asking for your help and support to help me turn the Be Solid message of transformation out of brokenness into a person who can take on life's biggest challenges.

As you can see from the breakdown, the majority of costs we're funding with this program allows us to take the message and materials to people all over the world for a positive change in people's lives.

The more funds we raise on top of our goal will go to continuing this endeavor of spreading healing and love to people who have experienced loss for their transformation.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you want to contribute in a way that is more than financial, you can talk up this book and this campaign with people in your life who can benefit the most from it. That can include a personal letter or email with our campaign URL, writing up a social media post that talks about why you're passionate about this project, or messaging us to see what ways you can volunteer to be a part of our team.

Please use the Indiegogo sharing tools to spread the word about this campaign, and be sure to write something in the post too. When you speak, it has so much more power than just clicking a share button. Plus, we want to hear what you have to say about this project!

Thank you for your support, contributions, and joining us in spreading love to the world. You're a solid person for doing so!
