Who will you become. Will you be someone who carries anger, resentment, bitterness, rage, and pain with you?
Will you let your experiences negatively impact your relationships, your business, your family life and your health?
Everything is connected. Heartbreak doesn't just hurt in one place. It carries over into every area of your life.
That's why when you experience it, it's like going through hell. You can't compartmentalize hell.
When I lost my marriage I had to quit the entrepreneurial business I had because I lost all of the confidence I had in myself. I took a very challenging job to be able to build that confidence back. I was scared of a LOT of stuff. But I didn't want to make decisions that would fuel more brokenness. So I chose to let that experience be the transformational vehicle to become the best version of me.
In just 2 years time, I've restarted my business working with people in helping them heal and grow. My confidence is at an all time high. I have peace in my life. I enjoy my time and my friends. I've discovered new hobbies and traveled more. It's easier than ever to make friends and bring healthy relationships into my life. I'm physically the healthiest I've ever been and exercise regularly.
Because when you seek wholeness in your life, everything changes. You come into the fullness of who you really are. Not hiding yourself out of fear, and not dependent on anyone else's validation. It's true freedom.
That's what this book and this project is all about. I'm serious about helping people who have been through this gut-wrenching experience of heartbreak. I want to help those who are going through it now, and those who are helping a loved one go through it be transformed.
I believe that pain can be the catalyst for a better life if you will let yourself go through the healing process in this book. I'm committed to helping to break the tragedy of hurting people hurting others. That cycle is real.
This book is a game changer because it changes the dynamic of who you are. Don't be a victim. Instead, become a  conqueror.
You have the power within you to become a solid individual. You just need the tools, guidance, and empowerment to make the necessary changes and move forward. Fortunately, you have me and this book.
Your support of this project helps me to be able to spread healing and wholeness to throughout the world so that hearts can be made whole from brokenness.
 

What Does This Campaign Goal Cover?
Yes the book is written. But it still needs to be formatted and readied for publishing. While "writing" a book like this has emotional/mental costs of living through the healing process described, it's also already had financial costs. I've invested thousands of my own dollars, borrowed resources from others, and done good faith deals to have everything that is currently in place. But I can't do this on my own. To be able to publish and put it out into the world (meaning to make it available for you to read in print, ebook, or audiobook), I need you to partner with me in supporting this campaign.
The campaign goal also covers the costs of promotion, marketing, design and other items. These costs include:

the initial print run and audiobook publishing
editor's fees,
promotion/PR services,
video production,
graphic design
copy writing
website design and hosting
additional merchandise (Solid T-Shirts!!!)
Indiegogo fees

I'm a big supporter of people who work to change the world, which is one reason I do what I do. In that vein, I'll be contributing 10% of everything we raise in this campaign to Big Brothers Big Sisters to help make more young people solid in life.
 
**BONUS**For everyone who contributes at a perk level (click each button to see what the perk level includes) with a Paperback copy ($35 or more), the paperback copy will come to you autographed with a special note inside. Another reason to contribute to this campaign and not wait for the book to be released to the general public.
Mention of you will also be included in a special video following the conclusion of this campaign where I will name you (and provide a pic if you send one in) and thank you for your help in making people all over the world more solid and whole.

Why You Should Support This Book Launch
This transformational book has taken two years to write and develop. Getting it published and into your hands quickly is why I need your help.  Supporters of this campaign get to read it before the rest of the world. Which means I'll personally send you a copy before it's "officially" released. That's first dibs!
Which means that you get bragging rights in saying that this book happened because of you!
The Be Solid book is a method, process, and guidebook into healing all in one. But there's more to help you in your healing to transform into the best version of yourself.
I'm committed to helping people heal and live their best life! This campaign gives more people more ways to benefit from this method and system for healing. The book, coaching, and speaking opportunities are all available in one place for those who want to really dive deep.
If you want more than the book and want a personalized, one-on-one experience in transforming your life into wholeness, that is available (at a discount) through this campaign. The Be Solid Coaching Program is where you work with me directly in a 6 month program. In it we walk together through the steps in the Be Solid process for wholeness and healing. It's life coaching on a higher level of personal development, wholeness, and growth.
If you have a business or group that can benefit from the inspiration and motivation of this story, you have the opportunity to bring the full keynote presentation to your event, meeting, or group.
All of these options are available at the different perk levels (click each button to the right to see what's inside and what's included).
 
What happens if we don't reach our goal?
If we don't reach our goal, we'll divvy up the funds that we do raise and allocate them to the sections we can cover. This campaign is designed to help us spread the healing and restoration method to the world to help people in our existing communities as well as those in other areas. ,
Every dollar you contribute goes to making that goal happen.
The book is about healing and wholeness. So is the program. And the coaching. And the keynote presentation. Everything here is about changing the dynamic of your life from brokenness into wholeness.
You are worth fighting for!
It's a statement you'll see me use a lot. Because owning your worth and being solid in who you are is the key to operating out of wholeness.
Your investment in this project gives healing and inspiration to yourself while also helping someone else have the chance to experience it too.
On top of contributing money to our chosen nonprofit, we're also going to contribute books to our local Big Brothers Big Sisters organization so their personnel and the people they serve can be positively impacted too!

My biggest desire is to help people who've been in similar shoes as I have come out of their brokenness and into the richness of themselves. When you believe in yourself, fully love yourself, and operate from confidence, everything in your life improves. Your interpersonal relationships are strong and vibrant. You have peace in your days. Your business endeavors become easier and more successful. And you love the life you live.
 
Every person wants to feel love, respect, and be successful. Don't you? But too often we let experiences and the trauma that life hits us with determine the story that we live out. You can choose to be bigger than your circumstances and become something that changes the world. This project gives you what you need to heal and become a force for good in a broken world.


Risks & Challenges
Vulnerability is risky. Talking about personal pain is risky. Spending 2 years going through a difficult healing process and writing about it is risky. Devoting the time, focus, money, and energy into a project that I believe in with all my heart and continuing with it for over a year is risky.
There's a lot of risk attached to this project already. But you know what? It's worth it. Because the healing has been worth it. So has the transformation. I'm 10x the man and human I was before everything broke down. In a way, I'm very thankful for this experience (despite how difficult and painful it was) because of what it produced.
The transformation I've been able to help others experience through coaching and speaking is worth it. Helping people go through their darkness to discover that the light on the other side is actually inside them. That's worth it.
Here's where the book stands right now: This book is written, edited,  is being readied to print. There are still a few things we need to add/correct before we hit "Print." This campaign ensures that we will publish it in the next few months.We will make advanced reader copies (in digital format) available to those who support this campaign as a way to kick off the launch of the book. We will also provide additional opportunities for early adopters through the Be Solid Program and keynote speech to supporters of this campaign before we release it to the world.
The Real Challenge
The biggest challenge for us is getting as many people as possible to hear about the book and the platform. Marketing and promotional endeavors can be bootstrapped, but you and I both know that doing so limits the amount of reach and exposure that can bring.
I'm not interested in playing small in this book release because I want to help as many people as possible live a full and whole life. Restoration is the message here, and spreading the love about this book actually spreads love to the world.
Personal growth is not just a book genre, it's a reality for those who seek it. This book is a resource to achieve that, and help countless people find the healing, peace, and transformation they seek.
I'm asking for your help and support to help me turn the Be Solid message of transformation out of brokenness into a person who can take on life's biggest challenges.
As you can see from the breakdown, the majority of costs we're funding with this program allows us to take the message and materials to people all over the world for a positive change in people's lives.
The more funds we raise on top of our goal will go to continuing this endeavor of spreading healing and love to people who have experienced loss for their transformation.
 

Other Ways You Can Help
If you want to contribute in a way that is more than financial, you can talk up this book and this campaign with people in your life who can benefit the most from it. That can include a personal letter or email with our campaign URL, writing up a social media post that talks about why you're passionate about this project, or messaging us to see what ways you can volunteer to be a part of our team.
Please use the Indiegogo sharing tools to spread the word about this campaign, and be sure to write something in the post too. When you speak, it has so much more power than just clicking a share button. Plus, we want to hear what you have to say about this project!
Thank you for your support, contributions, and joining us in spreading love to the world. You're a solid person for doing so!

story:
Election 2020 Painted LIVE from Washington DC! 

 

 

FOLLOW LIVE UPDATES: https://edihsu.com/pages/washington-dc-election-2020

 

As a painter who documents real moments from life, where else would be more potent than at the epicenter: Washington DC?? The politicians get all the attention and screen time...  But who are the PEOPLE affected by this election? 

 

 

"Democracy is hard; it relies on all its citizens to be informed of the facts and participate. The nation has never been more divided in our lifetime. Both political parties are uncompromising and steadfast that their side runs the country the right way. The facts are not just debated but are questioned. It was former NY state senator Daniel Patrick Moynihan who said 'You are entitled to your opinion. But you are not entitled to your own facts.'

"This Presidential election, Americans will have to choose between two candidates based on what they decide are the facts. Edi Hsu is a painter who documents real world events as they happen, and will travel to our nation’s capital to document the events leading up to and after the election. As citizens around the country converge in Washington D.C. the art will focus on our citizens, and hopefully show that while our politics are different, there is more that bonds us than divides us. Let’s start noticing each other again. Let’s see each individual affected by this election as an American, that every man and woman are created equal with certain unalienable rights."

- Alex Chiu 

 

Live-painted outside San Francisco City Hall on July 4th 2020.

 

With live-painted watercolors, I will document real people on the ground, and the real moments of Election 2020 throughout Washington DC. I'll seek to paint and interview citizens of various ages, socioeconomic, political, and ethnic backgrounds.

My pocket-sized paint set!

 

I'm excited to announce that this project will be in collaboration with writer / podcaster Alex Chiu, who during that time will be already present in Washington DC. He plans to contribute both spoken and written accounts of what’s happening on the ground, conducting interviews with people on location, and providing historical and educational resources.

This book will capture scenes of this historic Election. Every moment is unique and will never repeat itself. The feeling and intensity of the moment is most apparent when painting on location, as opposed to painting from photographs later.

Once our campaign goal is met, we will raise additional funding to expand this project into a mini video documentary of our experience documenting and painting Election 2020. This will also assist with conducting interviews.

 

Above is my book created in New York City (2019) -- Find out more about that successful campaign here: New York City 2019 - Kickstarter 

The Election 2020 book will look similar when completed!

Painting in a NYC Subway (2019).

 

Steps to get there.

  • Make the journey to Washington DC!

  • Write and document in conjunction with writer/podcaster Alex Chiu.

  • Paint the buildup and momentum of the crowds, leading into Election 2020.
  • Paint moments and scenes of people on the day of the election!
  • Paint the aftermath of the election results, leading into Veteran's Day 2020.
  • Post-processing the book and video, and self-publish the book!
  • Create additional memorabilia from the most iconic paintings from this project.

Immediately after this project is funded, I will head to Washington DC a week early to document the buildup to the election, culminating with Election Day on Tuesday November 3rd, 2020, and remain after to document the effects of the election, concluding with Veteran’s Day 2020.

Afterwards, I will self-publish copies of the painted book and excerpts from interviews using high quality papers and inks. Additional memorabilia will be created from the artworks as well.

With additional funding, we will create a short video documenting the entire project and experience!

 

Live-Painting a Soul Journal in San Francisco, California.

 

What We Need !

Although most of our funds were obtained during our successful Kickstarter campaign, we still need additional funds to make this project even better.

Ride-shares would be a much safer option than other forms of transportation, especially during more chaotic moments. Additional funds for this project would help with affording ride-shares during expensive peak hours.

We want to create a mini-documentary, since it would help offer an even more vivid account of the election and the entire creation process of the project. Most of our funds would go toward maintaining our equipment, and upon return, video & audio editing.

With enough funding we would also be able to begin approaching distributors to bring this book and project to audiences worldwide.Cost of materials include notebooks, watercolor paints, etc.

Our Kickstarter helped raise the minimum funds to obtain the following:

  • Safety equipment such as helmets, padding, PPE. 
  • Communications & research equipment, technologies, and data plans.
  • Cloud services to back up media before any contentious rallies, demonstrations, and protests.

 

What you'll get :

You will receive SIGNED & NUMBERED limited-edition copies of the book in softcover and hardcover formats. 

I will also create SIGNED & NUMBERED posters of the artwork created during iconic moments during the project.

During this preorder-phase, I will also offer custom limited-edition items that will not be available to the general public.

Original paintings from the 2 presidential debates and 1 vice-presidential debate will be available as limited rewards. * NOTE: Two of the paintings are already claimed. Only one remains. *

My 10 Previous Soul Journal Publications featuring different cities, communities, and events from around the world.

 

Live-Painted during the first 2020 Presidential & Vice Presidential Debates

 

Risks and challenges

  1. All the paintings are done from life, so there is always a time crunch, especially with an ever-evolving event such as the election.
  2. Researching the city will help determine the best locations to paint, and minimize the amount of wasted time figuring out transportation on the ground.
  3. There is always a risk of natural disaster or unfortunate incidents that prevent the creation of any live-project.
  4. There is definitely a huge risk of violence on and around the election in Washington DC. Especially as two people of color.
  5. There is a risk of being censored. Luckily, the books are self-published so I have editorial control. However, there will always be social media sites & stores which may not want to promote or sell the content.

 

Follow along!

We are documenting our progress and experiences with live-updates:

https://edihsu.com/pages/washington-dc-election-2020

story:
Summary

My name is Larissa Soehn and I struggle with depression and anxiety. I am also a mother and a wife, who is just doing her best.

During my depression I have learned that there will be times when the depression will force me to step back from being a mother and put myself first. 

That is why I created this book.  I found that I was spending a lot of time explaining to my daughter why I needed some 'me time'.  We talk a lot about our emotions, and it became common in our house hold to say 'mommy is having a sad day.'

I want to share this with other families, to help children understand that adults struggle with strong emotions too.

What We Need & What You Get

The artwork and the test was all put together by myself, so the publishing costs are relatively low.  That being said, there are still costs associated to printing.  The printing cost for 100 books is roughly $1500 plus shipping (approx. $500).

The money raised from this campaign will go directly to printing costs. If we happen to raise more money than needed, the remainder will be donated to the Mental Health Foundation. 

This campaign is set up with two perks;  

  1. Book pre order. The release date is planned for November 2021. 
  2. A split donation. Half will go towards the printing costs, and the other half will be donated to the Mental Health Foundation. 

The Impact

Mental health is a very real and very impactful health condition. I want both parents and children to understand that adults struggle too. I want to help remove the stigma around mental health and give people an easy way to start the conversation with their children. 

Mommy is Having a Sad day is a look into how depression can impact someone, but also how it impacts the children. 

Risks & Challenges

This book is 1 of 4 that I have in the works of being published. Without the support of generous donors, I will not be able to publish this book this year.

While we do not need to meet 100% of the goal to publish, we will need to meet 50% of it to take it to the printers. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot donate, that is perfectly fine. The next best thing to a donation is a kind word.  Share the campaign and get the message about mental health out there.

story:
Dear La Jolla Pannikin Old-Timers, now’s your chance to tell your story, relive the past, and publish your memoirs! Submit your photos, poems, stories, essays, newspaper articles, mementos, memoirs, and Pannikin paraphernalia.* We will curate your submissions and put them into a beautiful, coffee-table-style book. Once complete, the book will be available to purchase online and yours to keep for posterity!  

SUBMISSION FEES: In lieu of hard and fast submission fees we are asking for your donations to cover editorial and administrative costs.  Curating an anthology takes many long hours of work, not to mention the time it takes to edit and lay out the various photos and texts into a professional book layout program. 

 ABOUT THE EDITORS

Derek Pell is a visual artist, writer and satirist. He has authored more than 30 books, many of which he designed and illustrated, including the Doktor Bey series; MISSING MYSTERIES: A Pictorial History of Nonexistent Mysteries; ASSASSINATION RHAPSODY; LOST IN TRANSLATION; and NAKED LUNCH AT TIFFANY'S. He has devoted much of his life to small press publishing. Along with his alter ego, Norman Conquest, he publishes Black Scat Books.

David Newell is a Seattle based, street and lifestyle photographer. He has graciously agreed to contribute his own photos, and edit submitted photos for this project.  He has been one of the biggest cheerleaders of the project from the beginning!

Carla Wilson, MFA is a published writer, editor, and artist in her spare time. In her day job she is an executive assistant at a local university. Although not the oldest Old-Timer, she was a Pannikin employee from 1985 – 1995, serving customers in the La Jolla Cafe, the Retail store, the Pannikin Downtown cafe and retail; later holding the position of Accounts Receivable for Cafe Moto, downtown. She was around to help launch the Brockton Villa, and was also an assistant manager of the LJP in the 1990s.  She and her husband first met at the Pannikin around 1986.

Facebook: As one of the original co-founders of the La Jolla Pannikin Old-Timers Facebook group, along with former LJP manager Thompson Owen, I'm thrilled to see our group has over 700 members!

WHY A BOOK NOW?

50 YEARS: In 2018 the Pannikin celebrated 50 years of business and a group of us decided to have a mini- reunion! An official 50th celebration followed and group members clamored to create a book to document the wonderful memories we share of either working at, or frequenting this iconic cafe.

CUSTOMERS over the years have ranged from artists, writers, UCSD professors, celebrities, local historians, surfers, European au pair girls, middle eastern royalty, professional athletes, comedians, moms, and regular people from all over the world.

STAFF have included musicians and artists as well. We have also lost many dear friends who were LJP old-timers, and they’ll forever be part of our hearts. Many love stories happened there, as well, along with countless creative collaborations, unmentionable shenanigans, and avant garde developments in art and music.

IN SUMMARY

Donations for submissions will cover publishing and editorial costs, and maybe a book launch PARTY where we can all get together.

We hope you’ll contribute some of your money and memories for posterity and, who knows? Maybe we’ll do a sequel!

 WHAT WE NEED:

We hope to raise enough funds to cover publishing costs, which will be at least $4.00 per page, and hopefully enough to cover a party when it's all finished. If we don't reach our entire goal, your money will be quickly refunded OR we can continue the fund-raiser until we reach our goal and then have a party.  We hope we reach our goal!

Submission Guidelines

We've outlined our submission guidelines on our webpage. We are looking for stories, photos, mementos, memories, historical information, and a lot of laughs and love. The submission process is a simple email to: studiocgallerie@gmail.com with La Jolla Pannikin Book in the subject line.  Please follow the guidelines on the webpage.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you're unable to contribute, it doesn't mean you can't help!

  • We ask that if you can't contribute now, please get the word out and make some noise about our campaign, either on social media, or by word of mouth.
  • Please remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you!

David Newell is a Seattle based, street and lifestyle photographer. He has graciously agreed to contribute his own photos, and edit submitted photos for this project.  He has been one of the biggest cheerleaders of the project from the beginning!
Carla Wilson, MFA is a published writer, editor, and artist in her spare time. In her day job she is an executive assistant at a local university. Although not the oldest Old-Timer, she was a Pannikin employee from 1985 – 1995, serving customers in the La Jolla Cafe, the Retail store, the Pannikin Downtown cafe and retail; later holding the position of Accounts Receivable for Cafe Moto, downtown. She was around to help launch the Brockton Villa, and was also an assistant manager of the LJP in the 1990s.  She and her husband first met at the Pannikin around 1986.
Facebook: As one of the original co-founders of the La Jolla Pannikin Old-Timers Facebook group, along with former LJP manager Thompson Owen, I'm thrilled to see our group has over 700 members!
WHY A BOOK NOW?
50 YEARS: In 2018 the Pannikin celebrated 50 years of business and a group of us decided to have a mini- reunion! An official 50th celebration followed and group members clamored to create a book to document the wonderful memories we share of either working at, or frequenting this iconic cafe.
CUSTOMERS over the years have ranged from artists, writers, UCSD professors, celebrities, local historians, surfers, European au pair girls, middle eastern royalty, professional athletes, comedians, moms, and regular people from all over the world.
STAFF have included musicians and artists as well. We have also lost many dear friends who were LJP old-timers, and they’ll forever be part of our hearts. Many love stories happened there, as well, along with countless creative collaborations, unmentionable shenanigans, and avant garde developments in art and music.
IN SUMMARY
Donations for submissions will cover publishing and editorial costs, and maybe a book launch PARTY where we can all get together.
We hope you’ll contribute some of your money and memories for posterity and, who knows? Maybe we’ll do a sequel!
 WHAT WE NEED:
We hope to raise enough funds to cover publishing costs, which will be at least $4.00 per page, and hopefully enough to cover a party when it's all finished. If we don't reach our entire goal, your money will be quickly refunded OR we can continue the fund-raiser until we reach our goal and then have a party.  We hope we reach our goal!

Submission Guidelines
We've outlined our submission guidelines on our webpage. We are looking for stories, photos, mementos, memories, historical information, and a lot of laughs and love. The submission process is a simple email to: studiocgallerie@gmail.com with La Jolla Pannikin Book in the subject line.  Please follow the guidelines on the webpage.

Other Ways You Can Help
If you're unable to contribute, it doesn't mean you can't help!

We ask that if you can't contribute now, please get the word out and make some noise about our campaign, either on social media, or by word of mouth.
Please remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you!

story:
Urashima Taro is a storybook meant for learners of all ages. Children especially have a burning curiosity and a desire to learn, while adults often over-complicate the learning process making it harder for themselves; this storybook help fulfill these needs by providing an enjoyable and very easy to read.

 

Urashima Taro consists of more than 40 beautifully drawn full color pages with a glossary section and a background section explaining a brief history of the Urashima Taro folktale. Designed as a read-aloud book, the stories are a perfect length for bedtime or classroom reading with just a couple pages. Each of the illustrations were beautifully designed by the illustrator, Claudie C. Bergeron.

Urashima Taro is a heartwarming yet funny story about a young fisherman who, one day, rescues a small turtle. Little does he know, that turtle is the daughter of the Sea Dragon God and that his good deed will lead him on a incredible journey. A few days, a messenger turtle arrives and invites him to go to the Dragon God's palace to reward him for his good deed. There, he falls in love with the Sea God's daughter, Princess Otohime, and parties with everyone for an unspecified amount of time there. Eventually, he does gets homesick.

Missing his parents, Urashima decides to head back home. But before he leaves, Princess Otohime, the Sea Dragon God's daughter gives him a jewellery box and warns him never to open it. After traveling for a few days, Urashima arrives back to discover that his village has become a city and that his house is gone. Asking around, Urashima eventually finds someone and discovers that 300 years have passed. His family is gone and he is considered dead.

In the original version, a disheartened Urashima goes to his family grave and opens the jewellery box. Only to be covered in white powder and turned into a old man left to mourn what he has lost. However, as with all folktales, the stories of Urashima Taro vary depending on the region, era and literature of the time. In the original eighth century version, Urashima was known as Urashimako, though the story ended very similarly. In some versions, Urashima opens the box and a spirit of a woman appears, causing Urashima to realize that he can never go back to the realm of the Gods again. In another version, Urashima just straight up dies. In others, he turns into a crane and is left to circle his family grave. In another, he takes some medicine, grows gills and uses them to swim back to Otohime.

The Urashima Taro statue located at the Ryugu Shrine in Ibusuki, Japan

In the Otogi Bunko version, Urashima is given a three-tiered box by Otohime instead. And when he opens the box, he discovers a crane feather in the first drawer, gets turned into an old man with the powder in the second and discovers a mirror in the third drawer. Pulling out the mirror, he discovers that he has been turned into an old man. Mourning, suddenly, the wind picks up and the crane feather touches Urashima's back, transforming him into a crane. Otohime then turns into a turtle and the two are later revered as myojin deities.

To me, one of the important messages in this story is the importance of family and learning from past mistakes. So what sets my book apart is that I borrow elements from all these versions to create a wholesome ending where Urashima learns from his mistake of not treasuring the time he had with his family and uses it to treasure his remaining time with Otohime.I wanted to make Urashima grow stronger from his journey, instead of just mourning his losses. Causing Urashima to become a wiser and stronger person.

 

 

To spark interest in children and broaden their mind to learn about different cultures and encourage them to be more open-minded

We are on a mission to bring literacy to children all around the world through the colorful characters of "Urashima Taro". Literacy is so important because it is the basis for all other education. Being able to read and write, develops critical communication skills.

And basically this is about stressing the importance of family and appreciating the things you do have while you still have them, because you never know when you might lose them. In the case of Urashima Taro, yes, he does get to go on a grand adventure, but he winds up losing his family in the process. However, he learns from this mistake and vows to treasure the people he still has in life.

Natasha Muir, Author

Natasha Muir is a 32-year old children's book author from Melbourne, Australia. She has a Bachelor of Arts degree with a major in Archaeology and Asian Studies. As well as, a Diploma in Languages in Japanese and a Bachelor in Creative Writing. She has also been to Japan once and has an N3 degree in the JLPT.

Claudie C. Bergeron

Claudie C. Bergeron is a talented children's illustrator from Canada with over 5 years of experience in the artist field. She has worked on other children's books projects such as Kenny Rookstool's 'Amos from Uranus' and 'The First Franklin Christmas Tree.' Claudie spent her childhood immersed in art and never stopped drawing since. For the past few years, her work has been published in books and magazines internationally. When not painting, you can find her bird-watching or walking in nature.

.

Folktales are a very crucial part of a child's development. They introduce children to other cultures, stimulates the brain with simple reading and learning, teaches life skills earlier, sparks questions and encourages self-taught learning and teaches a child to be more open-minded. They also encourage creativity in young children by allowing them to get engrossed in the story and engages their imagination. My hope is that my book also allows your child to develop these crucial life-skills as well.

In terms of book production, the book is complete. All that is needed is to publish it. Naturally, the biggest challenge is raising funds to cover the publication costs. As of right now, the book is looking at a January 2022 release date, but this will change depending on my financial situation. But fret not, this book is still going to go ahead, we will keep on trying to raise funds even if it means multiple campaigns. Anyone who does purchase this book, will still receive a copy as promised.

 

Don’t Have Kids? Can’t Contribute Right Now? You Can Still Help In A Big Way!

If you have been touched by this book but can’t financially back us at this time, please take the time to share with your network on your social media pages. It would really help us out. You can reach more people than you think. If you know anyone that would like our book, please let them know.

Thank you for helping to make this book possible!

story:
When I started exploring the fascinating, misunderstood subculture of hardcore Insane Clown Posse fans known as Juggalos for my 2013 memoir You Don't Know Me But You Don't Like Me, I never could have anticipated the amazing and unexpected places my immersion in the Juggalo world would take me. 

I never could have imagined that one day I would stand in front of the Washington Monument and deliver a fiery speech about what being a Juggalo meant to me, but that's just what happened when I had the honor of being the last writer to speak at the 2017 Juggalo March on Washington. 

I couldn't have foreseen all of the crazy and wonderful places I'd see Insane Clown Posse perform, from a strip mall in Canada with Ice-T as their opening act, to a Rob Zombie-designed haunted house in Chicago and finally a park in Los Angeles, where I saw the clowns perform in early 2020 shortly before COVID 19 ensured that no one would be able to gather legally or safely, Juggalos included. 

When I published You Don't Know Me But You Don't Like Me and it got a four star rave in Rolling Stone and made the magazine's list of the 20 best music books of the year I couldn't have predicted that my Juggalo journey had really only just begun. 

 

It makes me enormously proud that You Don't Know Me But You Don't Like Me seems to have played a genuine role in changing the way Juggalos are seen by the culture at large, for the better. I succeeded in humanizing people all too often written off as a joke. 

Since 2009, I have only missed the Gathering of the Juggalos, Insane Clown Posse's legendary yearly festival of arts and culture four times: twice because I was working for Pitchfork (they weren't into ICP, sad to say) and twice because my wife had just given birth. 

Now I am looking to make my EIGTH visit to The Gathering and I need your help to make it as fresh and dope as possible! 

My life and my career changed forever when, in a fit of desperation and accidental inspiration, I explored crowd-funding and self-publishing for the first time to pay for 7 Days in Ohio, an Amazon kindle chronicling a surreal weekend spent covering BOTH the 2016 Republican National Convention AND the 2016 Gathering of the Juggalos, which happened to fall on the same week and take place in the same state, alongside my long-lost Juggalo brother, who I had not seen in decades. 

It turned out better than I could have expected. I raised over six thousand dollars, and the legendary Tom Scharpling even plugged it on The Best Show.

 

In the process I discovered that I could bypass the dispiriting, safe and boring world of corporate media by having readers fund my work directly and enjoy complete creative freedom in the process. 

I've been an independent ever since! That's why I'm using Indiegogo to fund the long-awaited sequel to 7 Days in Ohio. In the middle of August I will be returning to Ohio and the Gathering along with my brother, who I have not seen since 2016. 

The world is once again in a surreal, bizarre, fragile and unique place and I cannot wait to share the experience of going to the 2021 Gathering of the Juggalos with you, in daily updates and ultimately a big, 6 to 8 thousand word Hunter S. Thompsonesque manifesto about the whole crazy experience. 

With your help, my 2021 Gathering experience can be nothing short of miraculous!

story:
If you can not get enough of Jane Austen related books, then sponsor this project!

I can read, but Im not very god at it, I have difficulties for writing thats way Im writing a novel! 

My name is Clainda Nilsson, I have two great handicap called dyslexia, dyscalculia. I found myself start writing out of anger when I broke up with my boyfriend a year ago. And I liked what I wrote and so i showd a first draft for a friend who encouraged me to keep writing. I quickly realized that I did not knew so much about the British Regency era and took facebook for helpful to find someone who could tell me more, instead of reading books. 

I received a reply from a girl my own age Aurora was intrersserad of reenactment. I  interview her and her boyfriend who is also doing reenactment. Without their stories and amazing details I had neverget this far whit this lovely book..

what the money will go to

I am looking for money to go on a research trip to England to participate in the Jane Austen Festival in Bath in September 2015 so that I can improvethe story Im telling in a more  vivid saga. I have about half the book bune right now. I need to digg deeper. 

who will assist you with transcribing your work

I have an  aunt who helps me read my work and she fix my typos and grammatical spelling mistakes.

What the book is about. 

Briefly what the book is about is a girl from Sweden who travels to England to start a new life after her breakup from her boyfriend. One  late rainy evening she meets a man at Marks and Spencers who is dressed like Mr. Darcy from Jane Austen's Pride and prejudices. "Why is he dressed like that a typical rainy friday evening?!"  Next day she goes runnign in the park she sees him again, dressed in the same way. It turns out one the following day that he is a historian, and an author of a book that her company will give out and advertise as they have a big Halloween party. Jenny as here name is, is an ordinary Swedish girl, who worked at IKEA. She loves to read books but never took any with her whene she move... Way?! Mr Arthur Peter Finlye is the mans namne, he is in to he likes to kayak and read books. The big question is why is he dressed in Regency clothes all the time..


Best regards Clarinda Nilsson.

story:
Would you like to live the thrilling life of popular storybook hero?

Have you always seen past the conspiracy theories? Unravel them! Would you like to become a hero of an epic fiction? Would you like to live the life of a special agent?

Now you can!

Here is the ultimate solution to give or ask for the perfect gift. Make your free choice, define the name and face who's going to be the main character of the book!

We will write the master copy of a thrilling story in which, based on your order, we shall change the name written by the author to a name of your choice. Send a photo and see it on the cover.

The story are original and have a chance to be a bestseller, but now we offer a unique opportunity: not only can you read the world's most entertaining stories; you can also take part in them! This is more than simple reading! Clear the line between your favorite character and your own personality!

Read the story synopsis down below.

The story written with the main character you define will be delivered to you in the form of an e-book, or paperback print.

FUTURE PLANS

If you can’t decide yet, but you like the idea, send 1 USD, with which you will have supported the development of a pulpstarter website. With time, you may choose from more and more new story synopses and characters. You may start a fan club on pulpstarter where you can receive a discount, in addition to starting you on your road to fame.


THE STORY

CHARACTER: a detective in the government, skeptic

Inspector in the master copy

CATEGORY: conspiracy theory (series with separate episodes)

LOCATION: Area 51 and where the world’s mysterious things happen

SIGNATURE SENTENCE: Did you know you are a conspirer?

TITLE: Area 51 (book series)

Part 1: The Elvis-affair

Format: e-book, paperback print

PREVIEW: https://www.facebook.com/pulpstarter

story:
Etapa 1 - $3,045

Para ofrecerles tomate y cebolla desde marzo 2017, el proceso comienza desde fines de noviembre en la germinación de las plantas y la preparación del terreno.  

El monto a recaudarse en esta Etapa 1 refleja el costo básico de la preparación de tres siembras consecutivas de tomate y una de cebolla, con el propósito de ofrecer estas cosechas durante los meses de primavera, marzo a junio 2017.  

De lograrse el recaudo completo en la Etapa 1 se comienza a implementar los fondos durante diciembre, en preparación para la siembra a finales de enero 2017, y se procede a la etapa 2 de recaudación (ver más abajo).

  • La suma de $3,045 se compone de lo siguiente:
    • $1,300  Etapa 1 - Tomate    +    $115 tarifa Indiegogo  =  $1,415
    • $1.500  Etapa 1 - Cebolla    +    $130 tarifa Indiegogo =  $1,630
  • Los primeros $1,415 recaudados aseguran la implementación de la etapa 1 del tomate.
    • De no lograrse esta cantidad, no procederemos a la Etapa 2.  Los dineros recaudados se aplicarían a nuestra discreción en la siembra.
  • Los próximos $1,630 recaudados aseguran la implementación de la etapa 1 de cebolla.
    • De no lograr la suma completa de $1,630, los recaudados parciales para cebolla se aplican a nuestra discreción durante la Etapa 2 del tomate.
  • Dineros recaudados sobre la meta de $3,045 se aplicarán a la Etapa 2 de la siembra.
 

Desglose de gastos

A continuación el presupuesto para la Etapa 1 de tomate y de cebolla, respectivamente:

Etapa 2...

Luego de asegurar esta Etapa 1 para la germinación y la preparación del terreno, y mientras se gestiona el trabajo de la misma, comenzaremos con la Etapa 2 que se enfocará en recaudar el financiamiento para pagar el trabajo del personal de siembra, el abono, las cajas de cosecha y otros detalles a partir de enero 2017.   

A diferencia de la Etapa 1, la Etapa 2 se contempla recaudar en calidad de préstamo comunitario con la intención de repago al terminar la cosecha.  Pronto anunciaremos más detalle.
story_txt:
Etapa 1 - $3,045
Para ofrecerles tomate y cebolla desde marzo 2017, el proceso comienza desde fines de noviembre en la germinación de las plantas y la preparación del terreno.  
El monto a recaudarse en esta Etapa 1 refleja el costo básico de la preparación de tres siembras consecutivas de tomate y una de cebolla, con el propósito de ofrecer estas cosechas durante los meses de primavera, marzo a junio 2017.  
De lograrse el recaudo completo en la Etapa 1 se comienza a implementar los fondos durante diciembre, en preparación para la siembra a finales de enero 2017, y se procede a la etapa 2 de recaudación (ver más abajo).

La suma de $3,045 se compone de lo siguiente:
$1,300  Etapa 1 - Tomate    +    $115 tarifa Indiegogo  =  $1,415
$1.500  Etapa 1 - Cebolla    +    $130 tarifa Indiegogo =  $1,630


Los primeros $1,415 recaudados aseguran la implementación de la etapa 1 del tomate.De no lograrse esta cantidad, no procederemos a la Etapa 2.  Los dineros recaudados se aplicarían a nuestra discreción en la siembra.

Los próximos $1,630 recaudados aseguran la implementación de la etapa 1 de cebolla.De no lograr la suma completa de $1,630, los recaudados parciales para cebolla se aplican a nuestra discreción durante la Etapa 2 del tomate.


Dineros recaudados sobre la meta de $3,045 se aplicarán a la Etapa 2 de la siembra.
 
Desglose de gastos
A continuación el presupuesto para la Etapa 1 de tomate y de cebolla, respectivamente:


Etapa 2...
Luego de asegurar esta Etapa 1 para la germinación y la preparación del terreno, y mientras se gestiona el trabajo de la misma, comenzaremos con la Etapa 2 que se enfocará en recaudar el financiamiento para pagar el trabajo del personal de siembra, el abono, las cajas de cosecha y otros detalles a partir de enero 2017.   
A diferencia de la Etapa 1, la Etapa 2 se contempla recaudar en calidad de préstamo comunitario con la intención de repago al terminar la cosecha.  Pronto anunciaremos más detalle.

story:
Resumen

 

Hola soy Ramon Zarate Ortiz tengo 64 años y vivo en el hermoso puerto de Veracruz, México obtengo del estado una modesta pensión que no alcanza para vivir.

Tengo un año trabajando en un proyecto por internet para prospectar y comercializar productos de terceros y aún no he obtenido resultados, a mi edad ya no se aprende a la velocidad necesaria. Me he terminado mis ahorros y no quiero permitir que mi sueño de obtener una vejes digna y productiva desde mi casa se termine.

Con su ayuda lograre establecer un precedente de que aun siendo anciano tenemos mucho que aportar, enseñar y permitirá a otros ancianos a llevar a cabo proyectos como el mío y tener una vejes con recursos suficientes para una vida digna e independiente.

Lograre establecer una ruta para que muchos ancianos hagan sus proyectos desde su casa y/o cama.

Necesito 2,000 dólares para pagar asesoría profesional que me ayude a encontrar los puntos clave que no me han permitido lograrlo, con mis conocimientos y escasas herramientas

El lograr la independencia económica me llenara de total orgullo ya que a mi edad soy productivo y útil para la sociedad contare mi historia para invitar a abuelos a hacer lo mismo que yo. Siempre y hasta el último aliento se puede.

 Si no logro los fondos suficientes sus aportaciones se habrán invertido en conocimiento.

Su aportación dará valor a los ancianos no seremos relegados porque ya no podemos. Hacer lo que los jóvenes, pero si podemos ser con nuestra experiencia y conocimientos altamente productivos.

La persistencia y no aceptar que no puedo ser productivo a mi edad me da toda la fuerza y el coraje para realizarlo, la sabiduría de los ancianos cimentó maravillosos jóvenes. Voy a encontrar la forma de ser útil aunque mis limitaciones por la edad para otros sean un obstáculo para mí son mi fortaleza.

Si no le es posible aportar fondos, por favor difunda mi campaña con expertos en internet y con ancianos para que se enteren que hay formas de seguir adelante.

Se imaginan todo el conocimiento y experiencia acumulada en los ancianos

Vamos a darle valor.

Les pido de la manera más atenta que difundan mi campaña y que genere eco en ancianos y nietos.

Les recuerdo usen las herramientas para compartir de Indiegogo mucho se los voy a agradecer

story:
We love to play baseball

 

Nada nos apasiona tanto como el beisbol.

Han pasado dos décadas entrenando en espacios reducidos y campos de fútbol que no siempre están disponibles para nosotros, pues el deporte del balon pie es muy popular y a pesar de haber tantos espacios para practicarlo es dificil encontrar alguno desocupado.

Por más de 20 años hemos soñado con conformar equipos que puedan constituirse en una liga a nivel municipal y buscar patrocinadores para cada equipo, sin embargo no podremos lograrlo sin un campo, pues para jugar beisbol lo primordial es tener un espacio adecuado, por ello hemos decidido generar esta campaña que nos ayude a tocar puertas con las autoridades locales y poder hacer una propuesta en la cual exista una contraparte de colaboradores que creen y confían en un proyecto que ayuda a niños y jóvenes a desarrollarse. 

Hemos visto a varios jugadores guatemaltecos con oportunidades de becas en Colegios y Universidades de  Estados Unidos gracias al beisbol, eso nos motiva aun más para formar beisbolistas en Alta Verapaz, con niños y jóvenes de escasos recursos que pueden a través de este lindo deporte obtener oportunidades de estudio en el extranjero.

 Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes
Con la recaudación de fondos queremos pedirle al alcalde de la ciudad que nos conceda un espacio en usufructo por tiempo indefinido, en el cual nos permita a través de los donativos logrados poner nosotros una contraparte para la construcción de un diamante de beisbol que tenga infraestructura adecuada para que las familias puedan convivir del espectaculo del beisbol y los niños puedan desarrollarse como debe ser. Dichas instalaciones deben contar con el espacio de juego, un espacio para la jaula de bateo, graderío para el público con capacidad para 200 personas, una bodega para guardar implementos, una oficina de atención en donde se pueda llevar un registro de jugadores, inscripciones,etc. Baños, vestidores, dogouts, etc.
Actualmente contamos con un presupuesto para implementos y el salario de dos entrenadores, así como los gastos en viáticos para movilizar a nuestros jugadores a otros lugares del país dos veces al año con el objetivo de que puedan jugar y no solo entrenar porque cuando eso pasa se aburren y dejan el deporte. La competencia es una motivación.
Queremos lograr una contraparte del 50% del costo general del proyecto a través de esta campaña, por lo cual nos hemos propuesto como meta U$50,000.00 , otra contraparte es FEDEBEIS quien además se ocupará del mantenimiento y la otra parte es la Municipalidad de Cobán A.V.

Presenta más detalles:

 De no lograrse la meta propuesta queremos utilizar lo que se logre generar para iniciar con los trabajos básicos de movimiento de tierras y posteriormente tocar puertas con las empresas con el fin de lograr marcas patrocinadoras, aunque de principio es muy dificil si no ven esta contraparte.
Las personas donantes tendrán grabado su nombre en una plaqueta conmemorativa que estará en el loby del estadio, la cual dira "estas son las personas que ayudaron a impulsar la carrera de la vida de muchos niños y jóvenes de Alta Verapaz"
     
El impacto
 

Con este proyecto estamos impactando positivamente en la vida de niños y jóvenes de una de las zonas más vulnerables y de mayor pobreza en Guatemala como lo es Alta Verapaz. Además de abrirle oportunidades a los niños y jóvenes para prevenir que caigan en actos delictivos y generamos un espacio de convivencia sana para las familias de Cobán.

Si actualmente hemos logrado una matrícula de más de 60 niños, con este espacio esperamos tener muchísimos más.

También puedes ayudar con donativos en materia de implementos como bates, guantes, pelotas e incluso uniformes de beisbol o bien ser voluntario y entrenador por un tiempo. Puedes buscarnos en facebook como Beisbol Coban o escribirnos a asobeisav2012@gmail.com

story:
Short Summary

  • I'm an author. Other words that can be used to describe me are transgender, FTM, nonbinary, working class, on the autism spectrum, a survivor, anti-capitalist, genderfluid, and passionate. I self-publish my work and work for myself.
  • I've gotten lot's of requests for REFUSE audio books. Honestly, I am a writer, but I have reading difficulties myself. Trauma makes focusing difficult. I am more of an auditory learner. I want my stories to be more accessible.
  • In addition, I hope that this will be another source of revenue for me so that I can continue to write novels, curate trans/queer events, work on my music and other art, and live and thrive. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

The money will go towards: 

1. Advertising the audio book online

2. Travelling to table and promote at events like Philly Trans Health Conference, book store release parties, FlameCon, and more TBA

3. Producing some physical copies to sell

4. My hours of labor

 

You will get 

  1. The audio book weeks before anyone else
  2. A shout-out in my Thank You credits
  3. Other exclusive prizes

 

The Impact

More access to authentic trans stories for authentic trans people. 

A damn good audio book for the world. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Share, share, share! Or ask me :) 

Thank you!

story:
My name is Derek and this is my funny albeit dangerously accurate look at women and their Zodiac.  Specifically how the stars aligning this way and that affect the way they conduct themselves in the bedroom and relationships.  

The book will be 30 to 40 pages long, features conceptual artwork, compelling writing that is funny and oddly true, comic strips and insights into each female zodiac.  

Signs Say, She Might Be Bad: Women & Their Zodiac or Whore-A-Scopes should be ready in December!  

So what is the book about?  It is about power and how it is wielded by women of various signs.  Women can take us there with class and grace or less subtly with a wink and rapid thrusting of her Popsicle into the inside of her cheek. 

The book proposes what traits men are most desirous of and then correlates it to each woman’s astrological sign.  It is further deconstructed by comparing syncrisis. 

I’ve used eight fundamental components and grouped them into four comparative groups:

The first is she Modest versus Aggressive

Is she shy in the bedroom or does she bring a duffle bag to your first date filled enough special tools to put Batman to shame?

Second is she Chaste or Open…. Too everyone?

For instance are you her first or her first Basketball Team?

Third we look at if she is Submissive or Dominant

Does she call you Sir and like collars or are you walking funny for the next month?

Lastly we compare and contrast how Demure she is versus Nymphomaniacal behavior

Can you tell she hasn’t done this much or are you reaching for your wallet afterwards?

These are finally aggregated into the Syncritic Lability Objectified Onerously & Tenaciously Scale or SLOOT Scale for short.

As an aside there is no right or wrong side of the comparisons… some like it hot and some like it when a girl dons a gas mask and stomps on his testicles…  But wouldn’t it be great to know it before you were laying on the floor in a zipper mask hoping against hope that those stilletos heels she’s wearing are made from Nerf footballs?

The Point is, women can illicit fantasy from anywhere in the spectrum of innocence to profession.  Being a SLOOT isn’t just in Vogue, it is allowing all parties involved to gain some knowledge of what she is and isn’t capable of.

At its worst the book is funny, at its best it kicks the living shit out of Men are from Mars Women are from Venus.

 

Furthering this deep and practical science, I have close to 2,000 folks on Facebook following (started on June 6th) the creation of this work and helping with content.   You can see each of the my Zodiac's and some of the writing associated with each sign here.  As for content, I am polling large communities on Facebook for keen insight.  I have about five polls I have collected... like this one - Which Sign is the Most Perverted:

I have been working with different artists on conceptual drawings of the Zodiacs and different elements to include in the book.  I finally have sketches and stories for all twelve zodiacs (Need another $1,000 to finish all of them) from Facundo Moyano.  

I want to include comic strips, polls and comparison charts.... but all this stuff costs more and more money.   As you can also tell by my haphazard writing style, my book will also require substantial editing  before publishing.

This is where you come in!!!

Sooooo What do You GET for your support?

For $1 to $5 you get to be dirty!  Or at least participate in something shy of pornography.  This is tongue and cheek or bump and grind depending on your proclivities and no insects were hurt in the making of this book (accept any living in trees that were felled to make the paper they will be printed on).  You get to have some fun, laugh a little and participate in something  completely unique.  You also get my admiration (which means literally nothing to your employer, family or clergy).  I will let the first 200 folks in this level follow the sign of their choosing as it evolves through the creative and publishing process.  I will need your email for this.. 

I am working on a bumper stickers and other swag, but that comes with scale which comes with folks interest.  Any funds you submit can be later applied to swag as it comes out!

Next Level is the Book which retails for $19 bucks. ON SALE till August 15th for $10 bucks!!!  I will run various specials as I get closer so keep an eye out.  The first 100 folks at this level will get a signed copy and a picture of me doing laundry reluctantly (soooo sexy!!).

Just to level set, a dude here wrote a book about Vice Presidents of the United States with octopuses on their heads and was fully funded (I was one of them, btw)... So don't act like my stuff is below you...

For $35 you get the book signed and a custom T-Shirt (scale is super important here, if 1 person gets a shirt it costs a butt load, but if 100 do it makes sense.  I will eat costs to make you happy!!)  of your favorite Zodiac with a compatibility matrix on the back.  These custom T-Shirts will increase your ice-breaking skills by 692% (It's Science).  There is also the possibility they spread joy like ebola in an oil wrestling match.

For $45 you get the above plus a high resolution calendar with key celestial alignment for your sign and everyone else's that show the peak and valleys of the various signs during the year.   

For $100 you get mentioned in the forward and my junior prom picture, which is probably the most embarrassing thing I have ever looked at.  You also get a nod in the forward in the book and access to my other writing on Patreon.

Other Ways You Can Help...

Like us on FB or keep tabs on the writing and see my other "STUFF"  look  HERE.

For $35 you get the book signed and a custom T-Shirt (scale is super important here, if 1 person gets a shirt it costs a butt load, but if 100 do it makes sense.  I will eat costs to make you happy!!)  of your favorite Zodiac with a compatibility matrix on the back.  These custom T-Shirts will increase your ice-breaking skills by 692% (It's Science).  There is also the possibility they spread joy like ebola in an oil wrestling match.
For $45 you get the above plus a high resolution calendar with key celestial alignment for your sign and everyone else's that show the peak and valleys of the various signs during the year.   
For $100 you get mentioned in the forward and my junior prom picture, which is probably the most embarrassing thing I have ever looked at.  You also get a nod in the forward in the book and access to my other writing on Patreon.
Other Ways You Can Help...
Like us on FB or keep tabs on the writing and see my other "STUFF"  look  HERE.

story:
INTRODUCCIÓN

Siempre me ha gustado escribir.

Mi cuaderno favorito de primaria solía ser un cuaderno donde escribía mis canciones favoritas y pegaba recortes de frases y fotos de artistas. Con los años ese cuaderno se fue volviendo más personal, las fotos se volvieron mis dibujos, las canciones se volvieron rimas inspiradas en lo que veían mis ojos y las frases ya no salían de impresoras, si no que salían de mi corazón.

Escribir se volvió mi terapia.

Escribía por todo, y cuando las palabras no me salían por la boca, la pluma y el cuaderno se volvieron la puerta abierta a la cárcel que sentía que me aprisionaba por dentro.
Luego empecé a leer poesía, y lo que escribía empezaba a adoptar melodías y un tono tan honesto que al releerlo ni yo misma podía creer que había sido yo quien había escrito eso.

Así nació Cafeína y Nicotina,

de un día que decidí leer todas las frases que habían alguna vez sido la cura de mi insomnio de madrugadas, la calma del caos que llevaba por dentro en las mañanas, y tardes de refugio con forma de páginas de cuaderno.

Este libro no es solo un poemario, es mi diario, un pedacito de mi corazón entregado en tus manos, mi alma desnuda para que la lleves de llavero cuando quieras, y me leas..

¿Quien es G. A. Picota?

G. A. Picota, Gabriela Picota, Gigi, Gaby, QueenGG, G. A. Poesía, díganme como ustedes quieran.

Actriz, bailarina, aveces pintora y oficialmente escritora. Nací el 7 de agosto de 1995, fui a la escuela, intenté ir a la universidad, he cometido errores, me he enamorado, he roto corazones, tengo sueños y deseos (entre ellos que mi libro esté entre tus manos) y siento tanto como tú. Hace dos años, luego de leer mis escritos y darme cuenta que había potencial en ellos, decidí traspasarlos en blanco y solos se convirtieron en un poemario. Cafeína y Nicotina es el primer libro que me atrevo a publicar y el primero de una colección de tres poemarios, y el libro que me va a debutar como escritora oficial.

¿Qué es la Campaña Cafeína y Nicotina?

Más que una campaña de recolecta de dinero y donación es realmente más como una preventa única del libro, sólo que con beneficios y recompensas exclusivas para las personas que apoyen la campaña Cafeína y Nicotina.

¿Qué Beneficio y Recompensa Exclusiva me gano si apoyo a la Campaña?

Depende de como apoyes. La Campaña Cafeína y Nicotina te ofrece 5 paquetes únicos para que puedas apoyar. 

Paquete Consumidor

Paquete Enviciado

Paquete Adicto

Paquete Cafeína&NicotinaBox

Paquete VIP

Cada paquete ofrece una serie de beneficios y recompensas diferentes dependiendo del aporte que hagas. 

¡Si quieres saber el valor de cada paquete y sus gajes, en el cuadro a la derecha sale toda la información necesaria sobre las recompensas, entregas, precios y más!

¿Para qué es la Meta?

La meta de los $2110.00 cubre los gastos de impresión del libro, edición, registros y legales, diseño y transportación. Una vez hayamos llegado a la meta, el libro va a poder ser impreso, publicado y transportado a las tiendas y librerías del país o a sus mismísimas manos si colaboran con la campaña. 

Importante: la meta es únicamente para cubrir gastos de producción y post-producción del libro, las ganancias de la autora con esta campaña es únicamente lograr que su libro llegue a librerías y a sus manos.

¿Qué Pasa si no llegamos a la Meta?

Si no llegamos a la meta, no habrá publicación de Cafeína y Nicotina.

Esta campaña es a TODO O NADA, si llegamos a la meta, cada una de las personas que apoyo con la campaña se llevaran su recompensa tal cual está especificada y podremos imprimir el libro para distribuir en todas las librerías y tiendas del país...

Pero si no llegamos...

Todo el dinero recaudado se le devolverá a las personas que apoyaron a la Campaña, no habrán recompensas y por ende, no podremos publicar el libro ni distribuirlo.

Por eso es muy importante que compartas la campaña y alientes a tus amigos a que apoyen. ¡Solo con compartir la página atraerás a más personas que pueden estar interesadas en apoyar a la campaña y ayudarás a que lleguemos a la meta!

Detalles de Publicación

Fecha de publicación (tentativa):

  • 7/AGO/2018 (¡El día de mi cumpleaños!)

Fechas de entrega

  • Antes del 5/AGO/2018 (PRE-ENTREGA)
  • Después del 8/AGO/2018 (PUBLICACIÓN OFICIAL)

Puntos de venta (Tentativos):

  • Gran Morrison
  • Arrocha
  • Hombre de la Mancha
  • TravelinBookworms
  • BlueMoon Box

Quiero apoyar la Campaña Cafeína y Nicotina pero no tengo visa para comprar los paquetes. ¿Que opciones tengo?

Lastimosamente para hacerte acreedor de uno de estos beneficios es necesario hacer el pago a través de esta plataforma, sin embargo hay varias formas en las que igual puedes hacerte acreedor de uno de los paquetes o simplemente apoyar a la causa :)

  1. Transferencia. Si estas en Panamá y no tienes visa pero quieres aprovechar uno de nuestros super paquetes patrocinadores una de las opciones que ofrecemos es transferencia por banco. Puede ser depósito, transferencia, banca en línea, tú eliges. Solo tienes que contactar al correo bookwormspty@gmail.com y ahí te brindaremos toda la información necesaria. (Solo 15 transferencias serán aceptadas) (13 disponibles)
  2. Western Union. Si estás en otra provincia u otro país, aceptamos pagos de los paquetes por vía Western Union antes de que culmine la campaña. Para más información contacta a bookwormspty@gmail.com. (Solo 10 transferencias serán aceptadas)
  3. Compartiendo en tus redes sociales. Sube una historia en Instagram, comparte la página en Facebook, tuitéalo, sube un video, lo que quieras! Mientras más compartas la página más rápido llegamos a la meta y el libro Cafeína y Nicotina estará a tu alcance más pronto <3
