story:
Short Summary

Jordon Greene and Caleb Wygal founded Franklin/Kerr Press, LLC in order to provide currently undiscovered authors another avenue to publish their work. As previously self-published and traditionally published authors, Jordon and Caleb understand that publishing a book isn't just writing the perfect manuscript when you go it alone. It's editing (and more editing), figuring out how to format the book, how to design a cover (or finding someone to design one for you), figuring out where to get the book put in print or e-book formats and then wondering how to get it out on the market. All of this takes time and money away from the author whose time is better spent writing, and the money can add up quick.

We're here to provide full-service publishing, to allow our authors spend their time writing while we take care of the rest of the work and handle all the expenses. All we require of our authors is that they take a proactive role in their book's success and marketing.

Franklin/Kerr is:

  • A full-service publisher. We provide professional editing, cover art, formatting, e-conversion, marketing support and social media assistance.
  • Selective. We do not accept every submission.
  • Competitive. We provide competitive rates to our author.

Franklin/Kerr is not:

  • A self-publisher. We accept only manuscripts that fit our quality standards.
  • A cooperative publisher. We require no financial input from you, just quality writing and marketable books.

Find out more about Franklin/Kerr Press on our website at www.FranklinKerr.com.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are looking to raise between $1,000 and $2,000 in start up funds to help us cover the cost of our initial publishing projects and get a head start on our first couple novels once submissions roll in. Specifically, we have two anthologies that are currently in the works that will benefit the most from your support:

  • Down with the Fallen: A Post-Apocalyptic Horror Anthology
  • Into the Unknown: A Sci-Fi Anthology

As a thank you for your support, we have several gifts that we'd like to give you, including (but not limited to):

  • Free copies of Jordon and Caleb's books,
  • Autographed copies of Jordon and Caleb's books,
  • Mention in the above two anthology's acknowledgements, and
  • You as a character in one of Jordon or Caleb's upcoming stories.

Short Summary
Jordon Greene and Caleb Wygal founded Franklin/Kerr Press, LLC in order to provide currently undiscovered authors another avenue to publish their work. As previously self-published and traditionally published authors, Jordon and Caleb understand that publishing a book isn't just writing the perfect manuscript when you go it alone. It's editing (and more editing), figuring out how to format the book, how to design a cover (or finding someone to design one for you), figuring out where to get the book put in print or e-book formats and then wondering how to get it out on the market. All of this takes time and money away from the author whose time is better spent writing, and the money can add up quick.
We're here to provide full-service publishing, to allow our authors spend their time writing while we take care of the rest of the work and handle all the expenses. All we require of our authors is that they take a proactive role in their book's success and marketing.
Franklin/Kerr is:

A full-service publisher. We provide professional editing, cover art, formatting, e-conversion, marketing support and social media assistance.
Selective. We do not accept every submission.
Competitive. We provide competitive rates to our author.

Franklin/Kerr is not:

A self-publisher. We accept only manuscripts that fit our quality standards.
A cooperative publisher. We require no financial input from you, just quality writing and marketable books.

Find out more about Franklin/Kerr Press on our website at www.FranklinKerr.com.

 
What We Need & What You Get
We are looking to raise between $1,000 and $2,000 in start up funds to help us cover the cost of our initial publishing projects and get a head start on our first couple novels once submissions roll in. Specifically, we have two anthologies that are currently in the works that will benefit the most from your support:

Down with the Fallen: A Post-Apocalyptic Horror Anthology
Into the Unknown: A Sci-Fi Anthology

As a thank you for your support, we have several gifts that we'd like to give you, including (but not limited to):

Free copies of Jordon and Caleb's books,
Autographed copies of Jordon and Caleb's books,
Mention in the above two anthology's acknowledgements, and
You as a character in one of Jordon or Caleb's upcoming stories.

story:
Over 20 years as the owner of a bleeding edge technology consulting firm taught me how the world is desperately hoping to graduate to a new nirvana.  Needing to escape the continual onslaught of impending and ever widening technological trappings, I became an ordained minister, moved from Orlando, FL and opened a street ministry in downtown Asheville, NC. 

My wife and I ministered to the homeless and downtrodden for seven years until the crash of 2008 brought us to level of having to return to secular income. Throughout these years I have personally experienced the hopelessness and helplessness of people that span generations. I saw first hand how top level engineers and highly educated scientists end up on the streets in this small community and were a small percentage of the much larger population of economic and social refugees worldwide.

We taught college afterwards where I found the unnerving gas of entitlement emanating from the classrooms where I taught. Young students were undisciplined and disrespectful of their professors and the system that gave them the opportunity to learn. Many would not and could not complete basic course requirements but expected to be given passing grades simply because they showed up, albeit with mountains of excuses instead of accomplishments.

I began to understand the pattern in humanity that has led us to where we are today in our culture and how the expectations of the populous have outgrown the world’s ability to sustain a healthy environment.

My studies and experiences from 20 years in high tech as well as 10 years in ministry have given me a very unique perspective, as well as a wealth of information, to draw from for these books.

Now, my speaking engagements, article writing, and volunteering for organizations such as SCORE, has given me a new aspect of reality to see the forlorn and war torn consequences of the choices that have been made through the years of man's history. I have been able to spend rich study times that have revealed the patterns and pathways of both destruction and development in the world systems. and, my tenure as a minister has shown me the eminent apocalypse we have built that is near exploding.

They say we never learn from history and mistakenly end up repeating to what prior generations have succumb. In today's inundated environment of total communication overload there has to be a way of presenting and allowing this generation to not only know and understand how we've arrived at who we are but to provide a path of escape from total decimation.

My research will not by itself cure the world. But it will expose that which will become a standard for decision making, planning, and preparation for what is going to happen in the next few years. If this information isn’t disseminated publicly, many people will be caught in the acts of those who willfully control, eventually with force and loss of freedom. 

These three timeless volumes will undoubtedly be a must have tool to teach yourself, your family, and larger groups and organizations why we have arrived at where we are today and how to prepare for what is about to happen tomorrow.

story:
Short Scummary

Hey hey grublins, my name is Randolph Booth and I create children's books for kids (and adults) who like the darker, more interesting side of things. I have a background in illustration and animation and generally like making cool things.

I'm looking for funding to publish my second children's book 'This Strange Kingdom' - a collection of oddities and foul beasts that helps explain the world around us; answering questions that we all have about life, such as "why do bald heads look like big eggs?"

Traditional publishers are increasingly 'risk averse', leading to a landscape of children's literature that is ever so bland and banal. I need your help to add a little mischief and colour back into this realm.

What We Need & What You Grubs Get

I'm looking for £2,500 for a lithographic print run of the book (paperback) and that is pretty much it. This will cover the cost of printing 500 copies of the book. These will be beautifully bound and all of my backers will get one! (signed if you like that sort of thing too) 

 

The Almighty Impact

Your contribution will enrich the world of children's literature by allowing a work such as this to be published. A diverse literary field is very important for children.

I have run a successful crowdfunding campaign before for my first book 'The Lumpheads', and so I have experience with delivering a campaign like this to the satisfaction of my backers. Reviews for 'The Lumpheads' are available for your perusing on Amazon...

Whisks & Challengers

There are no real risks here as the book is in a print ready PDF document, I have a quote from a printer that I have used before who print all of Marvel's comics for the UK (so I know the quality of their printing) and I have a lot of experience with delivering creative projects within their deadline. If you back, you will get a book in the mail. Everything is ready to go!

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help 

Please raise awareness to attract other backers who may be interested in this project in any way that you can. All support is greatly appreciated whether it is sharing this campaign on social media or simply referring friends and family who may be interested in getting their mitts on an awesome and unique book. May the fish-male bless your kind, kind heart!

story:
The Story

 

Who Was Abram Games? Abram Games was one of Britain's finest graphic designers, particularly admired for his posters, some of which are among the most recognisable of the 20th century. Always committed to public education, his work led him to be appointed as the Official War Artists for posters in 1942. His output was hugely varied, including advertisements, book jackets and stamps, but every design was informed by his motto, ‘maximum meaning, minimum means'. The results were always striking for their efficiency, directness and humour. Games was awarded an OBE for Services to Graphic Design and appointed Royal Designer for Industry (RDI) by the Royal Society of Art.

Some of Abram's best-known posters

 

The Festival of Britain emblem, designed by Games

 

The Celebrated Poster: Among Abram Games's most admired creations was his design for the emblem of the Festival of Britain in 1951. But his single most widely known poster is the one commissioned for the Royal Shakespeare Theatre Centenary Appeal in 1975. To create this design he took the names of all the plays as they appeared in the original 1623 First Folio and fitted them together like a jigsaw puzzle to form the head of Shakespeare (as it appears in Martin Droeshout's engraving that also appears in the First Folio). The effect was inspiring and immediately memorable; it was one of the last posters he designed and has become the most ubiquitous. 

The title page of the First Folio

 

Games's poster, commissioned by the RSC

 

The Unfinished Project: The poster was hailed a huge success by the RSC and as far as Abram's family knew at the time, he considered the job completed.

But thanks to an exciting discovery we now know that Abram’s intentions for the much-admired image went far further than a poster. 

After his death in 1996, Abram's daughter and archivist, Naomi Games, happened upon a mock-up he had made of a flickbook based on the poster image. As she turned the pages of the book Shakespeare's face gradually appeared, one play at a time. From the designs she could see that her father had even experimented with getting Shakespeare to wink!

It was beautiful and ingenious and in that moment Naomi determined not to let the idea go with Abram to the grave but that one day she would publish the flickbook and see the project through to the end.

Abram Games hard at work in his studio. Photo credit: © Philip Sayer, 1988, with many thanks

A younger Abram Games with the 'Join the ATS' women's recruitment poster of 1941

 

But the flickbook was not all that she discovered among Abram's papers. In a document headed ‘Shakespeare Title-Portrait Project’, packed in among a number of old designs and pieces of writing, Naomi uncovered a whole list, accompanied by sketches, of further ideas for the poster image. 

It quickly became clear that Abram had intended to print the image of Shakespeare's head onto a whole range of objects including mugs, jigsaws and glassware. You can see how carefully these ideas had been thought through by his labelled plans for an umbrella for the RSC, below.

An initial design by Games for an umbrella featuring Shakespeare's face

 

Finishing the Project: Now 22 years on, we at Pallas Athene have worked with Naomi to complete Abram’s plans and bring his buried project to life.

The flickbook has been carefully put together to follow Abram's prototype as closely as possible. The effect is striking; as the pages are turned and the portrait comes into view, Shakespeare's face comes alive through movement, as does the brilliance of the idea behind it. 

To accompany the flickbook we are also producing objects featuring the Shakespeare poster image. Excited by the possibilities, we went beyond the ideas which Abram proposed; so as well as the mug, the jigsaw and a decanter, we are producing T-shirts, tea towels, prints and more.  

When choosing the pieces, we put a particular emphasis on quality - it seemed only right that Abram's high-quality designs should be complemented by high-quality products from the finest manufacturers.  

All of the pieces are available as perks - please see details below (and to the right).

 

The Perks

 

10% of All Perk Prices Will Be Donated to Shakespeare's Globe

Ten per cent of all perk prices will be given to Shakespeare's Globe in London (registered charity no. 266916).

Shakespeare's Globe houses a reconstruction of the Globe Theatre, an Elizabethan playhouse associated with Shakespeare, on the south bank of the River Thames. The theatre invites visitors from all over the world to watch productions ranging from original practices to world premières of new writing. The site also includes an educational and rehearsal studio complex and an exhibition about Shakespeare's life and work. Shakespeare's Globe continues to expand their programme of public events, school and university courses, and work with the Southwark Community. 

The Globe receives no public subsidy, but can be said to have revolutionised Shakespeare production and study - and to have opened the eyes of hundreds of thousands of visitors to the glories of Shakespeare's work.

We are proud to be able to contribute to this truly valuable institution.

 

The Shakespeare Flickbook

The flickbook has been made in close collaboration with Abram Games's daughter and archivist, Naomi Games, to ensure that it is as close to Games's original design as possible.  

Our only additions have been to complete Abram's sequence of quotations from each play that appear on the left hand pages - for the entertainment of the reader (or flicker!) - as well as a brief introduction by Naomi which explains the story behind the flickbook and how it came to be. 

All 37 plays are included, in the order they are printed in the First Folio of 1623, ending with Pericles, Prince of Tyre, first included in the Third Folio of 1664. The poems, and some of the plays not published in the Folios have been added for completeness. 

***Early bird offer: the first 70 copies to be ordered will be signed by Naomi Games. Don't miss out!***

The book is printed on luxurious FSC certified (sustainable forestry) 140gsm paper by Park Lane Press. Their waterless printing technology gives an extraordinary intensity of colour and is far more environmentally friendly than standard methods. 

112 pages. Dimensions: 148 mm x 106 mm landscape

10% of perk price will be donated to Shakespeare's Globe. 

A spread from the flickbook

 

The Shakespeare Tea Towel

Our bespoke tea towels are made of the finest linen by Ulster Weavers, a company devoted to creating quality linen and timeless homewares.

Linen is ideal for tea towels as it is much longer lasting and dries far faster than cotton, as well as being more eco-friendly. The design can be seen below - white letters out of the brick red chosen by Abram Games originally to echo the appearance of the Royal Shakespeare Theatre.

Dimensions: 48 x 74 cm

10% of perk price will be donated to Shakespeare's Globe. 

The design for the tea towel

 

 

 

 

 

The Shakespeare Jigsaw 

This premium-quality, laser-cut wooden jigsaw is made by Wentworth Jigsaws, using sustainable materials. 250 pieces make up the poster image which is featured in the original brick red colour. 

The jigsaw is embedded with special Shakespearean motifs among the pieces, such as daggers, ghosts, castles and even an enamoured Romeo and Juliet. Just a few examples have been extracted from the jigsaw below but there are many more and they're harder to find that you might think! 

Dimensions: 360 mm x 250 mm

10% of perk price will be donated to Shakespeare's Globe. 

Wooden jigsaw - spot the Shakespearean pieces!

 

The Shakespeare Print

We offer beautiful individually made giclée prints of the Shakespeare poster, ready for framing.

They are produced by Michael Perry, art fabricator and fine printer, on the highest quality 300g pure cotton paper using special inks.

Dimensions: sheet 37 x 54 cm, image 29 x 46 cm

10% of perk price will be donated to Shakespeare's Globe. 

 

The Shakespeare Decanter               

The Shakespeare Decanter, by Dartington Glass, features Abram's design sand-blasted into the glass.  It shows up brilliantly against wine or whisky – or sack.

Dimensions: 22 cm high, capacity 65 cl

10% of perk price will be donated to Shakespeare's Globe. 

Design for the Shakespeare decanter

 

The Shakespeare Decanter and Two Whisky Tumblers 

We also offer a set with the engraved decanter complemented by two tumblers sand-blasted with Shakespeare's signature.

Tumbler dimensions: 105 mm high, capacity 30 cl

10% of perk price will be donated to Shakespeare's Globe. 

The set will be presented as above, but will feature Shakespeare's head on the decanter and his signature on the tumblers

 

We're also looking to develop other products including cushions. For us at Pallas Athene this is a rare and exciting opportunity to bring the unfinished work of a great designer to life. We very much hope you will be able to join us.

If you would like to know more about Abram Games please visit the website: https://www.abramgames.com/home

 

Risks and Challenges

 

Pallas Athene have been publishing books for over twenty five years, and all the suppliers are well known to them. The flickbooks and products are all fully designed and a first batch has been produced: they look superb. We are raising money so that we can produce a larger number of the books and other products at a lower cost per unit, thus allowing us to sell Games's wonderful design more widely. Delays are possible but unlikely.

We look forward to keeping all our supporters updated with our progress.

story:
I need to give this book to the world

Lately, I’ve been thinking about things like, if something were to happen to me, how would I ever be able to share all that I’ve learned with my child, any future grandchildren, and all those people I know I could help if I could just reach them. I have all this wonderful knowledge and experience I’ve gained and I want to pay it forward. As a coach, I can help one person or business at a time. I also teach classes and workshops, which allow me to increase the value of my time. But I could reach so many more with a book. (I’ve also got plans beyond the book — like a training series and an app — but, one step at a time.)

Another thought I’ve had recently is that I can no longer burn the candle at both ends. So I can consult and earn a living, or I can finish this book while I’m on fire. I really want to get this book done within a year, which means devoting all of my time and energy to it. I’m well into this 100,000 word book, but I can’t complete it without your help. 

Hard-Earned Knowledge

The journey that is becoming the book is, in some ways, an autobiography. It started years ago when I decided I did not want to be a wallflower anymore and taught myself how to come out of my shell. 

Then there’s the successful 17-year consulting business I created that required learning how to sell myself and my business to clients, such as Apple and the California Department of Education. 

I also ended up having a first-hand experience with a child with PTSD as well as high-functioning autism, which brought me back to my degree in special education, and ultimately led me to improve those skills by becoming a behavior interventionist. 

Through these valuable experiences, I gained insight into creating behavior change, into what motivates us, and that change requires examining values, beliefs, and purpose as well as fears, anxieties, and self-doubt. 

I eventually went back to work for myself, this time as a personal and business coach. 

The world needs my book

I can spout statistics, like only 41% of us regularly make New Year’s Resolutions, 80% fail by Valentine’s Day, and only 8% finish. But what really matters is that many of us are dissatisfied with our lives and our efforts to improve them, and don’t know where to start, or end up feeling disappointed and frustrated when we try.

I’ve seen people with great ideas and no idea how to implement them; people that are frustrated with where they are currently, but are afraid to change; people that feel they have no choice but to be where they are; people that get a little ahead, then experience setback after setback; people whose lives seem perfect, but are really unhappy. I’ve been all of those people myself at one time or another, and I want to share with them what helped me.

Here’s what needed to make this happen

I’ve decided to use crowdfunding rather than seek a traditional advance from a publishing company because I’m not willing to let the fate of the book be dependent on an acceptance letter. And I have an aggressive guerrilla marketing campaign planned for the book that is above and beyond what I think any book publisher would typically do for me.

Let’s pay it forward together

So I’m asking you, my potential readers, to invest not just in me, but in your own future, the future of your friends and family, and the future of those you think deserve the chance to become all that they can be.

In appreciation for your help in getting this book out there, I’ll be giving you an e-copy of the book when it’s done. I am also offering you the opportunity to preorder one for a friend or loved one, and to choose to have one donated to a worthy group of your choice. You could even get up to 12 hours of coaching for yourself or someone you know. In addition, as part of my mission to help those who could use what I know, once the book is complete and I have time to devote to coaching again, I will be donating some of my coaching time to groups in need, such as veterans and at-risk youth (and I’m open to other ideas if you want to pass them along to me).

Thank you. I look forward to getting to know you.

Sincerely, Leslie MacNeill
story_txt: I need to give this book to the worldLately, I’ve been thinking about things like, if something were to happen to me, how would I ever be able to share all that I’ve learned with my child, any future grandchildren, and all those people I know I could help if I could just reach them. I have all this wonderful knowledge and experience I’ve gained and I want to pay it forward. As a coach, I can help one person or business at a time. I also teach classes and workshops, which allow me to increase the value of my time. But I could reach so many more with a book. (I’ve also got plans beyond the book — like a training series and an app — but, one step at a time.)Another thought I’ve had recently is that I can no longer burn the candle at both ends. So I can consult and earn a living, or I can finish this book while I’m on fire. I really want to get this book done within a year, which means devoting all of my time and energy to it. I’m well into this 100,000 word book, but I can’t complete it without your help. Hard-Earned KnowledgeThe journey that is becoming the book is, in some ways, an autobiography. It started years ago when I decided I did not want to be a wallflower anymore and taught myself how to come out of my shell. Then there’s the successful 17-year consulting business I created that required learning how to sell myself and my business to clients, such as Apple and the California Department of Education. I also ended up having a first-hand experience with a child with PTSD as well as high-functioning autism, which brought me back to my degree in special education, and ultimately led me to improve those skills by becoming a behavior interventionist. Through these valuable experiences, I gained insight into creating behavior change, into what motivates us, and that change requires examining values, beliefs, and purpose as well as fears, anxieties, and self-doubt. I eventually went back to work for myself, this time as a personal and business coach. The world needs my bookI can spout statistics, like only 41% of us regularly make New Year’s Resolutions, 80% fail by Valentine’s Day, and only 8% finish. But what really matters is that many of us are dissatisfied with our lives and our efforts to improve them, and don’t know where to start, or end up feeling disappointed and frustrated when we try.I’ve seen people with great ideas and no idea how to implement them; people that are frustrated with where they are currently, but are afraid to change; people that feel they have no choice but to be where they are; people that get a little ahead, then experience setback after setback; people whose lives seem perfect, but are really unhappy. I’ve been all of those people myself at one time or another, and I want to share with them what helped me.Here’s what needed to make this happenI’ve decided to use crowdfunding rather than seek a traditional advance from a publishing company because I’m not willing to let the fate of the book be dependent on an acceptance letter. And I have an aggressive guerrilla marketing campaign planned for the book that is above and beyond what I think any book publisher would typically do for me.Let’s pay it forward togetherSo I’m asking you, my potential readers, to invest not just in me, but in your own future, the future of your friends and family, and the future of those you think deserve the chance to become all that they can be.In appreciation for your help in getting this book out there, I’ll be giving you an e-copy of the book when it’s done. I am also offering you the opportunity to preorder one for a friend or loved one, and to choose to have one donated to a worthy group of your choice. You could even get up to 12 hours of coaching for yourself or someone you know. In addition, as part of my mission to help those who could use what I know, once the book is complete and I have time to devote to coaching again, I will be donating some of my coaching time to groups in need, such as veterans and at-risk youth (and I’m open to other ideas if you want to pass them along to me).Thank you. I look forward to getting to know you.Sincerely, Leslie MacNeill

story:
About the Author:

Hello everyone! My name is Lina and I am 22 years old. Since childhood I’ve always felt a great passion for writing,although until now, I never dedicated myself to it. After leaving my career at the University, aged 19, I decided to move to another city to be independent. This was where it all started.

I had the opportunity to learn English as well as a bit of French. This meant I could interact with tourists from all over the world while they visited Colombia. I was fascinated by their stories and how much they knew about my country – even more than I did at the time!

After two years working in a hostel, I learned so much about travelling and discovering new places that I decided to write a guide to my wonderful country, dedicated to those that are travelling in Colombia for a month. At the beginning of 2018, I decided to quit my job to travel through Colombia, discovering the best of the culture, people, landscapes, food, accommodation and festivals, describing in my notebook the things that I wanted to share. Little by little the idea of the book became an idea of micro-enterprise. My goal is now to make this happen so that I can show the best of my country with visitors from all over the world.

WHAT IS, GET LOST IN?

GET LOST IN, It is a Colombian micro-company that was born with the intention of showing the best of tourist destinations in four countries in Latin America, with a focus on local culture and experiences. We work with people who, like me, are interested in supporting local organisations and communities.

OUR GOAL:

Since our company is starting up, our budget is not sufficient to achieve the necessary goals which are:

  • The design of our website: This will help us to get closer to cities and small towns of our country with natural paradises that very few people know about.
  • The physical printing of our book Guide to distribute in different establishments and sell on Amazon.
  • Advertising our Instagram website with photos and videos of the experiences of travelers by our country.

If we complete the desired budget the total development of our initial project, (which is with the Colombia country) will be possible to carry out all our plans that is why we seek the support of stakeholders to achieve the goal of €5,000.

Our intention is to create and produce our own brand, i.e. that our guidebooks did not work with any Publisher and everything we produce will be of our company.

WHERE THE FOUNDS GO?

  • €500 will go toward Indiegogo and processing fees.
  • €2500  will go toward compiling and printing an initial run of 1000 books.
  • €1500  will go toward website design and media publicity.
  • €500  will go toward translation of the book in English/ French/ German.

WHY IS THIS PROJECT IMPORTANT TO US?

While there are many commercially produced tourist guides, GET LOST IN, will focus on producing a guide that promises great travel experiences AND support to local businesses and communities. In developing a travel guide that hopes strike a good balance between local interest and tourism we think we have produced a fun and exciting guide to Latin America that is beneficial to all stakeholders.

It is important for us to change the image that some Latin American countries, recognizing its shortcomings but highlighting all the magic that can be found once you are there. Each year the number of travelers increases and it is gratifying to know that things are changing. However, I feel that it’s still very important to contribute to this positive change.

In the process of building my dream and starting my company I've noticed how hard it is for young entrepreneurs to start their own projects and to secure the support to make their ambitions a reality. This is why all of the places that we recommend in our books are specially selected to support local communities, businesses and farms.

In producing the first edition of the guide I’ve had tremendous support from the businesses I’ve talked with.

This is because when you use a Get Lost In guide, you are contributing to something greater than just your travel experience.

OTHER WAYS TO CONTRIBUTION:

  • Follow our page on Instagram: @getlostincolombia
  • Share your experiences of travel, photos or videos with us through our contact email.
  • Share the campaign with your friends. Email: getlostincolombia@gmail.com
  • Donate any amount of money. Regardless the amount if not the intention.

story:
Short Summary

We are a startup indie publisher looking to print our first anthology. We are passionate about crime and mystery, so this will be the focus of our first anthology. We can't wait to spread the words of budding authors! 

What We Need & What You Get

We need about $2,500 plus tax to get this off the ground. This money will go towards paying the authors, printing costs, and a tiny marketing campaign. Depending on your level of support, you will get anything from email updates to a signed and lettered special edition.  

The Impact

This anthology is valuable to lift the voices of indie authors and to spread our passion for the crime genre.  We seek to bring the seedy underbelly of Las Vegas to your front door.

Risks & Challenges

Distribution is the biggest hurdle to get the books into the largest number of hands. We will be working with the world's largest book distributor to help with that. Also a grassroots marketing plan will be employed to make sure the word gets out. 

Other Ways You Can Help

We value your support, financial and otherwise. 

Help us get the word out about the anthology in YOUR city.

Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Changing the world of publishing to benefit everyone!

Modernization of the publishing industry has been long overdue as most publishers either hold writers to ransom with unfair contracts or simply reject them for not fitting into THEIR formula. A world of readers & writers continue to be neglected and considered secondary to profit margins! 

If the total of all stories being written in the world was represented by an iceberg, then the old-fashioned publishers are only publishing the tip, leaving a world of stories lost until now. Nettpress is designed to bring the rest of the stories to the surface allowing ANY author to publish their stories for readers to enjoy. Who knows, we might find the next J.K. Rowling or Shakespeare hidden away.

The Nettpress platform is alive and already in use with writers publishing and the feedback so far has been amazing!

We are now looking to put the icing on the cake with the world class Nettpress App! This is set to turbo charge the entire environment for all readers and writers to enjoy. We expand on all the details and benefits further below..... so keep reading.

Nettpress has been built by writers to help ALL writers around the world achieve their dreams of becoming published authors. Building a community where Authors and readers  come together because every writer has a voice and every story has an audience.

It's our mission to publish writers everywhere so their stories can escape the dark realm of dusty hard drives and reach a world of readers. We believe that neither money or executive opinion should block creativity and imagination EVER.

The book publishing industry has been a nightmare for writers wanting to get published for way too long. 

  • Rejection letters
  • High Commissions on book sales
  • Exclusivity contracts
  • Time & Money involved building your own website

 

These are just some of the issues Nettpress solves because publishing just got smarter!

We have moved the power of publishing to YOU the writer so, YOU get to decide what, when, where and how to publish your work. This sets you free in so many ways it’s truly amazing!

Writers get their own personal online bookstore! It’s all set up, simply customize and start publishing. 

It gives you the ability to publish, promote and sell ALL of your books in every format without restrictions.... and it's FREE to use!

Not only digital copies you can also sell physical copies of books. audio books and even book merchandise!

PLUS 

Writers keep 100% of their profits & 100% of their copyrights and so much more.

It’s exactly how publishing should be!

 

Truly international and perfect for ALL writers! 

Another major issue for writers wanting to sell books online is trying to get paid for their book sales!

Besides huge commissions being charged there's the lengthy waiting periods plus the fact you must sell a certain amount of books just to reach the payment threshold! 

On top of this you still won't get paid unless you can actually complete all the financial requirements involved and this is especially difficult if not impossible for most authors living outside of the USA.

Another roadblock smashed!

Nettpress is Australian owned and operated so there are no taxation or internal revenue hoops to jump through AND no outrageous paperwork involved to get paid.

Simply connect your Stripe account from anywhere around the world and get paid for your book sales within days! 

Currently we have a rolling eight day payment system and we’re working on making it daily, so every time you sell a book the money is transferred to you the next day!

​No more waiting months to get paid and no minimum sales volume either because they’re your sales and you should get paid for it, no matter how big or small. 

 

There are two main areas to Nettpress,

PUBLISHING - A dedicated area for writers which includes all things publishing, marketing, sales, order tracking, reports and more. An author hub to help you navigate the site quickly & easily, there's publishing guides, marketing guides, free images and template resources, video library and much more.

Everything required for a writer to run a successful writing career all within the same secure environment.

There's even a dedicated "Getting Started" page to get you set up in minutes! Short video guides demonstrate how to do things in an over-the-shoulder format that makes everything feel like child’s play!

READING - The readers hub is FREE for readers around the world to enjoy and access all things reading. There's author bookstores to explore should they wish to purchase anything and the community hub to interact with authors or other readers. There's also the Nettpress Nibbler (we expand on this further below) full of short stories and chapters to devour for free 24/7 on any device... it's reader heaven!

There are so many benefits for writers we couldn’t list them all here but please check out the Nettpress website for everything included - https://nettpress.com

 

How can you help and how do you benefit?

We have spent the last 3 years building, designing and creating the platform because all writers deserve to have their stories published. As you can imagine there have been many late nights, blood, sweat, tears and love involved with its inception for writers around the world to now enjoy.

It's FREE to use and many Authors have already begun publishing.

We are now looking to optimize the platform even further and in need of some help to build the Nettpress App! 

A world class custom built smart app for iOS & Android. Nettpress is already fully functional on all devices in a website format but it's now time to make the user experience even easier, smoother and faster than ever before with a premium stand alone App. 

Think Airbnb and how it helped home owners easily create extra income by connecting them directly with holiday makers or Uber simply connecting people for a win/win outcome.

Nettpress has been designed to grow into a peer to peer system bringing readers & writers together without the need of large publishing companies dictating and deciding what they think readers want. This allows the market to decide, giving readers the opportunity to enjoy what they want to enjoy and putting the power back into the hands of writers!

“Struggling authors” don’t struggle to write they struggle to get published and we say NO MORE!

The App will seamlessly connect you to all things Nettpress accessing all the amazing features with a touch of an icon. This will be a game changer for both authors & readers alike helping to create a shift the publishing industry desperately needs. 

Building this premium App is an expensive exercise which is why we need your help. This will give writers a powerful marketing tool to instantly reach BILLIONS of readers world wide (we expand on these benefits below) and we are rewarding our foundation members with a rare opportunity!

As there are running costs involved in the future this will incur a monthly fee of approx $15.99 per month for authors wanting to advertise and market their work in this format however for a small ONE TIME donation you can secure FREE LIFETIME MEMBERSHIP! ....Don't pay EVER! 

 

 

Nettpress is for readers too!

Nettpress offers free reading through a unique global reading portal where readers can immerse themselves in endless short stories and chapters regularly published by Nettpress authors. It's called the Nettpress Nibbler and it's designed to help kill commuter boredom one nibble at a time, entertaining you on any device during life’s dull moments. 

"The Nibbler reinvents how writers find readers"

So, not only are we building a premier App to enhance the entire user experience for writers on all devices, we will be incorporating "The Nibbler" into the App as well which will instantly create a world class reading App at the same time!

The Nibbler is already fully functional on the Nettpress platform but adding it into the App format will make it even more efficient, engaging and enjoyable for readers to use.

Perfect for when you're bored on that bus or train, sitting in a Doctors waiting lounge, stuck in transit or just patiently waiting for that friend that's always late. The Nibbler will have you enthralled instantly!

Instead of scrolling mindlessly through the same social media feed over and over hoping something new has been posted since you last checked, you can simply open the Nibbler and discover your next favorite author. 

"You choose something that catches your eye and usually finish it in no time, pleasantly surprised you decide to read another story published by the same author. Before you know it you're hooked and binge reading into the station, along the road and into your lunch hour."

This allows BILLIONS of readers around the world to enjoy short stories or chapters FREE of charge 24/7 on any device, helping kill commuter boredom one nibble at a time. If you run out of time to finish the story, no problems, just bookmark it and come back to it later.

Not only for livening up dull moments but think Netflix for reading and devouring an entire series in one sitting…. Binge reading!

 

Connecting writers & readers

Benefits of publishing in The Nibbler -

Publishing in this format has many benefits for writers by allowing them to grow their audience one short story or chapter at a time, testing the market and gaining confidence along the way. This is a fantastic way for authors to overcome any procrastination or self-doubt which often arises when trying to write an entire novel. 

Writers have the ability to place unique clickable links at the bottom of their stories which can send readers directly to their bookstore or current new release, thus creating a fantastic marketing opportunity and instant book sales!

In turn for the reader who has enjoyed what they’ve just read, can now instantly explore the authors own bookstore and purchase something should they wish instead of trying to find them elsewhere online at a later time.

Nettpress charges 0% commission on book sales so 100% of net profits go direct to the authors.​

 

The community Hub -

Authors and readers can communicate easily through the Nettpress community hub in a variety of ways. Readers may want to know when your next novel is being released and can ask you directly via Nettpress messaging, they can join a fan group you may have created or just post a question in one of the forums.

This allows your fans to get excited and help each other with topics relating to your novels, stories and more. You get to moderate everything.

It's also an excellent way for writers to gain feedback or thoughts on their story-lines, characters and future episodes. This can build valuable trust between readers & Authors helping to develop their author brand whilst also growing a huge fan base!

There's no more middle men!

A secure environment purpose built for writers and readers to do what they love.

Lifetime Membership Opportunity!

We will be forever grateful to all who contribute and as our way of saying a huge thank you we've created some amazing perks, such as an opportunity to claim LIFE TIME ACCESS TO EVERYTHING!

As there are overheads and ongoing running costs (annual software renewals, security certificate renewals, updates, push notifications, new software added for upgrades and much more) In the future there will be a small monthly cost for "Nettpress Pro" for authors wanting to publish and promote their work inside the Nibbler. 

The main Nettpress platform will always be free however Nettpress Pro will be about all things marketing for Authors wanting to take their book sales to the next level!

Imagine if Netflix had offered a small one time donation and you could use it free for life!

This is a limited opportunity so grab it today - 

FREE Reading, FREE Publishing and even FREE marketing in the Nibbler! ….DON’T PAY EVER!

If this part doesn't interest you, be a hero and share it with someone who could benefit!

 

 

Check out the full details of all our perks here -

(The description space is limited when filling out the "Perk" section so here are the full details of everything included in each perk)

 

$9 Contribution - 

Certificate of appreciation & Founding Contributor

  • You will be forever remembered with an official acknowledgment as a "founding contributor" listed on the Nettpress site as an honour roll. 
  • Receive an official Nettpress certificate of appreciation, emailed in PDF form
  • Get a huge thank you for contributing to the change the publishing industry needs and helping support writers around the globe. 

 

$19 Contribution - 

Classic Reading Collection & Founding Contributor

  • You will receive a $25 coupon to be used in the Nettclassics Bookstore! Choose up to 5 Ebooks from a selection of timeless classics such as Peter Pan, Sherlock Homes, Tom Sawyer, The Wizard of Oz, Treasure Island and many more. Perfect for yourself or to give as a gift and share these classic tales with the young or old.
  • You will be forever remembered with an official acknowledgment as a "founding contributor" listed on the Nettpress site as an honour roll. 
  • Receive an official Nettpress certificate of appreciation, emailed in PDF form
  • Get a huge thank you for contributing to the change the publishing industry needs and helping support writers around the globe. 

 

$29 Contribution - 

LIFE TIME MEMBERSHIP TO NETTPRESS!

Never pay for publishing again! 

  • You will have full access to ALL current features on the Nettpress platform FREE FOR LIFE!
  • You will have full access to ALL future features added on the Nettpress platform FREE FOR LIFE!
  • You will get unlimited publishing and marketing in The Nibbler FREE FOR LIFE! 
  • As a founding member any stories or chapters you publish in the Nibbler will also be included during our global marketing campaign! This quite simply means, not only do you get free publishing you will also be getting free advertising!
  • You will be forever remembered with an official acknowledgment as a "founding member" listed on the Nettpress site as an honour roll. 
  • Receive a Nettpress certificate of appreciation, emailed in PDF form
  • Get a huge thank you for contributing to the change the publishing industry needs and helping support writers around the globe. 

 

$99 Contribution - 

MEGA Member - Up to 4 accounts!

4 x Lifetime Memberships you can use as you wish!

This can be utilized in various ways –

  • If you are an author and write under several pseudonyms then you can publish and sell under 4 different accounts/author names.
  • You may be part of a book club and could gift 4 lifetime memberships to your author friends.
  • You can use as a family and allow children or relatives to have an account.
  • It's up to you how you would like to take advantage of this offer!

 

All 4 accounts include ALL of the following -

LIFE TIME MEMBERSHIP TO NETTPRESS!

Never pay for publishing again! 

  • You will have full access to ALL current features on the Nettpress platform FREE FOR LIFE!
  • You will have full access to ALL future features added on the Nettpress platform FREE FOR LIFE!
  • You will get unlimited publishing and marketing in The Nibbler FREE FOR LIFE! 
  • As a founding member any stories or chapters you publish in the Nibbler will also be included during our global marketing campaign! This quite simply means, not only do you get free publishing you will also be getting free advertising!
  • You will be forever remembered with an official acknowledgment as a "founding member" listed on the Nettpress site as an honour roll. 
  • Receive a Nettpress certificate of appreciation, emailed in PDF form
  • Get a huge thank you for contributing to the change the publishing industry needs and helping support writers around the globe. 

Thank You...

We wish to personally thank everyone who contributes, as writers ourselves we have been through the heartaches, struggles, painful submission processes, rejection letters, the huge cost of self publishing and just how unfair the publishing industry can feel.

With these funds we can continue to make a huge change in the industry, helping writers achieve their dreams of becoming published authors. 

Nettpress is for ALL writers from any nationality. Whether you are a complete novice or experienced author, young or old, male or female it doesn't discriminate.

 

See where funds are being allocated and the difference you will be making -

This is a breakdown of where the funds will be allocated, everything raised will be used towards the growth of Nettpress to benefit all readers and writers.

 

$18,000 to $20,000 AUD - Custom Built Nettpress App

This is the major component of our campaign, we have built the vehicle and this will be like the petrol/gas that will keep it running. We will be building the fully functioning Nettpress App on iOS and Android.

This will be connected seamlessly with the main Nettpress platform allowing all the amazing current & future features to be conveniently available with the touch of an icon.

Not only creating a writers dream publishing App, combined with the Nibbler also creates a phenomenal reading App connecting writers and readers on any device anywhere around the world.​

This is a large task as it will be a stand alone App and not built on a third party platform. After researching and meetings with developers we were also shocked at the cost of a stand alone app however to have the functionality custom built and also be available live in both Apple & Android app stores for downloading this is what's required.

We have investigated other cheaper alternatives with 3rd party providers but this comes with limits/restrictions on what is possible. We also foresee that a stand alone app would still need to be built down the track which would only cause further complications when trying to transition into a different app at a later stage.

With a custom built app means there will be less restrictions as things grow and we can constantly upgrade and improve the user experience for all involved. This will be a world class App of the highest quality for all to enjoy!

 

$3,500 AUD - Design and Editing Software Package

We will always be looking for ways to improve Nettpress and offer even more value to writers. Once we have this software integrated it will give writers the ability to design and create their own professional book covers in minutes!

It will include thousands of editable templates, graphics, artwork, fonts, design tools and more. High quality and simple to use which means writers will no longer have to pay expensive graphic designers for artwork and can freshen up their book covers anytime they wish.

Not only for book cover this tool will be perfect for authors looking to promote their next masterpiece, create professionally designed marketing material, social media posts, promotional adverts and much more.

 

$3,000 AUD - 12 Months Licensing

These funds will be to cover the current licensing and running costs for the next 12 months. Unfortunately this isn't an exciting expenditure however it's extremely necessary so as to keep everything online and secure. Covering the cost of all the annual renewals for software currently in place, Security Certificates, Monthly web hosting, Email , Webmail, CRM subscriptions and more.

 

$10,000 AUD - Global Marketing Campaign for the App

Help us to share Nettpress with the world!

We are going to spread the word far and wide that there is now a smarter, fairer way to get published. Let everyone know that writers and readers can come together for unlimited binge publishing and binge reading!

The marketing plan will be strategically rolled out over several months to make sure it is fresh and up to date as Nettpress continues to grow. It will also incorporate a huge variety of marketing channels to ensure maximum exposure and results.

Social media marketing will of course play a big part of this, utilizing the biggest social platforms running Facebook ads, Instagram ads, Youtube ads and Pinterest ads. We will be employing highly influential authors and other associated businesses with immense reach for an avalanche of "shoutouts" creating a huge industry buzz.

There will also be a number of other channels implemented including email marketing campaigns, viral video campaigns, messenger alerts, press releases and much more.

We will be focusing equally on writers and readers of all ages during this time, sharing the wonderful benefits included for all parties as the platform and the app work together harmoniously. This will also add to the overall organic growth of Nettpress as brand awareness increases and more people enjoy stress free publishing!  

 

$3,500 AUD - New Staffing Costs

This is another not so exciting part but it's something necessary to sustain the up keep and the ability to operate. We are trying to do as much as possible ourselves however we have reached a stage where we need a little extra help.

The funds will assist with a casual receptionist to carry out tasks such as answering phone calls, replying to emails and general customer support. This enables us to continue growing the platform whilst providing a premium service.

 

Making a difference

With these funds we can truly make a difference in the publishing industry and help so many writers around the world. Giving them a platform where they can thrive, create and publish their work with out limits whilst simultaneously providing them the perfect outlet to be discovered!

Building a global community where Authors and readers can come together because every writer has a voice and every story has an audience.

A completely FREE reading App for readers to explore and unearth their next favourite author. Enjoying short stories or chapters at their fingertips for any time you're stuck waiting, in transit, commuting, holidaying or to simply binge read all weekend! 

It's a WIN/WIN for everyone!

 

Summary - 

Let's help modernize the publishing industry making it fair and affordable for everyone. Letting readers dictate what they want to read and giving writers the freedom to publish at will.

No longer do writers need to be at the mercy of traditional publishers, ripped off by other platforms taking up to 70% commissions on book sales, stuck in dreaded exclusivity contracts restricting them at every turn or left trying to do build their own website wasting time & money just to keep what is rightfully theirs. It's now time to make a change!

 

PLUS.....Risk free reading for readers!

Giving BILLIONS of readers around the world the opportunity to discover wonderful new authors for zero outlay! Allowing them to enjoy a writers flavour or style first and should they wish to purchase something further from the author, they can do so effortlessly direct from their bookstore.  

Unlimited publishing for writers whilst keeping ALL their profits and ALL their copyrights so if Hollywood comes knocking they’re a free agent!

Exactly how publishing should be!

 

We can do it together, let's make it happen!
story_txt:
Changing the world of publishing to benefit everyone!Modernization of the publishing industry has been long overdue as most publishers either hold writers to ransom with unfair contracts or simply reject them for not fitting into THEIR formula. A world of readers & writers continue to be neglected and considered secondary to profit margins! If the total of all stories being written in the world was represented by an iceberg, then the old-fashioned publishers are only publishing the tip, leaving a world of stories lost until now. Nettpress is designed to bring the rest of the stories to the surface allowing ANY author to publish their stories for readers to enjoy. Who knows, we might find the next J.K. Rowling or Shakespeare hidden away.The Nettpress platform is alive and already in use with writers publishing and the feedback so far has been amazing!We are now looking to put the icing on the cake with the world class Nettpress App! This is set to turbo charge the entire environment for all readers and writers to enjoy. We expand on all the details and benefits further below..... so keep reading.Nettpress has been built by writers to help ALL writers around the world achieve their dreams of becoming published authors. Building a community where Authors and readers  come together because every writer has a voice and every story has an audience.It's our mission to publish writers everywhere so their stories can escape the dark realm of dusty hard drives and reach a world of readers. We believe that neither money or executive opinion should block creativity and imagination EVER.The book publishing industry has been a nightmare for writers wanting to get published for way too long. 
Rejection letters
High Commissions on book sales
Exclusivity contracts
Time & Money involved building your own website
 These are just some of the issues Nettpress solves because publishing just got smarter!We have moved the power of publishing to YOU the writer so, YOU get to decide what, when, where and how to publish your work. This sets you free in so many ways it’s truly amazing!Writers get their own personal online bookstore! It’s all set up, simply customize and start publishing. It gives you the ability to publish, promote and sell ALL of your books in every format without restrictions.... and it's FREE to use!Not only digital copies you can also sell physical copies of books. audio books and even book merchandise!PLUS Writers keep 100% of their profits & 100% of their copyrights and so much more.It’s exactly how publishing should be! Truly international and perfect for ALL writers! Another major issue for writers wanting to sell books online is trying to get paid for their book sales!Besides huge commissions being charged there's the lengthy waiting periods plus the fact you must sell a certain amount of books just to reach the payment threshold! On top of this you still won't get paid unless you can actually complete all the financial requirements involved and this is especially difficult if not impossible for most authors living outside of the USA.Another roadblock smashed!Nettpress is Australian owned and operated so there are no taxation or internal revenue hoops to jump through AND no outrageous paperwork involved to get paid.Simply connect your Stripe account from anywhere around the world and get paid for your book sales within days! Currently we have a rolling eight day payment system and we’re working on making it daily, so every time you sell a book the money is transferred to you the next day!​No more waiting months to get paid and no minimum sales volume either because they’re your sales and you should get paid for it, no matter how big or small.  There are two main areas to Nettpress,PUBLISHING - A dedicated area for writers which includes all things publishing, marketing, sales, order tracking, reports and more. An author hub to help you navigate the site quickly & easily, there's publishing guides, marketing guides, free images and template resources, video library and much more.Everything required for a writer to run a successful writing career all within the same secure environment.There's even a dedicated "Getting Started" page to get you set up in minutes! Short video guides demonstrate how to do things in an over-the-shoulder format that makes everything feel like child’s play!READING - The readers hub is FREE for readers around the world to enjoy and access all things reading. There's author bookstores to explore should they wish to purchase anything and the community hub to interact with authors or other readers. There's also the Nettpress Nibbler (we expand on this further below) full of short stories and chapters to devour for free 24/7 on any device... it's reader heaven!There are so many benefits for writers we couldn’t list them all here but please check out the Nettpress website for everything included - https://nettpress.com How can you help and how do you benefit?We have spent the last 3 years building, designing and creating the platform because all writers deserve to have their stories published. As you can imagine there have been many late nights, blood, sweat, tears and love involved with its inception for writers around the world to now enjoy. It's FREE to use and many Authors have already begun publishing.We are now looking to optimize the platform even further and in need of some help to build the Nettpress App! A world class custom built smart app for iOS & Android. Nettpress is already fully functional on all devices in a website format but it's now time to make the user experience even easier, smoother and faster than ever before with a premium stand alone App. Think Airbnb and how it helped home owners easily create extra income by connecting them directly with holiday makers or Uber simply connecting people for a win/win outcome.Nettpress has been designed to grow into a peer to peer system bringing readers & writers together without the need of large publishing companies dictating and deciding what they think readers want. This allows the market to decide, giving readers the opportunity to enjoy what they want to enjoy and putting the power back into the hands of writers!“Struggling authors” don’t struggle to write they struggle to get published and we say NO MORE!The App will seamlessly connect you to all things Nettpress accessing all the amazing features with a touch of an icon. This will be a game changer for both authors & readers alike helping to create a shift the publishing industry desperately needs. Building this premium App is an expensive exercise which is why we need your help. This will give writers a powerful marketing tool to instantly reach BILLIONS of readers world wide (we expand on these benefits below) and we are rewarding our foundation members with a rare opportunity!As there are running costs involved in the future this will incur a monthly fee of approx $15.99 per month for authors wanting to advertise and market their work in this format however for a small ONE TIME donation you can secure FREE LIFETIME MEMBERSHIP! ....Don't pay EVER!   Nettpress is for readers too!Nettpress offers free reading through a unique global reading portal where readers can immerse themselves in endless short stories and chapters regularly published by Nettpress authors. It's called the Nettpress Nibbler and it's designed to help kill commuter boredom one nibble at a time, entertaining you on any device during life’s dull moments. "The Nibbler reinvents how writers find readers"So, not only are we building a premier App to enhance the entire user experience for writers on all devices, we will be incorporating "The Nibbler" into the App as well which will instantly create a world class reading App at the same time!The Nibbler is already fully functional on the Nettpress platform but adding it into the App format will make it even more efficient, engaging and enjoyable for readers to use.Perfect for when you're bored on that bus or train, sitting in a Doctors waiting lounge, stuck in transit or just patiently waiting for that friend that's always late. The Nibbler will have you enthralled instantly!Instead of scrolling mindlessly through the same social media feed over and over hoping something new has been posted since you last checked, you can simply open the Nibbler and discover your next favorite author. "You choose something that catches your eye and usually finish it in no time, pleasantly surprised you decide to read another story published by the same author. Before you know it you're hooked and binge reading into the station, along the road and into your lunch hour."This allows BILLIONS of readers around the world to enjoy short stories or chapters FREE of charge 24/7 on any device, helping kill commuter boredom one nibble at a time. If you run out of time to finish the story, no problems, just bookmark it and come back to it later.Not only for livening up dull moments but think Netflix for reading and devouring an entire series in one sitting…. Binge reading! Connecting writers & readersBenefits of publishing in The Nibbler -Publishing in this format has many benefits for writers by allowing them to grow their audience one short story or chapter at a time, testing the market and gaining confidence along the way. This is a fantastic way for authors to overcome any procrastination or self-doubt which often arises when trying to write an entire novel. Writers have the ability to place unique clickable links at the bottom of their stories which can send readers directly to their bookstore or current new release, thus creating a fantastic marketing opportunity and instant book sales!In turn for the reader who has enjoyed what they’ve just read, can now instantly explore the authors own bookstore and purchase something should they wish instead of trying to find them elsewhere online at a later time.Nettpress charges 0% commission on book sales so 100% of net profits go direct to the authors.​ The community Hub -Authors and readers can communicate easily through the Nettpress community hub in a variety of ways. Readers may want to know when your next novel is being released and can ask you directly via Nettpress messaging, they can join a fan group you may have created or just post a question in one of the forums.This allows your fans to get excited and help each other with topics relating to your novels, stories and more. You get to moderate everything.It's also an excellent way for writers to gain feedback or thoughts on their story-lines, characters and future episodes. This can build valuable trust between readers & Authors helping to develop their author brand whilst also growing a huge fan base!There's no more middle men!A secure environment purpose built for writers and readers to do what they love.Lifetime Membership Opportunity!We will be forever grateful to all who contribute and as our way of saying a huge thank you we've created some amazing perks, such as an opportunity to claim LIFE TIME ACCESS TO EVERYTHING!As there are overheads and ongoing running costs (annual software renewals, security certificate renewals, updates, push notifications, new software added for upgrades and much more) In the future there will be a small monthly cost for "Nettpress Pro" for authors wanting to publish and promote their work inside the Nibbler. The main Nettpress platform will always be free however Nettpress Pro will be about all things marketing for Authors wanting to take their book sales to the next level!Imagine if Netflix had offered a small one time donation and you could use it free for life!This is a limited opportunity so grab it today - FREE Reading, FREE Publishing and even FREE marketing in the Nibbler! ….DON’T PAY EVER!If this part doesn't interest you, be a hero and share it with someone who could benefit!  Check out the full details of all our perks here -(The description space is limited when filling out the "Perk" section so here are the full details of everything included in each perk) $9 Contribution - Certificate of appreciation & Founding Contributor
You will be forever remembered with an official acknowledgment as a "founding contributor" listed on the Nettpress site as an honour roll. 
Receive an official Nettpress certificate of appreciation, emailed in PDF form
Get a huge thank you for contributing to the change the publishing industry needs and helping support writers around the globe. 
 $19 Contribution - Classic Reading Collection & Founding Contributor
You will receive a $25 coupon to be used in the Nettclassics Bookstore! Choose up to 5 Ebooks from a selection of timeless classics such as Peter Pan, Sherlock Homes, Tom Sawyer, The Wizard of Oz, Treasure Island and many more. Perfect for yourself or to give as a gift and share these classic tales with the young or old.

 $29 Contribution - LIFE TIME MEMBERSHIP TO NETTPRESS!Never pay for publishing again! 
You will have full access to ALL current features on the Nettpress platform FREE FOR LIFE!

You will have full access to ALL future features added on the Nettpress platform FREE FOR LIFE!

You will get unlimited publishing and marketing in The Nibbler FREE FOR LIFE! 

As a founding member any stories or chapters you publish in the Nibbler will also be included during our global marketing campaign! This quite simply means, not only do you get free publishing you will also be getting free advertising!

You will be forever remembered with an official acknowledgment as a "founding member" listed on the Nettpress site as an honour roll. 
Receive a Nettpress certificate of appreciation, emailed in PDF form
Get a huge thank you for contributing to the change the publishing industry needs and helping support writers around the globe. 
 $99 Contribution - MEGA Member - Up to 4 accounts!4 x Lifetime Memberships you can use as you wish!This can be utilized in various ways –
If you are an author and write under several pseudonyms then you can publish and sell under 4 different accounts/author names.
You may be part of a book club and could gift 4 lifetime memberships to your author friends.
You can use as a family and allow children or relatives to have an account.
It's up to you how you would like to take advantage of this offer!
 All 4 accounts include ALL of the following -LIFE TIME MEMBERSHIP TO NETTPRESS!Never pay for publishing again!
