story:
Adopt a Little Bird, the first vibrator synchronized to your erotic short stories. Please note that English "vibrating" erotic stories are now be available in our bookstore.

>>>>> Take a look at the English version !

                                                                           *****          

Adoptez un Little Bird, premier sextoy synchronisé à vos lectures coquines ! Grâce à lui, les mots deviennent des caresses et la lecture se transforme en une véritable expérience sensorielle.

B.Sensory est un projet ludique, impertinent et militant porté par une femme pour toutes les femmes qui ont envie de vibrer librement, en solo ou en duo  !

C’est aussi un projet industriel innovant et ambitieux qui a demandé de lourds investissements pour développer la plateforme de gestion des contenus, l'application et surtout le Little Bird (oeuf vibrant).

En janvier 2016, le Little Bird a reçu un CES Innovation Award et en octobre le GPI d'argent (Grand prix de l'innovation) de la Foire de Paris.

DESIGN

 

Le design du Little Bird  est  adapté à toutes les morphologies féminines. Il a été pensé pour maximiser les sensations au niveau du point G tout en étant confortable à porter.  Sa forme en ogive et ses dimensions ( 7 x 3,6 cm pour le "corps", 17 cm de longueur totale) procurent des sensations même lorsqu’il ne vibre pas.

Silencieux, vous pourrez profiter en toute discrétion de ses 10 modes de vibration. Enfin, sa conception garantit une connexion application/objet efficace.

Développé en France, fabriqué en silicone médical ultra doux, sans phtalates, le Little Bird se nettoie très facilement (eau/savon) et peut s'utiliser avec des lubrifiants à base d'eau. Il respecte aussi toutes les normes de sécurité en vigueur (CE/Canada et US). Rechargeable via un port USB, il pourra accompagner vos jeux et lectures pendant 1H3o . 

FONCTIONNALITES 


Comment ça marche ?
Le système B.Sensory inclut une application de lecture et un sextoy synchronisé via Bluetooth. Après avoir téléchargé gratuitement l’application sur votre smartphone ou votre tablette,  choisissez une nouvelle érotique « vibrante » puis commencez  la lecture.

Au fil du texte, jouez avec les mots et votre téléphone… Une simple caresse sur l’écran suffit à révéler le texte et déclencher les vibrations du Little Bird en accord avec l’intensité érotique de l’histoire.  À tout moment, vous pouvez faire varier les vibrations ou rejouer la séquence.

Vous pourrez aussi simplement utiliser le mode "télécommande" de l'application pour profiter en solo des 10 modes de vibration ou inviter votre partenaire à jouer avec vous.

Idéal pour vibrer en solo en toute liberté


Particulièrement silencieux, le Little Bird a été spécialement conçu pour vous permettre de l’utiliser où vous voulez (à la maison, dans les transports…), quand vous voulez, en toute discrétion.

Idéal pour les jeux à deux quelle que soit la distance
Au restaurant, en soirée ou chez belle-maman, partagez un moment de complicité en invitant votre partenaire à se connecter à l'application B.Sensory pour échanger des messages plus vibrants que jamais et à prendre le contrôle de votre Little Bird ! Qu'il se trouve à quelques mètres de vous, au bureau ou à l'autre bout de la terre, une simple connexion internet suffira pour activer votre plaisir. 


CONTENUS
Séduits par le concept de lecture érotique connectée, des éditeurs de référence tels que La Musardine, Blanche, Evidence, Dominique Leroy, Paulette, Union, Ska, nous ouvrent leur catalogue.  Nous avons aussi la chance d’être marrainés par Françoise Rey, auteure érotique reconnue. Ces partenariats nous permettent d'offrir à nos lectrices un large éventail d'ouvrages  en mode  classique et "vibrant". Plus de 300 références sont déjà disponibles en français et 50 en anglais.


APPLICATION DISPONIBLE EN VERSION iOS & ANDROID
Téléchargeables gratuitement sur l'Apple Store et le Play Store l'application vous permet de lire, vibrer et jouer avec un partenaire.

Le Little Bird peut être synchronisé avec des appareils équipés de la technologie Bluetooth 4.0 (BLE – Bluetooth Low Energy).

De façon générale, l'application est compatible avec :

  • iPhone 4S/5/5C/SE/6/6+ et modèles suivants
  • iPad 3 et suivants, iPad mini, iPad Air et modèles suivants
  • Smartphones/tablettes Android 4.3 OS et versions suivantes

Cependant, sur Android, certains modèles ayant les caractéristiques techniques décrites ci-dessus ne permettent pas un affichage optimal de l’application.

L'application a été testée avec succès par notre équipe technique sur les modèles suivants :

  • Samsung - Galaxy J1 | 4.4.4
  • ​Galaxy Tab S, Galaxy S5, Galaxy SG
  • LG - G6 | 4.4.2
  • Nexus 5 et Nexus 7
  • Wiko Fever

 

LIVRAISON 
Malgré l'échec de la campagne de crowdfunding le Little Bird est désormais disponible !
Vous pouvez le commander sur notre site.

 

DANS LA PRESSE
B.Sensory a déjà fait l’objet de nombreux articles dans la presse nationale et internationale, spécialisée ou grand public.

Article O1.NET Janvier 2015

ENVIE DE PARLER DE NOUS ?

Envoyez un mail à contact@b-sensory.com. Nous serons ravis de répondre à toutes vos questions.

COMMENT NOUS AIDER ?
En  commandant votre Little Bird mais aussi grâces à vos likes, commentaires et partages Facebook, Twitter, Google+ et autres réseaux !

DES QUESTIONS ?
Envoyez-nous un mail à contact@b-sensory.com. Réponse rapide garantie.

 

 

 

                                                                            *****  

                                                       ENGLISH VERSION
 

Adopt a Little Bird, the first vibrator synchronized to your erotic short stories. Please note that English erotic stories in “vibrating” version will be available in our B.Sensory boxes.

Thanks to Little Bird, words become caresses and reading turns into a true sensorial experience.

B.Sensory is a fun, cheeky and activist project led by a woman for women who want to have their senses stirred freely alone or in couple. It’s also an innovative and ambitious industrial activity which requires heavy investment to develop the content management platform, the app and the vibrator above all.

DESIGN
The Little Bird design is adapted to all feminine morphologies. It was designed to maximize sensations on G-spot and at the same time being comfortable to use.


Its bullet shape and size (7 x 3,6 cm for the "egg", 17 cm of total length) provides sensations even without vibration. Its quietness enables you to discreetly enjoy its ten modes of vibration. Besides, its design guarantees the efficiency of the connection between the app and the sex toy.

Little Bird is manufactured out of extra-soft medical silicone, without phthalate, It is water resistant and easy to clean with water/soap or water-based lubricant. It also complies with all CE, Canada and US standards.

Rechargeable via the USB port, the battery has enough power for at least 1 hour and a half of pleasure.

FEATURES

  • play on your own or with your partner
  • G Spot
  • 10 vibration settings
  • 1h30 continuous vibrations
  • powerful motor
  • body safe silicone material
  • quiet device
  • Long distance remote control
  • Phone control
  • IoS & Android
  • Bluetooth
  • rechargable via USB
  • water resistant
  • Made in France
  • 1 year warranty

 

FUNCTIONS  

B.Sensory system includes a reading app and sex toy synchronized via Bluetooth. Download our free app on your smartphone or tablet, select an erotic short story in “vibrating” version and start playing.
 
Throughout the text, play with words and your smartphone. A caress on the screen will reveal the text and trigger the vibrations according to the story. At any time, you can make the vibrations vary or replay the sequence.
 
You can also simply use the "remote control" of the app to thrill alone or in couple.

Ideal to thrill alone or in couple.

The Little Bird has been specially designed for a discreet use where you want (at home, in the transportation ...) and when you want.

Ideal for games regardless the distance
In a restaurant, during a party or at your stepmother’s house, share a moment of complicity inviting your partner to connect to the B.Sensory app and take the control of the remote! A few meters from you, in the office or in another part of the world, a basic Internet connection will be enough to have your senses stirred. You can also exchange vibrant messages in the chat.
 


CONTENTS
The B.sensory concept has already attracted French leading publishers. We also have the chance to be sponsored by Françoise Rey, a well-known French erotic author. These partnerships enable us to offer our readers a wide range of reading in classical and "vibrant" mode.

ANDROID & iOS APP AVAILABLE
You could download it for free from the Apple Store and Play Store. The app runs on :

  • iPhone 4S/5/5C/SE/6/6+ and next
  • iPad 3 and next, iPad mini, iPad Air and next
  • Smartphones/tablet Android 4.3 OS and next


DELIVERY 
The Little Bird is now available on our website !

 

HOW TO HELP US?
Today the company exists and the Little Bird too ! The best way to help us to grow is to adopt one ;-) You can also like, comment and share our informations on Facebook, Twitter & Co.

 

 

CONTACT
We would love to hear from you. If you have any inquiries, let us know : contact@b-sensory.com.

Please note that English "vibrating" erotic stories are now be available in our bookstore. >>>>> Take a look at the English version !                                                                           *****          Adoptez un Little Bird, premier sextoy synchronisé à vos lectures coquines ! Grâce à lui, les mots deviennent des caresses et la lecture se transforme en une véritable expérience sensorielle. B.Sensory est un projet ludique, impertinent et militant porté par une femme pour toutes les femmes qui ont envie de vibrer librement, en solo ou en duo  !C’est aussi un projet industriel innovant et ambitieux qui a demandé de lourds investissements pour développer la plateforme de gestion des contenus, l'application et surtout le Little Bird (oeuf vibrant).En janvier 2016, le Little Bird a reçu un CES Innovation Award et en octobre le GPI d'argent (Grand prix de l'innovation) de la Foire de Paris.DESIGN  Le design du Little Bird  est  adapté à toutes les morphologies féminines. Il a été pensé pour maximiser les sensations au niveau du point G tout en étant confortable à porter.  Sa forme en ogive et ses dimensions ( 7 x 3,6 cm pour le "corps", 17 cm de longueur totale) procurent des sensations même lorsqu’il ne vibre pas.Silencieux, vous pourrez profiter en toute discrétion de ses 10 modes de vibration. Enfin, sa conception garantit une connexion application/objet efficace.Développé en France, fabriqué en silicone médical ultra doux, sans phtalates, le Little Bird se nettoie très facilement (eau/savon) et peut s'utiliser avec des lubrifiants à base d'eau. Il respecte aussi toutes les normes de sécurité en vigueur (CE/Canada et US). Rechargeable via un port USB, il pourra accompagner vos jeux et lectures pendant 1H3o . FONCTIONNALITES  Comment ça marche ?Le système B.Sensory inclut une application de lecture et un sextoy synchronisé via Bluetooth. Après avoir téléchargé gratuitement l’application sur votre smartphone ou votre tablette,  choisissez une nouvelle érotique « vibrante » puis commencez  la lecture.Au fil du texte, jouez avec les mots et votre téléphone… Une simple caresse sur l’écran suffit à révéler le texte et déclencher les vibrations du Little Bird en accord avec l’intensité érotique de l’histoire.  À tout moment, vous pouvez faire varier les vibrations ou rejouer la séquence.Vous pourrez aussi simplement utiliser le mode "télécommande" de l'application pour profiter en solo des 10 modes de vibration ou inviter votre partenaire à jouer avec vous.Idéal pour vibrer en solo en toute liberté Particulièrement silencieux, le Little Bird a été spécialement conçu pour vous permettre de l’utiliser où vous voulez (à la maison, dans les transports…), quand vous voulez, en toute discrétion.Idéal pour les jeux à deux quelle que soit la distance Au restaurant, en soirée ou chez belle-maman, partagez un moment de complicité en invitant votre partenaire à se connecter à l'application B.Sensory pour échanger des messages plus vibrants que jamais et à prendre le contrôle de votre Little Bird ! Qu'il se trouve à quelques mètres de vous, au bureau ou à l'autre bout de la terre, une simple connexion internet suffira pour activer votre plaisir. CONTENUS Séduits par le concept de lecture érotique connectée, des éditeurs de référence tels que La Musardine, Blanche, Evidence, Dominique Leroy, Paulette, Union, Ska, nous ouvrent leur catalogue.  Nous avons aussi la chance d’être marrainés par Françoise Rey, auteure érotique reconnue. Ces partenariats nous permettent d'offrir à nos lectrices un large éventail d'ouvrages  en mode  classique et "vibrant". Plus de 300 références sont déjà disponibles en français et 50 en anglais.APPLICATION DISPONIBLE EN VERSION iOS & ANDROIDTéléchargeables gratuitement sur l'Apple Store et le Play Store l'application vous permet de lire, vibrer et jouer avec un partenaire.Le Little Bird peut être synchronisé avec des appareils équipés de la technologie Bluetooth 4.0 (BLE – Bluetooth Low Energy).De façon générale, l'application est compatible avec :
iPhone 4S/5/5C/SE/6/6+ et modèles suivants
iPad 3 et suivants, iPad mini, iPad Air et modèles suivants
Smartphones/tablettes Android 4.3 OS et versions suivantes
Cependant, sur Android, certains modèles ayant les caractéristiques techniques décrites ci-dessus ne permettent pas un affichage optimal de l’application.L'application a été testée avec succès par notre équipe technique sur les modèles suivants :
Samsung - Galaxy J1 | 4.4.4
​Galaxy Tab S, Galaxy S5, Galaxy SG
LG - G6 | 4.4.2
Nexus 5 et Nexus 7
Wiko Fever
 LIVRAISON Malgré l'échec de la campagne de crowdfunding le Little Bird est désormais disponible !Vous pouvez le commander sur notre site. DANS LA PRESSE B.Sensory a déjà fait l’objet de nombreux articles dans la presse nationale et internationale, spécialisée ou grand public.Article O1.NET Janvier 2015ENVIE DE PARLER DE NOUS ?Envoyez un mail à contact@b-sensory.com. Nous serons ravis de répondre à toutes vos questions.COMMENT NOUS AIDER ?En  commandant votre Little Bird mais aussi grâces à vos likes, commentaires et partages Facebook, Twitter, Google+ et autres réseaux !DES QUESTIONS ?Envoyez-nous un mail à contact@b-sensory.com. story:
ABOUT THE BOOK: 

When Your Soul Screams started off as a collection of journal entries documenting my journey from anxiety and depression that I had suffered after my marriage fell apart. I wanted the pain to end, but I didn't know how- instead, I desperately tried to take my life- it's a good thing that didn't happen. But at that time, I didn't know how to live. When Your Soul Screams is over 100,000 words and divided into five parts; each one tackles essential principles to finding relief and recovery from anxiety and depression. 

 Part One: Urgent Care for the Suffering Soul, explains the importance of self-care coping skills during crisis and conflicts. 

Part Two: Brain Matters, discuss the subconscious processes occurring inside of your body and brain in response to anxiety and depression. 

Part Three: Project B.A.B.Y. Build A Better You, walks you through the construction process of building better versions of yourself in response to change. 

Part Four: The Social Soul challenges the CoDependency Myth and offers social concepts to help create healthier social circles to depend on for well-being. 

Part Five: When Your Soul Thrives, teaches principles of thriving despite uncertainty. 

I know what it feels like to feel alone when stresses are too much to bear. My closest friends and family members know me as a person that they can go to for a kind ear to listen and an open heart to help them with their problems. If it is within my means to help, I will. If not, I will help them find places that can. It is my hope and prayer to help as many suffering souls find relief and recovery from anxiety and depression. This book is an extension of the best parts of me and the overflowing amounts of love and help I have to give to the world.  With your help, we can make this dream a reality!

ABOUT THE AUTHOR: 

I am a single mother of four kids (one in college, two in high school, and one in grade school), plus a few awesome kids I picked up along the way, five dogs, and a gecko. Eight of us live in a tiny 3 bedroom, 900 square foot apartment. On the weekends, we pack up to as many as 15 people in our little home. There is never a shortage of love and laughter in my family! When I am not busy doing mommy/ Auntie Jenni stuff or writing, I help my very active and wonderful parents in their Golden Years. 

This journey started 10 years ago with the end of my marriage. In that time, I've been through countless heartaches, short bouts of homelessness, devasting losses and frustrating unemployment. But through it all, I never stopped learning how to find relief and recovery from anxiety and depression. I never gave up on writing the book.  

Now that I got the book done, I need your help to get it published. I plan to launch the book on my 40th Birthday! 

ABOUT THE PROJECT:

Funds raised for this project will be used for start-up costs to get the book from draft to ebook/print, hire editors and formatting, purchase of ISBN, website maintenance, marketing budget, and rewards productions, as well as any unforeseen costs. 

Risks Involved with When Your Soul Screams after project has been fulfilled:

1) Something happens to my kids or extended family, and I have to take a few days or more off from working on this project to take care of them.

2) My health decides to put me down in bed for days but normally I do what I can to be productive despite health issues. (At the time of writing this, I've been on the couch all day suffering from the worst ulcer pains to-date.)

3)Production mishaps

4)Uncertainty: Sometimes things happen to the best of plans that cause disruptions and delays to any project. I am certain that I have strong coping skills and creative problem-solving skills to keep the project on task.  

Game Plan

As a single mom, I'm used to tackling all kinds of challenges. The key to responding to bumps in any well-laid plans is flexibility and adaptability without losing the integrity of the goal in mind. Constant communication with project backers is necessary. Any questions please contact me atwhenyoursoulscreams@gmail.com.

From the bottom of my heart, I'd like to thank you for taking the time to consider donating to this project. TOGETHER WE CAN HELP MANY....

Many Blessings, 

Jenn Nidoy

story:
The Rialto theatre is a hotbed of the Big Band Swing scene in Liverpool in 1946, with bands playing most nights to full crowds of youngsters looking to forget the drudgery of everyday life, rations and the ruins of the blitz. 

The Downswing Seven are The Rialto’s house band who are in the need of a new singer, much to the annoyance of George Hogg, the drummer. His disability had prevented him from seeing active service during the war, and now it’s preventing him from fulfilling his dream of fronting the band as the lead male vocal. 

Are somethings worth killing for? George certainly thinks so… 

In The Mood... For Murder is a 85000 word work of fiction. It is based in Liverpool in 1946, right after Britain was picking itself up from a brutal war. 

The Rialto (a real theatre in Liverpool, sadly was destroyed in the 1980's) is a local hotspot where the young and the not so young used to go to dance all their troubles away. 

The Downswing 7 are a local swing band, and the house band and at The Rialto. 

They are in need of a new singer, due to the deteriorating health of the current male lead vocal, but there are other troubles in the band, most of them revolving around George Hogg, the drummer, Red the owner of the club and Brian the brass section, who has a secret to keep. 

This novel is written and ready to go, I just need some funding together for the final edit, to finish off the artwork and to get the thing printed. 

As part of the rewards package I will be offering digital and physical copies of my debut novel The Twelve.

story:
The Human Nature Tarot

The Human Nature Tarot deck will be an 80 card deck, with a two extra cards in the Major Arcana, Card 22 - Beyond and a Happy Squirrel Card. The court cards will be gender neutral: Child, Warrior, Ruler and Elder, reflecting the natural cycle of life and a more inclusive gender equality narrative. It will include a 100 page guide book with images of the cards, key words from years of teaching tarot, and special notes from the photographer. Some of the photos have a story of their own!

The Human Nature Lenormand is going to be so much fun. I started reading with playing cards as a kid and the Lenormand format is that simple with more intuitive depth. There will be an extra man and woman card for gender preference and specific questions. Wildlife and landscape photos are a perfect fit for the Lenormand. I can't wait to build the Human Nature Lenormand and see them in action in a Grand Tableau!

The Human Nature Tarot Workbook is a long time coming. My students and friends have asked me for years to write a book on the tarot. Making a workbook speaks to my philosophy of hands on learning. In my classes, I guide students to create their own workbook. The Human Nature Tarot Workbook will draw from handouts and materials I use in my classes, discussions I've had with students and colleagues, and have a few pointers specific to The Human Nature Tarot. I'm partial to a 6" x 9" journal size for easier transport, and hopefully a spiral or lay flat binding for easy access. The point is to create an organized place for your  journey with the tarot. 

I'm excited to see high quality photos of nature and wildlife in a Tarot deck. Aren't you?

Something Different

I'm tired of Rider Waite Smith replays. I'm over tarot decks full of straight white people with mild expressions. I'm tired of cheesy mass produced art. I'm annoyed by decks with awesome major arcana and dead boring number cards. I'm over digital collage cards that are too chaotic to read. I'm so tired of the 6 million Lo Scarebo decks and gilded Angel Oracle cards. I love crazy wild fantasy cards, indie art collective decks and awesome theme style cards but they're not always functional to read with. 

I want cards that speak to the heart. I want high quality images of real things. Our world is beautiful and rich with meaning as it is. We don't need archaic representations to get there. The tarot is a living tool. The meanings grow with us. I want cards that have a thoughtful structure and an inclusive worldview. Most Animal and Plant Spirit decks talk about ancient mythology. Nature is not a myth. It's alive now. So is the Tarot. Let the beauty of our world speak for itself. Look the animals in their eyes. Feel the majesty of the tallest trees. Look at nature through these cards and let it speak to you. 

Who We Are

Hi! I'm Lisa MoonCat and I love Tarot. I've been reading cards and teaching tarot professionally since 2010. I run a tarot meetup in Portland, OR. I write a blog on tarot and astrology. I've been reading cards since I was a little girl. I want people to fall in love with Tarot and use it to grow as people. I've read stacks of books on the Tarot. I've played with more decks than I can remember. I published a book in 2012 called Energy Magic: A Ritual Guide where I touch briefly on Tarot in nature based Ritual practice. Nature recharges me and inspires my spiritual practice. Bringing the tarot to life through epic natural photography is a dream I've had for years. I'm lucky to know someone who travels far and wide, with a camera and an artistic eye.  

Tony Trupp is a world traveler, photographer, kayak enthusiast and lovely human being. His Spirit for adventure and careful perception are the starting place of The Human Nature Tarot. His lens captures the attitude and actions of wild creatures. The beauty of his landscape and architecture shots hits you right in the third eye. He's hiked and kayaked into some incredible remote places, been careful and patient enough to witness wildlife, and brought home treasures in the form of beautiful photographs. These images are the stuff of inspiration. A perfect body of work to build into a tool for exploring the human soul. 

What We Need & What You Get

$5000 will get the cards printed. I've found a US based printer that makes quality cards with proper card stock. The smallest print run for a custom project like this is 250 items. Add in shipping and time wrangling cards and the cost creeps up and up. 

If we get fully funded or beyond it will move up the ship date. The more funds I have up front, the sooner we get these amazing cards. I'd love to have the Tarot art to the publisher by October 2018. The Lenormand will come next and the Workbook after that. 

If we don't reach our goal, the funds will go to printing the cards and getting a website setup for regular orders. The less funding we get, the slower the cards will be in the making, cuz a girl's gotta eat.

Risks & Challenges

I've self published before. I know how much time and effort it takes. These cards want to be made. I'm going as fast as I can without compromising intention. The more funding I have, the more time I can devote to turning these images into an amazing Tarot and Lenormand and building the workbook to use them. 

Backing this project is pretty low risk. The major arcana of the Human Nature Tarot and a chunk of the minor cards are done. Indiegogo is a great platform to get the word out. I want to see these cards in action. I've started picking  cards electronically from the ones I've finished and they already read with depth and clarity. 

Share and Subscribe!

If you love the idea, but you can't fund us just yet, save it, share it, send it in an email, post it as a link, talk about it with your friend, come get a reading. If you're a more private person, check me out on Patreon under Lisa MoonCat. You can subscribe for as little as $1/mo. There are some amazing perks there, and those subscriptions help fuel this project too.

I want cards that speak to the heart. I want high quality images of real things. Our world is beautiful and rich with meaning as it is. We don't need archaic representations to get there. The tarot is a living tool. The meanings grow with us. I want cards that have a thoughtful structure and an inclusive worldview. Most Animal and Plant Spirit decks talk about ancient mythology. Nature is not a myth. It's alive now. So is the Tarot. Let the beauty of our world speak for itself. Look the animals in their eyes. Feel the majesty of the tallest trees. Look at nature through these cards and let it speak to you. 
Who We Are
Hi! I'm Lisa MoonCat and I love Tarot. I've been reading cards and teaching tarot professionally since 2010. I run a tarot meetup in Portland, OR. I write a blog on tarot and astrology. I've been reading cards since I was a little girl. I want people to fall in love with Tarot and use it to grow as people. I've read stacks of books on the Tarot. I've played with more decks than I can remember. I published a book in 2012 called Energy Magic: A Ritual Guide where I touch briefly on Tarot in nature based Ritual practice. Nature recharges me and inspires my spiritual practice. Bringing the tarot to life through epic natural photography is a dream I've had for years. I'm lucky to know someone who travels far and wide, with a camera and an artistic eye.  
Tony Trupp is a world traveler, photographer, kayak enthusiast and lovely human being. His Spirit for adventure and careful perception are the starting place of The Human Nature Tarot. His lens captures the attitude and actions of wild creatures. The beauty of his landscape and architecture shots hits you right in the third eye. He's hiked and kayaked into some incredible remote places, been careful and patient enough to witness wildlife, and brought home treasures in the form of beautiful photographs. These images are the stuff of inspiration. A perfect body of work to build into a tool for exploring the human soul. 


What We Need & What You Get
$5000 will get the cards printed. I've found a US based printer that makes quality cards with proper card stock. The smallest print run for a custom project like this is 250 items. Add in shipping and time wrangling cards and the cost creeps up and up. 
If we get fully funded or beyond it will move up the ship date. The more funds I have up front, the sooner we get these amazing cards. I'd love to have the Tarot art to the publisher by October 2018. The Lenormand will come next and the Workbook after that. 
If we don't reach our goal, the funds will go to printing the cards and getting a website setup for regular orders. The less funding we get, the slower the cards will be in the making, cuz a girl's gotta eat.

Risks & Challenges
I've self published before. I know how much time and effort it takes. These cards want to be made. I'm going as fast as I can without compromising intention. The more funding I have, the more time I can devote to turning these images into an amazing Tarot and Lenormand and building the workbook to use them. 
Backing this project is pretty low risk. The major arcana of the Human Nature Tarot and a chunk of the minor cards are done. Indiegogo is a great platform to get the word out. I want to see these cards in action. I've started picking  cards electronically from the ones I've finished and they already read with depth and clarity. 

Share and Subscribe!
If you love the idea, but you can't fund us just yet, save it, share it, send it in an email, post it as a link, talk about it with your friend, come get a reading. If you're a more private person, check me out on Patreon under Lisa MoonCat. You can subscribe for as little as $1/mo. There are some amazing perks there, and those subscriptions help fuel this project too.

story:
Resumen

 

Mi nombre es Martín Muñoz, soy padre de dos hijos, Diseñador y Escritor de novelas de aventuras, he publicado ya seis novelas con dos editoriales, una mediana y una pequeña. He representando, financiado por el consejo de la cultura, a mi país a la FIL Guadalajara, e invitado a distintas ferias Chilenas a presentar mis proyectos.

Sin embargo, las novelas en publicadas en la editorial pequeña, no pagan, y las publicadas en la editorial mediana, han resultado relativamente exitosas, pero no me han pagado lo que corresponde a los volumenes de venta que mis libros han tenido, teniendo que pagar mis pasajes y mis viaticos cada vez que es necesario promocionar mis libros (de los cuales gano el 10% de venta a librería, unos 600 pesos por ejemplar). Al se un escritor de provincia y que se arriesga con temas poco comunes, como lo son las culturas originarias de nuestro continente, las editoriales de primera línea tampoco toman en cuenta estos proyectos.

Mi sueño es ser un escritor profesional, es poder seguir investigando y sobre todo seguir difundiendo la culturas de nuestros pueblos autóctonos, mostrarle al mundo que nuestra miltología y nuestros paisajes son hermosos y vale la pena preservarlos.

Para ello, necesito convertirme en un escritor dedicado a la investigación, la escritura y la difusión de las culturas sudamericanas. Esta campaña es justamente el fundamento para construir ese sueño. 

Apoyando esta campaña, nos ayudarás a imprimir 500 libros que llevan consigo los mitos, la culturam los paisajes, la flora, la fauna y la cultura precolombina, embuelta en aventura y acción, perfecta para que los jovenes y los más adultos descubran el pasado mitico de la america austral. 

 

Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes

Para iniciar el proyecto, se necesitan al menos 500 ejemplares de la novela, que tiene 400 páginas app. Vendiendo estos ejemplares existirá capital para continuar invirtiendo, seguir investigando, escribiendo y publicando.

Le entregaremos un ejemplar a cada persona que coopere, y donaremos ejemplares a 100 colegios de escasos recursos.

Para financiar los 500 ejemplares necesitamos reunir US$4000.

En pesos Chilenos el desglose es más o menos así.

200.000 para el Editor creativo: revisaremos la estructura narrativa y la coherencia de la historia para asegurar la mejor calidad del producto.

200.000 Para la Corrección de Ortográfica.

150.000 para la portada

70.000 para la diagramación y la construcción del archivo final que se irá a imprenta.

50.000 para el envío al depósito legal, incripción e ISBN.

1,750.000 para pagar la impresión de 500 ejemplares.

 

Cada donante recibirá un ejemplar de la novela.

Los donantes exclusivos, serán mecionados en los agradecimientos.

Invitaré un café a quién se destaque ;)

 

Si la meta total no se logra, imprimiremos las copias que sean posibles con el dinero reunido.

 

El impacto

 

La literatura fantástica está plagada de dragones, elfos, enanos y heroes, todos estos seres son parte de la mitología nordica y germana. Estas historias están en el corazón más profundo de la cultura anglosajona, cuyo sustrato cultural es germano nordico. Soy un firme creyente en que nuestra mitología sudamericana, es lo suficientemente rica y potente como para dar a luz a una literatura fantástica no solo diferente y exótica, sino a una literatura fantástica con identidad americana. Tenemos como antecedente el único poema épico de nuestro continente, "La Araucana" de Alonzo de Ercilla, es tiempo de que nuestra literatura fantástica se ponga al día. Los Jinetes de milodón es la novela que continua con esta tarea, luego de El Martillo de Pillan, mi primera novela. Es tiempo de rescatar lo nuestro, de rescatar la mitad indígena que todos lo americanos llevamos dentro, y darnos cuenta del verdadero valor de nuestra cultura mestiza.

 Lo hice antes con "El Martillo de Pillan" recibiendo muy buenas críticas. He sido capas de vender más de 400 copias de la primera novela de zombies chilena, Evento Z, Zombies en Valparaíso, esta va a ser mi séptimo libro, tengo la experiencia y la pasión de difundir nuestra asombrosa cultura, estoy seguro que con su ayuda, las tradiciones latioamericas lograrán trascender y darse a conocer en el mundo.  
 

Riesgos y desafíos

 La novela está escrita y solo se necesita corregir, diagramar e imprimir para difundir al mundo hispanohablante, la cultura y la mitología de los pueblos originarios de américa del sur.

Los mayores riesgos son la falta de ventas, sin embargo, siempre podemos regalar ejemplares a colegios de escasos recursos y bibliotecas públicas.

 

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

Si no puedes colaborar con dinero, no significa que no puedes ayudar: Por favor, difunde esta campaña y que genere eco.Recuerda utilizar herramientas para compartir de Indiegogo.

story:
• Hello. My name is Annette McFarlane, I have many years of experience working with and observing children of all ages. At about age 12, I started working with kids, and have been doing so my entire adult life. I have a passion to teach children the Word of God and teach Sunday school classes. I believe it's crucial for kids to develop their own relationship with the Lord Jesus Christ. For the past 20 years, I have kept a journal of poems and short songs the Lord placed on my heart to sing to young children in Sunday school. I also completed a study during college on memorization and rhyme and how they correlate. I won an award for my thesis and study. The book, “Miss Purtell’s Challenge,” illustrates my passion for seeing children come to faith in Christ and live victoriously.  My daughter, Jaime Hilton, has a Christian CD for kids and a butterfly video on youtube. 
  • Here is what your contribution will help achieve: Christian Faith Publishing will be publishing this book. The publisher’s responsibilities will include handling the cover (the illustrations on this web site are not the ones that will be used for this book) and page design, furnishing the illustrations, facilitating the printing of the book and marketing the book. Plans are for the book to be distributed through national bookstores, including Barnes & Nobel as well as Christian distributors such as Spring Arbor.
  • A key concept behind “Miss Purtell’s Challenge” is kids reading, memorizing and applying scriptures to issues they face in their daily lives. I used rhyme, rap, songs, and poems to help kids easily memorize key scriptures, which will transform their lives,The poems, songs and raps are all inspired by the Spirit of God. When children read and hear poetry, rap and songs, they are encouraged to be creative as well. Poetry fills the mind with new ways of communicating ideas, thoughts and feelings. For young people, who are daily learning and growing in this ability, this book will help produce spiritual, academic and emotional benefits. 
  • The plan is this will be the first of possible sequels. 

What makes CFP a Christian Publisher other than its name?

Christian Faith Publishing is one of the largest publishers in North America supporting Christian authors. Unlike other publishing houses, CFP has a strict guideline on what is published. CFP seeks to publish books that further the kingdom of Christ or deliver a positive message. While CPF wants its authors’ content to be in the hands of everyone, they also want to deliver it to the retail book locations Christians visit frequently. Their partnership with Ingram and Spring Arbor allows them access to distribute titles into Family Christian and Lifeway locations as well as secular retail markets such as Barnes & Noble.

https://www.christianfaithpublishing.com/faq/

“Our mission at Christian Faith Publishing is to discover and publish Christian authors who desire to make the greatest impact possible through the written word.

Publish with us today and experience the CFP difference!

Christian Faith Publishing has partnered with North America’s largest book distributors, Ingram and Spring Arbor. This partnership allows all titles published by CFP to be available for sale in Christian based and mainline retail outlets both in North America and internationally.  All CFP titles are also converted to eBook format and sold online where an increasing number of sales are generated.”

https://www.christianfaithpublishing.com/about

We need $4,000 to make this book happen.

  • CFP is a member of BBB and can be trusted.
  • The unique perks? You will get a copy of “Miss Purtell’s Challenge” hardcover faith-giving children’s book if you give at least $25.  This is so exciting because it is furthering the Kingdom of God. I would eventually like to see this translated into different languages.
  • If you give $50 or more you can have the book and a recording of me reading it; this will include the songs and raps the children in the story created.

Your Impact is great!

 This project is valuable to the Kingdom of God and will help contribute to a needed cause for the entire world because it will go internationally. I hope to eventually get in translated to different languages. I hope to have more series in years to come. Thank you for giving.

story:
Short Summary

Hi!  We are Kathleen Dent and Alli DePuy, educators and owners of Inspired Classroom and Dr. Michael Sawaya of Sinopah Wildlife Research Associates.  We live and work in the wilds of Montana and have collaborated on our book, Bear in the Bathtub.  

As educators, Alli and Kathleen, create interactive experiences to engage students in K-12 in the work of the world.  Dr. Sawaya is a wildlife researcher studying bears, among other creatures, to try to understand animal behavior.  His fascinating study about bears spending time in ponds, lakes, and stock tanks to cool off in order to conserve fat supplies in late summer prior to denning inspired BEAR IN THE BATHTUB.   Kids LOVE this topic and are hungry to know more about our world, the changes happening, and the impact changes are making on our wildlife.  

Rather than a straight non-fiction book, we invited student voice by opening up an art contest to students across the country, asking them to imagine what bears would be doing in bathtubs.  The relatable fiction story and original artwork about Mia, her adventures, and a bear that resides in her bathtub introduces the concept of bear biology in a creative way.  Then we follow it up with the explanation of bear behavior in Yellowstone National Park from Dr. Sawaya's recent study.

This passion project is an extension of the work the three of us do every day.   It is our life's work, it needs doing, and the positive impact on a generation of children who may or may not have contact with the natural world is extremely important.  If kids are not curious and are not seeking to understand, how can they care and protect?  

What We Need & What You Get

Both Inspired Classroom and Sinopah Wildlife Research Associates are small, boot-strapped businesses.  Most of our income comes from projects with clients or grant funding.  In addition, our missions include giving back to our world, so we have determined that part of the proceeds of the sale of Bear in the Bathtub will go to the protection of bear habitat in our neck of the woods.   With distribution and retail costs, that doesn't leave much to pay for printing.  But we didn't want to drop the idea--it is too important to our mission--so the three of us made a commitment to print 3000 books.  To do this, we had to take out a small loan and dip into our personal pockets.  

We are asking for $5,000 to help defray part of the printing costs and pay back the loan. Anything we make from this campaign will go toward those costs. 

We would love to have you join us as collaborators on this collaborative project!  If you contribute a minimum of $15, you will receive a copy of BEAR IN THE BATHTUB signed by all three authors!  What could be better?  It is a great addition to your library and a fun way to take a quick trip to the great outdoors, 

The Impact

Translating the world to kids in a real way is one of the most important responsibilities all adults have.  You can be part of this important work by supporting our crazy project.  The BEAR IN THE BATHTUB project is completed.  It is at the printers, so IT IS HAPPENING.  Other similar collaborations are in the works too.  It is all part of the plan to get authentic information into kids hands--not something nice--SOMETHING NECESSARY! 

Risks & Challenges

Again, we have made a commitment to print this book.  It is a stretch for both of our businesses to financially take on.   We want to be sure we can produce passion projects like this that further our missions in the future but need a bit of support right now to minimize the financial pinch.  Anything you can do would be greatly appreciated.

Other Ways You Can Help

Spreading the word about BEAR IN THE BATHTUB in your social media, person to person or business networks is GREAT!  It makes a great gift for the little person in your life, a great donation to your local elementary school library or a present for a favorite teacher.  It will be for sale on Amazon and at inspiredclassroom.com soon.  Also, Indiegogo has share tools to make it easy to get the word out.  

.

story:
Youths Empowered For Your Success: Take The Right Action Today For Your Success Tomorrow

 

How My Youth Empowerment Mission Got Started

Growing up, I was always told that I was different because I did not do what everybody else was doing. As I grew older, I realized that youths in general can do much more than what they were doing. I became more conscious of the self-destructive path so many youths were on. 

Hence, at 11 years old I asked my parents permission to get on social media with one aim in mind and that was to post inspirational message to reach out to my peers. At 12 years old, I wanted to do more to reach more youths, so I started writing Youths Empowered For success but did not have the means to get out to my peers so I sat on it whilst still giving value to my peers via social media. On my 15th birthday last November, I created 3 journals to help my peers to be more organized and focused. To learn more about me please go here.

 

At the start of 2019, I realized that rather than decreasing, bullying and suicide among teens were on the increase so I decided that It was time to get my book Youths Empowered For Success out to youths. As a result, I decided that I would seek your help to get my book out to youths all over because I know the power of youths empowering youths.  

 

In February, 2019 I launched Youth Empowerment Podcast which inspires, empowers and give business ideas to youths to ensure they take the right action today for the success they want tomorrow.

There are so many youths out there now who are yearning to see an inspiring book from their peers but there aren't many out there. This is why I'm so passionate to get this book out to youths. I want to help my generation to ensure we have the kind of future we all want to live in. Yes, I want to inspire as many youths as possible to ensure they take the right actions today to have the success they want tomorrow. Youths can connect with me on social media for lots of value @TerrenceFaganJr and a free Facebook group (Youth Empowered For Success) I just created just for youths. Join here!

Are you ready to partner with me on this mission? Let us make this happen together!

 

The Campaign

What We Need & What You Get

With your support, I will be able to get my book Youths Empowered For Success out to many youths all over.  Even at 15 years old, I know the importance of starting to take the right action now and that's what I want to see from more of my peers. This is why I'm so passionate about this mission. With your help, I will be able to raise $30,000 to do the following:

  • To pay for the editing and formatting of this book.
  • To pay for the printing of the first batch of books.
  • To pay for shipping and handling to get the books out to you, youths, schools and youth organizations.
  • To pay for help to ensure the books are shipped out on time.
  • To pay for Indiegogo fees
  • To pay credit card fees and other fees associated with this launch

 

You can support my campaign by  pre-ordering "Youth Empowered For Success" book and "My Daily Action Planner" for yourself or for local or international schools or youth organizations. The aim of this mission is to reach 5,000,000 youths over the next 12 months.

Even at 15 years old, I know the importance of proper planning and with the aid of my team, we have put a lot in place to make this happen. 

 

The Impact Of This Project

  • When you support me on this youth empowerment mission, we are creating a lasting impact which has a dominate effect on society. To build a better society and to preserve our future, we must start with our youths.
  • More youths will have access to a valuable resource written by one of their own who they will feel more comfortable to listen to. (you can support a school or youth organization in your local area by purchasing books for them. I will ship to any school or organization of your choice)
  • Youths will be inspired to do more to achieve more now rather than later.
  • When more youths take action to engage and connect with the right things and people thy will achieve more which in turn has a positive effect on society. (I just created an accountability FB group for youths, "Youths Empowered For Success" pl send your youths to join for daily inspiration and empowerment to propel immediate action)

I have published 3 journals and action planners which are already creating an impact on my peers. They are kept organized and focused on the important tasks they have to do.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are reading this and you are not able to contribute, I still appreciate your help in other ways like: 

  • helping me to get the word out among your social and real friends, families and well wishers
  • using the Indiegogo share tools and share on social media!

 

Risks & Challenges

I will have many shipments of books to send out to youths and to prevent a backlog, we have already put persons on standby to mitigate against challenges we might have.

 

Let's Make This Happen

I thank you so much for your support to get Youths Empowered For Success book out to thousands if not millions of youths who would love to be inspired by their peer to take the right action today to ensure they have the success they want tomorrow. 

Youths are depending on us for this. Let us accomplish this mission together! Let's go!
story_txt:
Youths Empowered For Your Success: Take The Right Action Today For Your Success Tomorrow
 
How My Youth Empowerment Mission Got Started
Growing up, I was always told that I was different because I did not do what everybody else was doing. As I grew older, I realized that youths in general can do much more than what they were doing. I became more conscious of the self-destructive path so many youths were on. 
Hence, at 11 years old I asked my parents permission to get on social media with one aim in mind and that was to post inspirational message to reach out to my peers. At 12 years old, I wanted to do more to reach more youths, so I started writing Youths Empowered For success but did not have the means to get out to my peers so I sat on it whilst still giving value to my peers via social media. story:
Short Summary

"Unmask Me" gives an element of play using opening paper flaps. This activity, combined with easy reading entertains the child with a "big reveal" under each mask. The goal is to help children think about their peers in and out of the classroom. What could our face masks be hiding? What are we missing about each other by wearing masks?

I am a caricature artist, as well as a designer/author. I've drawn thousands of faces in my 25 years as a professional caricaturist, and every person's face tells a story. Faces are important. The eyes might be the windows to the soul, but our faces communicate more clearly what the eyes want to express. 

I look forward to the day we can stop hiding behind our masks, free to be, and free to see each other again!

I hope very much that if you identify with the message of this book, you will contribute and/or share this campaign on your social media platform.

What We Need

The funds received from this campaign will cover the following printing/production costs:

  • Cost of printing 500 copies (printing by PrintNinja.com) for soft cover books with full color printing and paper flaps inside (16-page interior with 7 paper flap attachments).
  • Shipping costs of 500 books from printer
  • Cost for physical proofing from printer

Book Description:

The book will be soft cover, saddle stitched, with paper flaps inside which open & close. It is full color, overall. I'm using PrintNinja.com as my printer for production.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute financially, please consider the following to help my campaign:

  • Share this campaign on your social media accounts or email!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Molise Matters

I need your help to tell the world more about Molise and all it has to offer. 

Your money will enable me to dedicate my time to writing

To buy new video equipment 

To cover travel costs 

To cover production and printing costs for an exhibition

The Impact

Your money will help me make an impact on the wonderful magical area of Molise. 

Share a little corner of Italy with me, and learn it's secrets 

The Challenges

I have to admit one of the challenges is COVID 19 as it means you might not be able to actually climb the hillsides or see the churches here in the midst of Italy

But I can bring it to you, so you can share Molise from your chair wherever you are

 

 You Can Help

By donating me even a few pounds or by following my progress, watching the films and videos and by sharing this wonderful region with your friends and family

Molise does matter

story:
IDENTIDAD VENEZUELA EN 1000 ROSTROS

 

Un libro que revela a los lectores la identidad de Venezuela a través de 1000 personajes.

Desde lo protagónico o el anonimato, el libro reúne a venezolanos de diversa índole, todos con una historia que contar, y cuyo legado les otorga un lugar inobjetable en esta obra.

Personajes que son un fragmento de Venezuela, pero que individual y colectivamente interpretan el sincretismo de su cultura, idiosincrasia y tradición.

Un libro que cuenta no sólo con personas tan emblemáticas como Carlos Cruz Diez, Rafael Cadenas, José Antonio Abreu, Sofía Ímber, Oscar D’León, Armando Scannone, Simón Díaz, Lila Morillo, Luís Aparicio, Omar Vizquel o Juan Arango; sino también con otros personajes, menos conocidos tal vez, pero relevantes en la conformación de la identidad del venezolano. Entre ellos, Baruj Benacerraf, primer Premio Nobel de Medicina; Marko Markof, diseñador del empaque de Harina P.A.N;  Francisco Rodríguez, primer medallista de Oro olímpico nacional, o Luis Cruz, compositor de la canción tradicional venezolana de las fiestas de cumpleaños: «¡Ay, qué noche tan preciosa!». Todos reunidos en este libro y de quienes podrán conocer más con esta publicación.

Identidad Venezuela en 1000 Rostros es un libro de gran valor documental, periodístico y fotográfico que expresa desde múltiples vistas la identidad de Venezuela y la memoria de un país.

Queremos con tu apoyo continuar mostrando a través de nuestra plataforma PROYECTO IDENTIDAD, la identidad de Venezuela y los venezolanos.

Somos un equipo liderado por el periodista Gil Molina y el ingeniero Oscar Burguillos, quienes dirigen ésta y otras iniciativas para seguir haciendo visible lo positivo, aquello que merece ser recordado y replicado.

Apóyanos con esta tercera edición impresa actualizada y de colección, imprescindible para todos los venezolanos dentro y fuera del país.

Conviértete en nuestro aliado, y juntos sigamos construyendo identidad.

___

Al contribuir con la 3ª edición impresa, recibirás la 1ª edición del libro Identidad Venezuela en 1000 Rostros en formato digital.


WEB: www.proyecto-identidad.com

story:
Hello Family and Freinds. You all know I have dreamed of this project becoming a reality. I am humbled by the anticipation that there has been for this story and the new characters that are brought to life in the pages of this book. I am now coming to all of you in hopes that you can help to get this to the starting line. Please show support and you will receive a free digital copy of the book and a collector's autograph picture of the main character with a werewolf. Thank you

Please share. There will be an extra surprise for those who share this fund me. Please type done in the comments

story:
A book about perseverance, strength, and resilience for children!  

What if we could help children trust their inner voices and become more resilient, all while advocating for other children to have a better life?

Fernanda de Oliveira, Laura Dall'Agata, and Evelyne Keomian have worked on this children’s book to help make that possible.

E is a young girl born into a family of 7 children in the Yacouba tribe in Cote D’Ivoire. They don’t have much . . . but they have deep cultural beliefs that are preventing E from doing the things she desires to do the most: go to school, learn to read, and learn 

to write so that she can improve her life and the life of her mother. 

E’s inner voice, her Chief Encouragement Officer, whisperer of encouragement that pushes E to be BOLD and reach for her dream.

Together, Lioness and E will find a way to take a stand to show her family and her tribe that it’s possible for a girl to go to school and become anything she aspires to be!

When I founded the Karat School Project, I knew I had to tell people why I am so passionate about girls’ education — I had to share my story. 

In every interview, people asked me “What kept you going when everyone around you told you it wasn't possible?”

Growing up I didn’t have a role model. I never saw a character in a book who I could identify with to help me dream of a better future. But I knew I wanted something different, and I heard a voice inside of me, pushing me to reach for that which was unattainable. 

At seven years old, I was selling water on market days to raise money to buy a pencil and a notebook.

We tell our children that they can be whatever they want to be. But in the face of adversity and hardship, children have limited life experiences to help them know what’s true. We all have a small voice inside of us that tells us to keep going or to give up. 

Lioness E will teach children to identify their positive inner voice and use it to push past hardships with a poetic storytelling style and stunning illustrations.

It’s a fact that children of color are underrepresented in books. Luckily, this is changing and Lioness E will help BICOP and marginalized children see the reflection of themselves in the hero of a story. 

Publishing this book will empower me as a black author to tell more of my story. And investing in this project will enable the entire team of minority females working on it to see their work become available to the world.

In addition, proceeds from this book will support the mission of the Karat School Project to help break the cycle of extreme poverty for children and women through education. 

Bringing this book to life has been a learning experience for me! As you may know, I founded the Karat School Project to provide education to all children because education changed my life. I self-funded the first school lunch with my very little life savings, and I have been working as a volunteer Executive Director since 2018. Today, I know that I do not have to do it all by myself.

By pre-ordering a copy of Lioness E, you will help this book come to life.

Your funds will be used to pay for illustrations, printing, and other upfront costs related to producing and distributing the book. Every dollar counts and I’m counting on YOU!

In addition, proceeds from this book will be supporting the mission of the Karat School Project to help break the cycle of extreme poverty for children and women through education.

We have exciting stretch goals to make this book an amazing experience for you! Check this out!

$7,000 - Unlock the Singing

Imagine this poetic book being sung with African drumming!

Unlocking this will enable us to send our talented writer, Feliz, to the studio to record the musical version of Lioness E with traditional African rhythm drumming. We will include the QR code in all of the books and make the song downloadable for you to enjoy on your car rides and in your classroom.

$10,000 - Unlock No More Backload

A lot goes into producing a children's book. This is not my daytime job. So, of course, I had no idea before I embarked on this journey. Luckily, I have been blessed with a team that has agreed to backload a lot of their cost to see this book come to life.

By unlocking this stretch goal, we can invest more in the upfront costs. This will mean the female entrepreneurs working on this project will be paid what they are worth for their work. We will not have to sacrifice printing quality. And more funding will go toward the mission as soon we are done paying for the production cost.

 $12,000 - Let's Start a Movement

We all need to be reminded about how AMAZING we are! And magnets and other gadgets have a magical way of doing that!

Reaching this goal will enable us to pay for the production of the book and add some gadget designs for all backers at a certain level.

We will design an “I’m a Lioness” magnet for every backer from the Buy A Book level (Physical rewards Only), Lioness E stickers, and more for lunch boxes and water bottle swag.

Let’s remind our children that they are Lions & Lionesses!!!

story:
Hi! I'm Maria 'Peacock' Barrett and I'm a Wiccan Priestess. Since 1989, I have been worshiping Nature and the God and Goddess. This path has transformed me into a mindful, imaginative, enlightened, and magickal being and has built a real connection between myself and the Divine. During my time in the Craft, I was blessed and inspired to create and save many rituals and celebrations marking the Seasons of the Year and also giving thanks for all that the Creator has given us. I have also been blessed to share those experiences with others of my faith, learning a lot about the Collective Consciousness of Mankind and how each of us can have an influence on things large and small that impact our future.

Over the last two years, I have used these rituals and celebrations to create a book that is both a how-to for beginners as well as an autobiography of my journey. In it, I share the life events I've celebrated with others, some of the rituals I've performed, and some of the life lessons I learned along the way. You will find examples of actual rituals that I have performed in the past, exercises for those who wish to put their feet on this path and see where it leads, and some insight into the real truths that I have encountered in my pursuit of a more spiritual life. I have tried to tell my story in a light-hearted way, engaging the reader to envision themselves in my shoes as I walked a road less traveled.

In my past, I have also been the recipient of repeating prophetic dreams. As a child, they were like small 'deja vous' moments that occurred in real time shortly after I dreamed of an event or encounter. As I grew older, these dreams became more persistent and complex and always served as a sign that I should be 'doing something', making a decision or taking on a task that seemed uncertain until the 'deja vous' moment would happen again and i knew that I was headed in the right direction.

For the 6 years prior to this completion of this book, I had been having the same recurring dream. As I am aware of this pattern in my past, I would speak to the Gods each night as I lay my head down to sleep to give me just a little more so that I would understand what it was trying to say to me. Then, 2 years ago, I sat at the computer and began writing. About half way through this project, when I knew without a doubt that I was going to finish the book, the dreams stopped! I can say without a doubt that this is the path that my feet were supposed to be on. I think that this book can make a difference for people who want to believe in the sanctity of Nature, the future of a peaceful and united human race, and a God that is personal and approachable, within them as much as anywhere else in the Universe.

This book has actually been approved for publishing by 3 separate firms. As an unpublished author, I need start-up capital. I am hoping that there are those of you out there who have walked a road less traveled, who have stood awestruck at the beauty and miracle of Nature, who have dreamed of a project that would help others, or who have aspired to make a difference in the world that will donate to get this book on shelves. Please examine your heart and your budget and see if you can help me complete the last phase of this dream!
