story:
Short Summary

The Storyline, or actually a Group of Storylines will be Translated into English (from Finnish) when completing the Startup of the First 10 Books Translation Project all done by me.

The First 10 Books Translation Project is a remarkable starter for publishing all the books of my "Early Production" written in Finnish, by completing the first 10 translations out of over 50 books.

Five book series of the project, the first two books of each series will get continuing publications in the future. Plus the other books and book series of the "Early Production" collection as well.

“In an unseen attempt of literature, facing a phenomenal personal Mission Impossible to translate over 50 books of the "Early Production", written in my prior native language, Finnish, and now translated to a current "native" language, English, being then completed in two different languages.”

Well... "How to eat an elephant? One spoonful at a time."
It means by completing one book at the time.

"I have written all those books so I will translate them too, even so it seems like a Mission Impossible at first, but by the time being, one book at the time, all the books will be completed and published. That's my Big Dream, always has been."



The Story of Storylines

“By the way, there is a unique story about every book, book series and writer personas which belong to the project. And that makes it great, it being a Story of Storylines.”

The Wild Royce character I created and the Storyline I wrote, 8 books in total for now, were for the Love of my 4 Children, dedicated to them, just like all the other children’s book series were.

The beginning of the entire Family of the Book Series was created in the time when we were “Living on the Beach”. An unforgettable wonderful Family Lifestyle of Travelers, Beach-life, the world being our playground, with freedom of playful joyfulness and infinite fictive creation of stories.


WILD ROYCE Series by Will Willeroy

Our Kids have always been interested in animals and been taking care of all kinds of little nature creatures. They were very interested in crocodiles, lizards, dinosaurs as well as all the animals and the nature.

That is why I wrote an adventure where a little child is living and adventuring with animals, Wild Royce with a Great Crocodile friend called Big Daddy, (a character of a real crocodile we once met in Spain, one of the biggest and oldest crocodile in the world), among numerous other animal friends.


ROYCE PIROT Series by Will Willeroy

The Royce Pirot series is kind a continuing Storyline from the Wild Royce series Storyline. The storyline (10 books for now) emerges also from my Children being interested in the pirates and the history of them, and also from the seaside beach-life we were living by our hearts.

One of the creator’s secrets is that, “Please keep the secret”, Wild Royce and Royce Pirot are actually the same person, just in at a different age and time.

The Black Beard found a young boy, later named as Royce Pirot, at the Caribbean Seas drifting with his little wrecked boat...

This finding comes sometime after Wild Royce finally took the risk to head off from his island, towards the sea horizon and new adventures, with his little boat in which he had wrecked onto his Paradian Paradise Island years ago when being a little boy.

Royce Pirot's adventures are full of action, living and fighting with pirates, commanding his own pirate ship and a grew of young children, legendary Young Pirates, sailing the Caribbean Seas.


REMAX Series by Dino X.

The Remax Series comes from my Kids interest to Dinosaurs. I wanted to write a storyline of a young boy called Max, adventuring in the unpredictable prehistoric world with great and dangerous prehistoric animals, and especially with a friendship with the great friend of Tyrannosaur Rex. 

By their actions based on their brave hearts they came to be the Kings of the Dinoxworld, an adventurous brave partnership, exploring the most unpredictable and unknown human-prehistoric-dinosaur-world, in a fictional life, at the time as the world was back then when there were the people living with prehistoric mammals, being the world of dinosaurs, human tribes, ancient civilizations and the secrets of the Mother Nature.

Once again a creator’s secret is that, “Please keep the secret”, Wild Royce’s fascinating cave art findings, when exploring his island and discovering its secrets, were created and first appeared, long, long time ago, in the storyline of Remax by prehistoric explorer Max.


ROYAL Series by Jaron Piroy

The Book Series Family continues with the storyline of Royal.

A creator’s secret is, once again, “Please keep the secret”, that a huge treasury, very old shipwreck, down at the sea bottom, deep there in where he was diving with his life in danger, a discovery was made and riches following from that lucky strike…

The secret is that the shipwreck Royal discovered, the huge treasury, was actually created by Royce Pirot’s great efforts and fights, when he was racing against the Black Beard, their Great Treasury Hunt rallying on the Caribbean Seas, against each other and the other Pirates as well, when looking for hidden Pirate Treasuries, growing the riches in their ship’s holds.

With the same rightness and values as in every storyline, in this Great Story Family of Storylines, is Royal investing his riches to fight for rightness against injustice, wrongdoers, criminal organizations and even dictatorial governments, to correct terrors, abuses, destruction and criminality.


QUEEN Series by Mirella Magine

The Book Series Family gets its Queen, when Dynacos, a handsome Frenchman, discovers a Young fascinating beauty, called Queen, at the streets of the New York. Impressive success follows when Queen explores her new lifestyle and surges on the top of the Fashion World. 

By the way, the very first Queen book, a young beauty’s success with world of fashion elements and romance, the beginning of the storyline of Queen, was written for, with dedicated order of my dear companion of life for over 20 years now, “in the whirl of the life of an artistry”, and a loving mother of our the most loved Children.

Queen’s future adventures, as well as her fascinating ancestry, her eagerness for thrill, taking risks when facing dangers, and unbelievable happenings within the glamorous Fashion World, its riches and beauties, and everything related to that, suits so well together with the principles of charming and captivating Dynacos…

The man with secrecy of his origins and uncertainty of his powers and wealth sources, with the related mystery of the other great “invisible” character, Royal…



Author's Role Play



I have written fairly over 50 books with different writer names. Here is why...

I love movies, books, good stories and visual experiences, as well as real life experiences. I have always been highly admiring authors as well as movie stars, story creators and producers, characters and actors, especially how brilliantly they can play their roles as being real.

With all of my appreciation and esteem to all of them…

That is how I can see my writing creation experience – Living in a real-time-movie.

My way to write and to create the story is highly intuitive, intensive and interactive. My way is to go in to a movie-kind of a role play in my mind, being in the scenery of the story, start creating, exploring in the characters role, as in a movie.

Experiencing with the character, in his role, I am experiencing the story creation and happening as a real-time-experience. For me it is all real, actual experience, in a present time, everything appearing as new to me, real-time-reality, when living in my imagination.

My way to create is highly intensive, as a real 5D visual experience, full-fiction-reality, adventuring in the real-time-story-creation, being deeply concentrated, sometimes as if in a trance.

Adventuring in the Creation of my “Fancy Galaxy Imaginarium” I am, at the very moment, enjoying events, excited about tension, laughing at events out loud when something sudden and funny happens, sweating when running, rushing on and having as well sweet as hard times…

And my fingers are tapping the story happenings down with a high speed typing… Me in, the story creation advancing at the same time when my fingertips are printing it out from the deeps of my creative Imaginarium, fictional infinity, transmitting by a mind-galactic hyper-loop from the Fancy Galaxy, appearing on my computer screen. Later on, so often wondering when reading the story afterwards "was it me who wrote this?"

Okay, that is my way to create and experience the stories. I Love It! I really do.

All of the author names of mine, such as Jaron Piroy, Will Willeroy, Dino X., Mirella Magine, J.J.Trywell and others… are like director roles of the movie-like-story creation to me.

They are author names, Role Play Characters, everyone specialized to direct with their specific style and interests... directing the shooting according to the screenplay of filming.

And as well as every director, every movie done and the production, is a creation, so are my Author Role Plays.

In every scene, chapter, play, shooting, framing and creation I put a big part of me in it, as a director, a main character and often in some side roles too. As said, I Love It! All, over and over again...

It’s a Big Deal to me, giving me Big Times, and I hope you’ll enjoy then too.

“The more real the experience of the story is, the better it is.”



Multilingual Indie Author Family

All the 50+ books published this far I have published by my own publishing deeds as being an independent – Indie Author.

The WOWBOOKS is my publishing brand and the logic is simple…

WoW – World of Words. A logo has been illustrated to describe the thinking of my creation. And what’s the best in it, the logo’s design has done by my son Miro when he was 10 years old. A little o in between two capital W letters, ultimate elements ice and fire, is the source of my Imaginarium called The Fancy Galaxy. That is where I am adventuring when bursting out stories…

I Love writing and creating... That is my principal motive of doing my job. I just love it, and that is why I keep writing.

But selling, marketing and promoting, all that is a very tough task for me. I always thought “if I would just write”. My thinking is that everyone should make what they like the most, and my choice is very clear.

But, more buts... At the moment I am keen to do more. I want to write, more and more, as much as before in my prior native language Finnish, now in my current "new native" language English. But I also want to do as much as I can for the public works. Still, pro sales and marketing persons are the best to do their job, but I want to be connected, cooperate and see the world of literature at its fullest.

"Early 50+ Books” I have written in Finnish, as it was the most comfortable writing language of mine before… Even though we have been living in France and Spain the most of the time for over 12 years now, traveling, and even though the Family is multilingual primarily in English and German, with fluent Finnish, well also French and Spanish knowledge (plus some other languages too).

The reason we spoke Finnish before was for teaching it to our children, and also it was used for homeschooling partly in Finnish, and for maintaining it in some practical level. Earlier, we used to speak Finnish it only being as our home-language and English we spoke with our friends. But then we quit Finnish entirely, using only English, it being more comfortable for us and also practical in every way, with the use of some other languages of and for our daily living environments and connections.

And now also, personally, entirely, I have quit writing in my previous native language Finnish too, a few years ago, transforming step by step to write in English as it being my "new native” language, as well for spoken as written and also for expression of my literary arts. Practically, a complete transformation such like that is quite a big challenge for a pro writer, but I have done my move without a return…

And I love it, I always did. Even back then when I wrote in Finnish I was partly thinking in English, actually complicating and often mixing both languages, being unsure of any, making it “characteristic”, as kind of English expression in my books in Finnish has been always recognizable. My books have well been unique and personal in Finnish, and that is how it will be also in English, being the fact I just have to accept. But now and also in the future being, I am only writing with one language, English, making it well comfortable for me.

In Finland, being a real Pro Indie Author is very exceptional. Principally, almost all the pro literacy in Finland is supported and done by governmental allowances and also mostly bought by governmental instances, especially libraries. There are very limited private markets as a real business, if any at all, when talking about the literature, simply because the markets are so small within a nation of only about 5 million people.

But even so the fact is, the only real thing I was ever interested in has been publishing in English, worldwide, and also internationally in some other main world languages when it will be possible, I wanted to product and publish a big bunch of my books in Finnish too

As the literacy in Finland is deeply old fashioned and supported by the government, it is mostly all the money pouring in for insiders, and especially when being different and extremely productive, the only choice was to make it all on my own. I have been like that all of my life “very much indie of everything” and that is how I wanted to product my books too. I wanted to learn the whole chain of the book production.

I have never received any penny of any literacy allowances, that being a big difference compared to most of the authors in Finland, I have done it all by my own money by selling books and in “indie-artistic” ways. I love being an artist and artistic too. And I am proud of it, proud of being a pure Indie Author.

Now, when considering publishing worldwide, in English and perhaps with some other main languages too, I want to connect and cooperate. I want to “Make It Big” still being a real Indie Author, but with cooperation with as many as possible.

The most what I want is to connect with the people among the literature, authors and all the other working within the same fashion than me. I want to see and experience the World of Words, more and more.

“Indie Author, that’s what I’ve always been, I am, and how it will be.”



Characteristics - Funding for

  • Translation by Jarno (from Finnish to English) first 10 Books out of the production of 50+ books.
  • Fund seeking and promotion for the project - 60 days.
  • Project in process for 10 months.
  • New cover illustrations for all 10 books by Indie illustrators or Jarno.
  • Publishing all 10 books in eBooks.
  • New publication every 1 to 2 months.
  • First book published and delivered 15.03.2016.
  • The project completed and all 10 books published and delivered by 15.12.2016.

Contributor - Collector Perks

Everyone contributing will receive eBook(s) by the amount of contribution. It's your choice which book or books you choose for 1 dollar a book. You can also just contribute without receiving any.
  • Books will be delivered by the publishing dates scheduled.
  • You’ll choose which books you’ll want to receive by the amount of your contribution for 1 dollar per book.
  • 1 dollar 1 book, 5 dollars 5 books, 10 dollars 10 books.
  • You can also contribute more still receiving 10 books in total.

Impact

"You make me to make it". With your support I'll make it. 

All kind of support helps and makes my day when continuing to complete the project. Even so as determined as I want to see myself, I need support from others as well as everyone does.

The project is a remarkable start for my personal "Mission Impossible". Re-creation in English for my 50+ early books written in Finnish.

Personally, a Big Deal and a Big Dream is to translate and publish all of my early 50+ books which have been published in Finnish in next 5 years, plus quite a bunch of the books more that are still unpublished...

"I know it's way too much, but dreaming is easy and I love dreaming."

¨But one thing is for sure, I'll complete these first 10 books, and then I'll see"


Other Ways You Can Help

When wondering if there are other ways you can show your support without contributing? Well, there are! You can help:

  • Tell your friends! Share the campaign on Facebook, Twitter, or your social media platform of choice.
  • If you are a reviewer or reporter, you have a blog or a podcast, consider interviewing me during or after the project! It's my pleasure to tell the story of anything wanted.
  • I am seeking cover illustrators as all the books published in the future, by the project plus new books coming, will get a new cover design, so please let me know if you know one or contact if you are a designer.
  • I am also seeking proofreaders (US Eng) as all the books will need a proper proofreading to be edited and completed for publishing, even so I will publish all the books completed by myself for now, but at once there is an option to have a new edition trimmed by pro editors I will make it. I'm a writer and creator fitted with an enormous imagination, and even though I am working only in English nowadays, I definitely need cooperation with proofreaders to make it pro.
  • I am also seeking pro marketers, author's agents or any other helpful cooperation for marketing and to boost sales. "I am a tool, just need someone to wrench."
  • I am also seeking cooperation for my new production too to ease my way. It is a very hard job to do it all by myself... As fitted with extraordinary productivity (several books a year) thanks to my great love of writing, favor of living and experiencing in my interactive creation process, in the Fancy Galaxy Imaginarium... Well, I wish I would just write.


    Thank you so much in advance for backing this crowdfunding campaign! Your support matters!



    Publishing Timetable

    12.02.2016 - 12.04.2016 / "A Dollar A Book" Translation Project fund seeking.

    12.02.2016 - 12.12.2016 / "A Dollar A Book" translation process for next 10 months. (I have already translated two books which will be published at first.)

    15.03.2016 / The first book "Wild Royce 1" will be published.

    15.12.2016 / All 10 books will be published.

    15.03.2016 / Publishing Book 1 / Wild Royce 1 - "Paradian Paradise Island 1"

    15.04.2016 / Publishing Book 2 / Wild Royce 2 - "Paradian Paradise Island 2"

    15.05.2016 / Publishing Book 3 / Royce Pirot 1 - "Freedom - Young Pirates 1"

    15.06.2016 / Publishing Book 4 / Royce Pirot 2 - "Freedom - Young Pirates 2"

    15.07.2016 / Publishing Book 5 / Remax 1 - "Kings of the Dinoxworld 1"

    15.08.2016 / Publishing Book 6 / Remax 2 - "Kings of the Dinoxworld 2"

    15.09.2016 / Publishing Book 7 / Queen 1 - "Man of Dreams 1"

    15.10.2016 / Publishing Book 8 / Queen 2 - "Man of Dreams 2"

    15.11.2016 / Publishing Book 9 / Royal 1 - "Diamond Beach 1"

    15.12.2016 / Publishing Book 10 / Royal 2 - "Diamond Beach 2"


     "A Dollar A Book" Project Book Descriptions


    ROYAL, Diamond Beach 1

    Description

    The book is a story of, a former secret service and special force specialist, eternal adventurer, and his bonanza with following sudden richness.

    He hits the point in France, on his daring venture of a diving excursion, at the site of a very old sunken wreck, in where he dives from the bottom of the sea, a big shimmering rock, at the risk of his life.

    As it follows variable events…

    The book is full of tension, action and unexpected turning points. It contains a lot of personal situation comedy and between the lines readable vivid humor.

    This book really is worth reading. It is a Real Diamond…


    ROYAL, Diamond Beach 2

    Description

    The diamonds’ auction is a great success for Royal. The money seems to have more than he can even realize. As it is for the eternal adventurer “big numbers are just numbers”.

    In a case of a lucky strike of sudden riches, is what people dream of, to become happy, but Royal is rather a little worried. Well grounded as now, his problems are just beginning. For all the riches are there plenty of plunderers…

    The criminal gangs, at the sea bottom lolling diamonds, fooling with money and all kinds of other actions diversify Royal’s life. Finally he gets “the most wanted” lifestyle, which suits to him, containing a lot of humor, adventure and hard-liner action…


    QUEEN, Man of Dreams 1

    Description

    The book is a fabulous story of a young beauty called Queen, from outskirts of the New York, and captivating Frenchman, charming Dynacos, coming upon. Their unexpected travel to Paris... Queen surges atop of the World of Fashion, multinational fashion-house and its dazzling world…

    The book is a very expositive storytelling of a mixture of ordinary life with fashion world and the world of riches with great glamour.

    “The book bulges delicate and sensible romance as it follows how luck strokes one.”

    “This book is absolutely a Pearl.”


    QUEEN, Man of Dreams 2

    Description

    The book is a fabulous story of a young beauty called Queen, from outskirts of the New York, and captivating Frenchman, charming Dynacos, coming upon. Their unexpected travel to Paris, Queen surges atop of the World of Fashion, multinational fashion-house and its dazzling world…

    In the future the Queen’s story changes from serene romance to be combined with feminine beauties in real action. Only rarely does a romance book contain as much pulse, as the second book of Queen.

    “The book surprises. It takes the reader along a fresh new kind of action, and for a gentler person all of it may start exceeding.”

    The world of fashion is very unpredictable…


    REMAX, Kings of the Dinoxworld 1

    Description

    Max runs into a huge flying dinosaur’s captivity, and he will soon be its brood’s food…

    A flying-trip, Max being a catch crushed on a dinosaur’s claws, ends up in a screeching beast-broods’ nest. There starts Max’s unbelievable adventure, through the canyon of horrors, inevitably, straight to the prohibited and terrifying dinosaurs’ world.

    Surviving in there, according to the old tribal stories, is impossible. And that is why Max runs straight into the greatest dangers ever.

    The most of all threats is the worst of all dangers, the horrifying Tyrannosaur Rex. Experiencing that, Max will live through with an amazing way, and of his future destiny can decide only The Great Unknown Might…


    REMAX, Kings of the Dinoxworld 2

    Description

    Max was captured by a huge flying dinosaur. There started Max’s unbelievable adventure, through the canyon of horrors, straight to the prohibited and terrifying dinosaurs’ world…

    Surviving in there, according to the old tribal stories, is impossible. And that is why Max runs straight into the greatest dangers ever. He has to fight for his life with all his powers, to survive and to be saved.

    The most of all threats is the worst of all dangers, the horrifying Tyrannosaur Rex, but… Max has decided to help the massive beast when it has met its own destiny.

    Will he save the Tyranno’s life? Or will he be, in the end, a mouthful for the terrible dinosaur? What would be in the future? That’s what only The Great Unknown Might knows.


    WILD ROYCE, Paradian Paradise Island 1

    Description

    A young boy called Wild Royce wakes up  being wrecked, alone, in an unknown island.

    He has lost his memory and he has to survive only with a trust of himself and based only on his own knowledge and instincts.

    Wild Royce is a great friend of animals, and soon he will get a lot of new friends. He runs into numerous dangers when being alone in the island. And sometimes surviving to be saved is “a bit too close and too hard”.

    There are also plenty of secrets in the island. And all the secrecy, one by one, young Wild Royce wants to discover and resolve.


    WILD ROYCE, Paradian Paradise Island 2

    Description

    Young Wild Royce wants to know his island better. He decides to make a dangerous expedition to a long way away to an appearing and clearly visible mountain.

    If it is horrifying to be along at the deserted island it is even more daring to be brave enough to go alone to the jungle.

    Who dares can win, he thinks. Soon Wild Royce finds out and learns many important rules and ways of surviving when coming across with the beasts of the jungle.

    The dangers of his adventures are almost excelling the young boy’s abilities. When struggling for life-and-death, sometimes, only a miracle can save him…

    ROYCE PIROT, Freedom – Young Pirates 1

    Description

    Royce Pirot is, the Southern Great Caribbean Oceans’ most of all feared Pirate Captain’s adopted son.

    The Black Beard has saved Royce’s life, when found, half-dead youngster, drifting alone, at the mercy of the merciless sea.

    He has firmly decided to raise and hard-train The Royce Pirot, to be a pirate predator of the seas, like himself.

    Royce’s sense of justice tells him otherwise, and that is why he has decided to escape from the Black Beard. Royce attempts to liberate a group of child-prisoners, and he comes across with the Giant… And the Black Beard himself at his most virulence. But now the target is Royce Pirot…


    ROYCE PIROT, Freedom – Young Pirates 1

    Description

    Royce Pirot is, the Southern Great Caribbean Oceans’ most of all feared Pirate Captain Black Beard’s adopted son.

    He has succeeded to liberate the child-prisoners, and the Great Giant.

    His over-daring venture is very dangerous for all of them. Royce’s plan is giddy indeed. Hardly ever has anyone dared before, even think about it, to attempt to hijack the greatest ship of the greatest Pirate Captain ever, The Black Beard.

    Will he succeed to escape?

    Could he hijack the Black Beard’s ship?

    What does the Black Beard do next?


    SOME OF JARNO’S EARLY PRODUCTION BOOKS

    Published in Finnish (Paperback and eBooks)


    Thank you!

other children’s book series were. 
The beginning of the entire Family of the
Book Series was created in the time when we were “Living on the Beach”. An unforgettable wonderful Family Lifestyle of Travelers, Beach-life, the world being our playground, with freedom of playful joyfulness and infinite
fictive creation of stories.


WILD ROYCE Series by Will Willeroy
Our Kids have always been
interested in animals and been taking care of all kinds of little nature
creatures. They were very interested in crocodiles, lizards, dinosaurs as well as
all the animals and the nature. 



That is why I wrote an
adventure where a little child is living and adventuring with animals, Wild Royce with
a Great Crocodile friend called Big Daddy, (a character of a real crocodile we
once met in Spain, one of the biggest and oldest crocodile in the world), among
numerous other animal friends.


ROYCE PIROT Series by Will Willeroy
The Royce Pirot series is kind a continuing Storyline from the Wild Royce series Storyline. The storyline (10 books for now)
emerges also from my Children being interested in the pirates and the history of them, and also from the seaside
beach-life we were living by our hearts.

One of the creator’s secrets is that, “Please keep the secret”, Wild Royce and Royce Pirot are actually the same
person, just in at a different age and time.
The Black Beard found a young boy, later named as Royce Pirot,
at the Caribbean Seas drifting with his little wrecked boat...
This finding comes sometime
after Wild Royce finally took the risk to head off from his island,
towards the sea horizon and new adventures, with his little boat in which he had
wrecked onto his Paradian Paradise Island years ago when being a little boy.
Royce Pirot's adventures are full of action, living and fighting with pirates, commanding his own pirate ship and a grew of young children, legendary Young Pirates, sailing the Caribbean Seas.REMAX Series by Dino X.The Remax Series comes from
my Kids interest to Dinosaurs. I wanted to write a storyline of a young boy
called Max, adventuring in the unpredictable prehistoric world with great and dangerous prehistoric
animals, and especially with a friendship with the great friend of Tyrannosaur
Rex.  

By their actions based on their brave hearts they came to be the
Kings of the Dinoxworld, an adventurous brave partnership, exploring the most
unpredictable and unknown human-prehistoric-dinosaur-world, in a fictional life, at the time as the world was back then when there were the people living with prehistoric
mammals, being the world of dinosaurs, human tribes, ancient civilizations and the
secrets of the Mother Nature.
Once again a creator’s
secret is that, “Please keep the secret”, Wild Royce’s fascinating cave art
findings, when exploring his island and discovering its secrets, were created
and first appeared, long, long time ago, in the storyline of Remax by prehistoric
explorer Max. 

ROYAL Series by Jaron Piroy
The Book Series Family
continues with the storyline of Royal. 
A creator’s secret is, once again,
“Please keep the secret”, that a huge treasury, very old shipwreck, down at the
sea bottom, deep there in where he was diving with his life in danger, a discovery was made and
riches following from that lucky strike…
The secret is that the
shipwreck Royal discovered, the huge treasury, was actually created by Royce
Pirot’s great efforts and fights, when he was racing against the Black Beard,
their Great Treasury Hunt rallying on the Caribbean Seas, against each other and the other Pirates as well,
when looking for hidden Pirate Treasuries, growing the riches in their ship’s
holds.
With the same rightness and
values as in every storyline, in this Great Story Family of Storylines, is
Royal investing his riches to fight for rightness against injustice,
wrongdoers, criminal organizations and even dictatorial governments, to correct
terrors, abuses, destruction and criminality.


QUEEN Series by Mirella Magine
The Book Series Family gets
its Queen, when Dynacos, a handsome Frenchman, discovers a Young fascinating
beauty, called Queen, at the streets of the New York. Impressive success
follows when Queen explores her new lifestyle and surges on the top of the Fashion
World.  

By the way, the very first
Queen book, a young beauty’s success with world of fashion elements and
romance, the beginning of the storyline of Queen, was written for, with
dedicated order of my dear companion of life for over 20 years now, “in the whirl
of the life of an artistry”, and a loving mother of our the most loved
Children. 
Queen’s future adventures,
as well as her fascinating ancestry, her eagerness for thrill, taking risks
when facing dangers, and unbelievable happenings within the glamorous Fashion
World, its riches and beauties, and everything related to that, suits so well
together with the principles of charming and captivating Dynacos…
The man with secrecy of his
origins and uncertainty of his powers and wealth sources, with the related
mystery of the other great “invisible” character, Royal…
Author's Role Play


I have written
fairly over 50 books with different writer names. Here is why...
I love movies,
books, good stories and visual experiences, as well as real life experiences. I have always been
highly admiring authors as well as movie stars, story creators and producers, characters and actors, especially how brilliantly they can play their
roles as being real. 

With all of my
appreciation and esteem to all of them…
That is how I
can see my writing creation experience – Living in a real-time-movie.
My way to write
and to create the story is highly intuitive, intensive and interactive. My way is to go
in to a movie-kind of a role play in my mind, being in the scenery of the story, start
creating, exploring in the characters role, as in a movie.

Experiencing
with the character, in his role, I am experiencing the story creation and
happening as a real-time-experience. For me it is all real, actual experience,
in a present time, everything appearing as new to me, real-time-reality, when
living in my imagination.
My way to
create is highly intensive, as a real 5D visual experience, full-fiction-reality, adventuring in the real-time-story-creation,
being deeply concentrated, sometimes as if in a trance.
Adventuring in
the Creation of my “Fancy Galaxy Imaginarium” I am, at the very moment,
enjoying events, excited about tension, laughing at events out loud when something
sudden and funny happens, sweating when running, rushing on and having as well
sweet as hard times…
And my fingers
are tapping the story happenings down with a high speed typing… Me in, the story creation advancing at the same time when my fingertips are printing it out from the deeps of my creative Imaginarium, fictional infinity, transmitting by a mind-galactic hyper-loop from the Fancy Galaxy, appearing on my computer screen. Later on, so often wondering when reading the story afterwards "was it me who wrote this?"
Okay, that is
my way to create and experience the stories. I Love It! I really do.
All of the author names of mine, such as Jaron Piroy, Will Willeroy, Dino X., Mirella Magine,
J.J.Trywell and others… are like director roles of the movie-like-story creation to
me. 
They are author names, Role Play Characters, everyone specialized to direct with their
specific style and interests... directing the shooting according to the
screenplay of filming.
And as well as
every director, every movie done and the production, is a creation, so are my
Author Role Plays. 
In every scene, chapter, play,
shooting, framing and creation I put a big part of me in it, as a director, a main
character and often in some side roles too. As said, I Love It! All, over and
over again...
It’s a Big Deal
to me, giving me Big Times, and I hope you’ll enjoy then too.
“The more real the experience of the story is, the better it is.”


Multilingual Indie Author Family
All the 50+
books published this far I have published by my own publishing deeds as being an independent
– Indie Author.
The WOWBOOKS is
my publishing brand and the logic is simple…
WoW – World of
Words. A logo has been illustrated to describe the thinking of my creation. And
what’s the best in it, the logo’s design has done by my son Miro when he was 10
years old. A little o in between two capital W letters, ultimate elements ice and fire, is the source of my
Imaginarium called The Fancy Galaxy. That is where I am adventuring when
bursting out stories…

I Love writing
and creating... That is my principal motive of doing my job. I just love it,
and that is why I keep writing.
But selling,
marketing and promoting, all that is a very tough task for me. I always thought
“if I would just write”. My thinking is that everyone should make what they like the
most, and my choice is very clear.
But, more buts... At the moment I am keen to do more. I want to write, more and more, as much as before in my prior native language Finnish, now in my current "new native" language English. But I also
want to do as much as I can for the public works. Still, pro sales and
marketing persons are the best to do their job, but I want to be connected,
cooperate and see the world of literature at its fullest.
"Early 50+ Books” I have written in Finnish, as it was the most comfortable writing language
of mine before… Even though we have been living in France and Spain the most of the time for over 12 years now, traveling, and even though the Family is multilingual
primarily in English and German, with fluent Finnish, well also French and Spanish knowledge
(plus some other languages too). 
The reason we
spoke Finnish before was for teaching it to our children, and also it was used for homeschooling partly in
Finnish, and for maintaining it in some practical level. Earlier, we used to
speak Finnish it only being as our home-language and English we spoke with our friends. But then we quit Finnish entirely, using only English, it being more comfortable for us and also practical in every way,
with the use of some other languages of and for our daily living environments and connections.
And now also,
personally, entirely, I have quit writing in my previous native language Finnish too, a few
years ago, transforming step by step to write in English as it being my "new native” language,
as well for spoken as written and also for expression of my literary arts. Practically, a complete transformation such like
that is quite a big challenge for a pro writer, but I have done my move without a
return… 
And I love it,
I always did. Even back then when I wrote in Finnish I was partly thinking in English,
actually complicating and often mixing both languages, being unsure of any,
making it “characteristic”, as kind of English expression in my books in Finnish has been
always recognizable. My books have well been unique and personal in Finnish, and that is how it will be also in English, being the fact I just have to accept. But now and also in the future being, I am only writing with one language, English, making it well comfortable for me. 
In Finland,
being a real Pro Indie Author is very exceptional. Principally, almost all the
pro literacy in Finland is supported and done by governmental allowances and
also mostly bought by governmental instances, especially libraries. There are
very limited private markets as a real business, if any at all, when talking about the literature,
simply because the markets are so small within a nation of only about 5 million people.
But even so the
fact is, the only real thing I was ever interested in has been
publishing in English, worldwide, and also internationally in some other main
world languages when it will be possible, I wanted to product and publish a big bunch of my books in Finnish
too

As the literacy
in Finland is deeply old fashioned and supported by the government, it is mostly all the money pouring in for insiders, and especially
when being different and extremely productive, the only choice was to make it
all on my own. I have been like that all of my life “very much indie of everything” and
that is how I wanted to product my books too. I wanted to learn the whole chain
of the book production.
I have never
received any penny of any literacy allowances, that being a big difference compared to most of the authors in
Finland, I have done it all by my own money by selling books and in
“indie-artistic” ways. I love being an artist and artistic too. And I am proud of it,
proud of being a pure Indie Author.

Now, when
considering publishing worldwide, in English and perhaps with some other main
languages too, I want to connect and cooperate. I want to “Make It Big” still
being a real Indie Author, but with cooperation with as many as possible.
The most what I
want is to connect with the people among the literature, authors and all the other
working within the same fashion than me. I want to see and experience the World of Words, more and
more.
“Indie Author,
that’s what I’ve always been, I am, and how it will be.”

Characteristics - Funding for



Translation by Jarno (from Finnish to English) first 10 Books out of the production of 50+
books.
Fund seeking and promotion for the project - 60 days.
Project in process for 10 months.
New cover illustrations for all 10 books by Indie illustrators or Jarno.
Publishing all 10 books in eBooks.
New publication every 1 to 2 months.
First book published and delivered 15.03.2016.

The project completed and all 10 books
published and delivered by 15.12.2016.


Contributor - Collector Perks
Everyone contributing will receive eBook(s) by the amount of contribution. It's your choice which book or books you choose for 1 dollar a book.
You
 can also just contribute without receiving any. 
Books will be delivered by the publishing dates scheduled. 
You’ll choose which books you’ll want to receive by the amount of your contribution for 1 dollar per book.
1 dollar 1 book, 5 dollars 5 books, 10 dollars 10 books.
You can also contribute more still receiving 10 books in total.



Impact"You make me to make it". With your support 
I'll make it. 
All kind of support helps and makes my day when continuing to complete the project. Even so as determined as I want to see myself, I need support from others as well as everyone does.
The project is a remarkable start for my personal "Mission Impossible". Re-creation in English for my 50+ early books written in Finnish.
Personally, a Big Deal and a Big Dream is to translate and publish all of my early 50+ books which have been published in Finnish in next 5 years, plus quite a bunch of the books more that are still unpublished... 
"I know it's way too much, but dreaming is easy and I love dreaming."
¨But one thing is for sure, I'll complete these first 10 books, and then I'll see"

Other Ways You Can Help
When wondering if 
there are other ways you can show your support without contributing? Well, there are! You can help:

Tell your friends! Share the campaign on Facebook, Twitter, or your social media platform of choice. 


If
 you are a reviewer or reporter, you have a blog or a podcast, consider 
interviewing me during or after the project! It's my pleasure to tell 
the story of anything wanted.

I am seeking cover illustrators as all the books published in the future, by the 
project plus new books coming, will get a new cover design, so please let me know if you know one or 
contact if you are a designer.

I am also seeking proofreaders (US Eng) 
as all the books will need a proper proofreading to be edited and 
completed for publishing, even so I will publish all the books completed by myself for now, but at once there is an option to have a new edition trimmed by pro editors I will make it. I'm a writer and creator fitted with an enormous 
imagination, and even though I am working only in English nowadays, I definitely need 
cooperation with proofreaders to make it pro.
I am also seeking pro marketers, author's agents or any other helpful cooperation for marketing and to boost sales. "I am a tool, just need someone to wrench."
I am 
also seeking cooperation for my new production too to ease my way. It is a very hard job to do it all by myself...
 As fitted with extraordinary productivity (several books a year) 
thanks to my great love of writing, favor of living and experiencing in my 
interactive creation process, in the Fancy Galaxy Imaginarium... Well, I wish I would just write.



Thank you so much in advance for backing this crowdfunding campaign! Your support matters!


Publishing Timetable
12.02.2016 - 12.04.2016 / "A Dollar A Book" Translation Project fund seeking.


12.02.2016 - 12.12.2016 / "A Dollar A Book" translation process for next 10 months. (I have already translated two books which will be published at first.)


15.03.2016 / The first book "Wild Royce 1" will be published.


15.12.2016 / All 10 books will be published.

15.03.2016
/ Publishing Book 1 / Wild Royce 1 - "Paradian Paradise Island 1"


15.04.2016
/ Publishing Book 2 / Wild Royce 2 - "Paradian Paradise Island 2"


15.05.2016
/ Publishing Book 3 / Royce Pirot 1 - "Freedom - Young Pirates 1"


15.06.2016
/ Publishing Book 4 / Royce Pirot 2 - "Freedom - Young Pirates 2"


15.07.2016
/ Publishing Book 5 / Remax 1 - "Kings of the Dinoxworld 1"


15.08.2016
/ Publishing Book 6 / Remax 2 - "Kings of the Dinoxworld 2"


15.09.2016
/ Publishing Book 7 / Queen 1 - "Man of Dreams 1"


15.10.2016
/ Publishing Book 8 / Queen 2 - "Man of Dreams 2"


15.11.2016
/ Publishing Book 9 / Royal 1 - "Diamond Beach 1"


15.12.2016
/ Publishing Book 10 / Royal 2 - "Diamond Beach 2" 

 "A Dollar A Book" Project Book Descriptions

ROYAL, Diamond Beach 1
Description
The book is a story of, a former
secret service and special force specialist, eternal adventurer, and his
bonanza with following sudden richness.
He hits the point in France, on
his daring venture of a diving excursion, at the site of a very old sunken
wreck, in where he dives from the bottom of the sea, a big shimmering rock, at
the risk of his life.
As it follows variable events…
The book is full of tension, action
and unexpected turning points. It contains a lot of personal situation comedy
and between the lines readable vivid humor. 
This book really is worth
reading. It is a Real Diamond…


ROYAL, Diamond Beach 2
Description
The diamonds’ auction is a great
success for Royal. The money seems to have more than he can even realize. As it
is for the eternal adventurer “big numbers are just numbers”.
In a case of a lucky strike of
sudden riches, is what people dream of, to become happy, but Royal is rather a little
worried. Well grounded as now, his problems are just beginning. For all the
riches are there plenty of plunderers…
The criminal gangs, at the sea bottom
lolling diamonds, fooling with money and all kinds of other actions diversify
Royal’s life. Finally he gets “the most wanted” lifestyle, which suits to him, containing
a lot of humor, adventure and hard-liner action…


QUEEN, Man of Dreams 1

Description
The book is a fabulous story of a
young beauty called Queen, from outskirts of the New York, and captivating
Frenchman, charming Dynacos, coming upon. Their unexpected travel to Paris...
Queen surges atop of the World of Fashion, multinational fashion-house and its dazzling
world…
The book is a very expositive
storytelling of a mixture of ordinary life with fashion world and the world of
riches with great glamour.
“The book bulges delicate and
sensible romance as it follows how luck strokes one.”
“This book is absolutely a Pearl.”


QUEEN, Man of Dreams 2
Description
The book is a fabulous story of a
young beauty called Queen, from outskirts of the New York, and captivating
Frenchman, charming Dynacos, coming upon. Their unexpected travel to Paris,
Queen surges atop of the World of Fashion, multinational fashion-house and its
dazzling world…
In the future the Queen’s story
changes from serene romance to be combined with feminine beauties in real action.
Only rarely does a romance book contain as much pulse, as the second book of
Queen. 
“The book surprises. It takes the
reader along a fresh new kind of action, and for a gentler person all of it may
start exceeding.”
The world of fashion is very unpredictable…


REMAX, Kings of the Dinoxworld 1
Description
Max runs into a huge flying dinosaur’s
captivity, and he will soon be its brood’s food…
A flying-trip, Max being a catch crushed
on a dinosaur’s claws, ends up in a screeching beast-broods’ nest. There starts
Max’s unbelievable adventure, through the canyon of horrors, inevitably, straight
to the prohibited and terrifying dinosaurs’ world. 
Surviving in there, according to the
old tribal stories, is impossible. And that is why Max runs straight into the
greatest dangers ever.
The most of all threats is the
worst of all dangers, the horrifying Tyrannosaur Rex. Experiencing that, Max
will live through with an amazing way, and of his future destiny can decide
only The Great Unknown Might…


REMAX, Kings of the Dinoxworld 2
Description
Max was captured by a huge flying
dinosaur. There started Max’s unbelievable adventure, through the canyon of
horrors, straight to the prohibited and terrifying dinosaurs’ world…
Surviving in there, according to
the old tribal stories, is impossible. And that is why Max runs straight into
the greatest dangers ever. He has to fight for his life with all his powers, to
survive and to be saved.
The most of all threats is the
worst of all dangers, the horrifying Tyrannosaur Rex, but… Max has decided to
help the massive beast when it has met its own destiny.
Will he save the Tyranno’s life? Or
will he be, in the end, a mouthful for the terrible dinosaur? What would be in the
future? That’s what only The Great Unknown Might knows.


WILD ROYCE, Paradian Paradise Island 1

Description
A young boy called Wild Royce
wakes up  being wrecked, alone, in an
unknown island.
He has lost his memory and he has
to survive only with a trust of himself and based only on his own knowledge and
instincts.
Wild Royce is a great friend of animals,
and soon he will get a lot of new friends. He runs into numerous dangers when
being alone in the island. And sometimes surviving to be saved is “a bit too
close and too hard”.
There are also plenty of secrets
in the island. And all the secrecy, one by one, young Wild Royce wants to discover
and resolve.


WILD ROYCE, Paradian Paradise Island 2

Description
Young Wild Royce wants to know
his island better. He decides to make a dangerous expedition to a long way away
to an appearing and clearly visible mountain.
If it is horrifying to be along
at the deserted island it is even more daring to be brave enough to go alone to
the jungle.
Who dares can win, he thinks. Soon
Wild Royce finds out and learns many important rules and ways of surviving when
coming across with the beasts of the jungle.
The dangers of his adventures are
almost excelling the young boy’s abilities. When struggling for life-and-death,
sometimes, only a miracle can save him…

ROYCE PIROT, Freedom – Young Pirates 1

Description
Royce Pirot is, the Southern
Great Caribbean Oceans’ most of all feared Pirate Captain’s adopted son.
The Black Beard has saved Royce’s
life, when found, half-dead youngster, drifting alone, at the mercy of the merciless sea.
He has firmly decided to raise
and hard-train The Royce Pirot, to be a pirate predator of the seas, like
himself. 
Royce’s sense of justice tells
him otherwise, and that is why he has decided to escape from the Black Beard.
Royce attempts to liberate a group of child-prisoners, and he comes across with
the Giant… And the Black Beard himself at his most virulence. But now the
target is Royce Pirot…


ROYCE PIROT, Freedom – Young Pirates 1

Description
Royce Pirot is, the Southern
Great Caribbean Oceans’ most of all feared Pirate Captain Black Beard’s adopted
son.
He has succeeded to liberate the
child-prisoners, and the Great Giant.
His over-daring venture is very
dangerous for all of them. Royce’s plan is giddy indeed. Hardly ever has anyone
dared before, even think about it, to attempt to hijack the greatest ship of
the greatest Pirate Captain ever, The Black Beard.
Will he succeed to escape?
Could he hijack the Black Beard’s
ship?
What does the Black Beard do next?

SOME OF JARNO’S EARLY PRODUCTION BOOKS 
Published in Finnish (Paperback and eBooks)







Thank you!

story:
WHAT THIS CAMPAIGN IS AIMING FOR :

This campaign aims to collect funds for professional editional and graphic works, writing stories of pre-war Kresy (Polish Eastern Borderlands), editorial office and finally printing at least 1.000 pieces of an album-book, enriched with exclusive archival photographs, documents, biographs, stories and video interviews I've collected during my researches in Poland, England, Scotland and Wales as well as former Kresy COUNTRIES: Ukraine, Belarus and Lithuania in past few years. This book is planned to be the first of the series.

YOU CAN HELP TO PRESERVE THIS INCREDIBLE HISTORY TOO!

 

WHAT IS "EASTERN BORLDERLANDS - KRESY FOREVER" PROJECT ABOUT:

“Eastern Borderlands Forever” is a project I call the “Project of my life” I was dreaming of for years. It was developed with the assistance of the Foundation for Help and Polish Connection "KRESY RP" as well as the Association of Former POWs of the Home Army at its first (UK) and second (Ukriane, Belarus and Lithuania) stages of realisation and supported by the Senate of the Republic of Poland in 2017 and 2018.  It is mainly directed at Poles abroad, especially Polish children and youth who are living outside the borders of Poland, as well as everyone who holds the traditions and history of the former borderlands close to their hearts.  The project which contain an exhibition, web-portal KresyNieutracone.pl, interactive workshops and multimedia presentations aims to introduce the history and culture of pre-war Poland, in particular that of the former Eastern Borderlands, and their impact on the development of Polish tradition and culture.

The “Eastern Borderlands Forever” project consists of:

Digitizing and preserving scattered and disappearing collections in various national and private archives

Creating modern educational materials, to support the education of Polish youth in Poland and abroad

Disseminating knowledge about Polish history, culture and tradition

Developing a national identity among Polish youth, who are growing up in Poland and abroad

Supporting and building conscious civic outlooks

Creating a generational "bridge" between the "old" and the "new" Polish emigration in the world

Building a cohesive knowledge base concerning the culture, history and traditions of the Polish Eastern Borderlands

Restoring the meaning of the term "Borderlands" - their place and role in Polish history and culture - in the minds of young people growing up in Poland and abroad

 

WHAT WAS DONE UNTIL NOW:

This project consists in the digitization and dissemination of archival collections primarily located outside Poland.  In addition to its educational value, it has added value in the form of organizing and digitizing archival materials associated with the Eastern Borderlands which are held in private hands. The owners are primarily individuals who left their homeland during and after World War II and never returned as well as thiose who were left outside Polish borders after WW2 and lived in the USSR and now in independent countries.

The first and second stages of the project (2017 & 2018) covered the territory of the United Kingdom and also - partly - Poland as well as Lithuania, Belarus and Ukraine. During my researches I was able to find and digitize almost more than 5.000 pre-war documents and photographs, mostly unpublished and in some cases even unseen for more than 70 years. However, in subsequent years, I plan to carry out work in other European and non-European countries to find, digitize, preserve and publish as many as possible of those archival treasures.  Through my work, I want to save and make public these generally-unknown images of the Eastern Borderlands - lost as a result of war and political upheavals, but preserved in the form of archival photographs and documents. This is why my project is called “Eastern Borderlands Forever” or "Kresy Nieutracone" in Polish which means "Kresy Never Lost".

Until now I was able to produce the following:

- Web-portal named "Kresy Nieutracone" (www.KRESYNIEUTRACONE.pl) which contain a huge part of my digitizing and archival work since 2000 until now with it's social media support (www.FB.COM/KresyNieutracone, www.INSTAGRAM.COM/kresy_nieutracone)

- Mobile multilingual exhibition containing 30 roll-ups (2m x 1m) and presenting the most beutiful photographs and documents from pre-war Eastern Borderlands

- Interactive workshops / presentations

- Movies, interviews with witnesses to the History (oral history project)

 

WHY THIS STORY MATTERS:

The "Eastern Borderlands Forever" project combines the features of an archiving and a research project, but its main value is to support the education of Polish youth living far from their native tradition, culture and history.  The Eastern Borderlands were an integral part of Poland for pre-WW2 generations, yet for young people of the 21st century they has often become devoid of meaning.  I also believe that the implementation of this project will contribute to bridging the "old" and "new" emigration generations, for the benefit of both parties.  Witnesses of history, with extensive and interesting archival materials, can become an inspiration for young people who are slowly losing their Polish roots. This can be an invaluable boost for elderly, and often lonely, people. 

The "Eastern Borderlands Forever" project has a farther reach than any other digitalization, archival or educational project, becoming a bridge between old and new, between the past and the present, as well as providing support to Poles who have permanently emigrated.

I would also like to emphasize that previous digitalisation of private archives, both in Poland and abroad, has not been conducted on a scale beyond the initiatives of individual non-governmental organizations and within a cohesive project. The effects of these activities have often been wasted, through ineffective promotion, or inadequate sharing of the collected materials with a wider audience.  As these witnesses to history leave us in increasing numbers, there is a threat that these materials will be lost or destroyed after their death.  Consequently, implementing this project now is extremely important, in order to preserve these valuable collections for future generations.

This campaign aims to collect funds for professional editional and graphic works, writing stories of pre-war Kresy (Polish Eastern Borderlands), editorial office and finally printing at least 1.000 pieces of an album-book, enriched with exclusive archival photographs, documents, biographs, stories and video interviews I've collected during my researches in Poland, England, Scotland and Wales as well as former Kresy COUNTRIES: Ukraine, Belarus and Lithuania in past few years. This book is planned to be the first of the series.
YOU CAN HELP TO PRESERVE THIS INCREDIBLE HISTORY TOO!
 
WHAT IS "EASTERN BORLDERLANDS - KRESY FOREVER" PROJECT ABOUT:
“Eastern Borderlands Forever” is a project I call the “Project of my life” I was dreaming of for years. It was developed with the assistance of the Foundation for Help and Polish Connection "KRESY RP" as well as the Association of Former POWs of the Home Army at its first (UK) and second (Ukriane, Belarus and Lithuania) stages of realisation and supported by the Senate of the Republic of Poland in 2017 and 2018.  It is mainly directed at Poles abroad, especially Polish children and youth who are living outside the borders of Poland, as well as everyone who holds the traditions and history of the former borderlands close to their hearts.  The project which contain an exhibition, web-portal KresyNieutracone.pl, interactive workshops and multimedia presentations aims to introduce the history and culture of pre-war Poland, in particular that of the former Eastern Borderlands, and their impact on the development of Polish tradition and culture.
The “Eastern Borderlands Forever” project consists of:
Digitizing and preserving scattered and disappearing collections in various national and private archives
Creating modern educational materials, to support the education of Polish youth in Poland and abroad
Disseminating knowledge about Polish history, culture and tradition
Developing a national identity among Polish youth, who are growing up in Poland and abroad
Supporting and building conscious civic outlooks
Creating a generational "bridge" between the "old" and the "new" Polish emigration in the world
Building a cohesive knowledge base concerning the culture, history and traditions of the Polish Eastern Borderlands
Restoring the meaning of the term "Borderlands" - their place and role in Polish history and culture - in the minds of young people growing up in Poland and abroad
 
WHAT WAS DONE UNTIL NOW:
This project consists in the digitization and dissemination of archival collections primarily located outside Poland.  In addition to its educational value, it has added value in the form of organizing and digitizing archival materials associated with the Eastern Borderlands which are held in private hands. The owners are primarily individuals who left their homeland during and after World War II and never returned as well as thiose who were left outside Polish borders after WW2 and lived in the USSR and now in independent countries.
The first and second stages of the project (2017 & 2018) covered the territory of the United Kingdom and also - partly - Poland as well as Lithuania, Belarus and Ukraine. During my researches I was able to find and digitize almost more than 5.000 pre-war documents and photographs, mostly unpublished and in some cases even unseen for more than 70 years. However, in subsequent years, I plan to carry out work in other European and non-European countries to find, digitize, preserve and publish as many as possible of those archival treasures.  Through my work, I want to save and make public these generally-unknown images of the Eastern Borderlands - lost as a result of war and political upheavals, but preserved in the form of archival photographs and documents. This is why my project is called “Eastern Borderlands Forever” or "Kresy Nieutracone" in Polish which means "Kresy Never Lost".
Until now I was able to produce the following:
- Web-portal named "Kresy Nieutracone" (www.KRESYNIEUTRACONE.pl) which contain a huge part of my digitizing and archival work since 2000 until now with it's social media support (www.FB.COM/KresyNieutracone, www.INSTAGRAM.COM/kresy_nieutracone)
- Mobile multilingual exhibition containing 30 roll-ups (2m x 1m) and presenting the most beutiful photographs and documents from pre-war Eastern Borderlands
- Interactive workshops / presentations
- Movies, interviews with witnesses to the History (oral history project)
 
WHY THIS STORY MATTERS:
The "Eastern Borderlands Forever" project combines the features of an archiving and a research project, but its main value is to support the education of Polish youth living far from their native tradition, culture and history.  The Eastern Borderlands were an integral part of Poland for pre-WW2 generations, yet for young people of the 21st century they has often become devoid of meaning.  I also believe that the implementation of this project will contribute to bridging the "old" and "new" emigration generations, for the benefit of both parties.  Witnesses of history, with extensive and interesting archival materials, can become an inspiration for young people who are slowly losing their Polish roots. This can be an invaluable boost for elderly, and often lonely, people. 
The "Eastern Borderlands Forever" project has a farther reach than any other digitalization, archival or educational project, becoming a bridge between old and new, between the past and the present, as well as providing support to Poles who have permanently emigrated.
I would also like to emphasize that previous digitalisation of private archives, both in Poland and abroad, has not been conducted on a scale beyond the initiatives of individual non-governmental organizations and within a cohesive project. The effects of these activities have often been wasted, through ineffective promotion, or inadequate sharing of the collected materials with a wider audience.  As these witnesses to history leave us in increasing numbers, there is a threat that these materials will be lost or destroyed after their death.  Consequently, implementing this project now is extremely important, in order to preserve these valuable collections for future generations.

story:
In Short: The Novel

'Durga Noir' is a pulp style detective noir thriller set in an alternative history world that the author is building.

The main action takes places in 1970s Calcutta where a down at heel private eye is hired to help find the missing wife of a billionaire industrialist, a small catch being the that the vanished spouse is an old flame of the dysfunctional detective.

Why has the wife gone missing? Who is responsible? Who is the mysterious ‘Irishman’? What is the connection with a seemingly catastrophic event in the prologue?

The Calcutta of this world is a teeming metropolis with a seething underbelly as you would expect in one of the major cities of the vast and powerful Bharat Empire.

A second narrative thread covers a longer period from the early days of The Second World War through to the mid-1950s and explores the intertwined histories of the principal characters. Further this thread gives the chance to explore many of the unique differences between our universe and the alternative history presented here.

As the plot progress it will become clear that the past of the protagonist and the major supporting characters are intimately intertwined with the current mystery.

The detective will discover that he is in fact a pawn in a large-scale conspiracy that threatens the stability of the Empire, being manipulated by a fundamentalist faction who wish to blame the Catholic minority for a planned terrorist atrocity, thus enabling the suppression of that religion.

Though as a 'pulp' style novel the character's may seem initially to be cliche'd and stereotypical there will be significant character development, particularly via the secondary narrative thread which will fully flesh out the characters, their motivations, and provide them with satisfying narrative arcs.

This novel is intended as the entry point to a new fictional world developed by myself, the world of The Bharat Empire, a universe where the India Empire still exists, but is ruled mainly by Indian Babus.

In Short: The Series

With a successful launch of the debut novel the aim then is to fully flesh out the history this storied world over two or three subsequent novels.

In the World of the 'Bharat Empire' the British Indian Empire still exists and rivals the United States for dominance across the World. This isn't the British Raj as we know it however; this is an Indian Raj ruled principally by Desi statesmen since the days of the Bengali Renaissance in the 1800s.

The author is a British citizen who has spent many years living and working in India and who has a great respect for the history and culture of both nations. This valuable perspective has led to a unique setting with a fusion of our modern World and the Bengal of the Babus.

Later novels in the series will cover the history of the Empire, how it diverged from our own history, why it did so, and who is responsible. The author is keen to explore as many facets of the setting as possible and expects that future works will defy standard genre descriptions. The range of the narratives will cover ancient history through to the far future and involve science fiction, historical drama, time travel, romance, adventure, and yes, more thrillers.

In Short: The Author 

Hi, I'm Robert Owen a first time novelist who's been an avid reader of fantasy and science fiction works since first picking up 'The Lion, The Witch, and the Wardrobe' around the age of seven.  It's been my dream to become a published novelist pretty much since I could read, however like most folks that dream disappeared under the relentless grind of modern life.

Recently however life threw me a curve ball as my marriage disintegrated, and through those smoking ruins, I suddenly realised that I had actually been presented with a reset moment. It was now or never, try and maybe fail, but at least I had chance to finally give it  a shot. 

If I can successfully build the 'Bharat Empire' my eventual aim is to make this an 'open universe' where other writers and contributors can add to the mythos, this way the world can be enjoyed by as many people as possible, in as many ways as possible.

I'm conscious that for most of my life I've been a consumer only, however this is my opportunity to finally create something and get it out there in the great big wide World to be enjoyed by others.

What We Need & What You Get

I plan to self publish the novel initially via Quignog a specialist in the Indian market, who offer a very comprehensive package including intensive marketing on Amazon and in 'brick and mortar' stores. I intend utilising their 'Hurricane' package which can be found here:

http://www.quignog.com/plans-and-supplements/

Funds then will be used to fund the following:

  • The package from Quignog which will cost circa £3,100 ($4,100 or INR 289,000).
  • Professional editing for the novel before submission to the publisher (Quignog offer one round as part of their package but I would prefer this is done beforehand for expediency).
  • Proof reading - as above for the editing with the same rationale.
  • Costs to promote  'Durga Noir' via author signings and book store events - these aren't included in the Quignog package and will require additional funding - I intended promoting the novel myself in both India and the UK.
  • Mailing and shipping costs for copies that are provided as perks to contributors. 

 

Perks:

I'll be offering a range of perks for my valued contributors:

  • You will all receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • A signed limited edition (100 units) hardbound copy will also be available.
  • Online access for all contributors to early chapters.
  • Online access for all to the audio book of 'Durga Noir' as and when I release chapters.
  • The opportunity to be mentioned in the acknowledgements alongside my family and heroes. 
  • The opportunity to be included in the book (or one of your loved ones if you so choose) as a minor character.
  • The opportunity to be included in the book (or one of your loved ones if you so choose) as a minor character, and then as a recurring supporting character throughout the series (whom I, cross my heart, will absolutely will not kill off, honest guvnor). 
  • The opportunity for all to contribute ideas and stories to the world of the 'Bharat Empire'.

The Impact

Buy contributing you will help me fulfil a lifelong ambition to become a published author, and by getting this first novel off the ground together we can launch a whole new series and develop a whole new world.

By reaching the 10,000 sales mark the publisher will automatically kick the book upstairs to their parent company Pirate Publishers who will offer a book deal, and I feel likely a deal for the entire series.

Given the commitment to marketing in the publisher's proffered package I believe this is a realistic target with online and physical sales taken into account.

Once a deal for a series is achieved I can continue to lay down the history of the 'Bharat Empire' and I will invite other authors to contribute to the world. If I can help others cut their teeth in writing via this approach I would be extremely proud.  

Risks & Challenges

As with the writing of any book the main risk must be not getting a finished product to the reader, however as the book it self is nearly finished the main risk with this project is getting the publication right. 

Quignog have a good reputation in India and I have physically and independently verified the existence of their published units prominently displayed in proper bookshops in some of the largest cities in India. 

Further they guarantee a strong on-line presence and marketing via Goodreads and Amazon Kindle.

More than anything I believe the marketing support from Quignog will make this publication a success.

A further challenge maybe the prospect of the book failing to find a readership. I've written the book as a fusion between Western and Desi (Indian) culture and history, with the idea that it will appeal to readers from both of those worlds. The danger though is that it might 'fall between' two stools so to speak and appeal to neither. In mitigation of this risk I have lived and worked in India for several years, and was married to an Indian lady for seven years - during these years I devoured Bengali food, films, literature, and culture with a healthy dollop of Hindi films and serials thrown in for good measure.  I feel that I have sufficient grasp of both the Desi and Western worlds to make the novel work in both,

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please make as much noise as possible on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #BharatEmpire and tag me as well 

    You can easily share my Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page

    Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

So lovely people, thank you for your time and attention and most importantly, your support.

Thanks, Diolch yn Fawr, Dhonnobad!

Robert Owen

story:
The Background Story

 

 

 

 

This book I originally wrote for my daughter who had many problems with food. They did not want to eat vegetables that were unknown to her.
I started cooking with her and made up stories with the ingredients

As she has learned more and more about them, she started to eat everything I put on the table in front of her. This experience has led me to make a children's book in the hope that I can help others with it

 

What you can find in the Book

 

The book has 15 little stories of 15 different vegetables.

All stories have 2 illustrations and a summary where you can find the hidden facts from the tales about the vegetables with some extra child friendly information and an extra drawing of how the vegetables look like in real life.

 

 

Why is there so many Language?

 

As I mentioned above, I wrote the book for my daughter at the beginning. We raise our children in three languages. I'm from Hungary my partner from Portugal and we live in Germany. I wanted her to share the book with anyone who was close to her without any language problems

 

For what exactly I need fundation?

 

As I said my mother tongue is not English, and I'm sure after several checks can still find grammatical errors in my project, so I definitely need grammatical correction and of course the translations for the different languages.

But where I want to invest the most money is the drawings and illustrations. I want to have this book very colorful. The more support I can have the more design I can put in.

what has the same priority with me is the general quality of the book. Thicker pages for easy scrolling and high quality printing for the colored images

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

All kind of Help is welcome! The biggest kind of help isn't cost any money! Please share as much you can as many platform you can to reach everyone who wannabe a part of it!

 

Be a part of this book!

 

I offer two different kind of ways for you to be in my book.

 

-  Would you like to see your name at the end of the book? then hurry up! 10 fastest person of you have the possibility to subscribe their name as a supporter inside the end of the book on a special page.

 

- would you like to give your face and name to one positiv karakter in the book? Than the Be a positiv Karakter in my book perk is just for you! Or you rather wanna be the evil the negativ carakter who messing around with our favorite heros? Than choose the Be an Evil perk.

After your support I contact you to find the best matching karakter to you. You can be a vegetables or a human. We searching together for the best for you. I also post that carakter every kind of channel of me to let the world know about it.

story:
The Gist:

All the best advice in all the best fiction-writing books, available at your fingertips. That's what we're here to create. Come be a part of it!

  • We're the team behind Re:Fiction, a website for fiction writers of all ages and genres. But we want to do even more for you. We want to put together the best online resource for fiction writers like you.
  • We're all fiction writers ourselves, with an additional specialty in creative nonfiction. That makes us the best team for this kind of challenge. We're going to rock it!
  • Every contribution helps toward creating the best content possible. You're investing in your own future as a writer. We'll make it worth your while!

Check out the perks and see what works for you!

What We Need:

We have our team of professional writers lined up for this project, but writers don't (and shouldn't!) work for free. 100% of funding will go into commissioning the top-quality articles that will make up the website.

With $2500, we can buy a meaningful chunk of top-quality knowledge of about 40,000 words. That's almost a full book.

Even if we don't reach the entire goal, every cent goes towards buying more quality content that will be the cornerstone of this huge undertaking. That's why this campaign is flexible.

The website itself is already built and is waiting for its precious content. Help us put it there!

What You Get:

Here are some of the awesome items you can get:

  • NEW! Join the "Idea to Plot" workshop at 50% off! This powerful workshop will show you how to entwine plot structure with character development and craft full, complex stories that will satisfy your readers. The workshop comprises of 4 extensive online sessions, plus live, tailored feedback on your work!
  • Exclusive writing prompts and writing motivational exercises, crafted into shareable graphic tiles. Get some good ideas and the passion to see them through, or get some likes and re-tweets.

  • A detailed critique on your fiction writing, up to 15,000 words, from a professional editor. Plot structure, scene flow, character development, voice, point of view, and style: what works, what could use some work, and how to take your writing to the next level. Don't miss out on this opportunity to develop as a writer.
  • An opportunity to help shape the new resource. By sponsoring a topic of your choice, you can be certain we'll cover it in depth. We'll also feature you as the sponsor on that page.

  • Any contribution will get you mentioned in the Contributors Hall, with your name and a link of your choice*!

Tight budget? Even the $5 perk would help towards the goal. Also, social sharing is worth gold. Hit those share buttons, please!

* Barring affiliate links.

The Impact:

We believe the greatest writers of tomorrow live among you now, working hard to hone their skills and polish their yet untold stories.

We want to help.

By contributing to this campaign, you help the global fiction writing community, and more than that, you help touch the lives of countless readers. We believe that stories have that kind of power. That's why we pursue quality and diversity that will make a positive impact on our society.

Come be a part of that.

Other Ways You Can Help

Thanks for your time! Please share this project with your writer friends who will appreciate this cause.
