By contributing to this campaign, you help the global fiction writing community, and more than that, you help touch the lives of countless readers. We believe that stories have that kind of power. That's why we pursue quality and diversity that will make a positive impact on our society.
Come be a part of that.

Other Ways You Can Help
Thanks for your time! Please share this project with your writer friends who will appreciate this cause.

story:
WHY I AM WRITING THIS BOOK 
Writing is my passion and I have done a lot of it in my field of marketing, along with books, articles and columns.  But none of the books and articles I have written have inspired me more than this book project.  

Every day, I hear friends, neighbors and social media connections say they are worried about where our society is headed and, for many, overly aggressive political correctness is at the root of it.  They worry about extremism and how social media fuels it.  They worry about "social censorship" and the fear of being socially blacklisted and labeled for standing up for what they believe in.   

They also worry about the dangers of knee-jerk activism before all the facts are known in the absence of witnesses and evidence.  And, they worry about how a rush-to-judgment can ruin careers and reputations virtually overnight with no going back.  They are concerned about how far this will go and its impact on free speech, the right to have a dissenting opinion, and "due process."

Additionally, they worry about how civil debate has devolved into partisan rancor and even violence.  

The fiasco that the Kavanaugh Supreme Court confirmation process morphed into demonstrates the depth of the dysfunction that we are now confronted with in society and government.  

Is political correctness a good idea that has gone too far?  Or, is it news bias, fake news, and the Russians that are fueling the divisions and public vitriol among us?  Is the "Me Too" movement creating needed accountability or has it gone so far that it is becoming a war against men?

Perhaps it is all of these.  Or, perhaps it is a confluence of these mashed together with political bullying and a lack of respect for facts and truth.

Where is this taking us as a nation?  What can we do to heal what divides us, and to protect our personal freedoms, while holding others to account in a fair and balanced way?

This book will delve into the most polarizing issues of our day and the impact of political correctness, social media, news bias and other influencers on them.  It will also seek to provide answers to what we can do about it.

Why do I refer to it as the "book everyone is afraid to write"?  Quite simply, this is because of the reluctance of the media, government leaders, and other major  influencers to go far enough in calling out or even questioning socially popular positions and actions where facts are lacking or distorted, or which threaten our Constitutional protections and guiding principles.  
 

HOW THE FUNDS RAISED WILL BE USED
Please refer to my FAQ for details.

PRELIMINARY CHAPTER TITLES
Acknowledgments
1 – Why Everyone is Afraid to Write this Book
2 – Statues and Bathrooms and Guns, Oh My!
3 – The Inherent Dangers of Knee-jerk Activism
4 – Is “Me Too” Fueling a War Against Men or Creating Accountability?
5 – Political Correctness Run Amok
6 – Coloring books, Play-Doh and Nap-time on College Campuses
7 – How Did We Get Here and Where Are We Headed?
8 – Lost Civility, is it Too Late?
9 – Winners and Losers . . .
10. Guest Author Chapter

PRELIMINARY TIMETABLE
30 DAYS - Finalize chapter titles, reserve domain, design book website, commence research, outline chapters.

60 DAYS - Complete research, finalize book title and cover, commence writing.

90 DAYS - Reach out with interview requests to social movement leaders and celebrities, and for on-the-record comments.  Distribute sample chapter to backers who selected that perk. Continue writing. 

120-180 DAYS - Submit manuscript to qualified third-party editor. Finalize the book. Upload advance digital copies.  


HOW THE FUNDS RAISED WILL BE USED
Please refer to FAQ for details.


ABOUT ME
I am a business owner, sometimes activist, and part-time writer.  This is my ninth and most important book.  Some have found homes with a publisher and are on the Kindle store and others are works-in-progress.  I have also written numerous published articles and columns through the years, served as an editor of an educational journal, and as a contributing editor for a metropolitan women’s magazine.  I also did a short stint in major market radio news early in my career.  You can learn more about me here:  tommipryor.com
 

HOW YOU CAN HELP
I hope you will watch the video above and decide to become a part of this project as a backer.  The unique perks I am offering provide a variety of ways to add your voice and collaborate with me on this.  These range from receiving a “sneak peek” to doing your own pre-publication review to your name and testimonial on the back cover to contributing a guest chapter (and more)!  All backers will be acknowledged in the book but may remain anonymous if preferred.  All will receive advance digital copies and will receive a discount in the next phase of funding when it hopefully goes to print.

You can also help this much needed book come to life by sharing this campaign with your friends, family and co-workers!  Please click on the social share icons next to the red "Back this Project" button at top right to share on Facebook and other social media,  Of course, I hope you will also join me in bringing this book to life as a backer!

Gratefully,
Tommi

story:
The Author

Howdy, folks! I'm Matt Spencer, a passionate storyteller with a dark sense of humor and long history of short stories and novellas published in various magazines and anthologies over the years, as well as several novels. Of late, I've gotten fed up with the traditional publishing world, after the current publisher was bought out by new management who've all but run the company into the ground and dragged my up and coming writing career to a crawl. So here I am, learning the business of independent publishing as I go, and finding out that the old saying "You have to spend money to make money" must have been coined for this racket. So for my first foray into independent publishing, I've decided to assemble a collection of some of my best short fiction. By "best", I mean both stories that have received the strongest responses from readers over the years, and those that mean a lot to me. By contributing to this campaign, you'll not only be helping me assemble a handsome, professionally assembled volume, but also giving me a jump promoting the hell out of it, getting it in front of the largest audience possible.

How You'll Be Helping, and What's In It For You

The majority of these funds will go to my cover artist and editors, for layout design, and I also need to purchase an ISBN number and an upload fee at IngramSpark. After that, I'll need to buy advertising and a pile of copies to sell at conventions and signings. Since I'm already shelling out some of my own money into some of these proceedings and this is my first adventure in crowd-funding, I'm starting with relatively modest goals...but big things often start small, don't they now?

As a contributor, you'll be among the first to get to read the completed book, along with some special prizes I've cooked up for you. See the list of perks to your right for details.

 

What People Are Already Saying:

Of the stories to be included in this collection, here's what readers have already had to say about a few of them

"Just Chew Your Way Out":

"Cassias isn’t in the best place in his life. His princess-girlfriend is in a magic coma and he’s stuck out in the hinterlands finding the bits and pieces of magic he hopes will bring her back to him. He’s a got a magic sword he’s bonded to his body and a head full of black magic tricks to put him one up on anyone else around. But after one betrayal too many, he’s out for revenge… but once he starts on that path he loses control of where it takes him.

Spencer writes great grimdark fantasy, and Cassias is a great trickster character I hope the world gets to see a lot more of. He’s more trickster than a straight up blood-and-guts barbarian, and trends more toward anti-hero than traditional hero. That said, if you are looking for a quick bite of fiction, you can do a lot worse than this and not a lot better." - Matthew Gomez, editor at Broadswords and Blasters

"When stand-up comedian/mage/sword-swinging badass Cassias falls for an up-and-coming princess, he'll stop at nothing to make sure they're together, even if it means wandering the countryside and making bad deal after bad deal. This time, the bad deal may have been a step too far, as Cassias has thrown his lot in with a Priest King, who has his own plans for using Cassias, and they may or may not involve his famed skills with blade or magic.

I'll be honest in that the voice took some getting used to for me, what with a very modern sensibility from Cassias mashed up with a rather formal old-school fantasy tone from surrounding characters, especially the Priest King. But after a page or so I forgot all about those concerns and just let myself enjoy the unfolding story. Spencer writes pulp fiction in a voice that is irreverent and fun. This story is well worth the time I spent reading it." - Cameron Mount, editor at Broadswords and Blasters

"Lambs of Slaughter In Blue And Gold"

"What’s a ghost to do when his lover is reborn in the same small town where they were killed so many years ago by the cult that controls it? What can he do when he sees her living her life, but his body is all razor blades and sharp ends? And what will happen if she ever wakes up to her life before?

More horror and urban fantasy, Spencer hits all the right notes of a could-be toxic relationship and how the real monster might be the last person you expect it to be. My biggest regret for this piece is that it isn’t a bit longer, doesn’t get a little more into the meat of the character, but all the rage and impotence of being able to see the world, of being close to a person you love without being able to fully be with them is well executed. 
If you are looking for a quick sharp jab of a story, Spencer has you covered." - Matthew Gomez, editor at Broadswords and Blasters

"What sort of life can you lead if you and your lover have been sacrificed by an ancient cult? How about when your lover is reborn without the memories of her passing, and she unintentionally summons your spirit to hover in her wake? Matt Spencer explores the cycle of birth, death, rebirth, and vengeance in this short urban fantasy. This story engenders the right level of disjointed questioning on the part of the reader to really sink home the same sort of disjointed questioning in the narrator. He knows just as much as we do, which might be frustrating for some readers, but students of unreliable narrators should be okay. I'd like to see more of this couple, possibly in a series of linked stories or perhaps in a longer short story or novella." - Cameron Mount, editor at Broadswords and Blasters

"Island of Skulls"

"This extended fantasy short story is a real treat. In my experience, good fantasy writing is difficult to achieve, one reason being that I'm always comparing such stories to the sheer inventiveness, masterful descriptions and original world building of Martin, Tolkien and Howard. But Matt Spencer comes close—extremely close. After just a few sentences, you are immersed in this world. People and place names sound like they 'fit', rich prose puts you in the scene with descriptions involving all 5 senses.
The story has a Conan or King Kull vibe to it. Two youngsters happen upon a mystical girl on one of their daily forays in the territory surrounding their home village located in the land of Deschemb. She tempts them with barely concealed lascivious overtures, and the enigmatic phrase “We shall all dance the Dance of the Rising, in the House of Schrias, on the Island of Skulls.”
The two protagonists learn more about the mythological nature of the island and its nearest habitation, Rothollow, from the village wise woman or 'blender'. To say more about the plot will deprive you of your enjoyment reading it; but suffice it to say, when you reach the end-page and read the words 'to be continued' then you can be sure you'll want to buy the next issue on the strength of this story alone." - from Amazon review of Broadswords and Blasters #1, where the story first appeared.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute personally, hey, that's understandable. Times are tough. You could still do me a solid by spreading the word around to anyone who likes to kind of stories I have tell, thirsty for a fresh voice, who might have the spare cash to help make it happen.

story:
Hello, it's me.

Hi. It's me, Brooks. I'm a writer. I love ideas and stories, which both feel the same, as they are most of the time marching through my mind space. 

I've used this mighty handy part of myself (my mind space) doing standup comedy, (over thirty years), writing three popular books, Clutter Busting, and Clutter Busting Your Life, and Better Late Than Dead!, as well as three television show pilots.

This campaign for Brooksisms! is important to me because I lovingly wrote this book to make fun of the human condition. I don't think there's anything better than writing humorously and drawing simple cartoons to illustrate and coalesce our amazing foibles, as well as our daring dos. I "courageously" use myself as the role model for both.

When you contribute towards Brooksisms! seeing the light of day, you help the world laugh at itself and take things more lightly. When we laugh at ourselves and the world, we create peace of mind. What a great thing to do! Think of this book as people's personal Jester that lightens the loads of their lives.

What I Need & What You Get

In order for Brooksisms! to see the light of day, I need you to help me raise $1490. Here's where the money is going:

1. $350 for editing, which involves trimming any excess, and helping make sure the stories are tight and communicating. The editor will also fix the multitudes of my grammar and spelling mistakes. (Hey, I heard George Lucas is terrible at both, too!)

2. $690 to pay for page layout and front and back cover design by the brilliant Colleen Sheehan from Write Dream Repeat Book Design. 

3. $450 for copies of Brooksisms!. These will be sent out for publicity and marketing.

Perks!

A $25 contribution to my campaign will get you a signed copy of Brooksisms! (Indiegogo will charge you a $7 shipping fee in the U.S.)

A $50 contribution to my campaign will get you a signed copy of Brooksisms!, as well as a special cartoon designed and drawn especially for you in the front of the book. (Indiegogo will charge you a $7 shipping fee in the U.S.)

A $150 contribution will get you the signed copy of Brooksisms!, as well as the specially designed cartoon just for you, and an original 14" x 17" oil pastel painting by myself made especially for you. (Indiegogo will charge you a $7 shipping fee in the U.S.)

A $200 contribution will get you the signed copy of Brooksisms!, as well as a one-hour Skype Clutter Busting session in which I will help you find and remove the clutter in your home, office, or life. (Indiegogo will charge you a $7 shipping fee in the U.S.)

If I don't reach the goal, the money will go into a savings account meant only for the purposes of publishing the book. As more funds come in from other sources, they will be combined and the book will come together that way.

The Impact

When you contribute towards the editing, design, and marketing of Brooksisms! you help make my day! Imagine me jumping around smiling. (I actually do that when good things happen.) I love this book and I would love to see it come to life, and to be read and enjoyed by many, many people.

It's impossible to do things on our own. It takes many villages (at least 12) to make anything happen. I can't afford to make Brooksisms! happen on my own. Which it turns out is a good thing, because when I do something like this with your help, it's more fun! We're doing it together. 

Challenges

It can be a noisy world. It takes a lot of work to get heard. First you have to hear yourself. It took me a long time to come up with these stories and cartoons. It often felt like mining for gems. A lot of stories and cartoons were rocks not diamonds and didn't make it into this collection. The ones that shone, did. Luckily I love mining!

The next step is to have the editors do their polishing. It's great to have their help. They can see the things I can't. I'll take what they recommend, and do one last edit of my own. I have the lust for stories carrying me through this long but fruitful process.

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand if you can't contribute financially towards Brooksisms! at this time. But if you can, I would love it if you would spread the word about my campaign to others. That would be a great gift to me and to my book. Thanks!

story:
Short Summary

Azania is a speculative science fiction novel based in a parallel(?) African dimension. The characters are modern, edgy and African. This project has been a year in the making and now we seek your help to make it complete.

What We Need & What You Get

As you may have noticed, we are seeking to raise 5000 USD to make this project an overwhelming success worldwide. 

About 3500USD will go directly into the publishing costs which will be about 500 books in total.

1500 of the funds raised will go towards the media campaign as this is a self-published, crowdfunded project.

The Impact

Azania is book 2 of the Mashu oMusha series. Seeing the impact of the first book motivated me to reprint it and also to work on this second book. Africans, young and old, have been thirsty for stories told from their point of view and even in their language. Azania uses a hybrid of Zulu and English to give Africans higher dreams. The talks and panels I have been a part of have shown that work like this is truly needed.

Risks & Challenges

As Afrofuturism as a movement grows, it becomes hard to separate the real from the fake. As an African in particular, I find myself wading through mountains of American content when researching the subject. But Azania is true Afrofutirism. It is high speculative Science Fiction literature and needs support to make it through the interfering noise. Your support would make the difference.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Do share this campaign. Tweet, WeChat, Facebook and Google+ it, even. The success of this project depends on numbers. 

Also, do use indiegogo.com's share tools to make it easier. 

Thank you for being here.

story:
Last year, I set out to identify a media platform dedicated to telling the story of under-served African startups. A platform that they can call their home. One they can use to identify and leverage opportunities for funding, mentorship, reaching out to new customers and users. Unfortunately, I failed to identify any.

As it is currently, it is hard for African startups - especially the homebred - to get publicity from mainstream media such as radio, TV, and newspapers. It is only startups that win a competition or raise a round of funding that may stand a chance. The other category is that of startups that can afford to pay for the service. Or, those that know an editor, producer or someone influential at a media house.

But, the question remains; How about those that do not know anyone? Those that don't have the money? Where should they go? Who will tell their story?

Because media is a very critical catalyst in UNLOCKING opportunities for startups. Especially those struggling to raise funding or get mentorship.

That's why, on the 1st of March 2017, I decided to launch Startup Digest Africa. Since then, I am happy to say that we have been able to UNLOCK some opportunities for the startups we have featured.

In 7 months, over 10 angel investors have contacted us from within and outside Africa about the featured startups. We have also got requests to help with identifying more startups. This made us realize that there is a lot of untapped opportunities for African startups that do not get to media.

That is why, as Startup Digest Africa, we decided to be the HOME & VOICE for African startups. Especially those that are currently under-served. Yet, with the current financial resources, we are unable to achieve this at scale.

This is why we have launched a crowdfunding campaign. We are seeking to raise $25,000 by close of 2017. This will enable us to tell more stories of African startups throughout 2018.

We need your financial support, however small. Even though you are unable to contribute, you can help us spread the word by sharing this.

Uganda is among the under-served startup ecosystems on the continent. Thus, the funds will go towards helping us tell more stories of startups in Uganda by covering regions beyond Kampala. We will also carry out a comprehensive survey of the funding landscape in the country, compile an exhaustive database of startups in the country, as well as carry out a survey of all the stakeholders in the Ugandan startup ecosystem.

story:
Set Sail & Travel…!

I am Zara Chan, an architectural designer from Hong Kong.  Travelling has always been my best part of life.  Apart from going to a new place and see new things, I also enjoy meeting new people and share my life.  Therefore a lot of time I prefer travelling for a long period: to visit places apart from famous tourist spot; to enjoy both cityscape and nature; to meet local people and to have a taste of living a life that they are living.

So, I want to record all my experience, feelings, and also my travelling tips through the media of photobooks.  This is not only a record, but also a sharing for all of you who love travelling as much as I do.

The Campaign was set up to raise fund for my publication of the travel photobook series, Set Sail & Travel, and most importantly, for my upcoming trip to Italy. 


Rock the Rockies – My first book

The first travel photobook would be recording my previous 3-week trip to Canada – mainly to the Rockies. 

The book is structured with time and place sequence:

The adventure was recorded by passages and photos:

Useful tips provided especially for transportation if you are planning to go, also some side topics related to the places found during the trip or when I did my research before head.

If you are worried about the content of the book, you can check them out first at http://setsailandtravel.blogspot.hk/ (ongoing update) or from our facebook site Set Sail n travel

The content would be more or less the same but you would certainly get more passages, photos and tips in the book.


Next stop – Italy

After the trip to Canada, I am planning a 2-month trip to Italy, which would be in June 2015, and I would do the same sharing through writing another travel book.  I need your support on the trip and the publication of the books.


Rewards

Shipping is not included. The exact amount of shipping fee would be advise later.



Hidden Treasures



Programme and Schedule



Other ways to help

Except being a backer you can also support us by:

- Follow our facebook and Instagram and get the most updated information;

- Go to our blog, comment and read our latest news; 

- Share our campaign through social media and ask friends to support us



BIG THANK YOU!

story:
Important:

I have to write this book that I believe every parent should own - wherever in the world they are. It's vital that I offer the knowledge I have to stop parents making mistakes at their child's expense - I personally care enough to make the effort, and I believe parents will too.

Let me explain:
  • Millions of babies, infants, toddlers & children are wearing ill-fitting, damaging shoes. FACT.
  • Millions of parents have no idea that they are damaging their child's feet. FACT. 
  • Parents are buying shoes from shops following bad advice from staff. FACT.
  • Parents are buying shoes either off-the-shelf or online without knowing if the shoes are suitable. FACT. 
  • Parents waste money on shoes which don't fit and won't last. FACT.
I can help. I have a wealth of experience. I am a Mum as well as a shoe shop owner and I care. I know exactly where mistakes are made and where parents are coming from; they want the best for their child but need guidance.
The facts above apply everywhere - the US, Europe and beyond. But the amazing thing is, I believe that a book on this subject is simply not available. How exciting is that - for me to write and you to own a first? Before I sit down and commit my knowledge to paper (or tablet, in this case), I would like assurance, in the form of backing, that there is an interest - before I allocate the time necessary. Make no mistake - armed with this advice you will now be able to make informed decisions about purchasing the correct shoes for your child; be it from "staffed" shoe shops, "self-service" shoe shops or online.


The working contents list is as follows:

Introduction.

Why it is important.

Pram shoes - what to look for, what to avoid and what to ask.  

Cruisers/ pre-walkers - what to look for, what to avoid and what to ask.

Walkers - what to look for, what to avoid and what to ask.

School Shoes - what to look for, what to avoid and what to ask.

Sandals - what to look for, what to avoid and what to ask.

Boots - what to look for, what to avoid and what to ask.

Trainers - what to look for, what to avoid and what to ask.

How to make your trip to your shoe shop less stressful. 

Problem Feet.

What the shops don’t tell you.


There will be something here for every age, every budget. The text will be easy to digest, and there will be explanatory photographs throughout.


How I am able to write this book:

Feet and shoes have always played a major part in my work – a lifetime of aerobic instructing and other related fitness teaching showed me how balance, posture and general well-being starts with the feet – and more accurately footwear. I branched out into supplying physiological footwear for adults in 2000, opening my first independent shoe shop in 2001. Shortly after that, my own daughter was beginning to need proper shoes for walking and, of course, school shoes followed. It was around 2006 that I decided that the service and advice I was getting for her was terrible and that I really needed to supply and fit children’s shoes myself. My knowledge and determination to make sure that I only let children go out of my shop wearing correctly fitted shoes, quickly made my shop THE place to go in my area, from baby to late school age. Parents came, saw and understood the importance of what I was doing, and continued to keep coming back. Read what some of them have been kind enough to say HERE.


Why?

Over the years I have fitted thousands of shoes on little feet. I know what is needed, and I also know that many parents are not being properly advised in lots of shoe shops – even some of those well-known shops that offer a fitting service. Parents frequently come in with their children wearing shoes bought elsewhere and ask me to check them. Quite frankly some of the fittings I have seen have been shocking. Those kids must be so uncomfortable in their shoes – wouldn't your feet be sore if you were in one or even two sizes too small and the wrong width? It happens, believe me. I am not on a crusade, I won't be naming brands or retail outlets and I am not looking to discredit anyone, but I believe every parent has the right to make the correct choice of footwear for their child. Many parents genuinely have not got a clue what to look for – and why should they? That’s why they go to proper shoe shops, isn’t it? But unfortunately you cannot rely on the advice that many staff, retailers and manufacturers offer. Granted, they are in business to make money, but that doesn’t mean that what they say and do is right. Follow the advice in this guide and you will have a clearer understanding of how to choose shoes to give your child healthy feet for life.


What I Need & What You Get

As an eBook, it is only priced at £3 - so all I need is a backing of £3, but from each of 1,000 people - this will get you a copy of my eBook delivered direct to your inbox. That's a lot of people - if you could also share the idea with your friends then there is more chance of us all reaching our goal. The information contained in this book will change the way you shop for your child's shoes, give you a greater understanding of what you should be looking for, improve the welfare of your child and SAVE YOU MONEY by way of avoiding costly mistakes - guaranteed!


Risks & Challenges

There are no risks that I can see - I have the knowledge and also the ability to create a eBook. The only risk is to myself, in the form of committing the time to write the book and not getting the returns - which is why I am using Indiegogo to spread the word and kickstart the whole campaign. This book will only happen if I get the funding - so if you want the book and fund the requested £3, then you will either get the book, or your money back if the target has not been reached. There is no risk; think of it as pre-ordering a book, with a money-back guarantee if it is not produced.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to fund this yourself with £3, then perhaps you know someone who could benefit from this wealth of knowledge. Perhaps your child is now too old, or maybe you do not have children yourself - but everyone knows someone who should have this book. Please tell them about it!

story:
О проекте

Сколько себя помню, я собираю и пересказываю всевозможные забавные житейские истории, да и со мной они регулярно случаются. Ну, и сочиняю, конечно. Прошло уже много лет с тех пор, как я опубликовал в интернете первую из них. За эти годы было создано и закрыто несколько блогов, что-то расползлось по сети, что-то сгинуло в недрах архивов. Это - наиболее полное собрание моих нелитературных сочинений.

Этот сборник - ответ сразу на несколько вопросов:

- Где почитать все?

- Как там было в истории про этого... ну, который...?

- Я это как-то пропустил /а. Где можно почитать?

- Мне срочно нужны десять минут здорового смеха. Расскажешь что-нибудь?

- Когда следующая книга? (Тут важно подчеркнуть, что книга с литературными произведениями тоже выйдет в этом году, но с "#Мемориз", кроме автора и иллюстратора, у нее ничего общего не будет)

 

Где почитать отрывки для ознакомления?

Вот несколько фрагментов

Жили-были

https://www.facebook.com/alexander.taver/posts/...

Мемориз

https://www.facebook.com/alexander.taver/posts/...

Розовоединорожье

https://www.facebook.com/pink.unicorner/posts/1...

Клочья

https://www.facebook.com/alexander.taver/posts/...

Почему краудфанд?

Создание книги стоит денег - верстка, вычитка, корректура, оформление, печать и прочее.

Типичная ошибка современного автора - сначала издать книгу за свой счет, а потом уже искать, куда бы ее пристроить. Кроме того, не каждый, кто во время подготовки уверяет, что собирается купить книгу, действительно ее покупает. Предзаказ решает все эти проблемы.

Поскольку это уже не первый такой проект, можно довольно точно предсказать, сколько денег на что пойдет. Я планировал бюджет с небольшим запасом на всякие непредвиденные случаи (изменение тарифов издательства и типографии, падение валют, переход в другое издательство и т.д.).

Для выхода печатной книги понадобится порядка $1500. В цели кампейна указана $500, т.к. часть денег поступит напрямую от тех, кто не хочет или не может использовать Indiegogo и электронные кошельки.

Это сумма не покрывает дерзкого намерения снабдить каждую из более, чем сотни историй, небольшой иллюстрацией-комиксом в том же стиле, что и заглавная картинка кампейна. Чтобы осуществить эту мечту хотя бы частично, в предзаказы добавлена опция "Покровитель искусств", позволяющая спонсировать создание одной иллюстрации. На сколько грантов хватит - столько и оформим.

Грант не предусматривает для спонсора возможности вмешиваться в работу иллюстратора, но его замечания о том, что именно и как именно иллюстрировать, будут, где это возможно, приняты к сведению. Сумма гранта покрывает только создание картинки и 1-2 незначительных правки(обычно больше и не требуется, иллюстратор надежный), но никак не переделку или долгие споры о деталях и исполнении . Во избежание лишних споров, никакой привязки картинок к конкретным грантам не будет.

Все, что останется после издательских расходов, будет распределено следующим образом:

- если останется $1500 и более - проиллюстрировано будет всё

- остаток будет поделен между автором и героями историй. Возможно, нам даже хватит на мороженое.

Публикация будет проходить в 3 этапа.

1. Официальная презентация с раздачей книг

2. Рассылка экземпляров (включая электронные) тем, кто воспользуется привилегированными перками:

- Покровитель искусств

- Спонсор

3. Рассылка оставшихся экземпляров и размещение электронной версии в онлайн-магазинах

Между этапами может пройти несколько дней.

Если вдруг не наберется достаточно

На создание электронной версии хватит порядка $200. Если наберется больше этой суммы - все получат по электронной версии.

Для заказавших бумажные экземпляры в этом случае предусмотрены три варианта:

- полный возврат денег за вычетом процентов Idiegogo и платежных систем

- электронный вариант и возврат оставшейся суммы за вычетом процентов Idiegogo и платежных систем

- переоформить как заказ моей следующей книги, которая близка к завершению и гарантированно увидит свет. К сожалению, привелегированные заказы перенести не получится. Разница будет возвращена за вычетом процентов Idiegogo и платежных систем

Как помочь проекту?

Решили купить - сразу заказывайте. Быстрый рост фонда, особенно в первые дни, крайне важен для демонстрации состоятельности проекта и может привлечь новых желающих. И, конечно же, даст мне дополнительный стимул сделать побыстрее и покачественнее.

Распространяйте информацию об этой книге в соцсетях.

Рекомендуйте друзьям.

Помните, что книга - лучший подарок, чем открытка, а написать на ней можно то же самое. К тому же, это гораздо бюджетнее и изысканнее, чем отдариваться деньгами. Заказывайте про запас.

Помните: чем больше заказов, тем больше шансы книги увидеть свет. Есть некий минимум экземпляров, не достигнув которого придется свернуть всю затею.

Важно!

Только экземпляры этого тиража нумеруются в порядке приобретения, сопровождаются дарственными надписями и автографами.

В последующих могу гарантировать разве что номера, прочее - по обстоятельствам.
story_txt:
О проекте
Сколько себя помню, я собираю и пересказываю всевозможные забавные житейские истории, да и со мной они регулярно случаются. Ну, и сочиняю, конечно. Прошло уже много лет с тех пор, как я опубликовал в интернете первую из них. За эти годы было создано и закрыто несколько блогов, что-то расползлось по сети, что-то сгинуло в недрах архивов. Это - наиболее полное собрание моих нелитературных сочинений.
Этот сборник - ответ сразу на несколько вопросов:
- Где почитать все?
- Как там было в истории про этого... ну, который...?
- Я это как-то пропустил /а. Где можно почитать?
- Мне срочно нужны десять минут здорового смеха. Расскажешь что-нибудь?
- Когда следующая книга? (Тут важно подчеркнуть, что книга с литературными произведениями тоже выйдет в этом году, но с "#Мемориз", кроме автора и иллюстратора, у нее ничего общего не будет)
 
Где почитать отрывки для ознакомления?
Вот несколько фрагментов
Жили-были
https://www.facebook.com/alexander.taver/posts/...
Мемориз
https://www.facebook.com/alexander.taver/posts/...
Розовоединорожье
https://www.facebook.com/pink.unicorner/posts/1...
Клочья
https://www.facebook.com/alexander.taver/posts/...

Почему краудфанд?
Создание книги стоит денег - верстка, вычитка, корректура, оформление, печать и прочее.
Типичная ошибка современного автора - сначала издать книгу за свой счет, а потом уже искать, куда бы ее пристроить. Кроме того, не каждый, кто во время подготовки уверяет, что собирается купить книгу, действительно ее покупает. Предзаказ решает все эти проблемы.
Поскольку это уже не первый такой проект, можно довольно точно предсказать, сколько денег на что пойдет. Я планировал бюджет с небольшим запасом на всякие непредвиденные случаи (изменение тарифов издательства и типографии, падение валют, переход в другое издательство и т.д.).
Для выхода печатной книги понадобится порядка $1500. В цели кампейна указана $500, т.к. часть денег поступит напрямую от тех, кто не хочет или не может использовать Indiegogo и электронные кошельки.Это сумма не покрывает дерзкого намерения снабдить каждую из более, чем сотни историй, небольшой иллюстрацией-комиксом в том же стиле, что и заглавная картинка кампейна. Чтобы осуществить эту мечту хотя бы частично, в предзаказы добавлена опция "Покровитель искусств", позволяющая спонсировать создание одной иллюстрации. На сколько грантов хватит - столько и оформим.
Грант не предусматривает для спонсора возможности вмешиваться в работу иллюстратора, но его замечания о том, что именно и как именно иллюстрировать, будут, где это возможно, приняты к сведению. Сумма гранта покрывает только создание картинки и 1-2 незначительных правки(обычно больше и не требуется, иллюстратор надежный), но никак не переделку или долгие споры о деталях и исполнении . Во избежание лишних споров, никакой привязки картинок к конкретным грантам не будет.
Все, что останется после издательских расходов, будет распределено следующим образом:
- если останется $1500 и более - проиллюстрировано будет всё
- остаток будет поделен между автором и героями историй. Возможно, нам даже хватит на мороженое.
Публикация будет проходить в 3 этапа.
1. Официальная презентация с раздачей книг
2. Рассылка экземпляров (включая электронные) тем, кто воспользуется привилегированными перками:
- Покровитель искусств
- Спонсор
3. Рассылка оставшихся экземпляров и размещение электронной версии в онлайн-магазинах
Между этапами может пройти несколько дней.
Если вдруг не наберется достаточно
На создание электронной версии хватит порядка $200. Если наберется больше этой суммы - все получат по электронной версии.Для заказавших бумажные экземпляры в этом случае предусмотрены три варианта:
- полный возврат денег за вычетом процентов Idiegogo и платежных систем
- электронный вариант и возврат оставшейся суммы за вычетом процентов Idiegogo и платежных систем
- переоформить как заказ моей следующей книги, которая близка к завершению и гарантированно увидит свет. К сожалению, привелегированные заказы перенести не получится. Разница будет возвращена за вычетом процентов Idiegogo и платежных систем
Как помочь проекту?
Решили купить - сразу заказывайте. Быстрый рост фонда, особенно в первые дни, крайне важен для демонстрации состоятельности проекта и может привлечь новых желающих. И, конечно же, даст мне дополнительный стимул сделать побыстрее и покачественнее.Распространяйте информацию об этой книге в соцсетях.Рекомендуйте друзьям.Помните, что книга - лучший подарок, чем открытка, а написать на ней можно то же самое. К тому же, это гораздо бюджетнее и изысканнее, чем отдариваться деньгами. Заказывайте про запас.Помните: чем больше заказов, тем больше шансы книги увидеть свет. Есть некий минимум экземпляров, не достигнув которого придется свернуть всю затею.
Важно!
Только экземпляры этого тиража нумеруются в порядке приобретения, сопровождаются дарственными надписями и автографами.
В последующих могу гарантировать разве что номера, прочее - по обстоятельствам.

story:
Hello, we are the 3D Print Monthly team and we are here to talk to you today about our magazine.

3D Print Monthly is a magazine giving a dose of all things relating to 3D Printing. All issues are feature packed with :-

  • Printer Reviews  
  • Filament Reviews  
  • Tips and Tricks  
  • Diagnosis Lab  
  • Directory in Back for businesses  
  • Interviews  
  • Useful Gcode  
  • Featured Print Designs  
  • For Sale Section  
  • Guides  
  • Useful Upgrades  
  • DIY Section  
  • Upcoming Tech  
  • Tutorials  
  • Project Fails (Kickstarter Etc)  
  • Company Reviews / Feedback  
  • Creative uses of 3D Printers  
  • News
  • Team Diary

The idea came after we bought our first pair of 3D Printers, and found ourselves hunting all across the internet picking various tips from across the globe on how to get prints to work. And then it hit us, wouldn't it be great if this information was all collated into a magazine for all to share and enjoy.

The magazine will be sold at £4.99 for a printed edition, and £3.99 for the digital edition. We are hoping to become a central resource for information, and to be able to offer advertising to raise funds moving forwards.

To keep track with the current progress of the first issue why not check out our website : www.3DPrintMonthly.co.uk

story:
WELCOME

Architecture for Refugees welcomes you to this crowdfunding campaign! Please join us, purchase the book or one of the alternative supporter packages and contribute to improving living conditions, housing, public facilities and infrastructure for refugees. 

This project brings together a diverse range of experience, expertise, strategies and models to inspire and improve future interventions and collaborations which result in better living conditions for refugees, whilst also ensuring they are empowered by these processes and at the centre of projects. 

CONTRIBUTE AND COLLABORATE!

We are aiming to raise €45,000 to support compilation and publication of the book. We aim to print 1000 copies initially and share the publication extensively both online and offline with a wide range and network of contacts, organisations, institutions and partners.

The fundraising target of €45,000 will be spent on the following:

- Project monitoring and evaluation of all the 25-30 projects featured in the book

- Compilation, drafting and editing of articles and contents

- Translation

- Extensive photo and video documentation

- Design and formatting

- Publishing

The TEAM at Architecture for Refugees DONATES a large amount of our free time to achieving our objective of SUPPORTING REFUGEES and ensuring their rights. A huge part of the project for this book is being planned and managed through voluntary work. YOUR PART in this crowdfunding appeal is also FUNDAMENTAL. Your contribution and all funds raised will be invested EFFICIENTLY to produce a PROFESSIONAL and EXCITING product which will make a PRACTICAL difference to the lives of refugees all over the world. 

There are different PERKS - packages and ITEMS available and all SUPPORT will be greatly appreciated. THANK YOU very much in advance for your CONTRIBUTION and SOLIDARITY. Working TOGETHER we can make a difference to the lives of refugees and host communities.

(FINANCIAL UPDATE - Dear All,

Many of you have asked us about the financial part of our crowdfunding campaign. Why €45.000 and what are we going to do with this amount? This is the first project of the Architecture for Refugees team where we ask for money. Until now, we worked and are still working on a pro bono basis. This project, however, needs more and better resources so the final product can become a really usable and successful knowledge transfer BOOK.  

We will use €1.000 - 1.500 per project / article to collect information and materials, analyse the findings and write the articles about the most significant experiences and knowledge. With 25 projects, this part of the process would cost around €30.000.

We will use the remaining €15.000 for publishing: to finalise the book’s design, check the texts, print the 1000 copies and deliver them to you.

Thanks for your feedback! If you have any further questions, please don’t hesitate to ask!

Best, The AfR TEAM)

FROM FIELD TO FIELD

The BOOK offers architectural, urban planning and spatial IDEAS and SOLUTIONS which support the realisation of BETTER LIVING CONDITIONS for REFUGEES. We aim to INSPIRE and ENCOURAGE architects, urban planners and stakeholders to action; outline the NEEDS and POSSIBILITIES on offer; and bring TOGETHER all stakeholders, providing alternative spatial solutions, better infrastructure and more livable spaces for refugees. 

EXPERTS from the field of ARCHITECTURE and URBAN PLANNING will SHARE their extensive EXPERIENCE on everything from organising a UNHCR refugee camp in Jordan to developing a communal space and community in Greece. The BOOK includes PRACTICAL INFO on topics like organising conferences, documenting and sharing knowledge, evaluation of past projects and positive feedback, developing projects in the present and formulating future interventions and strategies, educating students, how to act on site, how to map refugee settlements, … and not only HOW? but also WHY? And WHAT? 

Bringing KNOWLEDGE and PRACTICAL experience TOGETHER as a basis for further developments means that we don’t always have to start from zero. Rather we use the experience and KNOW-HOW gained from previous successful interventions which can be SCALED and ADAPTED to provide EFFECTIVE SOLUTIONS in other contexts. We create a KNOWLEDGE HUB and a PLATFORM for DISCUSSION between the different STAKEHOLDER GROUPS, encouraging more and more architects and urban planners to be active and to develop new strategies and solutions.

DETAILS

- 20 x 26 cm, full colour, soft cover

- ca. 250 pages

- ca. 25 articles / projects

- 8-10 pages per article / project

IMAGINE...

Can YOU imagine having to FLEE your home, your land, your country or even your own continent in order to SURVIVE and PROTECT your family? There are currently around sixty-five million refugees across the world who have had to do just this (UNHCR – June 2016). And then having made the long journey to SAFETY, imagine finding yourself in a refugee camp or settlement with very basic and inadequate facilities, services and infrastructure. Many refugees end up in just this situation, living in refugee camps and settlements which further compound their suffering. They are often left in limbo in these situations, for around seventeen years on average.

ARCHITECTURE FOR REFUGEES - WHAT WE DO

Architecture for Refugees provides an informational platform, educational resources, projects and collaborations which link refugees, refugee settlements and camps with architects, urban planners and designers, NGOs, government and UN agencies, refugee host communities and social and grassroots organisations. 

By facilitating collaboration between the different stakeholders in each case, by directly involving refugees in these processes and by harnessing and sharing innovative solutions, approaches and intervention models we aim to improve facilities, infrastructure and living conditions for refugees across the world.

KNOWLEDGE IS POWER

The key to our approach and mission is through the SHARING of KNOWLEDGE and expertise which EMPOWERS and inspires CHANGE. 

Architecture for Refugees is compiling this From Field to Field BOOK as an overview and guide, sharing information and experiences of different refugee contexts, projects, responses, intervention models, strategies, approaches and collaborations as well as experiences and perspectives from refugees themselves. 

Through this project we aim to INCREASE AWARENESS both of existing refugee situations and also of the range of POSSIBLE OPTIONS and INTERVENTIONS which are available and which can be ADAPTED and APPLIED in each particular case and context. 

This information and global knowledge exchange and transfer is crucial in CATALYSING further ACTION and improving our response capacity, especially in contexts of LIMITED RESOURCES. This book outlines different architectural, urban planning and design aspects, BEST PRACTICES, ideas and intervention strategies for improving and developing refugee settlements. 

We are collecting the KNOW-HOW, compiling experiences from a diverse range of organisations, academics, architects, NGOs, refugees and representatives of government and international agencies in order to provide a broad and comprehensive range of perspectives and visions. The BOOK will be PUBLISHED OFFLINE and ONLINE in order to maximise diffusion of the information and we hope that it is the spark for further involvement and actions from architects and the general public as well as from the diverse range of stakeholders already involved.

BRINGING US TOGETHER

We invited PROFESSIONALS from a range of different FIELDS of expertise and organisations as well as seeking EXPERIENCES and PERSPECTIVES from refugees. The book introduces their approaches, projects and EVALUATES the effectiveness of the intervention strategies and their advantages and disadvantages. What can we LEARN from the PAST and PRESENT and how can we DEVELOP and build better SOLUTIONS TOGETHER? 

The book HIGHLIGHTS the diversity of architectural and urban planning responses to the refugee crisis and compiles PERSPECTIVES from different STAKEHOLDERS and a range of APPROACHES. From shelter projects to community spaces to large refugee camps, the book discusses, details and analyses the practical efficacy of interventions in diverse countries on different continents as well as including perspectives and strategies from conferences, discussions, exhibitions, workshops, research, participatory processes, inclusive social projects and short and long-term projects. 

This knowledge TOOLKIT provides EFFECTIVE INTERVENTION MODELS and strategies, project monitoring, best practices and practical examples of diverse and complex problems with diverse and complex answers and solutions. Collaboration with partners in this book allows for collective development of improved short and long-term strategies. 

We believe that introducing and contrasting different approaches can encourage architects and urban planners to actively collaborate with development of infrastructure for refugees. Together we can share better and more sustainable solutions!

BE PART OF SOMETHING SPECIAL!

Your contribution can make a big difference to making the book a success and to improving the lives of refugees around the world. 

There are a range of amounts which you can contribute and which will support the publication of the book. Depending on your contribution, in addition to the book itself, you will also receive other thank you items in recognition of your kind support. 

We would also be very grateful if you could share this campaign on social media (facebook - twitter) and with any organisations who might like to contribute to or support the project or get involved. By supporting the compilation and publication of the book you will also be contributing to the long-term work of Architecture for Refugees in support of refugees. 

 

Thank you for your kindness and solidarity, sincerely,

THE TEAM - ARCHITECTURE FOR REFUGEES

Dennise Castillo, Nasr Chamma, Michael Evans, Zsófia Glatz and Bence Komlósi

www.architectureforrefugees.com

facebook - twitter

For our NEWSLETTER click HERE!

Depending on your contribution, in addition to the book itself, you will also receive other thank you items in recognition of your kind support. We would also be very grateful if you could share this campaign on social media (facebook - twitter) and with any organisations who might like to contribute to or support the project or get involved. By supporting the compilation and publication of the book you will also be contributing to the long-term work of Architecture for Refugees in support of refugees.  Thank you for your kindness and solidarity, sincerely,THE TEAM - ARCHITECTURE FOR REFUGEESDennise Castillo, Nasr Chamma, Michael Evans, Zsófia Glatz and Bence Komlósiwww.architectureforrefugees.comfacebook - twitterFor our NEWSLETTER click HERE!

story:
Why I can't make an anime.

I started with this ginormous idea in 2013. Make an anime.

Reflecting on four years of trial and error l have accepted that when you start from a position of.... 

  • not being able to draw,
  • not having contacts in the animation industry
  • not being Japanese
  • not having millions of dollars

... that not only can I not make an anime. I don't want to make one anymore.  

You see along the way I learned some important lessons about how anime comes to life. Anime is created by wealthy companies in Japan (and increasingly elsewhere) coming together to form a Production Committee. That committee spends millions of dollars often to create even one season of high quality animation that is viewed and licensed globally. The chances of getting your concept or short animation funded and produced this way are slim to none. Even if you are picked up your creativity suffers because your storytelling is limited by your budget. How many animes never see a season 2? What happened to the story? How poorly are animators and others paid to produce the works we love? Why is there such hatred for anything inspired by anime that is not from Japan? How does legal and illegal streaming affect traditional economic models for anime?

I had these questions on my mind when I launched the trailer for MultiFacet (www.themultifacet.com) in the fall of 2016 but the number one question people asked me was "when is the series coming out?"

I grew frustrated and tired of trying to explain the realities of being an independent who put every penny and moment of time they had for seconds of animation. For months I wallowed in the frustration of not seeing a path forward. I didn't have the resources to even produce another high quality trailer let alone a series.

In English "Nadir" means to be at the lowest point of something. I was living up to the name.

Yet each day online I would get messages from people from around the world who were...

  • making their own unconventional anime and struggling like me
  • trying desperately to work in anime but finding no way in
  • wanting to see the story of MultiFacet and loving what animation we did have
  •  wanting to try to start their own amazing dreams in anime and were inspired by my attempt

...As I processed all of these conflicting thoughts and emotions I took solace that my name has another meaning.

In Arabic "Nadir" means unique. It's time to start living up to that name too.

L.I.T.E. anime is a moment

I'm not going to try this the conventional way. Not anymore.

MultiFacet my story is the 1st  L.I.T.E. anime. A term I began using a year ago truthfully because I had no answers on what came next.

The term is built on four principles that run counter to how anime storytelling and production currently works. But now it needs to be more than a term, it needs to be something for real.  

Here's how the definition becomes real.

L. ess Seconds

I am going to take the seconds of animation I have at my disposal and re-use them in hundreds of different ways. Each second was painstakingly created and deserves more than to be viewed once and just discarded for the next. Any new animation will be merely seconds as well.

If you are looking for long form episodic seasons of animation with new content this isn't for you, go elsewhere. There are plenty of big budget animes for you to watch.

I. nclusive Diversities

I am going to invite people from all over the world to find a community of people who want to enjoy, and find a passionate (yet safe space) to express their fandoms, opinions and thoughts about the evolution of anime beyond Japan.

If you don't think it's anime go elsewhere. There are plenty of anime purists who you can find solidarity with.

T. ransmedia Narratives

I am going to give the opportunity for those with skills as animators, illustrators, writers, voice actors, thinkers, etc. to show their artistic expression. To see if we can find a different way to tell an anime story that combines multiple disciplines.

If you aren't willing to re-think storytelling go elsewhere. There are plenty of people who like the way stories are told now.

E. conomic Experimentations

I am going to try to collaborate to figure out a business model from the inside out. To see if together, we can ponder how we can all get paid.  Independents need to get compensated for their work: they currently give it away for free, or for so cheap it is practically free.

If you want a paying job in anime right away go elsewhere.  Current ways to work in the industry are hard to find but do exist.

 

What is the story of MultiFacet?

Rydin

Rydin Razi is a conflicted young man (that's him falling by the way). His older brother Billen (on the right in the violet, indigo, and blue) belongs to the Vibulare Facet who "Reason to None". His young brother Arsin (on the left in the red, orange and yellow) belongs the Royligio Facet who "Believe In The One." I mean middle child syndrome times infinity!

To say they Arsin and Billen don't like each other is a bit of an understatement. Their Facets have been in a protracted war like forever. The Royligio and Vibulare want to control the Well of Life, the world of Dunya's only remaining source of water....

The Well

Except the Well is controlled and mediated by MultiFacet who neutrally and ideologically "Stay The Middle". MultiFacet is all that keeps the Roy and Vib from going to war every day... barely. Rydin's ex Shabina (in the green in the middle) just happens to be a Potential and in-line to be the next leader of the world the Seleto. Awkward.

Prisms

Rydin hates all the Facets and especially Prisms. Because in Dunya you can use Prisms to refract light and turn that light into usable objects... A process called Lining.

                                            

Maybe Rydin's just jealous because Billen is an expert at Reasonal Lining, Arsin at Emotive Lining, and Shabina at Middle Lining. Rydin sucks at all of them. Like really really sucks.

Some bad breakups

Rydin doesn't speak to his brothers anymore, and broke up with Shabina. He asked them to abandon their life goals and choose his vision: a Dunya  without Lining, Prisms, and Facets ...

Yeah that went real well. Rydin well let's just say he is a bit of a loner now.

Dunya

To keep peace in the world of Dunya, MultiFacet convenes the World Water Council. The global body that negotiates and regulates how water is distributed between the Royligio and Vibulare.

Billen, Arsin, and Shabina were selected by their Facets to open the Council Session with a small ceremony that is a bit of a competition. 

Except the ceremony never concluded because Rydin accidentally crashed it. He absorbed all of their lining colours and accidentally made white lining. A very very bad thing. Because not only did it destroy a lot of stuff when the white light released it actually created three reflections of Rydin.

Which Rydin will you pick. You can only choose one...

Now his estranged brothers, and his former love each have a Rydin of their own to deal with. The "real" Rydin is missing...

 

FAQ in advance.

This isn't a conventional crowdfunding campaign. I won't be updating backers, or badgering people to join.

No, only those who want to be here and see money as just one piece of this are those that should come in. 

So I have listed a number of questions that I know people are going to have. 
(If I missed a major one and it keeps getting asked I will add it later)

 

Question: How do I participate in the story?

Why in a completely unconventional manner of course! The story of MultiFacet will be exclusively told in and collaborated on through the Workplace by Facebook Platform. It's Facebook but it allows you to create private networks to share and engage with content. To learn about it go here https://workplace.fb.com/ (if nothing else maybe it gives you ideas for your own projects).

If you are wondering what a story looks like in a platform like this... well here are some clues.

To access the world of MultiFacet and L.I.T.E. anime (https://themultifacetcom.facebook.com/ ) you need to pick a reward for one of the three communities that are forming. 

(You can only pick one reflection.)

Rydin's ROY Reflection: Focuses on Arsin Razi, Ascent of The Royligio Facet and his encounters with the Red Replica Reflection of Rydin.

Rydin's VIB Reflection: Focuses on Billen Razi, Base of The Vibulare Facet and his encounters with the Violet Replica Reflection of Rydin.

Rydin's G Reflection: Focuses on Shabina Rhung, Potential of The MultiFacet and her encounters with the Green Replica Reflection of Rydin. 

It's a Faceted world...


 

Once the campaign ends you will get access to the Reflection of your choice. Each Reflection will have different source material that you can than start working with and adding your voice to. It will be an organic process designed to build community and content in an experimental and iterative way. Fancy way to say there is going to be lots of trial and error:)!

Question. What does my $34 go to? 

1)  Create and host your specific e-mail address for the series for 2 months.

2)  Create and host your MultiFacet Workplace by Facebook Account for 2 months.

3) To give me and (depending on how many people are interested) my team time to organize four years of source material about the world of Dunya, the making of MultiFacet, and to lay the foundations of different faceted (see what I did there!) communities. 

4) Taxes and Fees Associated with Crowdfunding:)

Note: After 60 days you can decide if you want to keep going and building the L.I.T.E. anime project and want to renew or not. 

Question. Why is the goal so small?

Because I am immediately going to begin working on creating content inside the private community and am happy to grow this slowly. 

I honestly have no clue if this will be of interest to anyone. However maybe there are 15-20 brave souls out there who want to try...

Question. What if I can't fund during the campaign?

Each of Rydin's Reflections will take a maximum of 1100 people (3300 total). So if there are spots left at the end, I will keep this page going as an Indiegogo In-Demand page (same page just no time-limits and assuming we hit our listed goal) where you can still join a Reflection and start your 60 day period in the private platform for $34.

So join when you can. However, as life goes the earlier you join something emerging that more you get that feeling of being part of something at the ground floor and get to shape it. Also I am keeping the numbers manageable so their can be a real community experience. It's why it is capped and in a closed networks. Too often people just see dollar signs and forget about the individuals. Not happening here because I need more than your money, I need your brilliance. I take that seriously.

Who knows what this looks like next year...

Question.Who is on your team?

I have a core team around me of animators, thinkers, writers, and just great people who have helped me for years. But I am a lot to deal with on my own. So to protect their time and sanity and my current working relationships (won't be asking them to work for free), they will be introduced to anyone who is part of this project and wants to grow with it by collaborating inside the Workplace by Facebook Platform for MultiFacet. 

Question. Why can't the collaboration be free?

So as a Creator I see the world of content, intellectual property, and collaboration evolving. We live in a world of fanfics, remixes, and multiple interpretations. Yet that needs to be balanced with the very real need of creators and producers who literally spend each and every minute (yes even while sleeping) and dollar trying to bring something to life. 

So by putting this project inside a place that is not free to join, I sort of get to find out who wants to struggle through this as I have. It also allows me to keep a level of concentration on this new concept instead of being scattered all throughout social media where attention is so fragmented. I am so serious that when this campaign is over I will be limiting my activities exclusively to the new community, and not engaging on social media anymore.

One of the advantages of not being a giant corporation is that while I want to make money, I am not solely motivated by shareholders. There is a world of creative people out there who if you treat them fairly and compensate them can do amazing things. We will be creating guidelines around the community to navigate these issues, and by we I mean you as well. If you don't feel part of something why would you stick around?

Thanks for reading all the way to the Nadir...errr end.

Now if you will excuse me I need to go find Rydin...

...Somewhere.

-Nadir Shirazi
MultiFacet L.I.T.E anime facilitator
Hope to see you here in a couple of months!
https://themultifacetcom.facebook.com/

 

Rydin Razi-
Nobody In-Particular. Missing At Large in Dunya.

story:
Greeting Everyone;

My name is Sammie Ward. I am an Author/Writer/Publisher. I began my writing career in 1995; since then I have gone on to pen six novels, one novella, over fifty short stories, and numerous health articles. I have published with both traditional and non traditional publishers.

This Confession Campaign is important to me because my first short story was sold to Bronze Thrills Magazine, back in 2000. It was then owned and operated by Sterling McFadden. I would go on to sell over thirty stories for various magazines, then years later, the publisher discontinued the magazines were sold, and authors like myself had no place to write these types of stories.  In  2012, I decided to form my online publishing company called, Lady Leo Publishing. I wanted to bring back Confession stories. There was an appetite for these types of stories and I knew it. Instead of a magazine format, I decided to publish a single story in the form of an e-book. The Confessions remain 5-7,000 words. I gave the Author credit for their work. I also offered writers an advance of $100 for each story. Once the advance earned out, I began paying writers 30% royalties. 

During my time away, I noticed that no other publisher is putting the time or energy into this type of Short Stories. Confessions have been around for almost 96 years and are still a favorite among many readers. I would like to once again, tap into this forgotten genre market. However, this time around I would like to not only publish the stories as a single ebook, but I would like to also publish confessions in paperback format. Chicken Soup). In order to do this, I will need around $10,000 to start-up. The monies will be used to pay Editors, Graphic Designers, Marketing, Advances, and printing.  It will also give Authors a place to showcase their work. They can write as many stories as they would like.  Even if, I do not reach my goal of $10,000. What is donated will be used to fund LLP.  If you are unable to donate, please spread the word about Lady Leo Publishing. Head over to our website: https://www.ladyleopublishing.com. While you're there, read a FREE Sample or purchase a novel. Don't forget to hit the Share Button.

story:
THE ALIEN THEMED TAROT CARD DECK

Why support Inspiring Alien Tarot?

This is an alien themed tarot deck and guidebook set for starseeds, highly sensitive people and those who love colorful art as well as tarot collectors.

If you care about the quality of your tarot decks, this is the campaign to support!

Also if you care about the specialness and uniqueness of your tarot decks and want to support and independent artist, deck creator, tarot reader and a small business owner, this is the campaign to support.

  • My name is Alvia Crescens and I've grown up in an average family in an average town, not too many privileges and even less so as I've grown up and discovered who I really was all along. I'm a professional artist and tarot reader with a determinate spirit, so where I've lacked I've always made up in my existing resources. I'm an artschool graduate and this began in the time I attended artschool and did my degree work as I was also getting deeper into tarot.
  • This campaign celebrates the 3 year journey that the Inspiring Alien Tarot deck and upcoming guidebook has travelled so far - it has desired to be spread wider, so I shall respect its' (and YOUR) wishes to do so. This is the MAIN PURPOSE OF THIS CAMPAIGN! This deck has 11 reviews, all 5 stars which you can find here: https://inspiringalien.wixsite.com/inspiringali... 
  • Spreading it wider, however, means that it will need more funding. While my family background is certainly not the richest nor poorest, they cannot support me forever nor can they whip up a few 10s of grands to support my business with these decks. That should be obvious, but as there are some that this is not obvious to, I had to say that.  Ultimately, the funding will allow the deck to reach wider as well as me to live a more fulfilling lifestyle. Therefore this campaign does play a large role in my professional growth as well.
  • To be upfront, my journey so far with selling the collectors edition with less funds has not been easy - I had to learn the hard way on how to properly price the deck in which I was discounting on my talent as well as how to work around the expenses as I didn't want to discount the quality as well. I often had to buy individual decks before I was able to do the box designs and ship them to buyers, making the process very slow and even more expensive to me. I want to finally do it better and gather the funds first so that the production and shipping can go so much more smoothly and effortlessly, and to actually make some money from my craft instead of sacrificing my financial wellbeing for doing what I love.
  • When the necessary funds have been gathered, the larger scale production will be begin and this will help more people to enjoy hand made artwork in form of tarot cards that are printed in a quality cardstock of 350gsm, foiled mint green edges and a beautiful box that fits the A5 guidebook which has coloured imagery. When you think about the full effect in practical terms, in my personal life, this will allow me to keep creating for a living, have more quality in my life, and build my business by outsourcing tasks that don't bring me joy and lessen my workload (this does not mean i'm going to turn lazy - it means i'm able to work smarter and not harder without sacrificing the results).

Sample image for the new edition of the box design:

This deck will thus reach its' full circle from being a collectors piece of an artwork, an only 100 copies printed limited edition, to a wider spread amazing quality tarot readers edition divination tool. I'll also be able to print more guidebooks and decks at once so that I can cut down on production costs. The guidebook is almost finished and you can see some sneek peeks here: https://www.patreon.com/inspiringalien?tag=taro... 

We will give it justice and the exposure it deserves!!!

 

Cards without text / original artwork:

With text - limited edition:

Check out the reviews of the collectors edition, which has become more valuable through the years: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4pQNiLe... 

And my website page for screenshots of the reviews when the deck was on etsy - all 5 stars! https://inspiringalien.wixsite.com/inspiringali... 

I left etsy for ethical reasons - they were being unreasonable for international sellers, and have since sold it on my online store, which I do have to pay more for but at least I don't have to support a platform that doesn't reflect my values.

Also, this deck will not be sold to traditional publishers such as LoScarabeo, Llewellyn, Hay House.. I have my reasons not to do this and so to assure you that this deck will be at it's cheapest right now with this campaign.

 

THE GOALS, IN MONEY TERMS

So here's the raw numerical aspect of producing this quantity of decks and guidebooks.

  • To print out +1000 copies we'll need at least 12598$, for the guidebooks to limited editions 4700$, limited edition decks (50 copies) 1160$. We'll also need to pay 24% taxes for the Finnish government - let's not forget that!
  • This will total out production costs to 18458$ + 4429,92$ taxes = 22877,92$. To minimise any losses we raise this goal to 35000$, that way money won't be an issue in case something happens. Indiegogo will also hold a little percentage of this money for possible refunds and cancellations.
  • Then we consider profit - because we all deserve to be paid. Especially when "we" is just one person, me, Alvia. If there's no problems in the production and aftermath of that, I already have about 13000$ according to these calculations - however, I'd like to put that money onto quicker delivery. I also want to pay myself 15000$ on top of that as I've barely made any money on my decks previously because of my lack of business knowledge and pricing the deck very low in the beginning. I want to reward myself for making this far with this deck that truly came from my heart and having it reach yours as well. Some of the profit will go back into production such as quicker delivery, so the more we make, the quicker you'll receive the deck!
  • Lastly, I want to give back, so per each backer I'm giving 3$ as donations - 1$ for a charity (likely human rights, environments, poverty etc), 1$ for my family and 1$ for holding an Alien Party I wanna gift to my in person friends. I've thought that this Alien Party might even end up being an art show at the same time.
  • In case we don't get to 50000$, we'll print out as much as we can with the funds. I'm also opting in for the InDemand service to keep raising the funds after - that way the production would be delayed but it will still happen! Keep this in mind - the quicker the money gets raised, the quicker the decks will be delivered.

THE IMPACT

How will this campaign impact the creator?

This campaign will give me a much needed fresh start financially - you'll be supporting an independent artist, business owner and tarot reader.

Someone who's done it all on their own so far.

Someone who loves creating artwork, decks, youtube videos, creating in general.

You're giving me a chance to enjoy the fruits of my labour as well as put my money into what truly matters to me, such as ethical sourcing and offering workplaces for freelancers and those who want to help small businesses run their show.

This campaign will ripple into so many things other than decks and artwork. 

This will mark my first successful campaign and prepare me for the following ones to come - not only will I learn a lot, but I'll also feel a sense of achievement like NEVER BEFORE. It's satisfying!

Here's how it can possibly impact YOU:

  • Your decks will be beautifully produced and amazing quality - cardstock matters to me way too much. For the collectors edition, you'll receive a hand decorated product signed and numbered - you'll literally hold a piece of art in your hands.
  • You'll be updated throughout the campaign on what's happening with the book, decks and other designs as well as my life.
  • You'll allow so many tarot readers across the globe to receive this deck at less of an investment and not having to worry about the preciousness of the collectors edition. There's also a fantastic guidebook packed with information about starseeds, astrology, numerology and the reasons for my artistic choices. 
  • You can dive into the world of the inspiring little aliens - these aliens surprise you with their depth and love found in the vast cosmos. Many people feel drawn to this deck due to it's color and cuteness, but feel surprised of how mature and empowering these aliens can be. As a creator, they get even more straightforward with me and they directly connect to my higher self and starseed guides.

RISKS

This is my first campaign on crowdfunding and I've only done things the hard way by being self-resourceful with little funding, from my own pocket... So how can we combat the risks?

  • I know what it takes to put my work out there and I'm more and more knowledgeable of marketing and business at this point so I'll work my butt off to spread the word - and your help with this is BEYOND appreciated so keep sharing! If you've helped me share this - thank you to the moon and back!!
  • In the case of funding being unsuccessful, I'll keep running the campaign and promoting it as well as keep you updated on what happens to the deck - I've explained to you above, where the funds go, so the more we raise the more we can produce.
  • The last and most likely risk is production and shipping delays - this is very real and has happened to many other deck creators before, so I want you to keep this in mind as you choose to back.

HOW YOU CAN HELP

Can you help? Yes! Here's how:

  • SPEAK! Tell your friends about this awesome ALIEN INVASION!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Sign up to my newsletter to stay updated: http://eepurl.com/dLXtok 
  • Follow me on my social medias: @inspiringalien 

Thank you for reading this and being a part of my first crowdfunding campaign - it's wild and I'm honoured to have you being a part of this!

This is an alien themed tarot deck and guidebook set for starseeds, highly sensitive people and those who love colorful art as well as tarot collectors.
If you care about the quality of your tarot decks, this is the campaign to support!
Also if you care about the specialness and uniqueness of your tarot decks and want to support and independent artist, deck creator, tarot reader and a small business owner, this is the campaign to support.
